1a1(dkon brtsegs): @#/ /dkon brtsegs nga pa bzhugs so/ /
1b1(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya many+dzu shrI bud+d+ha k+She tra gu Na byU ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/
1b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
1b3(dkon brtsegs): bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag
1b4(dkon brtsegs): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong
2a1(dkon brtsegs): stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang /
2a2(dkon brtsegs): ngan song sel dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'
2a3(dkon brtsegs): brgyad khri bzhi stong la 'di lta ste/ thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
2a4(dkon brtsegs): ldog pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ lha bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis thams cad kyang byang chub sems
2a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po
2b1(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i tshangs pa bzhi khri nyis stong dang yang thabs
2b2(dkon brtsegs): cig go / 'di lta ste/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzang ris dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs can dang / lha ma
2b3(dkon brtsegs): yin gyi dbang po phrag rtsub dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab dga' dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi po thams cad kyang
2b4(dkon brtsegs): g.yog lha ma yin brgya stong phrag du ma yod pa dang thabs cig go / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / klu'i
2b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chu lha dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang / klu'i rgyal po gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / klu'i
2b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po sa 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang / klu'i rgyal po bdud las rgyal ba dang / klu'i rgyal
3a1(dkon brtsegs): po zla ba'i bla ma la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'di lta ste/ rgyal po chen po yul
3a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang / rgyal po chen po rnam
3a3(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi po thams cad kyang g.yog brgya stong du ma dang bcas pa dag dang / gnod sbyin kum
3a4(dkon brtsegs): bi ra dang / 'brog gnas dang / khab spu dang / yid bzang dang / blo gros bzang po dang / dbyibs bzang dang / kun
3a5(dkon brtsegs): nas kha dog dang / gnod sbyin mi 'khrugs pa dang / de dag dang / gnod sbyin gzhan brgya stong dang yang thabs cig go /
3a6(dkon brtsegs): yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por nye bar gnas shing bzhugs te lha dang / klu dang / gnod
3b1(dkon brtsegs): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'i lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dag dang / 'khor bzhi rnams kyis bsti stang du byas/
3b2(dkon brtsegs): bla mar byas/ rim gror byas nas mchod cing gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba dang / na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi gsos sman
3b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / yo byad bzang po mang po brnyes so/ /yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs dang / chos gos gsol/ lhung bzed bsnams te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen
3b4(dkon brtsegs): po dang thabs cig tu lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen po dang / sangs
3b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen pos me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po'i char chen po ni/ mngon par 'bebs/ sil snyan brgya stong ni/
3b6(dkon brtsegs): bkrol nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khyim du bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs te/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yang rab tu phyung ngo / /de nas
3b7(dkon brtsegs): d e'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad pas zhabs gang dang gang du bzhag pa'i zhabs bzhag pa de dang der pad+ma shing rta'i 'phang lo
4a1(dkon brtsegs): tsam| 'dab ma ni/ gser/ chu ba ni/ dngul/ ze ba ni/ bai DUR+Ya/ snying po ni/ nor bu bzang po dang ldan pa rnams byung ste/ pad+ma de dag gi dbus
4a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi snying po la byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug pa dag 'byung ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub
4a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i gzugs de dag pad+ma de dag dang bcas te rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po la lan bdun du bskor ba byed cing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /skye bo rnams
4a4(dkon brtsegs): la phan mdzad ded dpon gang / /yon gyi gnas gang dge ba rnams mdzad pa/ /shAkya khyu mchog blo zhi bdag nyid che/ /'jig rten mgon po de ni grong du gshegs/ /lha yi
4a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas su gang rnams rtsen pa dang / de bzhin rga dang 'chi las thar 'dod dang / /bdud kyi sde rnams pham par gang 'dod pa/ /des ni shAkya seng+ge mchod par gyis/ /'gro ba
4a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams la phan zhing thugs brtse'i phyir/ /bskal pa bye bar spyad pa rnam spyod pa/ /thub pa rnams kyi sgra yang rnyed par dka'/ /thub pa de ring rgyal po'i khab gshegs bzhed/ /
4a7(dkon brtsegs): zas skom de bzhin gos dang bzhon pa dang / /bu dang bu mo chung ma rnams dang ni/ /sbyin pa dpag med bsam yas gang btang ba/ /kun mkhyen de ni rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs/ /
4b1(dkon brtsegs): lag pa rkang pa mig dang rna ba dang / /sna dang yan lag dam pa mgo btang ste/ /kun btang yon tan ldan pa gtong phod pa/ /des ni kun mkhyen ye shes mchog brnyes so/ /sbyin dang
4b2(dkon brtsegs): dul dang sdom la gang bslab cing / /skyes bu dam pa tshul khrims ma nyams pa/ /bzod pa'i bdag nyid yon tan mchog ldan pa/ /zhi ba'i thugs de grong du deng gshegs so/ /sdug
4b3(dkon brtsegs): bsngal bying pa'i 'jig rten rab gzigs nas/ /brtson mchog bskal pa bye bar gang spyod cing / /bsam gtan mtha' yas mnyam pa med dang ldan/ /tshangs dbyangs de ni de ring
4b4(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer gshegs/ /drang srong chen po de yi shes rab ni/ /mtshungs med nam mkha'i khams ltar dpag tu med/ /bde gshegs de yi yon tan gzhan dag kyang / /spyod pa dang ni rnam
4b5(dkon brtsegs): par smin pas sbyangs/ /blo ldan gang gis bdud kyi sde bcom zhing / /mi g.yo go 'phang mya ngan med pa brnyes/ /chos kyi 'khor lo tshul bzhin rab bskor te/ /chos kyi dbang phyug de ni
4b6(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer gshegs/ /mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis brgyan pa'i sku/ /bde gshegs 'gyur bar su dag 'dod pa ni/ /snying la rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bzhag ste/ /mchod pa'i phyir ni
4b7(dkon brtsegs): de yi thad du song / /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug spang ba dang / /de bzhin nyon mongs gzhan las rgyal 'dod pa/ /de ni ston pa'i thad du nyer song la/ /mchod pa rnam mang mtha' yas
5a1(dkon brtsegs): myur du gyis/ /tshangs pa dang ni lha yi dbang phyug dang / /brgya byin nyid ni thob par su 'dod cing / /lha yi bde bas rtag tu rtse dga' ba/ /de ni thub pa
5a2(dkon brtsegs): mchod phyir nye bar song / /gling bzhi'i bdag po rgyal por 'gyur bya zhing / /rin chen mchog bdun rang gis thob pa dang / /bu mchog stong rnams kyang ni gang 'dod pa/ /sems
5a3(dkon brtsegs): can mchog la des myur mchod par gyis/ /khyim bdag tshong dpon khams kyi rgyal po dang / /mdzes pa'i gzugs dang g.yog 'khor dam pa dang / /longs spyod 'phel
5a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mchog rnams gang 'dod pa/ /de ni deng song thub la mchod pa gyis/ /gang su rnam par grol dang 'grol ba kun/ /thub pa rnams kyi chos mchog thos nas te/ /'dren
5a5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi sgra yang 'dir dkon gyi/ /de phyir chos nyan du ni deng myur dengs/ /de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po
5a6(dkon brtsegs): dag tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis bskul nas skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams me tog dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang
5a7(dkon brtsegs): phye ma'i phur ma thogs/ gser dang / dngul gyi me tog gi phur ma thogs/ /gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thogs/ rnga bo che dang / dung dang / rdza rnga dang / 'khar
5b1(dkon brtsegs): rnga dang / pi wang rgyud gcig pa dang / sgra snyan dang / gling bu dang / 'khar dkrol dang / kim pa la dang / na gu la dang / pi wang thogs te de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed
5b2(dkon brtsegs): cing / de bzhin gshegs pa la sems te sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob cing 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
5b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs g.yas pa sgo'i them pa la bzhag ma thag tu de nas grong khyer thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ lha
5b4(dkon brtsegs): dang mi'i sil snyan brgya stong yang ma dkrol bar sgra byung / lha'i me tog gi char yang rab tu bab ste/ sems can long ba rnams ni/ mig gis gzugs rnams mthong / sems
5b5(dkon brtsegs): can 'on pa rnams ni/ rna bas sgra thos/ sems can smyon pa rnams ni/ dran pa thob/ sems can yid brel ba rnams ni/ rtse gcig pa thob/ sems can gcer bu rnams
5b6(dkon brtsegs): ni| gos rnyed/ sems can bkres pa rnams ni/ zas rnyed/ sems can dbul po rnams ni/ nor rnyed do/ /de'i tshe na sems can gang yang 'dod chags kyis gzir ba
5b7(dkon brtsegs): med de| zhe sdang gis ma yin/ gti mug gis ma yin/ phrag dog gis ma yin/ ser snas ma yin/ khro bas ma yin/ da rgyal gyis ma yin no/ /de'i tshe na sems can
6a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang ldan zhing / phan tshun du pha mar 'du shes par gyur to/ /de la 'di skad ces
6a2(dkon brtsegs): bya ste| sangs rgyas skyes bu seng+ge che/ /stobs bcu grong khyer nam gshegs tshe/ /de yi mod la skye bo rnams/ /bde ba rgya cher dri med thob/ /long bas mig rnams mthong bar
6a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur| |'on ba thos pa'i mthu yang skyes/ /myos pa dag ni dran pa rnyed/ /yid brel rtse gcig de bzhin no/ /gcer bu dag ni gos rnyed do/ /bkres pa dag gis zas thob bo/ /
6a4(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu gang su dbul po yang / /dga' bar nor rnams rnyed par gyur/ /lha rnams bye ba mang po yang / /mkha' la gnas shing stobs rab mchod/ /smra ba'i seng+ge mchod pa'i
6a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir| |me tog char kyang rab tu 'bebs/ /rnga dang rdza rnga sil snyan dung / /nyams dga' byed pa dpag med pa/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni bsod nams kyis/ /grong khyer 'jug tshe sgra yang
6a6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung / /grong khyer kun tu rab g.yos te/ /de tshe nyams dga' mnyam par gnas/ /skye bos ngo mtshar 'di mthong nas/ /dga' ba shin tu rgya chen thob/ /'dod chags kyis ni
6a7(dkon brtsegs): mi gzir zhing / /de tshe khro blun ser sna med/ /nga rgyal la sogs nyes pas kyang / /gzir ba de tshe ma lus med/ /dga' bas khyab cing dang ba ste/ /mi rnams pha mar 'du shes gyur//
6b1(dkon brtsegs): gang tshe sangs rgyas stobs bcu po/ /skye bo bde phyir grong gshegs tshe/ /mi yi ma yin sil snyan rnams/ /ma dkrol bar ni sgra yang 'byung / /'jig rten lha min lha mir bcas/ /bde
6b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs 'od kyis rgyas par gang / /de ltar gang tshe sangs rgyas ni/ /'gro la phan phyir grong gshegs pa/ /de tshe ngo mtshar rmad byung ba/ /rnam pa mang po rab tu gda'/ /de nas bcom
6b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs pa dang / tshong dpon shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bu sdig bcom zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' khyim par gyur pa grong bar
6b4(dkon brtsegs): zhig na 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom gyis bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa/ dga' bar 'gyur ba/ dbang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba/ dul ba dang zhi gnas mchog
6b5(dkon brtsegs): brnyes pa/ dul ba dang zhi gnas mchog gi pha rol tu byon pa/ bsdams pa/ glang po ltar dbang po thul ba/ mtsho ltar dang ste rnyog pa med cing gsal ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
6b6(dkon brtsegs): sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku legs par brgyan pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa rgyang ring po nas gshegs pa mthong ngo / /mthong
6b7(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang de bcom ldan 'das la sems shin tu dad par gyur to/ /de sems shin tu dad nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
7a1(dkon brtsegs): bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub
7a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sdig bcom gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang
7a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / sangs rgyas
7a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing yang yongs su sbyong / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'tshal ba de lta bu yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
7a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sdig bcom la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir grong bar gyi phyogs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /phyogs gcig tu
7a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das mthong nas srog chags brgya stong mang po dag kyang lhags par gyur to/ /bar snang las kyang lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag
7a7(dkon brtsegs): gus pa dang bcas/ zhe sa dang bcas par thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
7b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po sdig bcom la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gcig dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
7b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su sbyong la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yang yongs su 'dzin
7b3(dkon brtsegs): to| |chos gcig po gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad la snying rje che zhing lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med
7b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o/ /de la lhag pa'i bsam pa khong du chud par bya ba gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ lhag pa'i bsam pa zhes bya ba ni /
7b5(dkon brtsegs): gang byang chub kyi phyir sems bskyed nas mi dge ba'i las gang yang mi spyod pa'o/ /ci mi spyod ce na/ 'dod chags mi spyod/ zhe sdang mi spyod/ gti mug mi spyod/ khyim pa'i rtags
7b6(dkon brtsegs): la sred pa mi spyod de/ rab tu byung nas kyang rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa mi 'dod cing / gang rab tu byung ba'i sgrub pa de la gnas pa yin no/ /de la rab tu
7b7(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i sgrub pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa'o/ /chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa gang
8a1(dkon brtsegs): zhe na| rigs kyi bu/ chos thams cad ces bya ba ni/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams
8a2(dkon brtsegs): so| |phung po lnga rab tu rtags pa ji ltar rab tu rtogs she na/ phung po lnga rnams sgyu ma lta bu dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang /
8a3(dkon brtsegs): ma 'gag par rab tu rtogs pa ste/ ji ltar rab tu rtogs pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar rab tu rtogs pa'o/ /gang gi tshe yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / mi
8a4(dkon brtsegs): shes| rlom sems su mi byed/ mi rtogs/ rnam par mi rtogs pa de'i tshe rtog pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba ni/ phung po rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya'o/ /gang phung po rab tu rtogs pa
8a5(dkon brtsegs): de| chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni/ rab tu byung ba'i sgrub pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
8a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams yongs su mi gtong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des ji ltar bdag gis chos de dag yongs su shes par gyur pa de ltar sems can thams cad la ston kyang
8a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can dang / chos kyang mi dmigs te/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gcig po 'di dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
8b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su sbyong / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yang
8b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su sgrub pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom mi skye
8b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te/ de dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba des shing ta la bdun srid du bar snang la mngon par 'phags so/ /'khor de'i nang nas srog
8b4(dkon brtsegs): chags nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye rgu'i srog chags khri bzhi stong ni/ chos rnams la
8b5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang
8b6(dkon brtsegs): gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas kha dog du ma dang / kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od 'phro ba 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang /
8b7(dkon brtsegs): dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu rnams byung ste/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par
9a1(dkon brtsegs): byas nas slar log ste bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan
9a2(dkon brtsegs): p a kun dga' bo stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar
9a3(dkon brtsegs): ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /chos rnams kun la mnga' dbang pha rol phyin/ /'dren pa khyod ni rgyal ba'i stobs la
9a4(dkon brtsegs): mnga'| |khyod ni thams cad mkhyen par 'jig rten grags/ /ci yi slad du 'dzum pa 'di bstan gsung / /thub pa chen po 'das pa ma lus mkhyen/ /de bzhin ma 'ongs ma
9a5(dkon brtsegs): lus rnams kyang mkhyen/ /da ltar dag kyang mkhyen pa ma smad pa/ /ci slad khyod kyis 'dzum pa 'di mdzad gsung / /rab 'bring tha ma'i sems dang ldan pa yi/ /sems can
9a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi ni spyod pa mkhyen/ /chags grol srid pa'i 'du shes pha rol phyin/ /mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba lung bstan gsol/ /lha rnams bye ba khrag khrig kun lhags
9a7(dkon brtsegs): te| |skyon ma mchis la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal zhing / /skye bo chos spyod 'di dag kun sdod kyi/ /thub pa chen po mtshungs med gsung dbyung gsol/ /khyod ni ye shes pha
9b1(dkon brtsegs): rol phyin/ /khyod la 'khrul pa yong mi mnga'/ /spyod pa'i bye brag kun mkhyen pa/ /ci zhig slad du 'dzum pa bstan/ /bye ba khrag khrig phrag stong lha 'di dag /chos rnams 'tshal
9b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i slad du 'dir lhags te/ /de bzhin dge slong tshogs kyang mang po dag /dam pa'i chos rnams nyan par 'tshal ba mchis/ /khyod la mchod pa'i phyir ni sil snyan rnams/ /rab
9b3(dkon brtsegs): tu bzang zhing mang ba brdung bar bgyid/ /skye bo mang po the tshom 'tshal ba kun/ /thub pa der 'dir the tshom myur gcad gsol/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
9b4(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom 'di shing ta la bdun srid du steng gi
9b5(dkon brtsegs): bar snang la 'dug pa mthong ngam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
9b6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom 'di bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis na bla na med pa yang
9b7(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bskal pa rims nad med pa la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du de
10a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang phyug ces bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ste / kun dga' bo/
10a2(dkon brtsegs): dper na/ da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang / nyan
10a3(dkon brtsegs): thos phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa de 'dra bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
10a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rab tu zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang phyug de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na yang de las mi lhag mi thu bar 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das phyogs
10a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas gshegs te mthar gyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs nas byon pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /dge slong gi dge
10a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dun rnams kyang stan ci 'os pa dag la 'khod do/ /de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun bzhugs par rig nas bdag nyid lag
10a7(dkon brtsegs): bdar te bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba dang / myang ba bzang po mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la bstabs te tshim par byas so/ /bstabs
10b1(dkon brtsegs): te tshim par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa bshos gsol ba dang / lhung bzed bzhag cing phyag bcabs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la ras bcos bu zung rin thang
10b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa sku la gsol to/ /sku la gsol nas kyang bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal te stan ran pa zhig blangs nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs
10b3(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / zhe sdang dang / 'chab pa gang
10b4(dkon brtsegs): nas 'byung ba lags/ mi shes pa ci las skye ba lags/ mi shes pa ji ltar 'gag pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di
10b5(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa yod pa las/ gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / zhe sdang dang / 'chab pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ngar
10b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas pas yon tan dang / nyes pa mi shes te/ de bas na/ mi shes pa zhes bya'o/ /gang ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa de yang dag pa ji
10b7(dkon brtsegs): lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa de la ni/ shes pa'am/ mi shes pa zhes gdags par mi nus so/ /de bas na/ rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyis 'du byed thams cad la gar yang 'gro
11a1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / gang nas kyang 'ong bar mi gdags pa de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ gang gar yang mi 'gro /gang nas kyang mi 'ong ba de
11a2(dkon brtsegs): la chos gang yang 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba med do/ /gang la 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba med pa de la skye ba med 'gag pa med de/ gang mi skye mi 'gag pa de shes pa'o/ /shes pa
11a3(dkon brtsegs): de ji lta bar mi shes pa'ang de bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nges par 'byung ba'am/ nges par mi 'byung ba'i chos de gang yang mi shes pa'i phyir ro/ /gang gi tshe nges par
11a4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'am/ nges par mi 'byung ba'i chos gang yang mi shes pa de'i tshe ye shes can zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol
11a5(dkon brtsegs): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis legs par gsungs pa ngo mtshar
11a6(dkon brtsegs): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ gal te bdag par skabs 'di kho nar 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par gyur na ni/ bdag nyid mtshams sbyor bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan
11a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra la chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar
11b1(dkon brtsegs): mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs nas phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe yang chos kyi sbyin pa la 'du bar 'gyur ba mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das zas phyis len pa spangs te
11b2(dkon brtsegs): lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag nas zhabs bkrus te nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i phyir gnas khang du gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag
11b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jog pa las bzhengs nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas 'di lta ste/ chos yang dag pa rab tu bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das gdan
11b4(dkon brtsegs): bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / nyan thos chen po gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po
11b5(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod
11b6(dkon brtsegs): d o| |'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang nang du yang dag 'jog las langs te lha'i bu bzhi khri nyis stong thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag
11b7(dkon brtsegs): g is yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig
12a1(dkon brtsegs): tu 'khod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang byang chub sems dpa' stong tsam gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du
12a2(dkon brtsegs): bdar nas lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /byang chub
12a3(dkon brtsegs): s ems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng+ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra yang byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya tsam gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas lhan
12a4(dkon brtsegs): cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /rgyal po ma skyes dgra yang dpung
12a5(dkon brtsegs): gi tshogs yan lag bzhis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste
12a6(dkon brtsegs): phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas kyang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig
12a7(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong du ma ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
12b1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa
12b2(dkon brtsegs): la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rgyal po'i khab
12b3(dkon brtsegs): k yi grong khyer chen po'i grong bar du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom gyis gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sangs rgyas
12b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa las brtsams te yongs su zhus pa de'i lan bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo tsam zhig bka' stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da yang byang chub sems
12b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su 'grub pa de las brtsams te/ ji ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
12b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi sde rnams pham par bgyid pa
12b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / gzhan mu stegs can rnams tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa zil gyis non par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su sbyong
13a1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa la
13a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod par 'gyur ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
13a3(dkon brtsegs): thob ste byang chub sems dpar gyur bzhin du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa'i don bgyid par 'gyur
13a4(dkon brtsegs): ba de ltar chos legs par rab tu bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'khor 'di na rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo byang chub don du gnyer pa 'dus shing mchis pa rnams
13a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das las chos mngon sum du thos nas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob par 'gyur te/ de dag dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob nas ji ltar
13a6(dkon brtsegs): thos pa bzhin du nan tan gyis bsgrub par 'gyur ba dag mchis so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ 'di lta bu'i chos bstan par byas na 'khor 'di lta bu ni/ mi
13a7(dkon brtsegs): mdzes kyi/ ngas ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas pas phyogs bcu kun tu phyogs re rer yang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po bkye la/ 'od zer re
13b1(dkon brtsegs): res kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po snang bas khyab par byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od kyang mi snang zhing / de dag 'od zer de dag
13b2(dkon brtsegs): gis zil gyis mnan nas phyir mig gi dbang po la snang bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams kyi 'od kyang mi mngon/ klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / nor bu dang / glog dang / me dang / skar ma'i
13b3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs dang / sems can gzhan gang gi 'od kyang mi mngon par 'gyur ba dang / gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa'i khor yug gang / khor yug chen
13b4(dkon brtsegs): po dang / btang bzung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / de ma yin pa gzhan ri'i rgyal po nag po dag dang / de ma yin pa gzhan ri nag po dag dang / rtsig pa
13b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / shing dang / nags tshal de dag thams cad 'od zer de dag gis thal byung du snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du bya'o/ /snyam du dgongs
13b6(dkon brtsegs): so| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu'i 'od zer bkye nas gsung bsal ba'i sgra mdzad pa dang / gsung bsal ba'i sgra des phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams
13b7(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas mu med pa dag sgras go bar gyur to/ /yang de'i tshe na shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das pa
14a1(dkon brtsegs): n a 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas 'od ces bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal brtsegs
14a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ming yang mi grag ste /
14a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' zhig gis yongs su gang ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs re
14a4(dkon brtsegs): re la yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa bye ba phrag brgya brgya yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
14a5(dkon brtsegs): po chos 'phags zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de chos 'phags zhes bya zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bcom ldan 'das dpal
14a6(dkon brtsegs): b rtsegs rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing chos ston pa'i spyan snga na shing ta la bdun srid tsam du bar snang
14a7(dkon brtsegs): la 'phags te lus mi snang bar gang 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs kyi chos ston to/ /de nas byang chub
14b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ chos 'di dag thams cad ni/ sgra tsam mo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di'i lus mi snang mod kyi/ bshad
14b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yang grag la sgra yang 'byin te/ gzugs yongs su grub pa yang mi snang ngo / /sgra ji lta bar gzugs kyang de bzhin no/ /gzugs ji lta bar chos thams cad kyang de bzhin
14b3(dkon brtsegs): no| |snyam mo/ /de ltar rab tu shes pas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa rnams bzod pa thob ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de chos 'phags zhes bya'o/ /byang
14b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' chos 'phags des snang ba chen po de yang mthong / gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas bcom ldan 'das dpal brtsegs rgyal po
14b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa de ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang
14b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du
14b7(dkon brtsegs): byung zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po yang gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags / rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das /snang ba 'di lta bu ni/ sngon chad ma mthong ngo / /de
15a1(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal brtsegs
15a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs su
15a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
15a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
15a5(dkon brtsegs): khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / 'di lta ste/ chos bsgrag par bya ba'i phyir ba spu'i khung bu thams cad
15a6(dkon brtsegs): nas 'od zer 'di dag btang ste gsung bsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtsegs rgyal po de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
15a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
15b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun de dag la yang
15b2(dkon brtsegs): blta ba dang / chos de yang nyan du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
15b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po chos 'phags byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag drug khri sum stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu stobs po ches lag
15b4(dkon brtsegs): pa bskum pa las brkyang ba dang / brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis skad cig thang gcig yud tsam de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi
15b5(dkon brtsegs): mjed 'dir gnas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par
15b6(dkon brtsegs): zhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de nyid la stong gsum gyi stong chen
15b7(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di me tog gi tshogs chen pos pus mo nub tsam du gang bar gyur to/ /sil snyan brgya stong gi sgra yang byung ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams 'di gdugs
16a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng bas kyang legs par brgyan par gyur to/ /spos mchog gis kyang yang dag par bdugs te/ gzhan 'phrul
16a2(dkon brtsegs): dbang byed kyi lha'i longs spyod dang khyad par med par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa de lta bu
16a3(dkon brtsegs): b stan nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
16a4(dkon brtsegs): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad+ma dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod
16a5(dkon brtsegs): d o| |yang de'i tshe lho phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA'i klung dgu cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rdul med
16a6(dkon brtsegs): p a zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng+ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
16a7(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med pas yongs su bskor cing chos ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams med do/ /yang sangs rgyas
16b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po che zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' de ci'i phyir lag na rin po che zhes bya zhe na/ yang
16b2(dkon brtsegs): r igs kyi bu de nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du sems can rnams la chos ston par 'dod pa de'i tshe lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed du 'dod pa sangs
16b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing de snyed lag gis byugs nas lag pa de las sangs rgyas rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo / /chos rin po che'i sgra dang / dge 'dun rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo / /sbyin pa
16b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo / /byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang /
16b5(dkon brtsegs): btang snyoms rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo / /de dag dang / gzhan yang chos rin po che'i sgra sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'byung ste/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu de lag na
16b6(dkon brtsegs): rin po che zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches snang ba chen po de yang mthong / gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas kyang bcom
16b7(dkon brtsegs): l dan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge'i rtsal gyi bsgyings pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu
17a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
17a2(dkon brtsegs): pa seng+ge'i rtsal gyi bsgyings pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po yang
17a3(dkon brtsegs): gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs
17a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA'i klung dgu cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
17a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa des gang 'di phyogs
17a6(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos bsgrag pa'i phyir ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'di ltar
17a7(dkon brtsegs): dag rab tu bkye zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo / /yang rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi
17b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs bshad par bzhed de/ der byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan
17b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das seng+ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag 'jig rten
17b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen
17b4(dkon brtsegs): bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de la yang blta ba dang / chos bstan pa de yang nyan du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu /
17b5(dkon brtsegs): khyod der song ste ci rung / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis khebs pa'i sems can rnams dang phrad pas na/ 'jig rten gyi khams de ni/ sdug
17b6(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ba'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge'i rtsal gyis
17b7(dkon brtsegs): bsgyings pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa des don gyi dbang ci zhig
18a1(dkon brtsegs): gzigs na/ bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gzhan dag kyang mchis bzhin du de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngan pa yongs
18a2(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des nga ci nas kyang sems
18a3(dkon brtsegs): can ngan pa rnams kyi nang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos bstan par bya'o/ /zhes yun ring po nas smon lam
18a4(dkon brtsegs): btab par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni/ de ltar thugs rje chen po dang ldan no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
18a5(dkon brtsegs): seng+ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten gyi khams
18a6(dkon brtsegs): mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thugs
18a7(dkon brtsegs): rje chen po bskyed de/ de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngan pa yongs su bzung ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de dka' ba mdzad pa ste/ de bzhin
18b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di lta bu ni/ 'byung bar dka'o/ /de mthong ba yang rnyed par dka'o/ /bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/
18b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu/ khyod de'i dus la bab par shes na song la/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing der rab tu sgrim par gyis shig /rmas par gyur ta re/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang
18b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni/ bsnyen par dka'o/ /de na sems can gzhan de dag kyang gtum zhing khro ba dag go /de skad ces bka' stsal pa
18b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
18b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ gang rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro bar 'gyur ba de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der rmas par 'gyur gyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la ni/ rjes su chags pa'ang ma
18b6(dkon brtsegs): mchis| khong khro ba yang ma mchis na/ bdag ci'i slad du rmas par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la sems can thams cad kyis phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal bar gshe zhing
18b7(dkon brtsegs): spyo ste brdegs shing btsogs nas bong ba dang / mtshon gyis btab kyang bzod par spro ste/ sems can gang la'ang gnod par bgyi ba'i sems mi bskyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de
19a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa des rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /khyed las gang byang
19a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che ltar bzod pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin par spro ba de rigs kyi bu 'di dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der dengs shig / b
19a3(dkon brtsegs): com ldan 'das des tshig de skad gsungs ma thag tu de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis stong gis dbyangs gcig tu
19a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che ltar bzod pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin par spro ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der
19a5(dkon brtsegs): mchi'o| |zhes gsol to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po che byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun
19a6(dkon brtsegs): du bdar te lhan cig tu sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gnas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
19a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po che 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ji lta bus bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i thad du 'gro zhing / sems can tshad
19b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa la ji ltar bde bar bya snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches de'i tshe ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lag pa g.yas
19b2(dkon brtsegs): pas bkab nas lag pa de las bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la bza' ba byung ba dang / btung ba 'dod pa rnams la btung ba dang / de bzhin du bzhon pa dang / gos dang / gser dang / dngul dang / bai
19b3(dkon brtsegs): DUR+Ya dang / mu tig dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / su dag ci 'dod par gyur pa thams cad de las byung bar gyur pa dang / sems can gang chos don du gnyer zhing chos
19b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa de dag gis kyang lag pa de las chos thos par gyur pa dang / de na sems can dpag tu med pa dag gis kyang chos mngon par rtogs par gyur pa dang / sems can gang
19b5(dkon brtsegs): n ad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis btab cing sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par
19b6(dkon brtsegs): b yas so| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa de lta bu 'di bstan nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lhan
19b7(dkon brtsegs): cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la
20a1(dkon brtsegs): lan gsum bskor ba byas nas smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad+ma de dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /yang de'i tshe
20a2(dkon brtsegs): n ub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i
20a3(dkon brtsegs): snying po zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
20a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni/ bai DUR+Ya bzang po 'ba' zhig las mngon par grub pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnam par gzhag
20a5(dkon brtsegs): pa med de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gis yongs su gang ngo / /yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' gang rnams 'gro yang
20a6(dkon brtsegs): rung / 'ong yang rung / 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / ldang yang rung / 'chag kyang rung ste/ de dag gis bai DUR+Ya'i sa chen po de las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
20a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de mthong ngo / /'di lta ste/ dper na/ shin tu phyis pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor la bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba de bzhin du
20b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bai DUR+Ya'i sa chen po de las de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ngo / /mthong nas chos kun 'dri ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yang de dag la lung ston to/ /
20b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag kyang chos thos nas bzod pa thob bo/ /'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bcom ldan 'das de'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i dbus su yang nor
20b3(dkon brtsegs): bu rin po che chen po mngon par grub ste/ nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad snang bar byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na me tog kha zum pa dang / me tog
20b4(dkon brtsegs): kha bye ba las nyin mtshan bgrang ba ma gtogs par nyi ma dang / zla bar mngon par yang med/ nyin mtshan du mngon pa yang med do/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i
20b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam khyad par blo gros zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
20b6(dkon brtsegs): smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis snang ba chen po de yang mthong / gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu
20b7(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub
21a1(dkon brtsegs): s ems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de la 'di skad
21a2(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po yang gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
21a3(dkon brtsegs): des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang+gA'i klung dgu cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig
21a4(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
21a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhes la chos ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig tshad med grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang /
21a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ chos bsgrag pa'i phyir ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer 'di dag rab tu bkye zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo / /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems
21a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das
21b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa
21b2(dkon brtsegs): de yang blta ba dang / chos bstan pa de yang nyan du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig /de nas byang chub sems
21b3(dkon brtsegs): d pa' smon lam khyad par blo gros byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te lhan cig tu sems bskyed pa
21b4(dkon brtsegs): gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir gnas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros 'di snyam
21b5(dkon brtsegs): du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ji lta bus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i thad du
21b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar bya snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis de'i tshe ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang dag sems
21b7(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur ba'i sems can de dag thams cad mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa dang / sems
22a1(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba'i me yang rab tu zhi bar gyur pa dang / sems can gang dag bkres pa dang skom pas
22a2(dkon brtsegs): nyen pa yi dwags dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can de dag dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa de dag thams cad bkres pa dang skom pa dang bral zhing / bde ba
22a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog dang ldan par gyur pa 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dge slong bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba bzhin te/ skad cig de nyid la sems can de dag bde
22a4(dkon brtsegs): ba rnam pa 'di lta bu skyes nas skad cig de nyid la sems can gang yang 'dod chags sam/ zhe sdang ngam/ gti mug gam/ khro ba'am/ nga rgyal lam/ 'chab pa'am/
22a5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshig pa'am/ phrag dog gam/ ser sna'am/ g.yo ba'am/ tha ba'am/ gnod sems kyis gzir ba med pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad
22a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang skad cig de nyid la byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang ldan zhing / phan tshun pha mar 'du shes par gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par
22a7(dkon brtsegs): 'du byas te/ de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di
22b1(dkon brtsegs): b stan nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
22b2(dkon brtsegs): shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas smon lam ji lta ba
22b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du byung ba'i pad+ma de dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /bam po gnyis pa/ /yang de'i tshe byang phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i
22b4(dkon brtsegs): k lung stong phrag drug cu rtsa gsum gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
22b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na khyim pa gos dkar po gyon
22b6(dkon brtsegs): pa med de/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gos ngur smrig 'chang ba sha stag go /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med kyi ming yang med cing mngal gyi gnas kyang mi shes so/ /
22b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gos ngur smrig gyon zhing skyil mo krung bcas par brdzus te 'byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das de yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la sangs
23a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /de la sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ gang 'di
23a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed de/ de ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la 'jug pa
23a3(dkon brtsegs): gzungs kyi rtsa ba'i gnas/ sems mi g.yeng ba/ gtong ba rjes su gtong ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rjes su 'jug pa/ mtshan ma med pa la yang dag par sgrub pa/ smon pa med pa tshol
23a4(dkon brtsegs): ba| rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rab tu rtogs pa/ 'dun pa'i bya ba rgyun chags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pa de la
23a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dad pa/ chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa de dag la yongs su rtog pa med pa/ rtog pa yang dag par chad pa de yang mi mthong ba 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi
23a6(dkon brtsegs): phyag rgya zhes bya'o/ /yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ rigs
23a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu de'i smon lam gyi khyad par ni/ 'di lta ste/ sems can ji snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthong ba na de dag thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum
23b1(dkon brtsegs): cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan par 'gyur pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos snang ba chen po de yang mthong / /gsung bsal ba'i
23b2(dkon brtsegs): sgra de yang thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas bcom ldan 'das sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo
23b3(dkon brtsegs): bos phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
23b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
23b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das| snang ba chen po 'di dang gsung gsal ba'i sgra chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
23b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba des rigs kyi bu de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ lho phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di
23b7(dkon brtsegs): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung drug khri sum stong gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
24a1(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin
24a2(dkon brtsegs): g shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag nas byang chub
24a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / 'di lta ste/ chos bsgrag pa'i phyir ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer 'di dag rab tu bkye zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo / /gsol
24a4(dkon brtsegs): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams de mi mjed ces bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi
24a5(dkon brtsegs): khams de na sems can 'dod chags la mi mjed/ zhe sdang la mi mjed/ gti mug la mi mjed/ sdug bsngal la mi mjed de/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams
24a6(dkon brtsegs): de mi mjed ces bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can de dag las la la spyos pa dang / mi snyan par brjod pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / brdegs pa
24a7(dkon brtsegs): bzod cing dang du len par bgyid pa ma mchis sam/ 'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa sel tam/ de bzhin du zhe sdang gi sems dang / gti mug gi sems sel ba mchis
24b1(dkon brtsegs): sam| bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can de dag las gang yon tan 'di dag dang ldan pa ni/ nyung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ sems can de
24b2(dkon brtsegs): dag las/ phal cher ni/ gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / zhe sdang mang ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis kun tu dkris so/ /gsol pa/ bcom
24b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ mi mjed ces bgyi ba'i ming 'di thog tu ma bab bo/ /gal te sems can de dag bzod par 'gyur na ni/ de yang rung na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar
24b4(dkon brtsegs): mi bzod pas na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das/ mi mjed ces bgyi ba'i ming 'di thog tu ma bab bo/ /bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rigs
24b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la bsnyen
24b6(dkon brtsegs): bkur byas pa/ bzod pa dang / dul ba dang / nges pa dang ldan pa dag yod de/ de dag ni/ sems can thams cad kyis spyos/ bsdigs/ mtshon gyis btab kyang ji snyam mi
24b7(dkon brtsegs): mjed de/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyis mi 'phrog go /rigs kyi bu/ skyes bu dam pa de dag gi ming gis 'jig rten gyi khams de mi mjed ces
25a1(dkon brtsegs): brjod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de yang de na sems can kha cig sdig pa'i chos dang ldan pa/ mu cor smra ba/ khro
25a2(dkon brtsegs): pa| gtum pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gzhol ba/ ngan 'gro'i spyod yul ba/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mi gus pa/
25a3(dkon brtsegs): phrag dog la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can ngan pa de dag gis de tsam du spyos shing smad de gnod par byas shing skur kyang bcom ldan 'das/ de snying rje che bas bzod cing
25a4(dkon brtsegs): dang du len te/ sa dang mnyam pa'i sems rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba med pas de bsti stang du byas kyang khengs par mi byed/ bsti stang du ma byas kyang 'dud
25a5(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed de/ de spyos shing brgyad kyang mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog/ gnod par mi 'gyur/ mi 'phrog/ mi chags/ mi skyo ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams
25a6(dkon brtsegs): de mi mjed ces bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan
25a7(dkon brtsegs): gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar bdag 'jig rten gyi khams der de tsam du smad pa'i sems
25b1(dkon brtsegs): ngan rnams kyi nang du ma skyes pa ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod de skad ma zer cig /de ci'i
25b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang dang shar gyi mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams stong gis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
25b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang phyug chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na
25b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams rab tu bde ba dang ldan no/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong gi bde ba bzhin te/ sems can rnams kyang
25b5(dkon brtsegs): bde ba de lta bu dang ldan no/ /yang rigs kyi bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams stong gis brgyan pa der lo bye ba brgya stong du tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa bas ni/ gang 'jig rten gyi
25b6(dkon brtsegs): khams mi mjed du tha na se gol gtogs pa tsam du sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems bskyed na/ de bas 'di bsod nams ches mang du bskyed na/ gang nyin
25b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan du yongs su dag par gnas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba de la byang chub sems
26a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
26a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi
26a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de yang blta ba dang / chos bstan pa de yang nyan du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das des bka'
26a4(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa| rigs kyi bu/ khyod de'i dus la dbab par shes na song zhig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po byang chub
26a5(dkon brtsegs): s ems dpa' bye ba phrag bcus yongs su bskor cing lhan cig tu sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi
26a6(dkon brtsegs): mjed 'dir gnas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul
26a7(dkon brtsegs): j i lta bus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'i thad du 'gro snyam nas de de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas stong
26b1(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis khebs par gyur pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs de las kyang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs
26b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi char rab tu 'bab/ sil snyan brgya stong yang 'khrol/ mu tig gi rgyan phreng brgya stong yang mngon par 'phyang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan brgya stong
26b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'phyang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma
26b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa
26b5(dkon brtsegs): j i snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par shes pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par
26b6(dkon brtsegs): b yas so| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di bstan nas
26b7(dkon brtsegs): b yang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
27a1(dkon brtsegs): thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor
27a2(dkon brtsegs): ba byas nas smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad+ma dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te phyogs bcu kun gyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi
27a3(dkon brtsegs): k hams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa dag tu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa rnams kyis snang ba chen po de yang
27a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong / gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos nas rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhus te 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags nas de dag thams
27a5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom
27a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod
27a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po 'jig rten
27b1(dkon brtsegs): skyong ba dang / de ma yin pa'i lha'i bu gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad kyis 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po de yang mthong / gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po de yang thos nas bcom
27b2(dkon brtsegs): l dan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
27b3(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
27b4(dkon brtsegs): b ye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa ji snyed pa de dag nas byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med pa 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'jig rten gyi
27b5(dkon brtsegs): khams mi mjed 'di rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag ji 'dra ba de 'dra bar lhag chad med cing khyad ma zhugs par mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi
27b6(dkon brtsegs): zhing de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i kha dog dang / mchu zheng ci 'dra bar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku'i yongs su grub pa yang de 'dra bar byang chub
27b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de dag gis so so nas mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / nyan thos chen po phun
28a1(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / longs spyod dang kun spyod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'dir yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis so so nas
28a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / bdag nyid kyang rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug pa snyam du shes pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do/ /de nas
28a3(dkon brtsegs): b yang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rgya mtsho chen po de mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
28a4(dkon brtsegs): nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
28a5(dkon brtsegs): gsol to/ /phyogs bcu rnams su grags pa mtha' yas blo/ /'jig rten lhar bcas 'dir ni lam me ste/ /thub pa'i thugs ni sems can thams cad kyis/ /tshad
28a6(dkon brtsegs): gzung mi nus de phyir khyod bsam yas/ /phyogs bcu dag nas rgyal sras dpag med pa/ /chos tshol slad du de ring 'dir lhags nas/ /bcom ldan 'das la kun
28a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang gus bcas gnas/ /smra ba'i mchog gis chos rnams rab tu gsungs/ /phyogs rnams ma lus par ni brjod grags pa/ /tshul khrims brtson 'grus ting 'dzin
28b1(dkon brtsegs): blo rnams kyis/ /seng+ge ltar ni 'jigs med khyod mdzes pa/ /nam mkha' dag la nyi ma bzhin du gsal/ /lha dang klu dang lha min gsang ba pa/ /dge bsnyen pho mo dge slong dge
28b2(dkon brtsegs): slong ma| |thams cad gus bcas thal mo sbyar gnas kyi/ /bcom ldan phan bzhed chos ni bshad du gsol/ /khyod ni 'das mkhyen de bzhin ma 'ongs dang / /da ltar yang
28b3(dkon brtsegs): ni shin tu nges par mkhyen/ /lus can mos pa ji bzhin khyod gzigs la/ /the tshom chen po sel ba'i chos bshad gsol/ /thub pa rgyal sras ji ltar spyad pas na/ /zhing
28b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams dag pa rdul med 'thob par 'gyur/ /ji ltar smon lam 'grub pa 'thob 'gyur ba/ /de ni 'dren pas bdag la myur bshad gsol/ /ji ltar ser sna'i dri mas mi
28b5(dkon brtsegs): gos shing / /ji ltar tshul khrims ma nyams 'gyur ba dang / /bsdigs pa dang ni de bzhin skur pa dang / /brnyas pa dag kyang thub pa ji ltar bzod/ /sdug bsngal du mas
28b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gzir ba yi/ /'jig rten dag gi sdug bsngal bzlog slad du/ /bskal pa bye ba mang por rgyal sras rnams/ /ji ltar brtson 'grus rtsom zhing spyod par 'gyur/ /
28b7(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu sems ni rtse gcig mnyam gzhag cing / /bsam gtan gnas pa spyod yul rnam dag ste/ /pad+ma chu yi nyes pas mi gos ltar/ /ji ltar 'dod pa dag gis gos
29a1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur/ /thub pa ji ltar zab mo'i chos smra zhing / /mkhas pa 'jig rten 'das pa'i blo ldan 'gyur/ /brtan pa ji ltar bdud sde bcas
29a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom nas/ /byang chub rdul bral bla med reg par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces
29a3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to/ /byams pa/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan shoms shig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gdan de la bzhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
29a4(dkon brtsegs): gi yon tan bkod pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par 'jug pa'i tshul la mkhas pa sgrub pa dang por bsam zhing nan tan bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad do/ /de nas
29a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang ci zhig gzigs na bdag gdan bting du
29a6(dkon brtsegs): bcug ste/ gnas brtan kun dga' bo dang / maud+gal gyi bu chen po la bka' ma stsal/ de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams gdan 'ding
29a7(dkon brtsegs): du bcug pa las na/ gtam 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gi phyir brtsams nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongs su spangs pa'i
29b1(dkon brtsegs): gtam zhig 'byung ba ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni/ chos bstan pa 'di'i snod ma yin pa lta zhig snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
29b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po byams pas de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng+ge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad bzhi 'bum pa/ rin
29b3(dkon brtsegs): po che du mas spras pa/ lha'i ras bcos bu brgya stong du ma bting ba/ shing bal 'jam zhing reg na bde ba bshams nas khri de'i 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
29b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas so/ |de nas bcom ldan 'das khri snga ma las bzhengs nas seng+ge'i khri de la bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das seng+ge'i khri de
29b5(dkon brtsegs): la bzhugs ma thag tu stong gsum gyi ston chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la
29b6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/
29b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi bsam pas yang dag par zhugs pa dang / sems can la snying rje ba dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brtan pa ste/
30a1(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i
30a2(dkon brtsegs): bu| gzhan yang chos gcig dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yongs
30a3(dkon brtsegs): su sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ /chos gcig po gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la
30a4(dkon brtsegs): slob cing 'dod pa dang / 'dun pa bskyed pa ste/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na tshig 'di skad ces/ gal te
30a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag skye ba thams cad du rab tu ma byung na/ sangs rgyas thams cad bslus par gyur cig ces smras te/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas de bzhin
30a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' de ltar slob pa ni/ skye ba thams cad
30a7(dkon brtsegs): du rab tu 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung gdon mi za bar khyim gyi gnas nas 'byung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di
30b1(dkon brtsegs): lta ste| khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par 'byung ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnyed pa'i mchog yin pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ rab tu 'byung ba la mngon par dga'
30b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan bcu yongs su 'dzin to/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa la chags par mi 'gyur ba dang / dgon pa'i gnas la dga' ba
30b3(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul yang 'thob pa dang / de chung ma dang / bu pho dang / bu mo la sred par mi 'gyur ba dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i chos rnam par spong ba dang /
30b4(dkon brtsegs): bde 'gror 'gro ba'i chos la brten pa dang / sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su mi nyams pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa 'thob pa dang / de la lha rnams
30b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / de la mi ma yin pa rnams kyis bsrung bar 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu/ rab tu 'byung ba la mngon par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan bcu po de
30b6(dkon brtsegs): dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang / sems can thams
30b7(dkon brtsegs): cad dgrol bar 'dod pas rgyun du rab tu 'byung ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba la shin tu dga' bar bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ chos gcig po de dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
31a1(dkon brtsegs): smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang chos gnyis
31a2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ gnyis
31a3(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi theg pa mi 'dod/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam la mi dga'/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang mi bsten/
31a4(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi bslab pa la mi slob/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos mi ston/ gzhan yang nyan thos kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug cing / rang sangs
31a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi theg pa yang de bzhin pa dang / gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du
31a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de la gzhan dag sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ gnas bcu yongs su 'dzin to/ /bcu
31a7(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gi dge 'dun rab tu rnyed pa
31b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de'i tshul yongs su sgrog cing chos ston pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de brgya
31b2(dkon brtsegs): byin nyid dam/ tshangs pa nyid kyi phyir sems dang sems las byung ba rgya chen po bskyed pa dang / mir gyur na yang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas mthong
31b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lha dang mi rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / g.yog 'khor mi phyed par 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med grangs med pa yongs su
31b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu
31b5(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du bya ba la bkod pa dang / rang sang rgyas kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba la bkod pa bas/ gang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gcig yang dag par rdzogs
31b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/ de ni/ de bas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas skyes pas ni/
31b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad par mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba med na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi/ shA ri'i bu/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba
32a1(dkon brtsegs): yod na| sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su gdags pa yang yod par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan
32a2(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub kyi sems la rab tu 'god pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ gnas bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin to/ /shA ri'i bu/ chos gnyis po de dag dang ldan na/ byang
32a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang chos
32a4(dkon brtsegs): gsum dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin te/ gsum
32a5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa dang / zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi sdom
32a6(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas par 'gyur ba'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa bcu 'thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang
32a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di mi 'jigs par grong du 'jug pa dang / mi 'jigs par 'khor la chos ston pa dang / mi 'jigs par kha zas za ba dang / mi 'jigs par gtsug lag khang du 'jug
32b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mi 'jigs par dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug pa dang / mi 'jigs par lung 'bogs pa dang / mi 'jigs par slob dpon dang mkhan po'i drung du 'gro ba dang / mi 'jigs
32b2(dkon brtsegs): par byams pa dang ldan pas 'khor la rjes su ston pa dang / mi 'jigs par gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad la spyod pa dang / des smras
32b3(dkon brtsegs): pa gzung bar 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu/ tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa bcu po de dag 'thob bo/ /shA ri'i bu/ zang zing med pa'i sems
32b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis chos sbyin pa sbyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ yon tan gyi chos bcu yongs su 'dzin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di de sdig pa mi 'dod pa yin/ de shes kyis khe mi 'dod
32b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/ de grags pa mi 'dod pa yin/ de khyim yongs su mi 'dzin pa yin/ de khyim la ser sna med pa yin/ de gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang /
32b6(dkon brtsegs): yo byad ngan mngon tsam gyis chog shes pa yin/ des smras pa gzung bar 'os pa yin/ lha dag kyang de'i drung du 'gro ba yin/ de tshul bzhin ma yin pa rnam par rtog pa yid
32b7(dkon brtsegs): la byed pa mi skyed pa yin/ de sangs rgyas kyi sems la sems bskyed pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu/ zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
33a1(dkon brtsegs): ni| yon tan gyi chos bcu bo de dag yongs su 'dzin to/ /shA ri'i bu/ dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ yon
