33a2(dkon brtsegs): tan gyi phan yon bcu yongs su 'dzin to/ /bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di 'du 'dzin rnam par spong ba dang / rab tu dben pa la brten pa dang / de bsam gtan la sems
33a3(dkon brtsegs): dmigs par 'gyur ba dang / bya ba mang por mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas rnams 'dod pa dang / de'i lus bde ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / de'i tshangs par spyod
33a4(dkon brtsegs): pa bar chad du mi 'gyur ba dang / tshogs chung ngus ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa dang / des tshig dang yi ge bstan pa rnams chud mi za ba dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams
33a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi don rab tu shes pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ yon tan gyi phan yon bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin to/ /
33a6(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu/ chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de
33a7(dkon brtsegs): lta bu yongs su 'dzin to/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bu 'dod pa
33b1(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu yongs su 'dzin te/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bden pa smra ba yin/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed cing nga rgyal bcom pa yin /
33b2(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal tshar gcad pa'i phyir zhugs shing phrag dog dang ser sna yongs su spangs pa yin/ /pha rol 'byor pa la yid dga' ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ bden
33b3(dkon brtsegs): par smra ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de'i kha nas ut+pa la'i dri ngad 'byung ba dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs
33b4(dkon brtsegs): su dag par 'gyur ba dang / lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi tshad mar gyur cing tshig 'khrul ba med par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung phun sum tshogs pa yongs su
33b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' bden par smra ba'i phan yon yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ nga rgyal bcom pa'i byang
33b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gang 'di ngan 'gror skye ba rnam par spong ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ rnga mo dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang / rta'i skye gnas
33b7(dkon brtsegs): dang | de bzhin du gzhan smad par skyes pa rnam par spong ba dang / mi smad par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan phyir rgol ba dang mi mdza' ba rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba
34a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu/ bzhi po de dag ni/ nga rgyal bcom pa'i byang
34a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i phan yon no/ /shA ri'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ phrag dog dang ser sna yongs su spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ bzhi gang
34a3(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de gtong ba'i sems la mi rmongs pa dang / mu ge 'byung ba'i dus na sbyin bdag tu 'gyur ba dang / de tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'ongs na khyim
34a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi sgo gcod par mi 'gyur ba dang / de'i gtong ba dang len pa la su yang phrag dog mi byed pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ bzhi po de dag ni/ phrag dog dang ser sna yongs su
34a5(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no/ /shA ri'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ pha rol 'byor pa la dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' phan yon te/ bzhi
34a6(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag bzung ste/ bdag 'di dag gi ched du go cha bgos nas 'di dag bde ba la sbyar bar bya ba yin no/ sems
34a7(dkon brtsegs): can 'di dag ni/ rang gi mthus bsgrubs pa'i longs spyod kyis bde bar 'tsho'o/ /zhes dga' ba rnyed pa dang / de'i longs spyod rgyal po dang / rkun po dang / me dang / chu la
34b1(dkon brtsegs): sogs pa dang / bgo skal la spyod pa mi mdza' ba rnams kyis mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba dang / gang gi tshe bu phun sum tshogs pa dang / g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs
34b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa rnyed pa de'i tshe de la rgyal po yang dga' bar 'gyur na/ sems can gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de longs spyod dang / kun
34b3(dkon brtsegs): tu spyod pa rgya chen po la sems 'jug pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ bzhi po de dag ni/ pha rol 'byor pa la dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no/ /shA ri'i bu/ chos
34b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to//
34b5(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta
34b6(dkon brtsegs): bu yongs su 'dzin cing yongs su sbyong ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnam pa phun sum tshogs
34b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos kun tu tshol zhing / de gang la chos nyan pa de la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar yon tan 'di dag yongs su sgrub pa de kun
35a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dri zhing des chos de thos nas de bzhin du nan tan byed pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas
35a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar smon cing / de tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ba ste/ de tshul khrims yongs su dag pas gang dang gang du smon
35a3(dkon brtsegs): bde dang der skyes te/ de der skyes nas de sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa la sems shing rtog ste/ nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa'am/ byang chub sems
35a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa'am/ longs spyod dang kun tu spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa mtshan mar 'dzin te/ des de dag mtshan mar bzung nas gus pa dang
35a5(dkon brtsegs): bcas| zhes dang bcas shing thal mo sbyar te de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du song nas bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpas ji ltar spyad na/ sangs
35a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rgya chen po yongs su 'dzin ces kun tu zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen te/ gang rnams
35a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rgya chen po yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba'i gnas de dag ston cing / yang dag par rab tu 'chad de/ des de
35b1(dkon brtsegs): thos nas de bzhin du nan tan byed pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dang ldan zhing / bya ba dang ldan pa yin te/ de mi shes pa
35b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su sbyong zhing bya ba ma yin pa yongs su spong ngo / /de la ye shes ni/ gang / bya ba ni/ gang zhe na/ ye shes zhes bya ba ni/ gang dmigs pa la dmigs pa ni/ ye
35b3(dkon brtsegs): shes te| nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang bral ba'o/ /bya ba zhes bya ba ni/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams la nan tan byed pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang
35b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rgyu dang 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin te/ de la rgyu ni/ gang / 'byung ba ni/ gang zhe na/ rgyu zhes bya ba ni/ gang 'di tshul bzhin
35b5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste/ gang las phyin ci log bzhi la sems can rnams gnas par 'gyur ba'o/ /de ni/ tshul bzhin la brtson
35b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/ de la tshul bzhin sbyor ba gang zhe na/ gang 'di chos thams cad yid la byed pa ste/ 'byung ba yang de nyid yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang
35b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyang rab tu shes/ zhing gi ngo bo nyid kyang rab tu shes so/ /de la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid gang / zhing gi ngo bo
36a1(dkon brtsegs): nyid ni| gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba de ni/ ming tsam mo/ /zhing gi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba de yang ming
36a2(dkon brtsegs): tsam mo| |gang ming tsam de dben par shes shing / ji ltar chos gang yang mi dmigs pa de ltar shes pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ chos lnga po de dag dang
36a3(dkon brtsegs): l dan na| byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi g.yo zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin cing yongs
36a4(dkon brtsegs): su sbyong ngo / /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang chos drug dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
36a5(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin te/ drug gang zhe na/ shA
36a6(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu| 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sbyin pa po sbyin bdag tu 'gyur ba ste/ de dngos po gang phangs pa yid du 'ong ba mngon par 'dod par
36a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba de yongs su gtong yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / yid dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa dang / yid bde ba skyes nas 'di ltar
36b1(dkon brtsegs): gang 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mngon par smon pas bdag gis sbyin pa chen po dang / theg pa chen po dang / bya ba chen po yongs su
36b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par bya'o/ /kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems kyis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub par mi nus so/ /snyam du rtog go/ des de ltar brtags nas
36b3(dkon brtsegs): bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ des rang gi lus dang / srog yongs su gtong yang yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur na/ gzhan nor gyi rnam pa
36b4(dkon brtsegs): dang | chung ma dang / bu pho dang / bu mo lta smos kyang ci dgos/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di la ji snyam du sems/ gang thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di'i bstan pa ji
36b5(dkon brtsegs): lta bu zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin te/ de'i
36b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir de byang chub thob pas na/ thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim par gyur pa yang rung / rab tu byung
36b7(dkon brtsegs): ba yang rung ste/ tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par 'dzin pa la rab tu gnas pa yin te/ de srog gi phyir yang bslab pa las mi 'da'o/ /gang tshul khrims kyi sdom
37a1(dkon brtsegs): p a yang dag par bzung ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
37a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bsngo ste/ bdag ni/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o/ /zhes dga' ba rnyed cing mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/ mngon par dga' bas tshangs par spyad pa spyod de/
37a3(dkon brtsegs): de tshangs par spyod cing bde bar nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed do/ /de bde bar chos mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi tshul dang ldan par yang dag par so sor rtogs
37a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par so sor rtogs pa la gnas pa ni/ zab mo la bzod pa skye'o/ /bzod pa skyes pa ni/ lta ba drang por 'gyur ro/ /lta ba drang po ni/ yang
37a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par nan tan byed par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag pa'i nan tan la gnas pa ni/ khams gsum la mngon par mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /de khams gsum la
37a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par mi dga' bas skrag par 'gyur ro/ /skrag pas 'byung ba tshol lo/ /'byung ba mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar bdag sdug bsngal ba ltar
37a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin te/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad kyi khur khyer la nye bar zhi ba ma gtogs par 'di dag gi bde ba'i rgyu gzhan
37b1(dkon brtsegs): med do| |snyam mo/ /de de ltar so sor rtog pa na snying rje chen po 'thob bo/ /de cher snying rje bas thams cad mkhyen pa ma thob kyi bar du mgo dang / gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du
37b2(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus mi 'dor ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzod pa'i go cha gyon cing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin gyi/ nga rgyal gyi stobs
37b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa ma yin no/ /des spyos/ brgyad/ brdegs/ bsdigs kyang bzod pa sgrub ste/ pha rol la mi 'khrug/ gnod par mi sems so/ /de 'di ltar sems bskyed de/
37b4(dkon brtsegs): gal te bdag la sems can de dag gis ri rab tsam gyi tho bas brdegs shing bskal pa bye ba'i bar du rgyun mi 'chad par gshe yang bdag gi gnod sems dang / tha
37b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang | zhe sdang gis sems bskyed par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can de dag ni/ ma bslab pa/ bdag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la
37b6(dkon brtsegs): slob par 'dod pa'o/ /snyam nas de ji lta ji lta bur sems can rnams kyis spyos pa dang / brgyad pa dang / brdegs pa de lta de lta bur snying rje chen po bskyed de/ bdag
37b7(dkon brtsegs): gis sems can 'di dag bskyab par bya'o/ /bdag sems can 'di dag gi don du go cha bgos nas bdag gis sems can 'di dag bzung ba yin te/ bdag gis
38a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag 'khor ba las yongs su thar par bya'i/ bdag gis 'di dag la gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / zhe sdang gi sems bskyed par
38a2(dkon brtsegs): ni mi bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /de de ltar bzod pa'i go cha bgos pas phun sum tshogs pa bcu 'thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di la rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang / longs
38a3(dkon brtsegs): spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / dge ba'i
38a4(dkon brtsegs): bshes gnyen phun sum tshogs pa dang / chos nyan pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / chos la nan tan byed pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / shi 'phos nas kyang sangs
38a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mthong ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed pa dang / mthong nas kyang dad pa thob pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ bzod pa'i go cha bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ phun
38a6(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pa bcu po de dag 'thob bo/ shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams
38a7(dkon brtsegs): shing yi dam la brtan pa yin no/ /de 'di ltar brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ gal te bdag gis sems can re re'i don gyi phyir yang phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa bye bar
38b1(dkon brtsegs): yang 'khor bar bya'o/ /zhes tshul 'di dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa 'di dang / spyod pa 'di dang / sems zhi ba 'di dang / yi dam 'di dang / dge ba'i bsam pa 'di
38b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / snying rje'i sems 'dis sems can 'di dag thams cad kyi ched du bskal pa de snyed du 'khor bar byas te/ 'di ltar bdag gis sems can 'di dag yongs su
38b3(dkon brtsegs): mi gtong ngo / /snyam nas brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /yang shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po
38b4(dkon brtsegs): c he sna bdun gyis yongs su gang bar byas te sems bskyed pa sems bskyed pa tsam la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
38b5(dkon brtsegs): la sbyin pa byin pa ste/ tshul 'di dang stobs bskyed pa 'dis phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa bye bar sbyin pa byin pa bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang lhag pa'i bsam pa phun
38b6(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pa/ snying rje chen po la gnas pas 'di lta bu'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha'i sems bskyed na/ de de bas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ brtson
38b7(dkon brtsegs): 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub sems dpas yon tan gyi chos bcu 'thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ des byis pa'i spyod pa spangs pa yin/ des sangs rgyas kyi spyod
39a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su bzung ba yin/ des 'khor ba la nyes par 'du shes bskyed pa yin/ des snying rje chen po yongs su bzung ba yin/ sngon
39a2(dkon brtsegs): dam bcas pa las mi 'gyur ba yin/ nad nyung ba yin/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bka' bzhin
39a3(dkon brtsegs): byas pa yin/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug chung ba yin/ ji ltar bstan pa'i tshig dang yi ge rnams kyi don rab tu shes pa yin/ nan tan gyis
39a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bsgrub pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ yon tan gyi chos bcu po de dag 'thob bo/ /shA ri'i bu/
39a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rjes su dran zhing de 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni/
39a6(dkon brtsegs): thugs rtse gcig pa/ rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa/ bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba dang ldan pa'o/ /snyam nas de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag de bzhin gshegs
39a7(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhud pa'i rjes su 'gro bar bya na/ sems g.yeng pa dang / brjed ngas pas ni/ gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi gnas te/ gnas 'di thob par mi nus so/ /snyam nas
39b1(dkon brtsegs): de chags pa thams cad dang / yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad dang / thob pa dang / bkur sti thams cad dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal la chags pa thams
39b2(dkon brtsegs): cad dang / grogs po dang / gla mi dang / khyim la sred pa thams cad yongs su btang ste/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir sems can thams cad ni/ bdag gis
39b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mi gtong ngo / /snyam nas dgon pa rab tu dgon pa la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ bse ru ltar gcig pu spyod cing de dgon pa rab tu dgon pa dag tu
39b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas phyogs gcig tu sems can rnams la byams pas khyab par byed do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te phyogs bcu kun gyi bar du tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis
39b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed do/ /byams pa la gnas nas bsam gtan la bsam gtan par 'gyur ro/ /yang shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems
39b6(dkon brtsegs): d pa' khyim pa gang gis gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal
39b7(dkon brtsegs): par bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsti stang du byas pa bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba gang rab tu dben pa 'dod cing dgon pa logs su phyogs te gom
40a1(dkon brtsegs): pa bdun bor na/ 'di ni/ de bas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do/ /ches myur du byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/
40a2(dkon brtsegs): bcu po 'di dag ni/ dben pa na gnas shing / bsam gtan la bsam gtan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa
40a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa yin/ blo gros dang ldan pa yin/ rtogs pa dang ldan pa yin/ mos pa dang ldan pa yin/ myur du spobs pa rab tu thob pa yin/ gzungs sgrub
40a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/ skye ba dang 'jig pa la mkhas pa thob pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi phung po las mi nyams pa yin/ lha rnams kyang de la rim gro byed pa yin/ gzhan
40a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi 'byor pa la mi 'dod pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu/ bcu po de dag ni/ dben pa la gnas shing bsam gtan la bsam gtan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
40a6(dkon brtsegs): phan yon no/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi rgyu mthun pa la mkhas pa yin te/ de 'di ltar shes rab gang nas
40a7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung snyam du nye bar rtog cing / de 'di snyam du sems te/ shes rab ni/ tshul khrims kyi sdom pa'i gnas las byung ba ste/ shes rab byung ba las chos
40b1(dkon brtsegs): dkar po thams cad rnam par 'phel lo/ /snyam nas de shes rab la slob ste/ gang 'jig rten gyi bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas dang / sngags kyi gnas dang / sman gyi
40b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang / gang bya dka' ba dang / sgrub dka' ba'i las de dag thams cad la slob bo/ /bslab nas kyang de 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ gang 'jig rten pa'i shes rab
40b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni/ yid 'byung bar ma yin/ 'dod chags dang bral bar ma yin/ 'gog par ma yin/ zhi bar ma yin/ mngon par shes par ma yin/ mngon par rdzogs
40b4(dkon brtsegs): par byang chub par ma yin/ dge sbyong ma yin/ mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ 'di ltar bdag gis shes rab gang gis shin tu zhi bar 'gyur ba'i bzo rnam
40b5(dkon brtsegs): pa de lta bu dang / sngags rnam pa de lta bu dang / sman rnam pa de lta bu dang / shes rab rnam pa de lta bu yongs su btsal lo/ /snyam nas de chos thams cad kyi thog ma yongs
40b6(dkon brtsegs): su tshol lo/ /de chos thams cad kyi thog ma yongs su tshol ba na chos gang yang chos gang la yang nye bar 'jog pa'i chos de gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /
40b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas rab tu zhi ba la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /rab tu zhi bar spyod pa la gnas nas yongs su yid mi 'chad do/ /yongs su yid mi 'chad pas
41a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi don du 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bsam bzhin du srid pa 'dzin
41a2(dkon brtsegs): te| shA ri'i bu/ chos drug po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing
41a3(dkon brtsegs): smon lam las mi nyams la/ 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs su
41a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang chos bdun dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
41a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ngo / /bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa de yang mi dmigs pa dang / tshul
41a6(dkon brtsegs): khrims kyang skyon med la tshul khrims de la rlom sems kyang med pa dang / bzod cing des la sems de yang mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyang rtsom la
41a7(dkon brtsegs): lus dang ngag dang sems de yang mi dmigs pa dang / bsam gtan yang yongs su sgrub la/ de yang mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan pa bsam gtan pa dang /
41b1(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed la de rtog pa yang med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyang rjes su dran la de mtshan ma yang sel ba ste/ shA ri'i bu/ chos bdun po de dag
41b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa yang yongs su 'dzin to/ /shA ri'i bu/ chos
41b3(dkon brtsegs): brgyad dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ phrag dog med pa dang / rgyan
41b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa dang / sems rgya che ba dang / chos smra ba la bsti stang byed pa dang / gus pa dang bcas pa dang / 'tsho ba rnam par dag pa dang / kun 'ged pa'i ngang tshul
41b5(dkon brtsegs): can dang / bdag la mi bstod cing gzhan la mi smod pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams
41b6(dkon brtsegs): shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su sbyong ngo / /bam po gsum pa/ /shA ri'i bu/ chos dgu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing /
41b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus sdom pa dang / ngag sdom pa dang / yid sdom pa dang / 'dod chags
42a1(dkon brtsegs): bsal ba dang / zhe sdang bsal ba dang / gti mug gsal ba dang / slu ba med pa dang / mdza' ba brtan pa dang / dge ba'i bshes
42a2(dkon brtsegs): gnyen la brnyas pa med pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ chos dgu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi
42a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing yang yongs su dag par byed de/ shA ri'i bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang
42a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag par byed do/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye
42a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyi sdug bsngal thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang / lha rgud
42a6(dkon brtsegs): pa thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang / mi rgud pa thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang / dbul ba dang / mu ge dang / rkun po dang / rang rta dang / dmag
42a7(dkon brtsegs): gi gnod pa thos na mi 'jigs cing snying rje ba ste/ de 'di snyam du ci nas kyang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing na sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye
42b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang / yi dwags kyi yul med cing bsam pa tsam gyis bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bgo ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / sems can rnams kyang tshe dpag tu med
42b2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur te nga yi ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par
42b3(dkon brtsegs): ma byas kyi bar du brtson 'grus mi gtong ngo / /snyam du sems bskyed pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las kyang
42b4(dkon brtsegs): mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' me tog khyer zhing de bzhin gshegs
42b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'am| de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du song nas 'di snyam du sems bskyed de/ me tog 'di ji ltar dri zhim la kha dog bzang zhing blta na sdug ste/
42b6(dkon brtsegs): yid du 'ong ba dang / mdzes pa de bzhin du bdag byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'ang me tog sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi
42b7(dkon brtsegs): shing ljon pas rab tu brgyan par gyur cig / ces bya bar sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te phye ma dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bzhon
43a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gser dang / dngul dang / bai
43a2(dkon brtsegs): DUR+Ya dang / mu tig dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru'i bar du gang ci 'bul yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bsgrub
43a3(dkon brtsegs): p a'i don du yongs su bsngo zhing tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pas byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa de'i sems kyi smon pa 'grub
43a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni/ su la'ang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshig mi brjod cing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig sha stag
43a5(dkon brtsegs): brjod de/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can gang gis kyang yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra mi thos te/ yid du 'ong ba'i sgra sha stag thos par
43a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi bde ba yongs su mi tshol zhing gzhan bde bas dga' bar 'dzin te/ de byang chub
43a7(dkon brtsegs): thob pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can rnams bde ba'i dam pas tshim par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dge
43b1(dkon brtsegs): ba bcu'i las kyi lam rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yang dag par blang shing sgrub ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su rdzogs par
43b2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing 'byung
43b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i shes rab can du 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' yul gang na 'dug kyang rung ste/ yul der yang skyes pa'am/ bud med
43b4(dkon brtsegs): dam| khye'u'am/ bu mo'am/ sems can gang ji snyed cig des mthong ba de thams cad byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug cing su la'ang nyan thos dang / rang
43b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam mi brjod cing / gzhan du na sangs rgyas kyis theg pa'i gtam sha stag brjod de/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing der
43b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas med cing byang chub
43b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thob par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi rnyed
44a1(dkon brtsegs): pa mi 'phrog cing / gzhan gyis thob na dga' bar 'dzin te/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang ji snyed
44a2(dkon brtsegs): cig skyes pa de thams cad mi 'phrog pa'i phun sum tshogs pa dang / chos kyi thob pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang 'di la byang chub
44a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ su'ang rung ste nyes pa byung bas mi rgol ba la bdag nyid kyang dam pa'i chos la sbyor te/ de byang chub thob
44a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyes pa'i ming yang ye med par 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can de dag ni/ nyes pa med pa'i chos can yongs su
44a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos 'dod cing chos don du gnyer la yongs su yid chad pa med pa'i rang
44a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin can yin te/ ci skad du thos pa'i chos la nan tan byed pas de byang chub thob pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag thams cad chos
44a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod cing chos don du gnyer ba dang / yongs su yid chad pa med pa'i rang bzhin can te/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams la nan tan byed par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/
44b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnga bo che dang / dung dang / rdza rnga dang / 'khar rnga dang / pi wang rgyud gcig pa dang / sgra snyan dang / 'khar dkrol dang / gling
44b2(dkon brtsegs): bu dang / pi wang dang / ba la ki dang / kim pa la la sogs pa rol mo sil snyan gyi yo byad yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mchod
44b3(dkon brtsegs): pa byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bsgrub pa'i don du yongs su bsngo ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sil
44b4(dkon brtsegs): snyan brgya stong ma dkrol ma brdungs par sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' brjed ngas pa'i sems can rnams la dran
44b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'i gdams ngag gis 'doms te/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can rnams bsam gtan gyi zas can du 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i
44b6(dkon brtsegs): bu| sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa las brtsams te bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par chos bstan kyang de bzhin gshegs
44b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spobs pa la mthar thug pa med mod kyi/ mos pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu
45a1(dkon brtsegs): mo gang dag gis gang thos nas de yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ba mdor bstan to/ /shA ri'i bu/ chos gsum dang ldan na/
45a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / ji ltar bsam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
45a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bag yod par gnas pa dang / ji skad du thos pa'i chos la nan tan byed pa dang / smon
45a4(dkon brtsegs): lam gyi khyad par te/ shA ri'i bu/ chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
45a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing ji ltar bsam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA
45a6(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa ni/ ngo mtshar te/ bcom ldan 'das/
45a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad ni/ bag mchis pa la gnas so/ /byang chub ni/ nan tan la gnas so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod
45b1(dkon brtsegs): pa phun sum tshogs pa ni/ smon lam gyi khyad par gyis 'grub bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ de de bzhin te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
45b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni/ bdag yod pa la gnas so/ /byang chub ni/ nan tan la gnas so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa ni/ smon lam gyi
45b3(dkon brtsegs): khyad par gyis 'grub bo/ /shA ri'i bu/ ngas sngon ci ltar smon lam btab pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su grub bo/ /shA ri'i bu/ nga bag yod pa la
45b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pas smon lam yongs su rdzogs so/ /shA ri'i bu/ ngas nan tan byas pas byang chub thob bo/ /shA ri'i bu/ bag med par gnas shing tshig gi las
45b5(dkon brtsegs): lhur len pa dang / nan tan med pas nyan thos kyi sa yang sgrub par mi nus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta ci smos te/ shA ri'i bu/ de
45b6(dkon brtsegs): lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i ming du gdags par dam 'cha' bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ji ltar
45b7(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa 'di la bslab par bya'o/ /de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong so so'i stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas kun gyis
46a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang mgrin gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis byang chub sems
46a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa 'di la bslab par bgyi'o/ /nan tan gyis yongs su bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /bag mchis par gnas par bgyi'o/ /smon lam rnams
46a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /ji ltar bsam pa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs par ma
46a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur gyi bar du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
46a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
46a6(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa| shA ri'i bu/ khyod kyis 'di skad du seng+ge'i sgra sgrog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong lags so/ /bcom
46a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ rigs kyi bu 'di dag thams cad bskal pa brgya phrag stong 'das nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
46b1(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu/ dper na/ seng+ge zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa sha stag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan du
46b2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba ngas gzigs pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang ming smon lam bkod pa zhes bya ba sha stag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan du 'byung
46b3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
46b4(dkon brtsegs): 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji 'dra ba de 'dra bar lhag chad med par 'gyur te/ tshe'i tshad ni/ ma gtogs so/ /
46b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di dag gi tshe'i tshad ci tsam zhig tu 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
46b6(dkon brtsegs): re re zhing tshe'i tshad bskal pa bcu bcur 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng+ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra zhes bya ba 'khor
46b7(dkon brtsegs): d e nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa stan las langs te bla gos brag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la
47a1(dkon brtsegs): ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'jam dpal gzhon
47a2(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstod cing bsngags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di yun ji srid
47a3(dkon brtsegs): cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni/ ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur/ de skad ces
47a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng+ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
47a5(dkon brtsegs): to| |rigs kyi bu/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid la dris shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng+ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par
47a6(dkon brtsegs): bsgrags pa'i sgras 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ khyod ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
47a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis kho bo la ci khyod bla na med pa yang dag par
47b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs sam/ 'on te ma zhugs zhes de dris shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ gal te kho bo byang chub tu yang dag
47b2(dkon brtsegs): par zhugs na ni/ de'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang yang rgya na/ kho bo yang dag par zhugs pa med pas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ji ltar
47b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ khyod sems can rnams kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par ma zhugs sam/ smras pa/
47b4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu/ gal te kho bos sems can zhig dmigs
47b5(dkon brtsegs): na ni| de'i phyir kho bo yang de dag gi don du byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug na/ rigs kyi bu/ gang gi phyir sems can yang med/ srog kyang med/ gang
47b6(dkon brtsegs): zag kyang med pa de'i phyir kho bo 'jug pa med do/ /ldog pa med do/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ khyod sangs rgyas kyi chos la ma zhugs sam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de
47b7(dkon brtsegs): ni| ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ chos thams cad ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la zhugs pa ste/ chos gang zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa med
48a1(dkon brtsegs): la| mtshan ma med cing mtshan nyid med pa de ni/ sangs rgyas su zhugs pa yin te/ chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas su zhugs
48a2(dkon brtsegs): pa de dang 'dra bas sangs rgyas su zhugs pa de dang mi 'dra ba med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du khyod sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi don du ma zhugs
48a3(dkon brtsegs): sam zhes smras pa de khyod nyid la dri'i/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lung ston cig /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs byang chub tu
48a4(dkon brtsegs): smon tam/ 'on te gzugs kyi rang bzhin nam/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dam/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dam/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dam/ gzugs kyi
48a5(dkon brtsegs): dben pa nyid dam/ gzugs kyi chos nyid byang chub tu smon/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/
48a6(dkon brtsegs): 'on te gzugs kyi rang bzhin nam/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dam/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dam/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dam/ gzugs kyi dben pa nyid
48a7(dkon brtsegs): dam| gzugs kyi chos nyid byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de ni/ ma yin te/ gzugs byang chub tu smon pa med do//
48b1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dang / gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dang / gzugs kyi dben pa nyid dang /
48b2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi chos nyid ni/ byang chub tu smon pa med do/ /gzugs ni/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/ gzugs kyi chos nyid kyi bar du yang
48b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
48b4(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa byang chub tu smon tam/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi bar du yang byang chub tu smon tam/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ rnam par shes
48b5(dkon brtsegs): pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi bar du'ang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/ smras pa/ 'jam
48b6(dkon brtsegs): dpal| de ni/ ma yin te/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ byang chub tu smon pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa'i chos
48b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi bar du'ang byang chub tu smon pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa ni/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi bar du'ang
49a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ phung po lnga po dag las phyi rol tu bdag
49a2(dkon brtsegs): gam| bdag gi zhes bya bar gdags par nus sam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de lta yin na/ byang chub tu smon pa'i chos
49a3(dkon brtsegs): de gang zhig yod/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang gang zhig yod/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ khyod lta bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
49a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po gzhan dag gi dbang du gyur pa/ tshad mar gyur pas kho bo byang chub tu smon pa med do/ /kho bo mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /zhes bshad
49a5(dkon brtsegs): na| bstan pa de thos pas byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa rnams skrag par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ chos thams cad
49a6(dkon brtsegs): ni| skrag pa med pa ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ni/ skrag pa med pa'o/ /skrag par med par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'ang chos ston te/ gang skrag pa
49a7(dkon brtsegs): de ni| skyo bar 'gyur ro/ /gang skyo bar gyur pa de ni/ 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gang 'dod chags dang bral ba de ni/ rnam par grol lo/ /gang
49b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba de ni/ bcings pa med par 'gyur ro/ /gang bcings pa med pa de ni/ chags par mi 'gyur ro/ /gang chags pa med pa de ni/ 'gro ba med
49b2(dkon brtsegs): do| |gang 'gro ba med pa de ni/ 'ong ba med do/ /gang 'ong ba med pa de ni/ smon pa med do/ /gang smon pa med pa de ni/ smon lam 'debs pa med do/ /gang
49b3(dkon brtsegs): smon lam 'debs pa med pa de ni/ ldog pa med do/ /gang ldog pa med pa de ni/ phyir ldog pa ste/ ci las phyir ldog ce na/ bdag tu 'dzin pa las phyir
49b4(dkon brtsegs): ldog go / sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang / chad par 'dzin pa dang / rtag par 'dzin pa dang / mtshan mar
49b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa las phyir ldog go / rnam par rtog pa las phyir ldog go /nam phyir ldog pa de'i tshe 'gyur ba med pas phyir mi ldog ste/ gang las phyir mi ldog ce
49b6(dkon brtsegs): na| stong pa nyid las phyir mi ldog go / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog go /de
49b7(dkon brtsegs): la gang las phyir mi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ bral ba med pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/ /khongs su gtogs pa med pa ni/ sangs rgyas
50a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos rnams so/ /dmigs pa med pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/ /len pa med pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/ /dor ba
50a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/ /rgyu ba med pa dang / rnam par rig pa med pa dang / ming tsam du zad pa dang / stong pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma
50a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gag pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang / rdul med pa dang / rdul dang
50a4(dkon brtsegs): bral ba dang / bdag gi ba med pa dang / yid la bya ba med pa dang / mi ldan pa med pa dang / zad pa med pa dang / blang pa med pa dang / mnyam pa dang mi
50a5(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa med pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/ /rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin pa de dag ni/ chos kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa yang ma yin te/
50a6(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la gang las 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/ /zhes bya bar brjod par bya ba'i gnas mi dmigs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub
50a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' las dang po pa gang gis bstan pa 'di thos nas 'jigs par gyur pa de dag ni/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
50b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gang 'jigs par ma gyur pa de dag ni/ ci'ang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ci las bsam
50b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing de skad du ston/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ gang 'jigs par gyur pa de dag ni/ rnam par rtog par 'gyur te/ gang rnam par rtog pa de dag ni/ 'di snyam
50b3(dkon brtsegs): du bdag cag gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/ /snyam nas de dag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa ji
50b4(dkon brtsegs): snyed du skyes par gyur pa de snyed du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gang dag de lta bu'i sems mi bskyed pa de dag ni/ byang chub tu dmigs pa med cing sems
50b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis rlom sems su mi byed de/ byang chub kyi sems su dmigs pa med pas rnam par rtog pa med do/ /gang gi tshe rnam par mi rtog pa de'i tshe ci'ang mngon par
50b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med do/ /ci'i phyir ci yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med ce na/ byang chub de mi dmigs pas de'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par
50b7(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgya ba med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ nam mkha'i khams byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de ni/
51a1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ ci bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par
51a2(dkon brtsegs): bstan mod/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de de bzhin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de lta bas na/ nam mkha' ji lta bar byang chub kyang de
51a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin| byang chub ji lta bar nam mkha' yang de bzhin te/ nam mkha' dang / byang chub de ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med do/ /gang gis
51a4(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu'i mnyam pa nyid shes pa de ni/ cung zad kyang shes pa med la/ des ma shes pa'ang gang yang med do/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe dge slong khri
51a5(dkon brtsegs): nyis stong nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /lha dang mi khri bzhi stong chos la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa
51a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag go / srog chags dgu khri drug stong gis sngon ma bskyed pa las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur
51a7(dkon brtsegs): to| |byang chub sems dpa' lnga khri nyis stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng+ge'i
51b1(dkon brtsegs): rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ khyod kyis yun ring po ji srid cig nas bla na
51b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ kha rog chos rnams ma skyes ba la bdag rnam par
51b3(dkon brtsegs): rtog tu ma gzhug / rigs kyi bu/ gang la la zhig 'di skad du bdag gis byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /bdag gis byang chub kyi phyir spyad par bya'o/ /zhes
51b4(dkon brtsegs): zer na| de nyid de'i log par lta ba chen por 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ bdag gis ni/ sems gang byang chub tu bskyed par bya ba de lta bu yang dag par rjes
51b5(dkon brtsegs): su ma mthong ste/ de ltar bdag gis sems de yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas byang chub tu'ang sems ma bskyed do/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ rjes
51b6(dkon brtsegs): su ma mthong zhes bya ba'i tshig de'i don gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong zhes bya ba ni/ mnyam pa nyid bstan
51b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o| |smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ci'i phyir mnyam pa nyid ces bya/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ni/ gang la tha dad pa med pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid
52a1(dkon brtsegs): des chos thams cad 'di lta ste/ dben pa'i tshul du tshul gcig tu bstan pas ro gcig tu brjod cing kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa
52a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / chad pa med pa dang / rtag pa med pa dang / mi skye ba dang / mi 'gag pa dang / nga'i ba med pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa
52a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / dor ba med pa'i phyir chos ston cing / mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ chos de lta bu mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i ye shes ni/ mnyam
52a4(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid ces bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos nyid khong du chud pa de ni/ khams las tha dad par yang yang dag par rjes
52a5(dkon brtsegs): su mi mthong ngo / /gcig tu yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba 'di ni/ mnyam pa nyid do/ /mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mi mnyam pa med pa'o/ /mi
52a6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa med pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzod ma nas dag pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng+ge'i rtsal gyis mngon
52a7(dkon brtsegs): par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni/ 'di srid cig nas ngas bla na med pa yang dag
52b1(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /zhes bgyi bar mi ston te/ 'khor 'di dag ni/ nyan par 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
52b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu| 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni/ zab mo'i bzod pa dang ldan pa ste/ de yang ji tsam du byang chub kyang mi dmigs/ sems kyang mi dmigs pa de tsam
52b3(dkon brtsegs): du zab pa'i bzod pa dang ldan te/ des byang chub kyi sems mi dmigs pas/ ngas 'di srid cig nas byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /zhes bya bar mi ston na/ rigs
52b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu| 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yun ring po ji srid cig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa bstan par bya'o/ /rigs
52b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed phrag bdun 'das pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol de'i tshe
52b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/
52b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
53a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed
53a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba bzang po zhes bya ba byung ste/ de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba
53a3(dkon brtsegs): de chos ston to/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos 'dus pa ni/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus
53a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ni| de'i nyis 'gyur du gyur te/ de'i tshe rgyal po nam mkha' zhes bya ba chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa
53a5(dkon brtsegs): byung ste| rigs kyi bu/ rgyal po nam mkha' zhes bya ba de bu dang / chung ma dang / gnyen 'dab dang / 'khor du bcas pas las gzhan med cing skyo ba med pa'i
53a6(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la lo
53a7(dkon brtsegs): brgyad khri bzhi stong du zhal zas kyi rnam pa kha na ma tho ba med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag dang / na bza' gsar pa gsar pa gzhan dang gzhan dag dang / pho
53b1(dkon brtsegs): brang khang pa brtsegs pa gsar pa gsar pa gzhan dang gzhan dag dang / rim gro ba kha na ma tho ba med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams cad
53b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis rim gro byas par gyur to/ /de ltar lo brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das pa'i 'og tu de gcig pu dben pa na gnyis su med par 'dug 'dug pa'i yid la rnam pa 'di
53b3(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i sems skyes par gyur te/ bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po mngon par 'dus byas kyang de dag nges pa med pa'i sems kyis 'dus byas na/ de ni/ dge
53b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ /snyam nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di brgya byin du bsngo'am/ tshangs par bsngo'am/ 'khor los
53b5(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur bar bsngo'am/ nyan thos su bsngo'am/ rang sangs rgyas su bsngo'am/ gang du bsngo snyam pa dang / rigs kyi bu/ rgyal po de sems de ltar skyes ma thag tu steng
53b6(dkon brtsegs): gi bar snang las lha mang pos sgra bsgrags pa/ rgyal po chen po/ /de ltar dma' ba'i sems ma skyed cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod kyi bsod nams kyi phung po yangs
53b7(dkon brtsegs): pa byas kyi/ rgyal po chen po/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig /ces byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu/ de'i tshe rgyal po nam mkha' de
54a1(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes par gyur te/ des 'di snyam du bsam mo/ /bdag ni/ byang chub las phyir mi
54a2(dkon brtsegs): ldog go / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha rnams kyis bdag gi sems yongs su shes te sgra bsgrags so/ /snyam mo/ /rigs kyi bu/ de nas rgyal po nam mkha' de
54a3(dkon brtsegs): s rog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cus yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs
54a4(dkon brtsegs): k yi rgyal po ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das de la lan bdun bskor ba byas
54a5(dkon brtsegs): nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de nas rgyal po nam mkha' zhes bya ba des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs
54a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyal po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ khyod kyi spyan sngar dam chos zhu/ /skyes bu dam
54a7(dkon brtsegs): pa mchog skye bar/ /rnam pa gang gis 'gyur ba de/ /rnam par 'dren pas bdag la gsung / /rnam 'dren khyod la mngon sum du/ /mchod pa yangs pa
54b1(dkon brtsegs): bgyis bgyis kyang / /ma nges sems kyis bgyis gyur gyi/ /gang yang yongs su bsngo ma bgyis/ /bdag ni gcig pu dben gnas tshe/ /'di 'dra'i sems shig skyes par
54b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur| |bdag gis bsod nams che bsags na/ /ji ltar yongs su de bsngo snyam/ /tshangs par bsngo 'am brgya byin nam/ /gling bzhi'i dbang phyug thob par ram/ /'on te
54b3(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dngos por ram/ /rang rgyal thob pa'i phyir bsngo snyam/ /de ltar sems bskyed de ma thag /lha rnams sgra 'byin brjod pa ni/ /dma' ba'i sems kyis bsod nams
54b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di| |rnam par chud gson ma byed cig / sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /smon lam rlabs chen gdab par gyis/ /byang chub sems rab bskyed byas shing / /
54b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten rnams kyi don kyang gyis/ /de bas chos kyi dbang phyug gtso/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag zhu ste/ /thub pa ji ltar sems bskyed na/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub
54b6(dkon brtsegs): skye bar 'gyur/ /ye shes de ni gang gis 'thob/ /de don bdag la bstan du gsol/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed bgyis shing / /thub pa khyod 'drar bdag kyang smon/ /
54b7(dkon brtsegs): de yi tshig de gsan gyur nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa/ /rgyal po chen po shes par gyis/ /rim gyis khyod la bstan par bya/ /chos rnams thams
55a1(dkon brtsegs): cad rkyen bzhin te/ /'dun pa'i rtsa la rab tu gnas/ /gang gis smon lam ci btab pa/ /de 'dra'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ /rgyal po ngas
55a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang sngon chad ni/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed gyur/ /sems can kun la phan don du/ /ngas ni smon lam dam pa btab/ /smon lam ji ltar btab tshul
55a3(dkon brtsegs): du| |ngas ni 'bras bu thob par gyur/ /byang chub dam pa ngas thob pas/ /nga yi bsam pa rdzogs par gyur/ /rgyal po chen po brtan gyis la/ /mi 'gyur sems ni
55a4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par gyis/ /gal te spyod pa spyad byas na/ /khyod kyang yang dag sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /thub pa'i gsung de thos gyur nas/ /rgyal po de ni dga' bar gyur/ /'jig
55a5(dkon brtsegs): rten kun gyis mngon sum du/ /seng+ge'i nga ror tshig 'di brjod/ /'khor ba tha ma med pa yi/ /sngon gyi tha ma ji srid pa/ /de srid sems can phan don du/ /spyod pa
55a6(dkon brtsegs): dpag yas spyad par bya/ /'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga 'dir/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do/ /'gro ba thams cad mgron gnyer te/ /dbul zhing
55a7(dkon brtsegs): phongs pa dgrol bar bya/ /de ring phan chad gal te yang / /bdag gis 'dod chags sems bskyed na/ /phyogs bcu dag na gang bzhugs pa'i/ /sangs rgyas
55b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bslus par gyur/ /byang chub nam zhig thob par du/ /tha ba'i sems dang gnod sems dang / /phrag dog dang ni ser sna yang / /de ring phan chad mi bya 'o/ /tshangs
55b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyod pa bdag gis spyad/ /sdig pa'i 'dod pa yongs su gtang / /tshul khrims sdom dang nges pa la/ /sangs rgyas rjes su bslab par bya/ /bdag ni byang chub
55b3(dkon brtsegs): rings tshul du/ /'tshang rgyar mos shing spro ba med/ /phyi mthar thug gi bar du yang / /sems can gcig phyir spyad par bya/ /tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /sangs
55b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas zhing ni sbyang bar bya/ /phyogs rnams bcu po thams cad du/ /bdag gi ming ni thos par bya/ /bdag gis bdag la lung bstan te/ /sangs rgyas 'gyur bar dogs
55b5(dkon brtsegs): pa med| |bdag gi lhag bsam rnam par dag / bdag dbang 'di na 'dren pa rnams/ /lus dang ngag gi las rnams kyang / /rnam pa kun tu bdag gis sbyang / /
55b6(dkon brtsegs): yid kyi las kyang sbyang bar bya/ /mi dge'i las ni spyad mi bya/ /ma 'ongs dus na sangs rgyas te/ /'jig rten mgon du 'gyur zhe na/ /bden pa des ni sa 'di yang / /
55b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa drug tu g.yos gyur cig /bdag gis bden tshig gang brjod pa/ /ma nor yang dag smras she na/ /bden pa des ni mkha' dbyings las/ /sil snyan dag
56a1(dkon brtsegs): gi sgra grag shog / bdag la gal te g.yo med cing / /de bzhin tha ba med ce na/ /man+dA ra ba'i me tog bzang / /bden pa des ni char du
56a2(dkon brtsegs): phob| |yang dag don du nges pa yi/ /tshig bden de skad brjod pa dang / /phyogs bcu mtha' yas thams cad kyi/ /bye ba'i zhing rnam rab tu g.yos/ /de yi
56a3(dkon brtsegs): mod la mkha' dbyings nas/ /sil snyan bye ba'i sgra yang byung / /me tog man+dA ra ba dag /mi 'greng bdun srid bab par gyur/ /rgyal po de yi rjes bslab ste/ /srog
56a4(dkon brtsegs): chags bye ba nyi shu yi/ /'dren par bdag cag 'gyur smon ces/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang bsgrags/ /de ltar srog chags bye ba phrag /nyi shu po rnams thams
56a5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang / /rgyal po mchog gi rjes slob cing / /byang chub tu ni zhugs par gyur/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nam
56a6(dkon brtsegs): mkha' zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
56a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nam mkha' zhes bya bar gyur pa ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis byang chub tu sems
56b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed phyin chad bskal pa gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bdun gyi bye ma snyed 'das par gyur to/ /mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas kyang bskal pa gang+gA'i klung
56b2(dkon brtsegs): drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das par gyur te/ de nas nye bar bzung nas 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs so/ /'di byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu
56b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su rdzogs so/ /'di sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su rdzogs so/ /'di sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs te/ bar 'ga' yang des bdag
56b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ram mi 'gyur snyam pa'i sems gcig kyang bskyed par ma gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
56b5(dkon brtsegs): g shegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i spyan sngar rgyal po de dang lhan cig tu byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i srog chags bye ba phrag nyi shu po de dag thams cad
56b6(dkon brtsegs): k yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i don du
56b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas nas sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de dag thams cad kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di sa
57a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa la yang dag par btsud do/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes
57a2(dkon brtsegs): rab la yang dag par btsud de/ thams cad la yang bsnyen bkur dang / yongs su spyad par byas so/ /thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos bzung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs
57a3(dkon brtsegs): pa gcig ma gtogs pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bzhi khri bzhi stong gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na
57a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams sa'i dbyings zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i lha zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun tshad med pa dang / sku
57a5(dkon brtsegs): tshe'i tshad dpag tu med par bzhugs pa ste/ de da ltar yang bzhugs shing 'tsho'o/ /gzhes so/ /sngon byung ba'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe srog chags brgya stong phrag
57a6(dkon brtsegs): bdun bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i
57a7(dkon brtsegs): sgras 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ gal te de ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang yongs su
57b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yang yongs su rdzogs/ sangs rgyas kyi sa yang yongs su rdzogs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs na/ ci'i
57b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya/ de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems
57b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' seng+ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs na/ yang dang yang du byang chub
57b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyar med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des byang chub thob par gyur pas thob zin pa ni/ gzod thob par mi bya'o/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ sangs rgyas
57b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos yongs su rdzogs zhes bya ba ji lta bu/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin nyid yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs
57b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'o| |nam mkha' yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /de ltar nam mkha' dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang
57b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni/ gnyis su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin zhe na/ de skad
58a1(dkon brtsegs): zer ba la/ gang gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang rnam par shes
58a2(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su rdzogs pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa ni/ ji lta bu/ tshor
58a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa ni/ ji lta bu/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis gzugs kyi rtag pa'am mi rtag
58a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de ni/ ma mthong ngo / /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ chos gang rtag pa yang ma yin/
58a5(dkon brtsegs): mi rtag pa yang ma yin pa de la yongs su rdzogs pa'am/ 'grib par 'gyur ba yod dam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de ni/ med de/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
58a6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu/ de ltar chos gang yongs su rdzogs pa yang med/ 'grib pa yang med pa de ni/ yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o/ /smras pa/ des chos cis yongs su
58a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa zhes bya/ smras pa/ des chos ji ltar shes pa de ltar ye shes 'jug par 'gyur te/ gang gi tshe ye shes 'jug par gyur pa de'i tshe mi rtog /rnam par mi
58b1(dkon brtsegs): rtog go / gang gi tshe mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog pa de'i tshe yongs su rdzogs pa'am 'grib par byed pa med de/ gang yongs su rdzogs pa'am 'grib par med pa de ni/ mnyam pa
58b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid do| |rigs kyi bu/ de lta bas na/ gzugs kyi mnyam pa nyid mthong ba gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
58b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i mnyam pa nyid mthong ba gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
58b4(dkon brtsegs): po seng+ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ da ltar khyod yun ring po nas bzod pa thob
58b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang bdag gis byang chub thob par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba'i sems bskyed pa gcig kyang skye ba med na/ 'jam dpal/ khyod kyis ji ltar sems can gzhan dag byang chub la yang
58b6(dkon brtsegs): dag par gzud par bya/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ kho bo ni/ sems can gang yang byang chub la yang dag par mi 'dzud do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can med pa dang /
58b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can dben pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu/ gang gis sems can dmigs pa des ni/ byang chub kyang dmigs/ gang gis byang chub dmigs pa de ni/ byang chub
59a1(dkon brtsegs): la sems can rnams yang dag par 'dzud par byed kyi/ rigs kyi bu/ bdag gis ni/ byang chub kyang mi dmigs/ sems can yang
59a2(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs pas de ltar byang chub la sems can rnams 'dzud par mi byed do/ /mnyam pa nyid ni/ byang chub tu smon par byed pa'ang med de/ de las ldog pa'ang
59a3(dkon brtsegs): med do| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mnyam pa nyid la rnam par rtog pa med pas/ de ltar mnyam pa nyid la smon pa med do/ /ldog pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du
59a4(dkon brtsegs): byed rnams la gang nas kyang 'ong ba dang / gang du yang 'gro ba med de/ de ni/ mnyam pa nyid do/ /rigs kyi bu/ mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni/ stong pa nyid kyi
59a5(dkon brtsegs): tshig ste| stong pa nyid la smon pa gang yang med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du de ltar yun ring po nas bzod pa thob na/ ci'i phyir bdag gis
59a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/ /zhes bya bar sems mi bskyed ces zer ba ni/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis sems gang gis byang chub thob par bya
59a7(dkon brtsegs): ba de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de ni/ ma mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems la gzugs med cing bstan du med pas
59b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyang ming tsam ste/ yid las byung ba ma yin pas byang chub ces bya ba'am/ sems zhes bya ba ni/ ming tsam ste/ ming gang yin pa de ni/ dben zhing byed
59b2(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'o/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de las bsam nas bdag gis byang chub ji ltar thob par bya snyam du sems bskyed pa med do/ /zhes smras pa yin no/ /de ci'i
59b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ sems de ni/ ma skyes pa ste/ ma skyes pa la skye ba med do/ /gang la skye ba med pa de la thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par bya ba yang gang zhig yod/ smras
59b4(dkon brtsegs): pa| 'jam dpal/ mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba ji lta bu/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang chos thams cad la rlom sems med cing mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa
59b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni| mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o/ /ji ltar rdul tsam gyi 'du shes kyang mi bskyed mi 'gog pa de ltar rtogs pa de ni/ mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin
59b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ni/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ de ni/ mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o/ /yang dag pa'i lta bas zhugs te mnyam pa nyid la chos gang yang
59b7(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs shing / mi dmigs pas gcig pa'am/ tha dad par mi byed cing rlom sems su mi byed pa 'di ni/ mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o/ /chos thams cad gang
60a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig tu lus kyis mngon du byas shing shes kyang lus la'ang mngon par zhen pa med/ sems la'ang
60a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par zhen pa med pa 'di ni/ mngon par rtogs pa thob pa zhes bya'o/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ thob pa zhes bya ba de ji lta bu/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ni/ rgyu ba
60a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i tshig ste/ de'i phyir thob pa zhes bya'o/ /de'i rgyu ba khams gsum na tha snyad du 'di yin no/ /zhes bstan du med de/ 'phags pa rnams kyi thob pa gang yin pa
60a4(dkon brtsegs): de ni| brjod par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de ni/ gnas med cing rgyu ba med pas de'i phyir brjod par mi nus so/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang de ni/ thob

67b5(dkon brtsegs): blta bar 'tshal lam/ 'chag gam/ 'gro'am/ 'ong ngam/ sdod dam/ mchis kyang rung ste/ gang dag der sangs rgyas la blta ba'i yid la bgyi ba skyes ma thag tu de dag
67b6(dkon brtsegs): g is de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs pa de de nyid na bzhugs par mthong
67b7(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur cing / mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de mthong ma thag tu de dag gi the tshom mam/ nem nur ram/ yid gnyis sam/ chos kyi som nyi gang ci mchis pa yongs
68a1(dkon brtsegs): su chad par gyur te/ bstan mi 'tshal bar chos kyi tshig de'i don yongs su 'tshal bar gyur cig /ces bgyi bar smon lam btab bo/ /de nas
68a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor de'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ gang 'di kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba mtshan de ni/ tshul dang 'dra
68a3(dkon brtsegs): b a ste| sems can gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de'i mtshan thos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin
68a4(dkon brtsegs): na| sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes par gyur pa lta ci smos te/ gang dag gis lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang / gang dag gis 'jam
68a5(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming thos pa de dag gis ni/ sangs rgyas mngon sum du mthong bar blta'o/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
68a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu dag /gang gis sangs
68a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi mtshan brjod pa bas ni/ gang gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming brjod na/ 'di nyid de bas bsod nams ches
68b1(dkon brtsegs): mang du bskyed na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de'i mtshan brjod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
68b2(dkon brtsegs): pas bskal pa re re zhing sems can gyi don ji snyed du byas pa'i sems can gyi don de ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyis kyang ma mdzad do/ /de nas 'khor de'i
68b3(dkon brtsegs): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag
68b4(dkon brtsegs): khrig 'bum phrag du mas mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa la
68b5(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal lo/ /de skad ces brjod pa dang / de'i mod la srog chags bye pa khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
68b6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par gyur to/ /sems can tshad med pa dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par
68b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ni/ 'di ltar phyogs bcu'i
69a1(dkon brtsegs): ' jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag tshad med grangs med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyi sangs
69a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyan dang / smon lam gyi rgyan dang / mtshan nyid dang / mtshan ma dang / spyod pa dang / gnas kyi rnam pa'i rgyan gang ji snyed cig

69a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa las brtsams te rnam pa gzhan dang / gzhan du thogs pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis sug las gzhan ma mchis par bshad dam/ de

69b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
69b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la ni/ thogs pa med de/ dus gsum kun tu 'jug go /de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems par

69b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yod pa de gnyis 'dra'am/ 'on te mi 'dra snyam pa dang / de nas bcom

69b6(dkon brtsegs): la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi la la zhig gis skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshags pa'i tshad rgya mtsho chen po las chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs na/

70a1(dkon brtsegs): na lus pa ni/ tshad ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ mi des skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshags pa'i tshad

70a3(dkon brtsegs): tan bkod par blta'o/ /rgya mtsho chen po ni/ chu'i lhag ma ji snyed cig yod pa de tsam du ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par

70b1(dkon brtsegs): brgya'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams smon lam la rab tu gnas pas mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
70b2(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun nas 'od zer yon tan rtag tu mnga' ba rgya mtsho'i rgyal po zhes bya ba sku tshe'i tshad dpag tu med pa da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ byang
70b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i tshogs tshad med pas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas

71a3(dkon brtsegs): pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang bstan du gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa

71a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dug go / gsum pa ni/ zhi ba'i dbang po zhes bya ste/ nub phyogs logs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab brtsegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
71b1(dkon brtsegs): na 'dug go / bzhi pa ni/ smon lam blo gros zhes bya ste/ byang phyogs logs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mthu bo che'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug go /de
71b2(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa 'di lta bu mngon par mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de mngon par mdzad pas /

71b4(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskor cing mdun gyis bltas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa sngon chad ma mthong ma thos shing bsam
71b5(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu mig dang ldan pa'i lag na skyu ru ra'i 'bru 'dug pa mthong ba de

71b7(dkon brtsegs): ba rgya mtsho'i rgyal po de yang sku tha mal pa dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong mnga' ba ste/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi ri bo ltar mdzes shing lha me lhan ne lhang nge bzhugs pa byang
72a1(dkon brtsegs): c hub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dpag tshad bzhi khri nyis stong tsam du gyur pa sha stag gis bskor cing mdun gyis byas te byang

72a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
