74b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das| mnyam pa nyid la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
74b7(dkon brtsegs): rgya'o| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub ji lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs
75a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang sus kyang ma thob ma bshig cing / gang la yod pa'am med par chags pa dmigs
75a2(dkon brtsegs): su med pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub de ji tsam du yod pas kyang mi 'thob/ med pas kyang mi 'thob bam/ smras pa/
75a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni/ gzod ma nas ma skyes pa ste/ yod par ma gyur/ mi 'gyur pas de'i phyir thob par 'gyur ba
75a4(dkon brtsegs): med do| |smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ tshul gcig pa'i chos bstan pas de skad du ston tam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ tshul gcig pa'i chos
75a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa zhes bya ba gang yin/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ gang phung po rnams kyang mi mthong / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyang mi mthong la/ dmus long yang
75a6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin| sha'i mig can yang ma yin zhing / chos gang la yang mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog pa dang / chos gang la yang 'phel ba dang / 'grib par mi mthong ba 'di
75a7(dkon brtsegs): ni| chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras smras pa/ gang de bzhin nyid dang
75b1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gal zhing chos nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed de/ 'di dag ni/ so so'i skye bo'i chos so/ /'di dag ni/ nyan thos kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos
75b2(dkon brtsegs): so| |'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos so/ /zhes bya bar tha dad du mi 'byed cing / gang 'di dben pa'i tshul du tshul gcig la 'jug pa 'di ni/ chos kyi tshul gcig
75b3(dkon brtsegs): tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthong dgas smras pa/ gang de bzhin nyid la yang zhugs la/ de bzhin nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing / 'di ni/
75b4(dkon brtsegs): zab bo| |zhes bya bar mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa mi
75b5(dkon brtsegs): zad pas smras pa/ chos thams cad mi zad pa gang yin pa de ni/ shin tu zad pa ste/ gang chos thams cad mi zad par chos bstan pa de ni/ chos nyid las
75b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gal bar mi byed pa ste/ de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa legs par sems
75b7(dkon brtsegs): pas smras pa/ gang bsam pas bsam du med pa la yang 'jug la/ bsam du med pa des kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing / mi dmigs pa de ltar bstan pa
76a1(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdul dang bral bas smras pa/ gang 'dod chags dang
76a2(dkon brtsegs): shin tu bral ba de ni/ mtshan ma thams cad la 'dod chags pa yang med/ 'dod chags dang bral ba yang med/ rjes su chags pa yang med/ khong khro ba yang med/
76a3(dkon brtsegs): rmongs pa yang med/ gcig tu byed pa yang med/ gnyis su byed pa yang med/ byed pa yang med/ mi byed pa yang med/ len pa yang med/ 'dor ba yang med de/
76a4(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshos smras pa/ gang rgya mtsho lta bur zab cing gting dpag dka' ba'i
76a5(dkon brtsegs): chos la zhugs pa de chos la'ang mi rtog / rnam par mi rtog la/ ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du chos ston cing / bdag dang gzhan du rlom sems su mi byed pa de ltar
76a6(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /zla ba'i bla ma gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/ gang sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis
76a7(dkon brtsegs): zla ba lta bur gyur kyang sems can de dag la'ang rlom sems su med pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems
76b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad rnam par sel bas smras pa/ gang mya ngan thams cad rgyun chad pa de ni/ mya ngan med cing zhum par 'gyur ba med do/ /sems can
76b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni/ mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan pa'o/ /de la mya ngan gyi rtsa ba gang zhe na/ gang 'di ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa ste/ gang ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin
76b3(dkon brtsegs): pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing chos ston pa de ni/ chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa med pas smras pa/ gang 'dod pa'i khams
76b4(dkon brtsegs): la yang mi dmigs/ gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang mi dmigs pa de ltar
76b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu lta bas smras pa/ gang chos ston na/ gang 'di stong pa nyid kyi mnyam
76b6(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid kyis mnyam pa nyid ston la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su mi byed/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi tshul
76b7(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas smras pa/ gang chos ston pa'i tshe 'khor gsum dang 'gal bar mi byed de/ 'khor
77a1(dkon brtsegs): gsum gang zhe na/ bdag mi dmigs pa dang / chos nyan pa mi dmigs pa dang / chos la'ang mngon par zhen pa med pa'o/ /'di ni/
77a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i chos bstan pa zhes bya ste/ de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'gro
77a3(dkon brtsegs): pa grub pas smras pa/ gang chos thams cad 'du ba med par yang shes shing / ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du yang ston la 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad brjod du med
77a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir yi ge gcig kyang mi brjod pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' zab mor spyod pas smras pa/
77a5(dkon brtsegs): gang chos thams cad kyi zab pa nyid kyang shes la/ chos de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gang ston pa dang / gang la ston pa dang / gang bstan pa de
77a6(dkon brtsegs): yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
77a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po gzi brjid chen po dag gis so so nas rang rang gi spobs pa ston par gyur to/ /tshul gcig tu bstan pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di bstan
77b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bdun cus mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni/ bla na med pa yang
77b2(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes par gyur to/ /dge slong bdun stong ni/ nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /lha dang mi'i
77b3(dkon brtsegs): skye rgu las khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa drug ni/ chos la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med par rnam par dag par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
77b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng+ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de'i
77b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni/ ji snyed cig tu 'gyur/ de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni/ ji tsam zhig tu 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni/ ji srid cig na bla na med pa
77b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
77b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di nyid la dris shig / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng+ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad
78a1(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ khyod ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya/ 'jam dpal
78a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ gang gi tshe nam mkha'i khams gzugs can du gyur pa de'i tshe bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gang gi tshe sgyu
78a3(dkon brtsegs): ma'i skyes bu byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gang gi tshe dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa
78a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gang gi tshe rmi lam gyi skyes bu dang / brag ca dang / mig
78a5(dkon brtsegs): yor dang / chu zla dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
78a6(dkon brtsegs): rgya'o| |gang gi tshe nyi ma'i 'od kyis mtshan mor gyur la/ zla ba'i 'od kyis nyin mor gyur pa de'i tshe bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rigs
78a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu| de ltar yin gyi/ su byang chub tu smon pa de la dris shig /smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ khyod byang chub tu mi smon tam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ni/ ma yin
78b1(dkon brtsegs): te| de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ nyid kyang byang chub la/ byang chub nyid kyang 'jam dpal lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ gang 'di byang chub ces bya ba'am/
78b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal zhes bya ba ni/ ming tsam mo/ /ming gang yin pa de ni/ dben zhing byed pa med pa ste/ stong pa'o/ /stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub bo/ /de nas
78b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng+ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod
78b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa dang / nyan thos 'dus pa mthong ngam/ thos sam/ gsol pa/
78b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis mthong ngo / /thos so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ bsam gyis
78b6(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab bo/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de ni/ bgrang du ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ yul ma ga d+ha'i
78b7(dkon brtsegs): til gyi dong nas til gyi 'bru gcig cig blangs nas rigs kyi bu/ til gyi 'bru gcig po de ji lta ba de lta bur ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi byang
79a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' 'dus pa dang / nyan thos 'dus par blta'o/ /phyi na til gyi lhag ma lus pa ltar ni/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
79a2(dkon brtsegs): pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'dus par blta'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
79a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thal bar brlags te rdul phra rab tu byas pa la rigs kyi bu/ rdul phra rab ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi bskal par de bzhin gshegs
79a4(dkon brtsegs): pa kun tu gzigs pa de bzhugs par byas kyang brgya'i char yang smos par mi 'gyur ro/ /stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig phrag
79a5(dkon brtsegs): 'bum gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / rgyur yang smos par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das
79a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i tshe tshad ni/ tshad med grangs med par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di
79a7(dkon brtsegs): lta ste| dper na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di skyes bu la la zhig gis rdul phra rab tu brlags te thal bar byas pa de las skyes bu la
79b1(dkon brtsegs): l a zhig gis rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig khyer te rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de snyed kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas der rdul phra rab kyi
79b2(dkon brtsegs): rdul gcig bzhag ste/ skyes bu des tshul de bzhin du shar phyogs logs su rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag thams cad zad zad du bkod par gyur la/ de bzhin du skyes
79b3(dkon brtsegs): bu gnyis pa zhig skyes te/ des kyang lho phyogs logs su de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re nas tshul de bzhin du bor te/ de bzhin du phyogs bcur skyes bu de lta bu
79b4(dkon brtsegs): re res tshul de dang 'dra bar de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul zad zad du re re nas bor na/ rigs kyi bu/ de ji snyam du sems/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
79b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams de dag brgya phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /stong phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /'bum phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba phrag ni/ 'di snyed
79b6(dkon brtsegs): cig yod do/ /bye ba brgya phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba stong phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba 'bum phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba khrag khrig
79b7(dkon brtsegs): 'bum phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /gtams phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /dkrigs phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /mi 'khrugs pa phrag ni/ 'di
80a1(dkon brtsegs): snyed cig yod do/ /zhes bya bar tshad gzung bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ mi nus so/ /bde bar gshegs
80a2(dkon brtsegs): pa| de ni/ mi nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ skyes bu bcu po de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
80a3(dkon brtsegs): ji snyed cig 'das pa dang / gang dag tu phyin te rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag bor ba dang / gang dag las 'das te rdul phra rab ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams
80a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad btags te rdul phra rab tu brlags na/ rigs kyi bu/ de ji snyam du sems/ rdul phra rab de dag rtsis shes pa'am/ rtsis la mkhas pas
80a5(dkon brtsegs): brgya phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /stong phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /'bum phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /
80a6(dkon brtsegs): bye ba brgya phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba stong phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba 'bum phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
80a7(dkon brtsegs): phrag ni| 'di snyed cig yod do/ /gtams phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /dkrigs phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /mi 'khrugs pa phrag ni/ 'di snyed
80b1(dkon brtsegs): cig yod do/ /zhes bya bar shes pa'am/ bgrang ba'am/ gzhal ba'am/ tshad gzung bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dpe de la ni/ sems can
80b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams mos par 'gyur gyi/ don 'tshal ba'am/ gzhal ba'am/ bgrang ba'am/ tshad gzung bar mi nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
80b3(dkon brtsegs): bu| de bzhin gshegs pas ni/ rdul phra rab de dag bgrang ba'i tshul gyis brgya phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /stong phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /'bum phrag

80b5(dkon brtsegs): ni| 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /gtams phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /dkrigs phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod
80b6(dkon brtsegs): do| |mi 'khrugs pa phrag ni/ 'di snyed cig yod do/ /zhes bya ba de bas kyang lhag par gong du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam pa thams cad du thugs su chud do/ /de nas bcom
80b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te ye shes chen po de lta bu'i slad du byang chub
81a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par sems can dmyal ba chen por bsregs kyang bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/
81a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des bzod par bgyi'o/ /de lta bu'i ye shes chen po ni/ yongs su gtang bar mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
81a3(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa| byams pa/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ sems can mos pa chung ngu dang / le lo che ba dang / brtson 'grus chung ba ma gtogs par su
81a4(dkon brtsegs): zhig de lta bu'i ye shes chen po la 'dod pa mi bskyed/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di bstan pa'i tshe srog chags khri byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /de nas
81a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar phyogs bcur
81a6(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu bcu po de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig 'das pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag tu phyin te rdul phra rab
81a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi rdul bor ba dang / gang dag las 'das te ma bor ba de thams cad rdul phra rab tu brlags pa de dag pas kyang mang ba'i bskal par da dung 'jam dpal gzhon
81b1(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa byang chub gyi spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i smon lam ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ yang dag par
81b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang bsam gyis mi khyab par
81b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta
81b4(dkon brtsegs): ste| 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ltar bskal pa 'di snyed du yang skyo ba mi skyed pa'i 'jug pa chen po de ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ spyod pa
81b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po de ngo mtshar lags so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ nam mkha'i khams 'di snyam du zhag dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba phyed
81b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / dus dang / lo dang / bskal pa dang / bskal pa brgya dang / bskal pa stong dang / bskal pa bye ba dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig dang / bskal pa bye ba
81b7(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag dang / gtams dang / dkrigs dang / mi 'khrugs pa zhig 'das so/ /snyam du sems sam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de ni/ ma
82a1(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha'i khams la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin te/ byang
82a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' gang gis chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur khong du chud de/ ci nas kyang mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog pa de ltar khong du chud pa de ni/ 'di snyam
82a3(dkon brtsegs): du zhag gcig 'das par gyur to/ /nyi ma gcig 'das par gyur to/ /zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du lo 'di snyed cig 'das par gyur to/ /zhes rnam par mi rtog
82a4(dkon brtsegs): go / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos gang la yang de'i 'du shes gang yang 'jug pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i khams ni/ bskal
82a5(dkon brtsegs): pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed pas lhag pa zhig 'das par gyur kyang skyo zhing yongs su yid chad pa med do/ /nam mkha'i khams la skye ba'am/ 'jig pa'am/ tshig
82a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'am| 'gyes par 'gyur ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha'i khams la dngos po med pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang
82a7(dkon brtsegs): gis chos thams cad dngos po med par shes pa de ni/ skyo ba dang / yongs su yid chad pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang la nam mkha'i khams zhes

89b3(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhin/ /lha yi gnas nas lha dag shi 'phos shing / /lha rdzas 'dod pa rjes su dran pa bzhin/ /rgyal ba'i bstan pa mngon par mi shes shing / /rgyal po sde nyams
89b4(dkon brtsegs): snying rjer smre sngags 'don/ /nga yi rin po che ni sna bdun dang / /mi yi phun sum tshogs pa bzhi po dang / /longs spyod dag ni rjes su dran byed cing / /sa bdag de ni
89b5(dkon brtsegs): snying rjer smre sngags 'don/ /mdangs 'phrog byed pa'i srin po stobs can gyis/ /ji ltar mi zhig yongs su non gyur na/ /bdag kyang mi shes gzhan yang mi shes
89b6(dkon brtsegs): ltar| |sa yi bdag po de yang de bzhin no/ /ti se'i gangs kyi ri bos bsgribs gyur na/ /ji ltar mi dag blta bya mi mthong ba/ /de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos bsgribs pas
89b7(dkon brtsegs): na| |rgyal pos blta bar bya ba mi mthong ngo / /gnyid kyis log gam shi bas myos gyur pa'i/ /mis ni rang gi sems kyang mi shes te/ /de bzhin nga rgyal chen po myos
90a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas/ /rgyal po des kyang dge ba mi shes so/ /dper na khyim thab shi bas myos pa yi/ /bud med snying rjer smre sngags 'don byed pa/ /
90a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos myos gyur pas/ /rgyal po de yang snying rjer smre sngags 'don/ /da lta bas na 'char ka thabs mkhas pa/ /khyod kyis 'dir ni rgyal po dad
90a3(dkon brtsegs): par gyis/ /nga rgyal rgyal mtshan rab tu bsnyal bar byos/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa bslang bar gyis/ /'char ka khyod ma gtogs par srid pa yi/ /'gro ba dag na
90a4(dkon brtsegs): skal mthun spyad med pas/ /rgyal po'i sems ni rab tu dad bya bar/ /gang gis nus pa'i dge slong gang yang med/ /'char ka sngon gyi dus na byung ba ni/ /'das pa'i
90a5(dkon brtsegs): dus na sa yi bdag po zhig / ming ni bden pa 'phel zhes bya ba ste/ /sa skyong byed pa rnam par grags pa byung / /de ni chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan/ /srog chags bye ba
90a6(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod/ /rgya mtsho'i mtha' mar thug pa'i sa 'di ni/ /chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po des kyang bskyangs/ /grong dang grong khyer dag kyang 'dab nye zhing / /
90a7(dkon brtsegs): bza' shing 'bras bu me tog rgyas pas gang / /'phags pa'i skye bo dag dang shed las skyes/ /sdig dang bral ba rnams kyis rab tu gang / /dri za brgya mang dag gis
90b1(dkon brtsegs): gang ba ste/ /sdong dum tsher ma rtswa shing ngan pa med/ /'jam zhing dge sbyong gnas kyi tshogs kyis spras/ /chu klung 'bab stegs bde bas rab tu brgyan/ /drang srong tshogs brgya
90b2(dkon brtsegs): rjes su rgyu ba ste/ /skye bo'i dkar chos rnams kyis kun du bsgrubs/ /ngan song lam ngan rnams ni rab tu bcad/ /de nas sems can thams cad lha gnas 'dod/ /rgyal po
90b3(dkon brtsegs): de la bu dag yod pa ni/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas byung ba mthong ba ste/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ni bskyed pa can/ /yon tan mang pos bsgos pa'i blo gros ldan/ /ming ni blo gros snying
90b4(dkon brtsegs): po zhes bya ste/ /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod/ /'dod pa rnams la skyon du lta ba can/ /mi bdag khyim na gnas kyang dben la dga'/ /rgyal po bden
90b5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'phel zhes bya ba des/ /lha yi pho brang 'dra ba'i khyim mchog 'dir/ /na chung tshogs kyis kun nas mdun bdar te/ /'dod pa'i yon tan bzang la spyod ces smras/ /
90b6(dkon brtsegs): bu yi dam pa khyod la nga yis ni/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i bya ba gang ma byas/ /'dod pa rnams la khyod yid ci yi phyir/ /ma mos nga la bu khyod myur du smros/ /srid pa'i 'gro ba'i
90b7(dkon brtsegs): yon tan mkhas bgyis te/ /bu khyod rin chen khyim la dga' ba bskyed/ /bud med rin chen 'khor dang 'grogs bgyis te/ /yul la dga' zhing mos pa bskyed par gyis/ /
91a1(dkon brtsegs): dka' thub nags na 'khod pa'i drang srong dag /de btang nas ni phyir yang 'di dag na/ /dka' thub btang zhing 'dod pa'i dga' la spyod/ /
91a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa de dag bu gcig khyod la bstabs/ /de lta bas na 'dod pa'i dga' la spyod/ /nga dang rgyal srid thams cad khyod dang mthun/ /rnam thos bu yi gnas dang
91a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba yi/ /gzhal med khang gis brgyan can khyim 'dir spyod/ /'di dag rnams kyang mchog gi gzugs ldan zhing / /lha mo 'dra la sgyu rtsal tshar phyin pa/ /rol
91a4(dkon brtsegs): mo'i sgra yi tshul dang glu la mkhas/ /bsnyen bkur snyoms shing yon tan yid kyang 'phrog /mig ni pad+ma'i lo ma 'dra ba ste/ /bim pa'i mdog 'dra mchu mdzes yid
91a5(dkon brtsegs): du 'ong / /so dang bzhin mdog dri ma med cing bzang / /dpral ba smin ma legs shing mgul pa sdug /brla ni glang po che yi sna yang 'dra/ /phrag so shas rgyas thal
91a6(dkon brtsegs): gong legs dang ldan/ /lag dang rkang pa'i mthil ni zangs kyi mdog /sor mo byin pa phra bar legs dang ldan/ /lce ni zangs mdog 'dra ba srab cing ngag /tshig ran
91a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam par smra ba'i tshul dang ldan/ /so ni thags bzang so rnams rad rod med/ /mche ba rab dkar mchog gi rgyan dang ldan/ /lto ba phyang nger 'dug cing lte ba sdug /
91b1(dkon brtsegs): sta zur yangs shing rked pa rdo rje 'dra/ /byin pa glang po che yi so 'dra zhing / /mda' rgyu snying po legs par skyes pa bzhin/ /dregs bcas glang chen 'dra ba'i 'gros dang ldan/ /gzhan
91b2(dkon brtsegs): du mi sems yid kyis khyod la lta/ /rtse ba 'dod cing dar la bab dang ldan/ /gzhon nu snying rje ltos la rtse bar byos/ /bu gcig khyod dang bud med 'di dag gi /mdog bzang ba
91b3(dkon brtsegs): dang dar la bab pa yang / /shing gi rtse mo'i me tog bzhin lhung gis/ /nga rgyal thong la 'dod pa bsten par gyis/ /blo gros snying po ldan des sme ba yi/ /pha dang 'khor rnams kun
91b4(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad smras/ /yab cig khyod ni med par gsungs pa lags/ /gang dag tshig gis grags pa ma smad med/ /yon tan rnams la mos pa bdag gi tshig /bsam ste gtan
91b5(dkon brtsegs): la phab la rgyal po gson/ /ji ltar rmi lam na yang 'dod la bdag /sems mi dga' zhing ma mos de 'dra gson/ /sa yi bdag pos bka' stsal 'di dag ni/ /mkhas pa
91b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams la mdzes pa ma lags te/ /mi mkhas skye bo dag gis yang dag bsam/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis de dag rtag tu smad/ /long ba ma lags ci yi rgyu zhig gis/ /long ba'i
91b7(dkon brtsegs): tshig gis lam gol 'dzin par bgyid/ /thang la gnas pa su zhig ji ltar na/ /mgon med chus khyer ba la 'dod pa bskyed/ /grol ba ji lta bur na bcings pa yi/ /tshig gis
92a1(dkon brtsegs): btson ra der ni 'jug par bgyid/ /sa mnyam gnas shing ma 'khrul ji ltar na/ /nyam ngar gnas la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid/ /sa bdag
92a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa rnams la chags bcas shing / /'dod pa'i longs spyod dag gi chus khyer ba/ /long ba chus khyer btson rar gnas pa dang / /nyam ngar gnas 'drar bdag
92a3(dkon brtsegs): ni de snyam bgyid/ /mi yi bdag po khyod ni long ba bzhin/ /bdag ni mig can khyad par mthong ba lags/ /khyod ni 'dod pa'i chu bos khyer ba lags/ /bdag ni 'dod
92a4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la rnam par smod/ /'dod pa dag ni dug gi lo ma bzhin/ /sprul gyi mgo 'dra sdug bsngal bgyid pa ste/ /rtse gsum pa dang ral gri mdung thung 'dra/ /me yi phung
92a5(dkon brtsegs): po shin tu 'bar ba bzhin/ /blo gros snying po ldan pas de skad du/ /smre sngags 'don pa'i pha dang 'khor la smras/ /rin chen sna bdun dag la ma bltas bar/ /rgyal
92a6(dkon brtsegs): srid rnam par spangs te rab tu byung / /sprul gyi pags snying brjes pa ci 'dra dang / /ngar snabs rus pa'i thal ba bzhin spangs te/ /blo gros snying po ldan pa chags med
92a7(dkon brtsegs): par/ /sdig dang rnam par bral te rab tu byung / /gzhon nu de ltar rab tu byung gyur nas/ /blon po'i bu zhig rjes su rab byung ba/ /ming ni zla bas byin zhes bya ba ste/ /blo
92b1(dkon brtsegs): gros snying po'i rjes su rab tu byung / /gzhon nu de ltar rab tu byung gyur nas/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po bskyed nas ni/ /grogs dang bcas pas mngon par shes pa
92b2(dkon brtsegs): lnga| |ma lus mtha' dag bskyed par byas par gyur/ /'dod pa rnams la skyon du lta bas na/ /mi yi seng+ge de ni 'dod khams 'das/ /tshangs pa yang dag nyid ni thob bya'i
92b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir| |tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba byas/ /de ltar gzhon nu rab tu byung bas na/ /pha de bu la ma dad gyur pa dang / /zla bas byin pa de yi gan song nas/ /legs
92b4(dkon brtsegs): par bshad pa'i tshig gis dga' bar byas/ /'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems/ /de tshe blo gros snying po gzhan snyam mam/ /nga nyid de yi tshe na der gyur te/ /'dod pa'i
92b5(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod don du gnyer ba med/ /'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems/ /bden pa 'phel ba gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ /sa bdag zas gtsang 'di nyid de yi tshe/ /rgyal
92b6(dkon brtsegs): bo bden pa 'phel zhes bya bar gyur/ /'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems/ /rjes su rab byung zlas byin gzhan snyam mam/ /khyod nyid de tshe de yi dus na ni/ /bden pa 'phel ba
92b7(dkon brtsegs): dad par byed pa yin/ /de lta bas na 'char ka khyod kyis 'dir/ /rgyal po zas gtsang dad pa mngon skyed cig /sa skyong byed pa 'di ni dad gyur na/ /skyid pa chen po phun sum tshogs
93a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bcom ldan 'das la mi smra bas khas blangs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka zhag de 'das
93a2(dkon brtsegs): nas snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thabs bogs/ lhung bzed thogs te/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por song ngo / /de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma btsun mo'i
93a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyi mdun na shAkya stong tsam zhig dang dgos pa zhig gi ched du 'dus shing 'khod do/ /rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas su byon cing /
93a4(dkon brtsegs): ser skya'i gnas 'di nyid na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /zhes thos nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu de rab tu byung bas bdag ni/ dbang phyug
93a5(dkon brtsegs): gi longs spyod chen po las nyams par byas so/ /gal te gzhon nu de khyim na gnas na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ chos dang ldan pa/
93a6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni/ 'di dag ste/ 'di ltar 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin
93a7(dkon brtsegs): po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / blon po rin po che ste/ 'di bdun no/ /de la bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag
93b1(dkon brtsegs): mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ gzhan gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong yang tshang bar 'gyur zhing / des gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang chad pa med cing
93b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshon gyis bda' ba med la/ mnyam ste mi mnyam pa med cing chos dang mthun pas legs par phab nas bskal pa rdzogs par legs par bskyangs par 'gyur ba zhig ste/ de ltar
93b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur na| bdag cag kyang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid la dbang phyug gi dbang dang ldan zhing / rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / bsti stang du byas pa dang /
93b4(dkon brtsegs): mchod par byas pa dang / dbang phyug gi dbang chen po yang rnyed par 'gyur ba zhig na/ da ltar bdag cag ni/ gzhon nu de rab tu byung bas de lta bu'i longs spyod kyi dbang chen
93b5(dkon brtsegs): po dang bral bar gyur to snyam mo/ /des de snyam du bsam nas shAkya rnams la bsgo ba/ nga'i bu de la blta ba'am/ bsnyen bkur byed par su'ang ma 'gro zhing / la la zhig nga'i
93b6(dkon brtsegs): bu de la blta ba'am/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro na de'i lus la gnod pa'i chad pas gcad do/ /de'i tshe shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin zhes bya ba zhig 'khor de nas byung
93b7(dkon brtsegs): nas song bar gyur te/ shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin gyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyang ring po nas 'ongs pa mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song ste tshe dang
94a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur spyon/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa legs so/ /tshe dang
94a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring zhig nas byon to/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka /bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs sam/
94a3(dkon brtsegs): mi bde bar mi mnga' 'am/ de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das/ bde bar byon tam/ shin tu ma mnyel tam/ bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal
94a4(dkon brtsegs): tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /dga' ba'i bzhin/ de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan
94a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das la snyun mi mnga'o/ /stobs dang ldan no/ /bde bar bzhugs so/ /mi bde ba mi mnga'o/ /de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga'o/ /bde bar byon to/ /mnyel ba med do/ /bsod
94a6(dkon brtsegs): snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med do/ /shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sad kyis kyang shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang lhan cig dben pa na 'khod pa
94a7(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas 'khor de nas byung ste tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur
94b1(dkon brtsegs): spyon| tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa legs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring zhig nas byon to/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka /bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/
94b2(dkon brtsegs): stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das/ bde bar byon tam/ shin tu ma mnyel
94b3(dkon brtsegs): tam| bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sad la 'di skad ces smras so/ /shin tu
94b4(dkon brtsegs): legs par sad/ de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga'o/ /stobs dang ldan no/ /bde bar bzhugs so/ /mi bde ba mi mnga'o/ /de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga'o//
94b5(dkon brtsegs): bde bar byon to/ /mnyel ba med do/ /bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med do/ /shAkya'i bu mya ngan med dang / mya ngan bral gyis kyang tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang / shAkya'i bu
94b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i bzhin dang / shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sad gnas dben pa na 'khod pa mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char
94b7(dkon brtsegs): ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur spyon/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa legs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring zhig nas
95a1(dkon brtsegs): byon to| |tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka / bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba
95a2(dkon brtsegs): mi mnga' 'am/ de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam/ shin tu ma mnyel tam/ bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal tam/
95a3(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas shAkya'i bu mya ngan med dang / mya ngan bral la 'di skad ces smras so/ /mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral/ bcom ldan
95a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das la snyun mi mnga'o/ /stobs dang ldan no/ /bde bar bzhugs so/ /mi bde ba mi mnga'o/ /de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga'o/ /bde bar byon to/ /mnyel ba med do/ /bsod
95a5(dkon brtsegs): snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dag bcom ldan
95a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par byed do/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / shAkya'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa 'char ka/
95a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag ni/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'dod na/ bdag cag gis de ltar ma nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po zas gtsang
95b1(dkon brtsegs): mas nga'i bu la blta ba'am/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir su yang ma 'gro zhig /la la zhig de la blta ba'am/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song na/ lus la gnod pa'i chad pas
95b2(dkon brtsegs): gcad do/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ /de bas na 'phags pa 'char ka de ltar bdag rgyal pos 'jigs pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'am/ bsnyen bkur byed du 'dong bar
95b3(dkon brtsegs): mi nus so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di ni/ shin tu nga rgyal gyis non par gyur na/ ji ltar bdag gis de'i drung
95b4(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro bar bya snyam nas des 'di snyam du bsam mo/ /'on kyang bdag gis nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis shing rta la bdun srid kyi steng gi bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te rgyal
95b5(dkon brtsegs): po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'gro bar bya'o/ /snyam nas de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa de lta bu la mnyam par bzhag ste/ sems mnyam par bzhag pa
95b6(dkon brtsegs): des nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags nas bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te rgyal po zas gtsang ma ga la ba der song ngo / /rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang tshe dang
95b7(dkon brtsegs): l dan pa 'char ka rgyang ring po nas nam mkha' la shing rta la bdun srid du 'phags te rdzu 'phrul gyis bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas shing 'ong ba mthong nas de la thal mo sbyar te
96a1(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad nas smras pa/ tshon bsgyur gos can khyod ni gang nas 'ongs/ /khyod la ci dgos myur du smra bar byos/ /khyod la gang
96a2(dkon brtsegs): dgos de yang myur du sbyin/ /brtul zhugs grub pa mthong bar shin tu dka'/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la tshigs su
96a3(dkon brtsegs): bcad de slar smras pa/ rgyal po bdag ni khyod kyi sras kyi bu/ /bdag la chos dgos rgyal po gang na bzhugs/ /bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bshos skyel te/ /
96a4(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa skyob pa'i bshos bkur ro/ /yul 'khor bdag po che ba'i dpal mnga' ba/ /khyod la mi mchog sras mnga' grags pa thob/ /gzi brjid kyis
96a5(dkon brtsegs): ni phyogs rnams kun tu 'bar/ /ston gyi nyi ma'i gung gi 'od dang 'dra/ /ji ltar sprin med nam mkha'i nyi ma ni/ /phyogs rnams kun du 'od byed mngon par 'bar/ /
96a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras/ /ye shes mnga' bas phyogs rnams kun du snang / /ji ltar ston gyi nyi ma shar ba na/ /srin bu me khyer zil gyis mnan cing snang / /
96a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras/ /mu stegs gzhan rnams kun bcom lam mer bzhugs/ /ji ltar nyi mas zil non skar ma rnams/ /nyin par 'od stong lam
96b1(dkon brtsegs): mer mi rung ba/ /de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod sras kyis/ /zil gyis mnan pas mu stegs gzhan mi snang / /ji ltar nyi ma'i zil gnon zla ba ni/ /nam mkha'i dbyings na
96b2(dkon brtsegs): 'od stong nyid mi snang / /de bzhin khyod sras zil mnan mu stegs rnams/ /nyi mas zil non zla bzhin gsal ba med/ /seng+ge'i nga ro thos nas phra mo rnams/ /shugs
96b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis rmongs nas bsam pa ji bzhin du/ /ri sul gseb tu byer nas 'khra zhing gnas/ /stag gi nga ro gzhan gyis bzod par dka'/ /de bzhin rgyal ba drang srong chen po'i
96b4(dkon brtsegs): gsung / /bdag med nga ro mu stegs gzhan thos na/ /shes rab dman pa srid pa'i rtser phyin kyang / /gsung thos pas ni thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur/ /lha dang
96b5(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa'i 'jig rten long ba la/ /spyan dang ldan pa des ni mig kyang stsal/ /snang ba mdzad cing rdul kyang rnam par sbyangs/ /ye shes snang ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon
96b6(dkon brtsegs): par shar/ /bde dang mi bde lam gnyis rab tu bstan/ /lam dang gol ba'i lam yang rgyal bas bstan/ /lam stor skye bo rnams ni lam du btsud/ /'dam du bying
96b7(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams kyang thang la bton/ /ji ltar skom pa'i sa la sprin gyis ni/ /sgang dang gshong bcas char gyis ngoms par byed/ /de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras/ /'gro
97a1(dkon brtsegs): ba lhar bcas chos kyis ngoms par mdzad/ /ji ltar char gyis ngoms pa'i ri sul nags/ /rtswa dang gel ba nags tshal shing rnams dang //
97a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khri shing sdong po sman gyi rnam pa dang / /me tog sna tshogs kyis ni sa mdzes pa/ /de bzhin stobs bcu mi 'jigs mnga' ba dang / /ma 'dres bco brgyad chos lnga'i sdong po
97a3(dkon brtsegs): la/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes me tog dang / /'bras bu spras pas rgyal po'i sras mdzes so/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dbus na lhun po'i ri/ /lha yi gnas gyur mi
97a4(dkon brtsegs): bsgul rnam par mdzes/ /de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras/ /dge sbyong rgya mtsho'i nang na rnam par mdzes/ /bde sogs khyim thab brgya byin lha dbang po/ /lha yi stan
97a5(dkon brtsegs): la 'dug na mdzes pa ltar/ /de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras/ /dge sbyong tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par mdzes/ /byams pa'i stobs can zab mo'i 'brug bsgrags
97a6(dkon brtsegs): te/ /thugs rje chen po'i glog phreng rir ldan pas/ /dran pa nyer gzhag char rgyun 'dab 'khrigs te/ /rgyal ba klu mchog de ni chos char 'bebs/ /yongs dag dkyil
97a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor tshul khrims rab kyi zer/ /ting 'dzin nyon mongs lha min rab 'joms shing / /ye shes nyi zer srid pa'i sred pa skem/ /rgyal ba'i nyi chen 'gro bar rnam par
97b1(dkon brtsegs): mdzes| |ting 'dzin tshul khrims gzings dang gru chen te/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i nor bu rin chen tshogs/ /byang chub yan lag rin chen 'byung gnas bsam gtan
97b2(dkon brtsegs): rlabs| |thar pa 'dod pas sangs rgyas rgya mtsho bsten par bya/ /tshul khrims rnam dag rtsa ba brtan par zug /ting 'dzin lo ma dran pa yal ga 'dab/ /byang chub yan lag
97b3(dkon brtsegs): me tog stong pa'i sdong / /bdag med grib ldan rgyal ba'i sdong po bsten/ /tshul khrims nags mtha' bsten pa'i stobs chen po/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba'i ri khrod phug na gnas/ /
97b4(dkon brtsegs): stong pa mtshan med smon med spyod yul can/ /rgyal ba stobs can seng+ge khyod kyi sras/ /thub pa mi gnas gnas ni rnam par ston/ /rgyal ba khyu mchog brjid pa'i stabs
97b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhud pas/ /byis pa so so mu stegs gzhan bsngags te/ /khyod kyi sras ni khyu mchog sgra yang 'byin/ /tshul khrims gter dang yon tan dbyig gis brgyan/ /bsam
97b6(dkon brtsegs): gtan dang ba'i zhi gnas nye bar bskyabs/ /ye shes kyis bsrungs thar pa'i spyod yul can/ /rgyal ba tshong dpon gtso bo nor gtong mdzad/ /dge ba yongs su bzung
97b7(dkon brtsegs): bas sdig bcom ste/ /nyon mongs zhi mdzad dge bsnyen bka' stsol pas/ /lha dang lha min bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ /rgyal po khyod kyi sras mchog rnam par mdzes//
98a1(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims mchog sprin blo ros glog 'byin cing / /yan lag brgyad lam cher chen rlan gyis spangs/ /thub pa gces pa'i lo tog 'bras
98a2(dkon brtsegs): bu stsol/ /khyod kyi sras ni klu chen po 'brug sgra sgrog /rgyal pos smras pa/ gang zag mchog de bde bar 'ongs sam ci/ /bsod snyoms rgyu bas 'dren pa ma ngal lam/ /de
98a3(dkon brtsegs): yi lus la ngal bas dub med dam/ /thang gnas ut+pa la bzhin ma rnying ngam/ /'char kas smras pa/ rdzu 'phrul stobs mnga' bsam gtan spyod yul can/ /dgyes shing
98a4(dkon brtsegs): bde bas yan lag yongs rgyas te/ /thub pa zhi ba'i snyoms 'jug gnas bcas pas/ /gser gyi pad+ma lta bur rgyal ma rnying / /rgyal pos smras pa/ sngon chad rdza rnga rnga bran
98a5(dkon brtsegs): sgras bskul zhing / /gling bu'i sgra snyan nga ros bskul byas te/ /bud med glu yi dbyangs kyis bslang bslang na/ /da ltar sad na sdug bsngal mi myong ngam/ /'char kas
98a6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ bsam gtan dgongs pas ting 'dzin zhi yul can/ /ting 'dzin sgrub pa'i tshul la mkhas pa ste/ /mnal lam bzhengs sam bzhud dam bzhugs pa na/ /
98a7(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal mi mnga' rgyal ba rtag tu dgyes/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ che ba'i rkyen 'os lam mchog bshams pa la/ /me mar sdong pos kun nas mtha' bskor te/ /bud
98b1(dkon brtsegs): med tshogs kyis bskor cing nyal nyal na/ /da lta mun par nyal na cis mi rmongs/ /'char kas smras pa/ thub chen 'phags pa gzims lam gzims pa ni/ /byams pa'i
98b2(dkon brtsegs): gdan bting thugs rjes bde bar bzhengs/ /dga' bas gnas pas dgyes dang ldan pas na/ /srid med btang snyoms can la rmongs mi mnga'/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ shAkya
98b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bos de rtag mdun du bdar/ /bstan bcos mkhas dang rtse zhing dga' byas te/ /gzhal med khang 'dra'i khyim du dga' byas na/ /nga yi bu de nags mthar ji ltar
98b4(dkon brtsegs): dga'| |'char kas smras pa/ chos kyi byung ba zhi sems ldan rnams kyis/ /zhi ba'i thugs mnga' de rtag mdun du bdar/ /zhi ba'i dgon par zhi ba bstan mdzad pas/ /
98b5(dkon brtsegs): ston pa 'jigs bral de ni der dgyes so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ sngon chad gzhon nu khyim na gnas pa'i tshe/ /yan lag spos kyi 'bru mar zhim byugs te/ /rgyal po'i
98b6(dkon brtsegs): rkyen du 'os pas khrus byas na/ /nags kyi mtha' na thub pa su yis bkru/ /'char kas smras pa/ khrims gtsang 'bab stegs chos chu rdzing bu ste/ /thub pa de bkru gzhan
98b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dkru ba mdzad/ /sku la mi gsher sras dang bcas su 'bog /rang yang rgal la skye bo phal chen sgrol/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gser gyi skud pa nor bu'i phreng bas
99a1(dkon brtsegs): brgyan/ /rgyal po'i rkyen 'os gos mchog bzang po gyon/ /tsan+dan zhim pos shing 'dab legs par bris/ /nags chen de gseb thub
99a2(dkon brtsegs): pa su yis brgyan/ /'char kas smras pa/ tshul khrims spos byugs yon tan phreng bas brgyan/ /khrel yod na bza' ting 'dzin bsam gtan brgyan/ /mngon shes
99a3(dkon brtsegs): rig pa rnam thar brgyan pa'i sku/ /rnam grol gzi mnga' thub pa nags na mdzes/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ rtse gnyis mtshon dang ral gri mtshon thogs pa'i/ /dpa' bo
99a4(dkon brtsegs): g.yul du 'ongs pas lus bsrungs te/ /bla re gdugs kyis rtag tu dgab dgab pa/ /gcig pu nags na 'dug na su yis bsrung / /'char kas smras pa/ byams
99a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i stobs kyis thub pa yongs bsrungs te/ /de dpung ye shes nyan thos zham ring g.yog /yon tan tshogs la nges pas 'jigs mi mnga'/ /stobs bcu dgyes
99a6(dkon brtsegs): pa mnga' zhing mi 'jigs brnyes/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ nga yi bu yi yon tan khyod kyis smras/ /chos legs spyod cing dub med brjod pa thos/ /khyod kyang zan zo bsod
99a7(dkon brtsegs): snyoms bkur bar gyis/ /bdag kyang mi yi dbang po bltar 'gro'o/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras
99b1(dkon brtsegs): so| |rgyal po chen po/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ tshogs kyi slob dpon/ tshogs kyi mchog /dge sbyong gi tshogs yongs su sdud pa drang srong chen po ste/ dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi
99b2(dkon brtsegs): nang na bzhugs na/ dge sbyong gi rgyal po lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes bco lnga la zla ba nya ste yongs su rgyas pa'i
99b3(dkon brtsegs): tshe skar ma'i tshogs kyis kun nas bskor ba ni/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ lham me/ lhan
99b4(dkon brtsegs): ne/ lhang nge'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma ni/ sngon gyi dus na shin tu lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi
99b5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ shin tu lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab rgya mtsho'i nang na 'dug pa ni/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang
99b6(dkon brtsegs): nge'o| / de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni/ chos
99b7(dkon brtsegs): bzang lha'i mdun sa na gnas na/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ lham me/ lhan ne/
100a1(dkon brtsegs): lhang nge'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ lha'i bu rab 'thab bral dang / lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan dang / lha'i bu rab 'phrul dga' dang / lha'i
100a2(dkon brtsegs): bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha'i tshogs kyi nang na gnas na/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs
100a3(dkon brtsegs): na| lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa ni/ tshangs pa bye ba phrag stong gis bskor na/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang
100a4(dkon brtsegs): nge'o| |de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma bcom ldan
100a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi yon tan de lta bu brjod pa 'di thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos su zad na/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di
100a6(dkon brtsegs): ltar mthu che la 'di ltar dbang che bar grags na/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma btsas pa nyid kyi tshe sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab
100a7(dkon brtsegs): tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg /rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem
100b1(dkon brtsegs): chem| 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs shing / snang ba dpag tu med pa byung ba lta ci
100b2(dkon brtsegs): smos/ btsas ma thag tu sus kyang ma brten par sa la gom ba bdun por ba dang / steng gi bar snang las chu'i rgyun grang dro rnam pa gnyis byung ste/ de gnyis kyis khrus
100b3(dkon brtsegs): byas pa dang / de'i tshe lha'i khri bzang po dbus gser las byas pa byung ba dang / steng gi bar snang las lha'i gdugs rnga yab dang bcas pa byung ba lta'ang ci smos/ btsas
100b4(dkon brtsegs): ma thag tu lha thams cad phyag 'tshal bar gyur pa dang / gang gi tshe btsas nas gang gi tshe mngon par byung ba de'i bar du nam yang 'khrul pa med pa/ rtag tu dam
100b5(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa la brtan ba/ ji skad smras pa de ltar byed pa/ rtag tu rgyun mi gcod par brtson 'grus brtan pa/ yang dag par smra ba/ slu ba med pa lta ci smos/ gang gi tshe
100b6(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te brgal nas bsgral bar bya'o/ /zhes smras pa lta ci smos snyam ste/ des de ltar bcom
100b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i dam bcas pa de dran nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /blo mchog ldan pa gang zhig bltams ma thag /nor pa med pa'i
101a1(dkon brtsegs): gsung ni brjod mdzad de/ /gang zhig la ni bden pa'i gsung mnga' ba/ /de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/ /gang zhig bltams par
101a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur ma thag nyid du/ /'jig rten gtso bor 'gyur bar bya'o zhes/ /mgon 'os mnyam pa med pa'i gsung brjod pa/ /de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/ /su zhig rmi lam
101a3(dkon brtsegs): rmi ba'i dus na yang / /rdzun gyi tshig ni nam yang ma gsungs te/ /ji skad gsungs pa de dag mdzad mdzad pa/ /de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/ /gser gyi phung
101a4(dkon brtsegs): po gangs rir mnyam pa yis/ /gang zhig chags par bya bar ma nus shing / /gang zhig chags las rnam par 'das gyur pa/ /de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/ /
101a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshon rnon 'dra ba'i dag rtsub tshig rnams kyis/ /gang zhig khro bar bya bar ma nus shing / /zhe sdang dngos po las ni rab 'das pa/ /de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi
101a6(dkon brtsegs): ches| |chags par 'gyur dang zhe sdang rmongs 'gyur bas/ /gang zhig thul bar nus par ma gyur te/ /shes rab rgyal po dang ni ldan gyur pa/ /de la mkhas pa su zhig
101a7(dkon brtsegs): yid mi ches/ /'dod pa'i dga' dang bde rnams du ma dang / /longs spyod dag la rtog pa'i rnam pa yis/ /gang zhig bcing bar nus par ma gyur pa/ /de la mkhas pa
101b1(dkon brtsegs): su zhig yid mi ches/ /rmad du byung ba rnam pa brgyad dag gis/ /ngo mtshar 'dzin 'jug nam yang ma nus te/ /dpal stug ldan zhing lag tu mi dam pa/ /de la mkhas pa su
101b2(dkon brtsegs): zhig yid mi ches/ /mkhas pa dag gis brjod pa'i tshig snyan pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'i tshig gis kyang / /gang zhig bcing bar nus par ma gyur pa/ /de la mkhas
101b3(dkon brtsegs): pa su zhig yid mi ches/ /don gyi tshul la brtson dang ldan pa dang / /chos dang 'dod la nges pa'i tshig rnams kyis/ /gang zhig bcing bar nus par ma gyur pa/ /de yi
101b4(dkon brtsegs): gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /dri ma med stobs mtha' yas ldan gyur pa/ /gang zhig grong khyer mchog nas 'byung ba'i tshe/ /dpung rnams kyis ni thub par ma gyur
101b5(dkon brtsegs): pa| |de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /byang chub dam pa mngon par bzhed pa'i phyir/ /gang zhig 'dod pa'i bde ba spangs nas su/ /'chi med rgyu phyir ri dwags spyod
101b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa/ /de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /byang chub dam pa mngon par bzhed pa'i phyir/ /zhen pa ma yin sems can gang zhig gis/ /lo drug bar du dka' thub
101b7(dkon brtsegs): drag spyad pa/ /de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /'jig rten la ni phan dang bde ba'i phyir/ /byang chub dam pa don du gnyer ba na/ /lo drug lon pa'i tha mar tshod khu
102a1(dkon brtsegs): gsol| |de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /gang la lo drug bar du bdud kyis ni/ /rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brangs te glags btsal kyang / /
102a2(dkon brtsegs): de la glags ni rnyed par ma gyur pa/ /de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang bral gyur cing / /su la cung zad tsam yang mi slong la/ /
102a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten dag gi don ni mdzad gyur pa/ /de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /gang zhig gzhan la gsan pa ma mdzad par/ /rtogs pa dka' ba rab tu zhi ba yi/ /
102a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub bla med mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas pa/ /de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /gang zhig tshangs pa nyid kyis gsol btab pas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de yi
102a5(dkon brtsegs): tshig gsan te/ /nyid kyis chos ni rab tu bshad pa na/ /de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /gang zhig bdag la thugs brtse don gyi phyir/ /shAkya'i grong khyer khyim
102a6(dkon brtsegs): du byon gyur te/ /shAkya'i tshogs rnams grol bar mdzad pa na/ /de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /brgal bar gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das gang gis/ /sngon gyi thugs
102a7(dkon brtsegs): dam bcas pa dgongs mdzad de/ /bdag cag srid pa'i rgyun las sgrol mdzad pa/ /de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /de dus nga bab de ltar dus mkhyen pas/ /bcom
102b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis de yi dus mkhyen te/ /'dren pa dus su thugs brtse mdzad pa po/ /de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/ /mi yi 'dren pa yi ni sku mchog la/ /blta ba'i don
102b2(dkon brtsegs): du bdag ni 'gro bya zhes/ /rgyal po des ni rang gi sems kyis su/ /de snyam du ni rjes su bsam pa byas/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas de ltar ring zhig rjes su bsam nas
102b3(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa/ dge slong khyod la ci zhig dgos/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la tshigs su bcad
102b4(dkon brtsegs): de slar smras pa/ rgyal po khyod kyi don du bsam byas te/ /khyod nyid dad par bya phyir bdag 'dir 'ongs/ /stobs bcu mnga' la dad pa'i sems bskyed na/ /skyes pa bud
102b5(dkon brtsegs): med dag kyang mtho ris 'dong / /stobs bcu mnga' zhing yon tan tshad med ldan/ /drang srong chen po shAkya dga' mdzad pa/ /'dir spyon rgyal po thugs dang skyed cig dang //
102b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi grags pa tshad med 'jig rten 'byung / /khyod kyi sras ni mi dbang dam pa ste/ /stobs bcu thugs rje thugs brtse che mnga' ba/ /chu khrod pad+ma ji bzhin chags med par/ /
102b7(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcu chags med thugs mnga' spyod pa mdzad/ /srid pa'i chu bo bzhi las brgal gyur nas/ /'gro ba mang po chu bo che las sgrol/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo mi 'jigs thang
103a1(dkon brtsegs): 'don gyi/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /srid pa'i zug rngu bzhi po kun bton te/ /sman pa'i gtso bo skye rgu'i zug rngu 'byin/ /gsol
103a2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa mkhas pa dam pa'i mchog / 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /bdud kyi sde chen dpag med pham mdzad de/ /nag po'i phyogs rnams sder bcas yongs
103a3(dkon brtsegs): mnan nas/ /mchog tu zhi ba'i byang chub rnyed gyur gyi/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /'gro ba 'grol zhing chos kyang bstan pa dang / /'chi med zhi ba mi la
103a4(dkon brtsegs): bshad gsol zhes/ /mi dbang la ni lha dbang gsol 'debs kyi/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad bskyed/ /phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs rnams zil mnan te/ /ston pa
103a5(dkon brtsegs): dpag yas 'khor lo rab bskor nas/ /sems can bye ba tshad med 'dul mdzad kyi/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /rnam dag spyan mnga' de ni 'gro ba dag /
103a6(dkon brtsegs): mun pa rab rib stug pos bsgribs pa yi/ /mig sbyong rab rib sel cing gsal mdzad kyi/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /rga dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa nyon
103a7(dkon brtsegs): mongs la/ /rga shi med mchog mi la ston mdzad cing / /'chi med gnas su sems can don mdzad kyi/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /me chen gsum gyis
103b1(dkon brtsegs): bsregs pa'i 'jig rten 'di/ /mes tshig sa la sprin chen char pa bzhin/ /bzhi gnyis dam pa'i sprin gyis char 'bebs kyi/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /dri
103b2(dkon brtsegs): gsum dri ma spangs shing skyon bsal te/ /dri ma gsum las skye bo grol mdzad cing / /stobs bcu rnam par snang ba skyed mdzad kyi/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa
103b3(dkon brtsegs): skyed| |skye rgu kun la pha bzhin thugs brtse bas/ /stobs bcu thugs rje mnga' ba byams par dgongs/ /thugs rje thugs brtses sems can sgrol mdzad kyi/ /'dren pa mi mchog la
103b4(dkon brtsegs): ni dad pa skyed/ /bcom ldan de ni ma dul sems can 'dul/ /thugs rje mnga' ba ma zhi zhi mdzad cing / /rgod pa rnams kyang nyon mongs zhi mdzad kyi/ /'dren pa mi mchog la
103b5(dkon brtsegs): ni dad pa skyed/ /skye bo rnams kyi srid pa'i rgya mtsho skem/ /rgya mtsho la ni lha'i bu ji lta bar/ /stobs bcu thugs rje che mnga' sgrol mdzad kyi/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa
103b6(dkon brtsegs): skyed| |tshad med yon tan tshogs kyis mdzes gyur pa/ /thugs rje chen po dang ba'i thugs kyis spyod/ /yun ring 'khrugs pa'i skye bo dad mdzad kyi/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni
103b7(dkon brtsegs): dad pa skyed/ /nor bu rin chen chu dang byed pa bzhin/ /rgyal ba skye ba dang bar spyod mdzad cing / /mi yi 'thab rnyog rab tu dang mdzad kyi/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed//
104a1(dkon brtsegs): nor bu rin chen rang bzhin yongs dag pa/ /mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' ba yongs su skyed/ /rgyal ba de bzhin skyon bsal dag pa'i thugs/ /
104a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' ba yongs su skyed/ /'jig rten gtso la dad pa thob gyur na/ /lha dang mi dag sdug bsngal khur yang 'dor/ /srid pa'i rgyud spangs zhi ba mchog
104a3(dkon brtsegs): tu 'dong / /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /bdag gis yon tan phyogs gcig brjod pa ni/ /nam mkha'i dbyings la mkha' lding rjes bzhin te/ /bdag ni
104a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i yon tan mthar phyin min/ /'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka las legs par bshad pa yang
104a5(dkon brtsegs): thos/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' mdzad pa'i yon tan de lta bu yang nyid kyis mngon du mthong / /sngon bdag brgal nas skyes bu khyu mchog khyod kyang
104a6(dkon brtsegs): bsgral bar bgyi'o/ /zhes dam bcas pa yang rjes su dran nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la dad pa thob par gyur to/ /de ltar dad pa thob pa'i sems kyis tshe dang ldan pa
104a7(dkon brtsegs): 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so/ /dge slong khyod ni/ nga'i bu'i chos las skyes pa'i bu yin na/ khyod bdag zan zo la bcom ldan 'das kyi bshos khyer te song
104b1(dkon brtsegs): zhig / da yang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir phyi bzhin 'ong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byas nas zan zos te
104b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bshos khyer nas song ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /rgyal po zas gtsang ma ni/ dge slong

104b4(dkon brtsegs): song nas bdag gis byas pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la legs so/ /zhes bya ba gnang ste/ 'char
104b5(dkon brtsegs): ka legs so/ /legs so/ /de ring rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par byas pas khyod kyis bsod nams mang du bskyed do/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams

104b7(dkon brtsegs): shig yod na ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma rnyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su yang bsod nams kyi phung po de mi shong ste/ bsod nams kyi phung po

105a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma'i rnam pa 'di lta bu mdzad do/ /mtshan ma'i rnam pa de lta bu mdzad pas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su bskor

105a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dug par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung yang dri za bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan
105a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs logs su brten te steng gi bar snang la dri za'i
105b1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po yang grul

105b6(dkon brtsegs): su brten te steng gi bar snang la klu'i tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to/ /
105b7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas snga ma bzhin du steng gi bar snang
106a1(dkon brtsegs): la thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to/ /de bzhin du lha'i dbang po rab 'thab

106a4(dkon brtsegs): l dan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te steng gi bar snang la re re zhing yang g.yog lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig

106a6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu dang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang pa'am/ brkyang pa las bskum

106b6(dkon brtsegs): dri gsum 'joms/ /rtog ge can tshogs zil gyis mnan nas ni/ /mkha' la skar ma'i bdag po bzhin du mdzes/ /nyi ma 'od zer brgya yi lus 'dzin pa/ /ston gyi
106b7(dkon brtsegs): dus na mun sel rnam mdzes shing / /lha min tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas su/ /nyi ma de ni pad+ma'i kha yang 'byed/ /nyi ma 'od zer brgya 'dra'i sku mnga' bas/ /stong
107a1(dkon brtsegs): gsum po dag zil gyis mnan nas ni/ /mi yi nyi ma rnam par mdzes gyur cing / /nyan thos pad+ma'i tshal mchog kha yang 'byed/ /lha
107a2(dkon brtsegs): yi rgyal po dbang po brgya byin ni/ /'dun sar lha yi tshogs kyis yongs bskor ba/ /lha yi 'khor rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni/ /bde sogs khyim thab sbyin ldan rnam par
107a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzes| |rkang gnyis dbang po dpal stug stobs bcu yang / /dge sbyong tshogs kyis mdun bdar stong gsum ni/ /rtog ge tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni/ /dge
107a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyong tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par mdzes/ /lha yi rgyal po mtha' bral dbang byed pa/ /mtha' bral bzang po lhas mchod btsun byas ba/ /mtha' bral bzang po lha tshogs
107a5(dkon brtsegs): nang zhugs te/ /mtha' bral rnams kyi nang na 'dug pa mdzes/ /gzi brjid mtha' yas stobs bcu mnga' ba yang / /lam ngan ngan 'gror 'gro ba zil mnan nas/ /yan
107a6(dkon brtsegs): lag brgyad pa rab tu ston mdzad cing / /stobs bcu yon tan rnams kyis rab tu mdzes/ /lha yi rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan de/ /dga' ldan gnas na lha yi tshogs
107a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis bskor/ /lha tshogs mang po zil gyis mnan nas ni/ /sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas rab tu mdzes/ /de bzhin lha dang lha min bla ma yang / /lha dang lha min tshogs kyis
107b1(dkon brtsegs): bla mar byas/ /'khor brgyad po dag zil gyis mnan nas ni/ /skyes bu seng+ge dam pa 'jig rten mdzes/ /lha yi dbang po bdag po rab 'phrul ni/ /lha tshogs mang po zil gyis

108a1(dkon brtsegs): pa lha dang mi rnams dang / /lto 'phye chen po dag ni 'dus mkhyen nas/ /skyes bu khyu mchog yan lag brgyad ldan gyi/ /gsung rnams kyis ni

109b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang sngo ba dang / /rta yang sngo zhing sngo ba'i 'khor dang bcas/ /mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang sngo ba ste/ /de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang sngo/ /lcags kyang sngo zhing thag srang rnams
109b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang sngo/ /dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas/ /mi rnams kyang ni sngon po'i gos can te/ /rgyal mtshan sngon po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas/ /shing rta ser zhing

110a5(dkon brtsegs): gos can te/ /rgyal mtshan dmar po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas/ /shing rta dkar zhing rgyan kyang dkar pa dang / /rta yang dkar zhing dkar po'i 'khor dang bcas/ /mtshan
110a6(dkon brtsegs): ma lnga po dag kyang dkar po ste/ /de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang dkar/ /lcags kyang dkar zhing thag srang rnams kyang dkar/ /dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang
110a7(dkon brtsegs): bcas| |mi rnams kyang ni dkar po'i gos can te/ /rgyal mtshan dkar po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas/ /shing rta khra zhing rgyan kyang khra ba dang / /rta yang khra zhing khra ba'i
110b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor dang bcas/ /mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang khra ba ste/ /de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang khra/ /lcags kyang khra zhing thag srang rnams kyang khra/ /dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams
110b2(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas/ /mi rnams kyang ni khra ba'i gos can te/ /rgyal mtshan khra bo bsgreng bas mdzes par byas/ /shing rta de dag rnams kyi phyi bzhin du/ /glang po brgyad khri tshang bar
110b3(dkon brtsegs): bshams pa ni/ /gser gyi rgyal mtshan rnams kyis legs par brgyan/ /glang chen rnams ni gser gyis tshal bar brgyan/ /de dag steng du rin chen sna bdun gyi/ /khang pa
110b4(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa dag ni bzhag nas su/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi/ /shing rta rnams kyis phyi bzhin 'brang bar bshams/ /de bzhin rta mchog stong phrag brgyad cu
110b5(dkon brtsegs): yang / /rin chen sna bdun rgyan gyis dga' bar brgyan/ /rgyal po'i chas gos rgyal po 'cham stabs can/ /glang po de dag rnams ni phyi bzhin 'brang / /rab tu dri zhim kha
110b6(dkon brtsegs): dog lnga pa yi/ /me tog sil ma rgyal po'i lam du bkram/ /dar gyi lda ldi dag kyang rab tu bres/ /bdug spos snod rnams kyis ni legs par brgyan/ /glu mkhan gar
110b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhan rnams dang gyad rnams dang / /bum rnga thogs pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas/ /rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa mang / /rab tu dga' zhing rgyal po'i phyi bzhin
111a1(dkon brtsegs): 'brang / /rgyal po gshegs pa'i le'u ste/ gnyis pa'o// //de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / /shAkya rnams rta babs
111a2(dkon brtsegs): sa'i bar du bzhon pa dang dong ste phyin nas bzhon pa las babs te/ rkang thang gi 'khor gyis yongs su bskor nas mdun du bdar te n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar dong
111a3(dkon brtsegs): ngo| / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma nga rgyal che bar mkhyen nas mi gang lhag tsam gyi steng gi bar snang gi nam mkha' la rgyal po zas gtsang
111a4(dkon brtsegs): ma mngon par dad par bya ba'i phyir 'chag cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'chag pa'i g.yas phyogs nas mi mjed kyi bdag po
111a5(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa zhal 'bring du 'chag cing 'gro'o/ /g.yon phyogs nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin zhal 'bring du 'chag cing 'gro'o/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i
111a6(dkon brtsegs): zhal 'bring du lha'i rgyal po rab 'thab bral dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams bcom ldan 'das la
111a7(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gdugs 'dzin cing bsil yab kyis g.yob par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / yul 'khor srung gnyis kyang bcom
111b1(dkon brtsegs): l dan 'das 'chag pa'i shar phyogs logs kyi thog ma la bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga smad nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su
111b2(dkon brtsegs): thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang gnyis kyang bcom ldan 'das
111b3(dkon brtsegs): ' chag pa'i nub phyogs logs kyi thog ma la bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga smad nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar
111b4(dkon brtsegs): ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to/ /de'i tshe rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang /
111b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir steng gi bar snang la gnas te/ lha'i
111b6(dkon brtsegs): me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / lha'i man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dang / lha'i spos kyi phye ma rab tu 'thor bar gyur to/ /bcom
111b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lha'i rol mo'i sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs dag kyang steng gi bar snang la sgra 'byin par gyur to/ /mi'i las 'das pa'i glu'i nga ro yang
112a1(dkon brtsegs): bar snang las byung bar gyur to/ /sprin las spos kyi char zam zim yang bab par gyur to/ /lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i
112a2(dkon brtsegs): char yang bab par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa gang mngon par mdzad pas lha dang mi rnams kyang gcig gis gcig mthong
112a3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par mdzad do/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas lha de dag bcom ldan 'das de la mchod pa byed pa yang mthong / lha'i rin
112a4(dkon brtsegs): po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las grub pa'i khang pa brtsegs pas kyang bar snang gang bar mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs
112a5(dkon brtsegs): par gsungs pa de ni/ ngo mtshar che ste/ sngon bcom ldan 'das gzhon nur gyur pa'i tshe 'di skad du nga la ni/ gling chen po bzhi'i dbang phyug la dbang bar 'gyur
112a6(dkon brtsegs): ba ngo mtshar mi che ste/ ngas ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su lha dang mi'i nang du chos kyi dbang phyug la dbang bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs na/
112a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dbang phyug la dbang ba de ni/ 'di yin par blta ste/ bdag ni/ mi'i 'khor can du zad/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ lha dang mi'i
112b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor can du gyur to/ /snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas bla gos phyogs gcig tu bgos te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi
112b2(dkon brtsegs): bos phyag 'tshal te tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das bltams ma thag tu sus kyang ma brten par sa chen po la gom pa bdun bzhud de phyogs bzhir gzigs nas
112b3(dkon brtsegs): gsung brjod pa/ nga ni/ 'jig rten na mchog /nga ni/ 'jig rten na gtso/ nga ni/ 'jig rten na rab ste/ ngas skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba mthar dbyung ngo / /
112b4(dkon brtsegs): zhes gsungs pa de'i tshe yang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos gtugs te phyag bgyis so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das zhing pa'i grong du bzhud nas
112b5(dkon brtsegs): dzam+bu'i grib ma bsil ba la bzhugs pa'i tshe nyi ma yol yang dzam+bu'i grib mas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku de ma btang ste/ lha'i bu gzhon nu drug thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod
112b6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa de'i tshe yang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag bgyis so/ /da yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di dang lan gsum du phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes smras nas de'i tshe tshigs su
112b7(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /gang tshe rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod bltams nas/ /sa chen 'di la gom pa bdun bzhud de/ /nga ni 'jig rten 'di na mchog ces gsungs/ /de tshe mkhas
113a1(dkon brtsegs): pa khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /gang tshe thub chen zhing ba'i grong bzhud de/ /dzam+bu'i grib mas bzhugs pa ma btang zhing / /lha bu gzhon nu drug gis
113a2(dkon brtsegs): btud gyur pa/ /de tshe mchod 'os khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /nga yang 'di dang khyod la lan gsum du/ /thub pa khyod kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rje che mnga' lha
113a3(dkon brtsegs): mis mchod pa gtso/ /khyod 'dra 'jig rten ma mchis lhag ci smos/ /mtshan ni don grub lags zhes sngon brjod pa/ /pha dang ma yis bsam ste btags pa lags/ /khyod kyis bsam
113a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs bdud rtsi brnyes pas na/ /don grub lags par bdag gis nga gdod 'tshal/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi seng+ge'i khri lha'i yid bzhin gyi
113a5(dkon brtsegs): ngas bcos bu bting ba rnam pa sna tshogs su spel ba bshams so/ /thams cad dang ldan pa'i n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar yang lha'i yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bu yog par
113a6(dkon brtsegs): bting ngo / /steng du yang lha'i yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bu'i bla re bres so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bar snang gi 'chag sa de nas babs te gdan khri bshams pa la
113a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs so/ /rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha
113b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bar snang la 'khod par gyur to/ /'di la 'di ni/ chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /ser skya zhes bya
113b2(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer dam pa yi/ /n+ya gro d+ha yi ra ba nyams dga' bar/ /rgyal po zas gtsang de dang gang gi tshe/ /'jig rten mgon po phrad pa de yi tshe/ /skye bo mang po dag ni 'dus gyur te/ /lha
113b3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin dang mkha' lding dbang po dang / /klu tshogs rnams dang de bzhin grul bum dang / /dri za'i rgyal po rnams kyang 'dus par gyur/ /de bzhin gsang ba'i bdag po rnams
113b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dus te/ /mi'am ci yi tshogs dang mi rnams dang / /de bzhin 'dod pa dag na spyod pa'i lha/ /rab tu dga' ba rnams kyang 'dus par gyur/ /de bzhin gzugs kyi khams su
113b5(dkon brtsegs): gtogs pa yi/ /tshangs pa rnams dang tshangs pa'i ris rnams dang / /'od gsal ba dang dge rgyas pa dag dang / /'bras bu che bar gtogs dang gnas gtsang 'dus/ /dge
113b6(dkon brtsegs): sbyong dag dang de bzhin bram ze dang / /spyod pa can dang kun tu rgyu dag dang / /gcer bu pa dang mu stegs gzhan mang po/ /log lam rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang 'dus/ /sangs rgyas
113b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi gzi brjid dam pa yis/ /rgyal po chen po zas gtsang de yi sems/ /yongs su smin par bya ba'i don gyi phyir/ /de yi tshe na 'dus pa chen por gyur/ /sngon chad bcom ldan
114a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis legs bshad pa'i/ /tshig gis 'khor rnams yongs su tshim par mdzad/ /da ni rgyal ba rgyal po zas gtsang la/ /rgyal ba'i mthu ni rab
114a2(dkon brtsegs): tu bstan par bzhed/ /bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po zas gtsang gis/ /gzhon nu khyod ni sa bdag chen po yi/ /rgyal por 'gyur zhes mkhas pas lung bstan gyi/ /
114a3(dkon brtsegs): khab nas ma byung zhig ces mngon gsol ba/ /gling bzhir dbang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba ste/ /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod/ /rin chen sna bdun
114a4(dkon brtsegs): dag dang ldan par 'gyur/ /'byor pa bzhi po dang yang ldan par 'gyur/ /chos la gnas shing sa yang skyong ba ste/ /gling bzhi dbang bar rgyal rigs rgyal chen 'gyur/ /
114a5(dkon brtsegs): mi yi bdag dang mi yi mchod par 'ong / /lto 'phye ches mchod 'gyur zhes gsol ba btab/ /de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' des/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig dpag
114a6(dkon brtsegs): med nas/ /bdag ni rtag tu bden pa'i tshig smras kyi/ /rgyal po bdag gi tshig la gson ces gsungs/ /'di ltar gling bzhi pa yi rgyal srid kyis/ /bdag la slu ba
114a7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad par bzhed pas na/ /de lta'i tshul las rgyal po chen po khyod/ /bdag la cung zad tsam yang thugs mi re/ /rgyal po chen po sngon tshe byung ba ni/ /rgya mtsho'i rlabs
114b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis rus sbal gcig cig 'phangs/ /rgya mtsho'i rlabs ni phyir log gyur pa na/ /rus sbal de ni khron pa'i nang du lhung / /de la khron pa'i nang gi rus sbal gyis/ /rgya mtsho'i rus sbal
114b2(dkon brtsegs): ga nas 'dir 'ongs kye/ /nga yi the tshom skyes pa gcad pa'i phyir/ /myur du nga la smros zhes de skad smras/ /khron pa'i nang gi rus sbal de nyid la/ /rgya mtsho'i rus sbal blo chen des
114b3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ /nga ni rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyis bkur bkur te/ /khron pa 'dir ni de ring bor bar gyur/ /rgya mtsho'i rlabs chen de ni phyir log song / /nga ni slar log 'gro bar ma nus

114b5(dkon brtsegs): khron pa 'di bas che ba zhig / dris lan nga la myur du smros zhes smras/ /rgya mtsho'i rus sbal blo chen rgyal po des/ /khron pa'i rus sbal de la tshig smras pa/ /khron pa'i rus sbal khyod
114b6(dkon brtsegs): ni byis pa ste/ /blo rgya chung zhing shes pa rab tu zhan/ /nga ni lan tshwa can gyi chu der btsas/ /yun ring dus nas de na skye skye yang / /rgya mtsho'i mtha' ma shes par mi nus na/ /dbus
114b7(dkon brtsegs): lta shes par ga la nus zhes smras/ /de ltar mi yi bdag po khyod kyis kyang / /bdag gi mthu ni thugs su ma chud de/ /gling bzhi ba yi mchod pa rnams kyis ni/ /khyod kyis bdag
115a1(dkon brtsegs): la slu ba mdzad par bzhed/ /bdag ni chos can chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur/ /chad pas mi gcad mtshon chas bda' med par/ /stong gsum 'jig
115a2(dkon brtsegs): rten khams 'di bskyang bar bya/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i mchod pa thob par 'gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul stobs bsgoms pa yi bdag nyid can/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon tshig sbyang

115a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bskul ba mdzad pa dang / /'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag ma lus par/ /de yi tshe na de ni 'dus par gyur/ /rgyal po 'dun par byas pa'i le'u ste/ gsum
115a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'o|| / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzang ris bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i sems thog mar skye
115a6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mtshan ma mdzad do/ /de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzang ris lha ma yin khrag khrig phrag drug cu dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo khrag khrig
115a7(dkon brtsegs): phrag drug cu dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa thog mar byas te/ de nas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na rin po che rin thang yod pa dang / rin thang med pa ji
115b1(dkon brtsegs): snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir phul lo/ /rin po che gzhan rgya mtsho chen po de na med pa dag kyang mngon par sprul pa byas te
115b2(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa phul lo/ /rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can gyi shing rta khrag khrig phrag drug cu yang mngon par sprul to/ /shing rta de dag re re zhing yang rta cang shes khrag
115b3(dkon brtsegs): khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to/ /rta de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba can la rkang lag gi rgyan gser las byas pa rin po che sna bdun
115b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis spras pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis byas pa'i 'phyar 'dab can/ gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa sha stag go /rta cang shes de dag gi rgyan du bya ba'i phyir
115b5(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun gyi bla re dag kyang mngon par sprul to/ /shing rta de dag kyang gser gyi rgyal mtshan can gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa sha stag go /yid bzhin gyi nor
115b6(dkon brtsegs): bu'i bla re de dag kyang steng gi bar snang las shing rta de dag gi phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur te/ shing rta de dag 'dong na ni/ rjes su 'dong / shing rta de dag sdod na ni/
115b7(dkon brtsegs): sdod pa sha stag go /yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re de dag la yang mdzes par bya ba'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi phreng ba'i lda ldi mngon par dbyangs so/ /yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re
116a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang ldan par mngon par sprul te/ /shing rta'i rgyan dang / rta'i rgyan dang / yid
116a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re'i rgyan de dag rlung gis bskyod na/ sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la mnyan na bde ba sha stag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rol mo sil
116a3(dkon brtsegs): snyan yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa mkhas pas sgra phyung na/ sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba dang / mnyan na bde ba 'byung ba de bzhin du shing rta'i rgyan de dag dang / rta'i rgyan de
116a4(dkon brtsegs): dag dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re'i rgyan de dag rlung gis bskyod na/ sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la mnyan na bde ba sha stag 'byung bar gyur te/ /shing rta de dag gi 'phang
116a5(dkon brtsegs): gis kyang steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad drug cu bsgribs te 'khod par gyur to/ /shing rta de dag gi phyi bzhin yang rol mo sil snyan sna tshogs rjes su 'brang bar gyur to/ /
116a6(dkon brtsegs): shing rta de dag thams cad la yang lha ma yin gyi bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dag 'khod do/ /bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la ni/ rol mo byed/ la
116a7(dkon brtsegs): la ni| sil snyan dkrol/ la la ni/ glu len/ la la ni/ gar byed/ la la ni/ tsan+dan dang ut+pa la'i phye mas 'thong / la la ni/ a ga ru dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye mas
116b1(dkon brtsegs): 'thor| la la ni/ lha ma yin gyi rdzas kyi phye mas 'thor/ la la ni/ gser dngul gyi phye mas 'thor/ la la ni/ man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dang / many+dzu Sha ka dang /
116b2(dkon brtsegs): many+dzu Sha ka chen po dang / pa ru Sha ka dang / pa ru Sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dang / skya snar dang / skya snar chen po dang / skya sngar khra bo dang /
116b3(dkon brtsegs): skya snar bkra chen gyi me tog mngon par sprul cing bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro/ /la la ni/ gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / shel gyi me tog
116b4(dkon brtsegs): dang | bai DUR+Ya'i me tog dang / spug gi me tog dang / mu tig dmar po'i me tog dang / rdo'i snying po'i me tog gis mngon par 'thor to/ /la la ni/ rin po che sna bdun
