116b6(dkon brtsegs): phyag gi rgyan dang / sor gdub dang / gdu bu dang / gdu bu tham pa dang / dbu rgyan rtse gsum pa dang / dpung rgyan dang / cod pan dang / gser skud dang / mu tig gi do
116b7(dkon brtsegs): shal dang / nor bu'i do shal dang / sen mo do dang / gya do dang / mgul rgyan sna tshogs 'thor bar gyur to/ /la la ni/ tsong tsong gshibs pa/ la la ni/ mgo rgyan/
117a1(dkon brtsegs): la la ni/ rna cha gdub kor/ la la ni/ gser gyi phreng ba rin po ches spras pa/ la la ni/ rin po che'i phreng ba gser gyis spras pa/ la
117a2(dkon brtsegs): la ni/ gser gyi dra ba/ la la ni/ gser gyi phreng ba dang / nor bu'i phreng ba dang / mu tig gi phreng ba thogs so/ /la la ni/ gser gyi gdugs dang / dngul gyi
117a3(dkon brtsegs): gdugs dang / bai DUR+Ya'i gdugs dang / shel gyi gdugs dang / spug gi gdugs dang / rdo'i snying po'i gdugs dang / mu tig dmar po'i gdugs dang / rin
117a4(dkon brtsegs): po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan sna tshogs tha dad pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang / tshon sna tshogs can
117a5(dkon brtsegs): mang po thogs so/ /la la ni/ spos chu'i char 'bebs shing 'khod par gyur to/ /la la ni/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod par
117a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur to| |mi mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi phul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rkang gnyis gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod la do zla yong ma mchis/ /'jig rten gsal
117a7(dkon brtsegs): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal dang ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan rdzogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyon
117b1(dkon brtsegs): mongs sel la phyag 'tshal lo/ /spyod dag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems dag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnas pa mi mnga' zhum mi mnga'/ /le lo mi mnga' rgod mi mnga'/ /brtson
117b2(dkon brtsegs): 'grus brtsams shing rtul ba nyid/ /nges par rtogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag
117b3(dkon brtsegs): khrig phrag drug cu yang mngon par sprul to/ /rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag re re zhing yang bzhugs sa khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to/ /bzhugs sa de dag
117b4(dkon brtsegs): re re zhing ba gam bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can brgya phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to/ /ba gam de dag re re la yang khang pa brtsegs

124a6(dkon brtsegs): nyi mas me khyer bzhin/ /gzi brjid phung po gzi brjid kyis/ /sems can zil ldan zil gyis mnan/ /zil mnan de dag lam me min/ /nyi mas me khyer zil brlags
124a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin| |ye shes rgya mtsho ye shes kyis/ /'jig rten gsum kun zil gyis mnan/ /zil mnan de dag lam me min/ /nyi mas zla 'od zil brlags bzhin/ /lha ma yin gyi
124b1(dkon brtsegs): d bang po sgra gcan gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te bcom
124b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing me tog skya snar khra bos mngon par gtor te tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ /'dren pa'i
124b3(dkon brtsegs): blo gros zhi ba po/ /zhi gnas dgyes pas 'gro ba yi/ /'dod sdang gti mug rdul zhi mdzad/ /char pas rdul rnams zhi bgyid bzhin/ /'bar zhing chos tshul 'bar bar mdzad/ /

124b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshul yang ston mdzad de/ /nor mkhan rin chen yon tan bzhin/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog gis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po g.yul la mngon

125a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ gdul dka' mi bzad sems ni khyod kyis
125a2(dkon brtsegs): brtul| |g.yul las dpa' bas g.yul ngor dpa' bo bzhin/ /shin tu tshar bcad rang gi dbang du mdzad/ /thugs dul mi bsnyengs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyis dbang po

125b2(dkon brtsegs): chos zhes brjod pa yang / /de ni brdar btags tshig tu zad/ /chos rnams chos kyi ngo bo yis/ /rnam pa kun tu mi dmigs so/ /gang 'di chos zhes brjod pa yang / /de ni
125b3(dkon brtsegs): ming tsam zad ces gsungs/ /ming ni ming gis dben pa ste/ /mtshan nyid kyang ni de bzhin no/ /chos rnams mtshan nyid med pa ste/ /ming yang med ces khyod kyis bshad/ /

126b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis gsung gcig brjod pa la/ /skye bo bsam pa ji bzhin so sor 'tshal/ /thub pa khyod kyi gsung de de ltar 'byung / /de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan/ /bcom

130b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi tshogs la 'jug par sha stag go / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag /de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa ste/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang
130b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'o/ /dge slong dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon
131a1(dkon brtsegs): tan gyi tshogs ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /dge slong dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams gzugs can zhig yin na ni/ sems
131a2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa re re'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du shong bar mi 'gyur te/ sems bskyed pa re re'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyang de bzhin

131a4(dkon brtsegs): nus so| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe sems bskyed pa gang yang sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa sems can
131a5(dkon brtsegs): gang ji snyed cig yod pa'i sems can de dag thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don du ma bskyed pa gcig kyang med de/ sems can gyi khams ni/ tshad med pas sems
131a6(dkon brtsegs): can gyi khams ji snyed pa de snyed kyi bsod nams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems bskyed pa re re las 'byung ngo / /sems can gyi khams ni/ mi zad pa ste/ sems can gyi
131a7(dkon brtsegs): khams ji ltar mi zad pa de ltar mi zad pa'i bsod nams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems bskyed pa re re las 'byung ngo / /sems de ni/ sems can thams cad la phan
131b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don du skyes pas/ sems can thams cad kyis mchod kyang lan lon par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten pa'i mchod pa ni/ zang zing dang bcas pa yin la/ byang
131b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du 'byung ba ni/ sems can 'khor ba la gzhol ba 'di dag mya ngan las 'das pa

131b6(dkon brtsegs): dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan

132a4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to/ /mngon pa'i rgyal can yod med par gyur to/ /lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su ma dag pa dang ldan pa'i sems can yod med par

138b1(dkon brtsegs): shel gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu rnams ni/ shel/ shar bu rnams ni/ dngul las byas pa'o/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba
138b2(dkon brtsegs): bkra ba| blta na sdug pa rin po bdun gyis kun nas bskor to/ /de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa sha stag ste| 'di ltar gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya
138b3(dkon brtsegs): dang | shel dang / spug dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po dang bdun no/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de dag rin po che sna bdun gyi dra ba bkra ba/ blta na sdug
138b4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di lta ste/ gser gyi dra ba dang / dngul gyi dra ba dang / bai DUR+Ya'i dra ba dang / shel gyi dra ba dang / mu tig dmar po'i dra ba dang / spug gi dra ba dang / rdo'i snying po'i

138b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / rin po che sna bzhi'i rgyu las bsgrubs pa sha stag ste/ rgyal mtshan sngon po rnams ni/ tog ser po can/ rgyal mtshan ser po rnams

139b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dang / gdugs de dag dang / rgyal mtshan de dag dang / ba dan de dag dang / bla re de dag bar snang gi nam mkha' la lding zhing bcom
139b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed par gyur to/ /de nas 'dab bzang brgyad khri drug stong po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te bcom ldan 'das la
139b3(dkon brtsegs): lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ rga dang

140a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing / /shes rab ldan pas mchog tu 'gyur bar shog /da ltar rnam par 'dren pa khyod lta bur/ /skye bo rab 'grel sangs rgyas 'grub par
140a2(dkon brtsegs): shog / 'dren pa 'jig rten mkhas pa khyod lta bur/ /bdag cag 'dren pa stobs bcu ldan pa dang / /ma 'dres bco brgyad chos kyi mthar phyin cing / /'jig rten mkhas

140b4(dkon brtsegs): ste| |slob ma mchog la bla mas bstan pa bzhin/ /the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom gcad du gsol/ /rab tu dga' mdzad rjes su smon pa mdzod/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis

140b6(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa| thams cad zil gnon stobs bcu brtson 'grus bden/ /rgyal ba dbang po thub pa de bzhin gshegs/ /'dren pas yan lag brgyad ldan gsung dbyangs kyis//
140b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dab bzang 'gro ba rta thul bka' stsal pa/ /rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris/ /'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum gang ngas bstan pa/ /de yi 'bras bu dga' ba'i yid
141a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis nyon/ /the tshom sol la rab tu dga' ba skyed/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub zhi tshol zhing / /stobs dang mi 'jigs bzhi po gang rnams kyis/ /

145a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba khyod kyis ji ltar thugs chud 'dzum rgyu gsungs/ /de thos nas ni 'gro ba thams cad yid rangs dogs pa chad par 'gyur/ /thub pa bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog
145a7(dkon brtsegs): la don kyang thob par mchi/ /'khor rnams 'di dag don myong gyur nas yid ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /kun rtog dbang du mi 'gyur byang chub yid kyis rgyal ba'i spyod nyan 'gyur/ /
145b1(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad don thos rang byung nyid du nges par 'byung / /'khor 'di rgyal ba khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum mthong the tshom 'tshal gyur te/ /sdug bsngal dogs
145b2(dkon brtsegs): bcas yid mi bde zhing chos la som nyi gang 'tshal ba/ /de dag la ni thub pa ston pas dogs bsal the tshom dgum du gsol/ /drang srong khyod kyis gang slad 'dzum bstan myur
145b3(dkon brtsegs): du bka' stsol the tshom khum/ /rgyal ba gang gis de ring yid ni rnam par sbyangs shing bdud bcom thul/ /su zhig yid rab tshim nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dam pa bgyis/ /
145b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni su yi mthu lags ston pa 'gro ba'i mdun du 'di bka' stsol/ /thos nas bdag cag yid rangs mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas bde bar 'gyur/ /khyod kyi zhabs kyi drung du 'dus
145b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gro ba 'di dag the tshom 'tshal/ /'dzum rgyu dga' ba bskyed pa bka' stsol thub pa the tshom bsal du gsol/ /de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis 'gyur/ /rgyal
145b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gsung sgra yang dag thos nas de dag yid dga' 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ /rta thul legs so rgyal ba'i
145b7(dkon brtsegs): dgongs pa 'dzum pa 'di ni legs par dris/ /klu yi bu mos mchod de 'jig rten phan phyir ngas ni 'dzum pa bstan/ /de yi 'bras bu bstan gyi yid gnyis tha ba spangs pa'i sems kyis
146a1(dkon brtsegs): nyon| |gang gi don du ngas ni 'dzum pa 'dir mdzad nga yi tshig la nyon/ /klu yi bu mo 'di dag chags med yid kyis byang chub yang dag zhugs/ /'gro ba thams
146a2(dkon brtsegs): cad stong bar rnam gzhig blo ldan dogs med legs par gnas/ /'di ni byed med tshor med gang zag med cing skye ba po yang med/ /chos rnams 'di dag rdzun zhing smig rgyu
146a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs la me long gzugs brnyan 'dra/ /'di dag rnams kyis mchod byas byas gzo blo gros yang dag nas shes so/ /rgyal ba'i chos nyid dang ni 'gro ba stong zhing bdag po med
146a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong legs/ /mchod pa rnam par phye zhing legs par bkod pa 'di dag sgyu ma 'dra/ /byang chub gzhal yas gang du smon lam btab pa de yang 'di 'drar stong / /nga la gzhal
146a5(dkon brtsegs): yas mchod pa de byas pa dang 'gro ba stong skyes pas/ /klu las shi 'phos nas ni lha gnas brgya byin gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sum cu rtsa gsum song ste lha yi nang du dga' bar
146a6(dkon brtsegs): tshe rdzogs nas/ /ma smad grags dang ldan pa'i lha gnas 'thab bral gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'thab bral lha nang gnas te lha yi dga' ba spyod/ /lha 'gyur bde gshegs
146a7(dkon brtsegs): sras rnams de ni tshe yi tshad du gnas par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'thab bral dga' ba spyad nas che tshad zad pa dang / /dga' ldan gnas su lha yi grong khyer lha dang brtul
146b1(dkon brtsegs): zhugs 'dra bar 'gyur/ /de dag de ni lha yi bu mos bskor nas lha yi dga' ba spyod/ /pad+ma chus mi chags pa bzhin du bde gshegs mi gnas blo can gnas/ /'gro ba thams cad stong
146b2(dkon brtsegs): par rtogs rig blo las nyams par yong mi 'gyur/ /skyob pa rnams kyi dran pa rdo la brkos pa bzhin du yong mi nyams/ /de dag dga' ldan gnas der gnas te lha yi dga' ba spyad nas
146b3(dkon brtsegs): ni| |tshe tshad yongs su zad nas de tshe rab 'phrul dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bde gshegs ma smad grags ldan der yang lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod 'gyur te/ /mi gnas blo gros ldan
146b4(dkon brtsegs): pa tshe chad bar du gnas na gnas par 'gyur/ /de dag gnas der rab 'phrul gyur te lha yi dga' ba spyad nas ni/ /mkhas pa che zad blo gros ldan pas chos kyi mthar ni phyin gyur nas/ /
146b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa bsam pa dag pa chags med yid ldan chos kyi bsam pa can/ /chos dang ldan rnams gzhan 'phrul gnas su lha 'du bar ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de dag la gnas de na gnas shing lha yi
146b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba spyod par 'gyur/ /bde gshegs ma rmongs blo ldan de dag rang gi tshe tshad gnas par 'gyur/ /mya ngan 'das ltar lha yi 'dod pa'i yon tan mnyam nyid zhi bar rtogs/ /bsam gtan
146b7(dkon brtsegs): bsam pas tshangs gnas ma smad grags dang ldan par 'gro bar 'gyur/ /tshangs pa'i gnas su bsam gtan mkhas shing bsam gtan 'bras bu spyad gyur nas/ /der gnas dpe med
147a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur cing byang chub yid kyis bskal par gnas par 'gyur/ /de dag bskal par tshangs gnas mthun par ye shes don gnyer brtul zhugs
147a2(dkon brtsegs): bzang / /thub pa mkhas pa thabs mkhas de dag 'jig rten don ni mtha' yas byed/ /mkhas thub de dag de na bsam gtan spyod yul bsam gtan chags pa med/ /bsam
147a3(dkon brtsegs): gtan bde ba mnyam nyid 'drar rig byang chub phyir ni dbang po zhi/ /kun du grol yid drang srong byang chub phyir ni byang chub blo dang ldan/ /mya ngan 'das pa lta bur bsam gtan blo
147a4(dkon brtsegs): gcig zhi ba'i mtshan nyid 'gyur/ /bde bar gshegs pa dang bcom ldan sras po byang chub zhi ba yongs tshol ba/ /tshang pa'i yid ldan 'jig rten don byed de dag tshangs
147a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas de na gnas/ /kun kyang tshangs pa'i blo ldan mthar phyin sha stag byang chub don gyi phyir/ /rang byung dgongs pa khams gsum la ma las 'das pa'i nges par 'byung
147a6(dkon brtsegs): ba ston| |tshangs pa la ni gus pa bskyed nas 'gro ba byang chub tshol bar 'gyur/ /tshangs pa'i bsam pa rang byung bsam pa nyes 'byung mthar thug shes nas ni/ /bde bar
147a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog la brtson pa de dag 'gro ba la/ ci nas chos tshul 'bras bu myur du shes 'gyur de ltar chos kyang ston/ /de dag tshangs gnas de na gnas/
147b1(dkon brtsegs): shing 'jig rten dag la byang chub phyir/ /phan pa byas nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po byang chub bkod/ /rgyal ba kun la mchod phyir 'jig rten khams mang khrag khrig
147b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar 'gyur/ /dbang po zhi ba de dag bskal pa skar ma 'dra la rgyal bar 'gyur/ /lha dang mi dang klu dang 'dab bzang dag dang lha min bcas pa dang / /dri za grul bum mi'am ci
147b3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs gnod sbyin 'gror bcas dga' zhing mgu/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub tu ni yongs sbyang chos kyi stobs rnyed pa/ /de dag thams cad yi rang thal sbyar bde bar
147b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs la ma gos phyag 'tshal/ /klu'i bu mo lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bdun pa'o// //de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa
147b5(dkon brtsegs): yang thos/ yongs su rdzogs par rig nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' la sogs pa klu bye ba phrag dgu bcu ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
147b6(dkon brtsegs): de sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa mkhyen cing / bcom ldan 'das de la mi mkhyen pa'am/ ma gzigs pa'am/ ma gsan pa'am/ mngon du ma mdzad pa
147b7(dkon brtsegs): gang yang med cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi chos ni/ legs par gsungs pa/ yang dag par mthong ba/ rims nad med pa/ dus chad pa med pa/ nye bar gtod pa/ 'di mthong
148a1(dkon brtsegs): ba la don yod pa/ mkhas pa rnams kyis rang gis rig par bya ba ni/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni/ rdzu 'phrul
148a2(dkon brtsegs): che zhing mthu che ba mnga' ba'o/ /'di ltar bud med du gyur pa rgod pa mi brtan pa mi gnas pa rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa yongs su shes pa
148a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi slob ma dge 'dun yang legs par zhugs pa/ drang por zhugs pa/ rigs par zhugs pa/ mthun par zhugs pa 'di ltar bud med
148a4(dkon brtsegs): du gyur pa 'dod chags dang / zhe sa dang dang / gti mug mi bzad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la 'jug pa ni/ ngo mtshar che'o/ /snyam ste/ ngo
148a5(dkon brtsegs): m tshar thob pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir dzam+bu'i gling rgya mtsho'i ri'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad spos kyi sprin chen pos kun nas yog par byas
148a6(dkon brtsegs): te thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di spos kyi ngad kyis khyab par byas so/ /spos kyi dri'i ngad des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur nas sems
148a7(dkon brtsegs): can gang dag gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das la
148b1(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad kyang dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad mu tig dmar pos pus mo nub tsam du rgyas par gang bar byas so/ /n+ya gro d+ha'i
148b2(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' ra ba de yang rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po ches chal bar bkang ngo / /klu'i me tog gi 'dun khang rgyar dpag tshad drug cu yod pa rin po che sna bdun gyi ka ba dang ldan pa
148b3(dkon brtsegs): dag mngon par sprul to/ /klu'i rol mo sil snyan dpag tu med pa dag kyang mngon par sprul te sgra phyung ngo / /klu'i me tog gi 'dun khang de la yang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lda
148b4(dkon brtsegs): ldi bye ba phrag dgu bcu bres so/ /rin po che sna bdun gyi ka ba de dag kyang bai dUr+ya'i dra bas legs par brgyan te/ /'dun khang de'i gzhi yang rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po ches
148b5(dkon brtsegs): yog par byas par gyur to/ /'dun khang de'i gzhi ni/ 'jam pa bsgyur du rung ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rdo leb ar mo ni ga ltar
148b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam pa/ kha dog bai dUr+ya ltar 'dug pa/ ka tsa len+di ka ltar reg na bde ba/ nyams dga' ba/ sems can mthong ba rnams kyi mig mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mi
148b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / lha rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba lta bu'o/ /nor bu rin po che sna tshogs de dag gi nang nas nor bu la la las ni/ me 'byung / la la las ni/ chu 'byung ba sha stag ste/ de
149a1(dkon brtsegs): la'ang la la las ni/ chu kha dog sngon po 'byung / la la las ni/ chu kha dog ser po 'byung / la la las ni/ chu kha dog dmar po 'byung / /
149a2(dkon brtsegs): la la las ni/ chu kha dog dkar po 'byung / la la las ni/ chu kha dog sna tshogs 'byung ngo / /nor bu la la las ni/ bde bar bsil ba'i rlung 'byung / nor bu la
149a3(dkon brtsegs): la las ni/ de ma yin pa'i yo byad gzhan dag bsam pa bzhin du 'byung / la las ni/ snum gyi bya ba byed/ la las ni/ me long gi bya ba byed de/ 'khor de dag
149a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che de'i nang du snang bar gyur to/ /ser skye'i gnas nas sems can gang ji snyed cig rgyu ba de dag thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che de dag gi
149a5(dkon brtsegs): nang du snang bar gyur te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul de dag rnam par sprul pa mdzad pa/ nyan thos kyi dge
149a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dun dang bcas pa yang nor bu rin po che dag gi nang na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur to/ /'dun khang gi gzhi de'i 'og nas kyang klu'i mthus gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs
149a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par thon par gyur to/ /rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / me tog gi lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / spos kyi lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs
149b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / rin po che'i lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / mu tig gi phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / me tog brtsegs ma'i lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rta rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dril
149b2(dkon brtsegs): bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyang thon par gyur to/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nyer dga' bo la sogs pa klu bye ba phrag dgu bcus rta de rnams sngon du dkri ste
149b3(dkon brtsegs): rkang gis dong na bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te nor bu rin po che ka tsa lin+di ka ltar reg na bde ba dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par
149b4(dkon brtsegs): gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /'dun khang gi gzhi de nas rin po che gang dag mngon par thon pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
149b5(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa'i steng du char bzhin du bab par gyur to/ /klu'i rol mo sil snyan dpag tu med pa de dag kyang steng gi bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to/ /de nas klu bye ba phrag dgu
149b6(dkon brtsegs): b cu po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum pa bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te cang mi zer bar bcom
149b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnam par rjes su dran par byed cing mig mi 'dzum par blta la/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan 'dod pa'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu yang dag
150a1(dkon brtsegs): par zhugs par gyur to/ /de nas de dag gis cung zad cig tu mi smra bar bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rjes su dran par byas nas so so nas bla gos
150a2(dkon brtsegs): p hrag pa gcig la gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la yan
150a3(dkon brtsegs): lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ mtshan brgya rdzogs pa brtul zhugs legs spyad pa/ /dka' thub dgyes pa dri med thugs
150a4(dkon brtsegs): rje can| |rin chen 'byung gnas bcas pa'i sa spangs te/ /bde gshegs khyed ni grong khyer mngon par byung / /lo drug par du dka' thub dka' mdzad de/ /rgyal ba khyod kyis
150a5(dkon brtsegs): bdud rtsi ma brnyes kyang / /bde gshegs khyod kyi thugs ni zhum ma gyur/ /thub pa khyod kyis byang chub thugs kyis spyad/ /ji ltar 'dren pa lha mi'i bla ma khyod/ /'gro la phan
150a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhed dka' thub spyad mdzad de/ /'jig rten mgon po sdug bsngal btang gyur pa/ /de thos pas kyang bdag cag yid mi dga'/ /thub pa dbu dang spyan ni btang ba dang / byang chub
150a7(dkon brtsegs): sems ni ji ltar sgrub mdzad pa/ /bde bar gshegs kyi dka' spyad thos gyur na/ /de thos pas kyang bdag cag bde mi 'gyur/ /gang tshe ka ling rgyal po bzod smra bas/ /zhabs
150b1(dkon brtsegs): dang phyag dang snyan rnams gtubs gyur te/ /de bzhin shangs bcad rgyal ba mi 'khrugs pa/ /de thos pas kyang bdag cag yid mi dga'/ /phug ron skyabs su mchis pa ma
150b2(dkon brtsegs): btang ste/ /gang tshe 'dren khyod srang la bcal gyur pa/ /rgyal ba'i de thos pas kyang mi bde ste/ /bde gshegs byang chub spyod pa sdug bsngal che/ /bdag cag mi 'tshal ma lags
150b3(dkon brtsegs): ci zhe na| |bde bar gshegs la 'gro ba gnod bgyis pa/ /ngan song mun par lhung bas bde gshegs kyi/ /sdug bsngal spyod pa dran sa pa mi dga' lags/ /ji ltar 'jig
150b4(dkon brtsegs): rten 'dren pa blo 'phags dang / /bde gshegs spyod pa mi 'tshe blor gyur dang / /sgrub pa'i tshe na de la mi gnod pa/ /'jig rten 'dren pa spyod bde bka' stsal gsol/ /mtha'
150b5(dkon brtsegs): yas blo mnga' bde gshegs spyod pa la/ /thub pa klu tshogs 'di dag rab tu brtson/ /ji ltar khyod kyi bzhin du spyod 'gyur ba/ /de ltar bde gshegs byang chub lam bstan
150b6(dkon brtsegs): gsol| |rga shi ma mchis go 'phang mthor 'tshal zhing / /klu tshogs 'di rnams thub pa skom par gnas/ /'gro ba 'di dag bde bar 'dul 'gyur ba'i/ /brtul zhugs spyod
150b7(dkon brtsegs): pa bde gshegs bka' stsal gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i mchod pa de dag kyang gzigs/ lhag pa'i bsam pas smon lam btab pa de dag kyang thugs
151a1(dkon brtsegs): su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni/ chos nyid de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe kha dog
151a2(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs dang / kha dog du ma'i 'od zer bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas byung ste/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags nas phyir log ste bcom
151a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ brtul zhugs bzang po dge
151a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyong thub pa rnams/ /rgyu med rgyal ba 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ /'dren pa bde gshegs thugs rje che mnga' ba/ /mtshungs med bcom ldan 'dzum rgyu bka' stsal gsol//
151a5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyi slob dpon skye bo 'di dag ni/ /'dzum rgyu nyan 'tshal khyod kyi zhal du blta/ /yid ni zhum gyur the tshom 'tshal zhing mchis/ /mkhas pa the tshom rnam par
151a6(dkon brtsegs): bsal du gsol/ /'jig rten mkhas pa ston pa shAkya thub/ /de ring su zhig yid ni yongs su dga'/ /gang gis bdud kyi dbang po mthong gyur te/ /rmongs par bgyis nas
151a7(dkon brtsegs): yid ni mi dgar bgyis/ /tshogs kyi slob dpon 'dren pa su zhig gis/ /bde gshegs chos nyid yab la bsnyen bkur bgyis/ /bde bar gshegs la mchod pa dam
151b1(dkon brtsegs): pa bgyis/ /shAkya seng+ge bka' stsal the tshom khum/ /sor bcu thal mo sbyar ba mgor bzhag cing / /'gro ba 'di dag thub pa'i zhal du blta/ /tshogs kyi slob dpon the tshom bsal
151b2(dkon brtsegs): du gsol/ /'dren pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu yang gsung / /de thos skye bo 'di dag dgar 'gyur te/ /rgyal bas dgongs pa'i tshul yang rtogs par 'gyur/ /bde bar gshegs
151b3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'khor rnams tshim bgyis na/ /gzhan du mi sems nan tan gnas par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal
151b4(dkon brtsegs): pa| thub mkhas 'dren pa tshogs kyi slob dpon gyis/ /tshangs 'dra yan lag brgyad ldan gsung brjod kyi/ /rta thul skyon med sems kyis dad byos la/ /'dzum pa mdzad pa'i
151b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyu de mnyan par gyis/ /klu yi bdag po 'di dag dad gyur te/ /'gro ba zil gyis mnan nas mchod pa byas/ /skye bo bde bar yongs smin bya ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'di
151b6(dkon brtsegs): ni yongs su tshol/ /snying rje chen pos rnam 'dren med pa yi/ /'gro ba bltas nas sdug bsngal cis mi bsten/ /'gro ba byang chub rgya chen thob bya la/ 'dren pa dag ni skyo bar
151b7(dkon brtsegs): yong mi 'gyur/ /zhi gnas dge ba ye shes stobs ldan stobs/ /mtshan med stong pa de bzhin smon med pa/ /rnam thar sgo gsum yongs su bsgoms nas su/ /shin tu yongs
152a1(dkon brtsegs): dag yid can be bar 'gro/ /'gro ba mtha' dag mnyam pa nyid rtogs te/ /gang tshe rgyal bas shes rab mtshan thos nas// mnyam pa'i
152a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dang byams dang snying rje thob/ /'gro la snying rje chen po rab bskyed nas/ /snying brtse ldan pa mchog tu snying rje can/ /'jig rten mkhas pa bla na med par 'gyur//
152a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba de dag 'gro 'di mtshungs bsgral nas/ /de dag dgra bcom rnam par 'dren par 'gyur/ /rtag tu bdag med tshig ni nyan byed cing / /'jig rten gtam gyi
152a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyud la 'jug pa ste/ /de dag bde bar gshegs kyi 'chi med thob/ /de na bdud med mu stegs tshogs kyang med/ /'dren pa bde gshegs snying rje ldan pa yi/ /rgyal
152a5(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag 'gro ba kun mos byed/ /bde gshegs bka' dang tshig rnams thams cad dang / /bde bar gshegs kyi dgongs la mos byed 'gyur/ /srid par bde gshegs
152a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyad spyod cing / /rab bder 'gro ba yongs smin byed par 'gyur/ /mtshungs med thub pa bde bar myur du yang / /yongs su 'tshang rgya 'chi med thob par 'gyur/ /thob
152a7(dkon brtsegs): nas 'gro ba dag kyang mos par 'gyur/ /skye bo kun kyang gzugs kyi mchog dang ldan/ /'gro ba thams cad bde gshegs de dag gi/ dgongs pa'i tshig ni mngon du shes
152b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /phyugs dang bya dang gnod sbyin mi de dag /rang byung dgongs min cung zad byed mi 'gyur/ /de dag kun tu chos rtogs dran dang ldan/ /bde bar gshegs rnams
152b2(dkon brtsegs): 'chi med thob par 'gyur/ /de dag tshig thos sems can gang yang ni/ /bstan pa de la mi dgar 'gyur ba med/ /bde gshegs de dag gsung la dga' ba yi// 'gro ba 'chi
152b3(dkon brtsegs): med yang dag thob par 'gyur/ /de tshe 'gro bas rgyal ba'i dgongs legs rtogs/ /rga ba dang ni na dang 'chi ba dang / /mya ngan smre sngags 'don las yongs su dgrol/ /
152b4(dkon brtsegs): tshig de thos nas ngar 'dzin med par 'gyur/ /klu yi bsam pa shAkya seng+ge la/ /yongs su zhus nas ji ltar de dag rnams/ /gzhal yas byang chub thob nas thub rnams kyi/ /
152b5(dkon brtsegs): ye shes 'jug 'gyur de skad sras la bstan/ /klu rnams lung bstan yid du 'ong ba yi/ /rgyal ba'i gsung thos 'khor rnams yid dga' ste/ /de la yid ni rab tu zhi gyur
152b6(dkon brtsegs): nas| |dga' ba'i yid kyis rgyal ba'i skyabs su song / /klu lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ brgyad pa'o// //de nas grul bum bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyis lha ma
152b7(dkon brtsegs): yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / klu'i bu mo rnams dang / klu rnams kyi mchod pa yang mthong / /lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te
153a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas ngo mtshar thob par gyur to/ /'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la shes rab kyi mnga'
153a2(dkon brtsegs): rgya chen po mnga' zhing / 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po 'di lta bu byas pas kyang ngo mtshar du mi dgongs te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/
153a3(dkon brtsegs): rgya che zhing yongs su rgyas pa yin pas mtho ba'am dma' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang chos thams cad la the tshom mi mnga' zhing yon tan thams
153a4(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su rdzogs la/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yangs pa mnga' bas mchod pa 'di lta bu dag bzhes kyang mtho ba'am dma' bar mi 'gyur zhing / ngo
153a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshar du mi dgongs pa ni/ ngo mtshar shin tu che'o/ /snyam mo/ /de nas grul bum bye ba phrag bco brgyad po de dag gis bdag cag nyid kyi mchod pas bcom ldan 'das
153a6(dkon brtsegs): la mchod pa'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi bla re bye ba phrag bco brgyad mngon par sbrul te/ 'di lta ste/ gser gyi skud pa'i bla re dang / dngul gyi skud pa'i bla re dang / bai
153a7(dkon brtsegs): DUR+Ya'i skud pa'i bla re dang / shel gyi bla re dang / mu tig dmar po'i bla re dang / spug gi bla re dang / rdo'i snying po'i bla re sha stag go /rin po che'i bla re de dag la yang
153b1(dkon brtsegs): me tog sna tshogs kyi phreng ba'i lda ldi mngon par sprul te/ gser gyi skud pa'i bla re rnams la ni/ dngul gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ dngul gyi skud pa'i bla re rnams
153b2(dkon brtsegs): la ni| gser gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ bai DUR+Ya'i bla re rnams la ni/ shel gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ shel gyi bla re rnams la ni/ bai DUR+Ya'i me tog

153b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang mngon par sprul te/ de dag kyang gser nas rdo'i snying po'i bar du shing rta de dag gi steng du rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs thur ma brgya pa gser gyi yu ba can dang / bai
153b6(dkon brtsegs): DUR+Ya'i yu ba can dang / shel gyi yu ba can bye ba phrag bco brgyad mngon par sprul to/ /gdugs de dag la rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lda ldi mngon par sprul te/ 'di lta
153b7(dkon brtsegs): ste| gser gyi me tog gi lda ldi dang / dngul gyi me tog gi lda ldi dang / bai DUR+Ya'i me tog gi lda ldi dang / shel gyi me tog gi lda ldi dang / mu tig dmar po'i me tog gi lda ldi
154a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / klu'i nor bu'i me tog gi lda ldi sha stag go /mu tig dmar po'i dra ba dag kyang mngon par sprul to/ /de dag gis gdugs de dag dang / me tog gi phreng ba de dag gi
154a2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs byas so/ /grul bum gyi rol mo'i sil snyan dag kyang mngon par sprul to/ /shing rta de dag re re zhing yang bla re de dag re re rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur to/ /de nas grul
154a3(dkon brtsegs): dum de dag rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta de dag la zhon te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang / bla re dang / me tog de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor
154a4(dkon brtsegs): te mchod pa byed cing bcom ldan 'das la steng gi bar snang las lan gsum bskor to/ /bskor nas shing rta de dag las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
154a5(dkon brtsegs): mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ thams cad du yang mi bsnyengs
154a6(dkon brtsegs): mnga' dbang can/ /thub pa chen po mi mtho mi dma' ste/ /ri yi rgyal po lhun po'i ri 'dra ba/ /mchod pa rgya chen 'di dag bzhes su gsol/ /'gro ba thams cad ming
154a7(dkon brtsegs): dang mtshan ma dang / /tha snyad tsam mkhyen thub pa chags mi mnga'/ /'dren pa khyod kyis ting 'dzin zhi bsgrubs pas/ /shes rab ldan pa dregs pa yong mi mnga'/ /
154b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba khyod kyis 'gro ba sgyu 'drar mkhyen/ /rang bzhin stong ste rmi lam dag 'dra dang / /chu zla nam mkha'i smig rgyu lta bur ni/ /bde bar gshegs pas 'gro ba 'di dag gzigs/ /
154b2(dkon brtsegs): dri za'i grong khyer ji ltar snang gyur kyang / /grong khyer de ni phyogs bcu kun na med/ /gzhan du grong khyer de ni ming tsam ste/ /de bzhin bde bar gshegs pas 'gro 'di gzigs/ /mchod
154b3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di kun brag ca ji bzhin te/ /shing rta gdugs dang bla re sil snyan dang / /me tog rgyal mtshan thal mo sbyar bgyis pa/ /brag ca ji bzhin de dag de ltar gda'/ /'dren pa

154b7(dkon brtsegs): pa| |mya ngan 'das mchog sems can bstan par bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grul bum de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de
155a1(dkon brtsegs): nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ ston pa rgyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad de/ /rnam 'dren 'jig
155a2(dkon brtsegs): rten mkhas la mtshar mi mnga'/ /ngo mtshar 'gyur med rgyal bas 'dzum mdzad na/ /'dzum rgyu legs par bka' stsal nyan par 'tshal/ /rgyal ba'i zhal nas 'dzum pa
155a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad mthong nas/ /'gro ba 'di dag the tshom som nyi 'tshal/ /the tshom 'tshal ba rnams kyi the tshom khum/ /mi yi dbang po 'dzum pa'i rgyu yang gsungs/ /gang gis de ring
155a4(dkon brtsegs): chos la yid bzhag 'gyur/ /de ring gang gis chos kyi rgyal yab mthong / /deng sus sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i mchod pa bgyis/ /mi yi dam pa bdag ni nyan par 'tshal/ /

155a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni nyan par 'tshal/ /de ring su yis 'khor bcas bdud rnams bcom/ /thub pa ston pa deng sus mnyes par gyis/ /'dren pa su zhig de ring gting rnyed gyur/ /the
155a7(dkon brtsegs): tshom mchis te deng bdag de nyan 'tshal/ /'dzum mdzad de yi don ni mnyan slad du/ /'gro ba kun kyang thal mo sbyar cing gnas/ / 'dren pa the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom
155b1(dkon brtsegs): sol| |rkang gnyis dam pas lung yang bstan du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal ba/ rta thul khyod kyis dri ba
155b2(dkon brtsegs): legs par dris/ /'dzum pa'i rgyu 'di yongs su dris pas na/ /'gro ba'i don yang khyod kyis byas par 'gyur/ /de don bstan byas rta thul mnyan par gyis/ /grul bum tshogs

155b4(dkon brtsegs): de ring nga mchod de/ /zhi ba'i chos la blo gros rnam par btang / /lam stor skye bo rnams la snying brtse zhing / /bsam pa thag pas snying rje chen po bskyed/ /snying rje bas ni nga la

156a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten khams/ /khrag khrig mtha' yas rnam par spyad par 'gyur/ /skye bo mang po'i don byed 'dren 'gyur te/ /ngo mtshar med ces bya ba'i rgyal
156a2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ /de dag zhing rnams gang du 'gro rgyu ba/ /der ni 'gro bas rgyal ba byung bar shes/ /de dag thabs kyis ma 'ongs dus dag na/ /ngo mtshar med par skye bo rnam

159a7(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal bsgrubs pa'i 'gro ba sdug bsngal ba/ /'dod pa'i yon tan rgyun gyi rjes 'gro ba/ /mngon dga' sdug bsngal brgya las yongs su dgrol/ /ji ltar bde gshegs
159b1(dkon brtsegs): khyod bzhin bdag cag gis/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal gnod pa myong 'gyur la/ /g.yo yi zhags pas zin cing mu ma mthong / /yongs 'thob spre'u ltar rgod pa yongs su
159b2(dkon brtsegs): dgrol| |ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis/ /'gro ba mi mkhas mig dang bral ba yi/ /sna tshogs yongs skyo gnyid kyis log gyur cing / /bdag nyid
159b3(dkon brtsegs): las kyi 'bras bu chud zin dgrol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri za bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad
159b4(dkon brtsegs): do| |de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bde gshegs mtha' yas gzigs pas 'dzum pa mdzad/ /'dren pa
159b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ma mchis par mi 'dzum na/ /bde gshegs 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni myur du gsungs/ /nem nur gnod gyur rnams kyi the tshom sol/ /bde gshegs khyod kyi zhal gyi 'dzum
159b6(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas/ /skye bo 'di dag the tshom rnyed par gyur/ /'dzum pa'i don ni de dag nyan par 'tshal/ /thub chen 'gro ba'i the tshom bsal du gsol/ /bde bar gshegs kyi
159b7(dkon brtsegs): bstan la su zhig zhugs/ /the tshom bral zhing som nyi bsal bar gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi bsam mkhyen nas/ /mi yi mchog gis 'dzum pa bstan pa
160a1(dkon brtsegs): mdzad| |su zhig bde gshegs bka' stsal tshul bzhin du/ /blo gros rtogs pa chos bzhin gnas par gyur/ /gang gi blo gros dran rtogs blo
160a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen nas/ /bde gshegs 'gro ba'i nang du 'dzum pa mdzad/ /'gro ba 'di dag blo gzhan yongs btang ste/ /bde gshegs 'dzum don zhal nas thos par dga'/ /sor
160a3(dkon brtsegs): bcu thal sbyar mgo la bzhag bgyis shing / /dga' ba'i yid kyis ston pa'i zhal du blta/ /nyon mongs bral zhing mya ngan rab spangs pa/ /dgyes pa'i thugs mnga'
160a4(dkon brtsegs): thub chen 'jig rten mig / 'gro ba yid gnyis som nyi bsal du gsol/ /rgyal ba thugs rje ldan pas 'dzum rgyu gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
160a5(dkon brtsegs): rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ 'gro ba'i don du 'dzum pa ngas bshad pa/ /khyod kyis don dris mthun zhing legs pa ste/ /'dzum pa de yi don ni lung
160a6(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa/ /skye bo'i tshogs chen don ni de ring 'phel/ /'dzum mdzad rgyu de rta thul mnyan par gyis/ /rnam par 'dren pa 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa/ /de ni ma log par yang
160a7(dkon brtsegs): ngas bstan gyis/ /bstan pa de la dga' ba'i sems kyis nyon/ /dri za 'di rnams chos kyi rjes bsnyegs shing / /bde bar gshegs la mchod pa 'di dag byas/ /chos nyid
160b1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur ba med pa ste/ /chos nyid zad par 'gyur ba'ang med pa yin/ /rgyal ba rnam rtog sgyu ma lta bur gnas/ /rtog par mi byed de dag rmongs par 'gyur/ /gang gis
160b2(dkon brtsegs): chos gang rjes su brjod bya ba/ /des ni de nyid stong zhes bde gshegs gsungs/ /de dag nga yi tshig de rtogs gyur nas/ /rta med glang po mchog gis mchod pa byas/ /byang chub
160b3(dkon brtsegs): rga med 'chi med tshol byed cing / /dri za'i rgyal po rnams kyis nga mchod do/ /nor ba'i 'gro la snying rje bskyed nas ni/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'di dag mos/ /'di dag nga la
160b4(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa 'di byas pa/ /dri za'i ris bor dga' ba'i yid gyur te/ /blo gros bzang rnams lha rnams lha yul pa/ /brgya byin lha 'dus par ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de dag sangs
160b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bde gshegs rdul med pa/ /bye ba khrag khrig mang la mchod byed 'gyur/ /zhing nas zhing du rjes su rgyu byed cing / /de dag la ni mkhas pa chos kyang nyan/ /de dag bde gshegs
160b6(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yongs su skyong / /de dag zhing yang rtag par yongs dag 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i gdung 'dzin de dag sems can ni/ /khrag khrig mang po dag la byang chub ston/ /'gro ba
160b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag rang bzhin stong rig nas/ /bde gshegs 'gro ba dag la ston par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen cing kun gzigs pa/ /rdul med bskal pa khrag khrig bzhugs
161a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mtshan ni mtha' yas rtogs pa ste/ /sangs rgyas re re khrag khrig phrag mang ba'i/ /bskal pa rnams su rdul med gnas
161a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam 'di rjes su ston/ /rgyal ba thub pa nyon mongs bcom pa yis/ /de ltar de tshe dri zas mchod lung bstan/ /rta thul gyis ni 'dzum
161a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don zhus pa/ /dri za lung bstan pa ni bshad pa mdzad/ /dri za lung bstan yid du 'thad 'gyur ba/ /de thos nas ni 'gro ba thams cad dga'/ /der ni bde bar gshegs
161a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi gsung thos na/ /shAkya thub la thams cad skyabs su dong / /dri za lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcu pa'o// //bam po lnga pa/ de nas gnod sbyin bye ba
161a5(dkon brtsegs): phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas dri za'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing
161a6(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi shes rab kyi rnam pa la rim gro chen po bskyed de chos nyid la 'jug pa yang thos nas ston pa'i 'du
161a7(dkon brtsegs): shes skyes par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang blo zad mi shes pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das blo zad mi shes pa zhes bya bar
161b1(dkon brtsegs): rig nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa skyes par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa skyes par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir
161b2(dkon brtsegs): brtson par gyur te tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ mngon shes stobs ni kun tu mtha' yas te/ /rgya mtsho'i chu 'dzin pad+ma
161b3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal dang 'dra/ /de bas mtshungs med 'jig rten phan mdzad pa/ /mi yi seng+ge khyod la 'di ltar bstod/ /ri rab srang la gzhal bar nus kyang gda'/ /gzi brjid chen
161b4(dkon brtsegs): po nam mkha' gzhal rung gda'/ /shes rab mchog mnga' bde gshegs ye shes stobs/ /tshad gzung dag par nus pa yong ma mchis/ /'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa
161b5(dkon brtsegs): thugs su chud/ /skye bo drang rung mi rung btul min pa/ /de dag las kyi rnam pa mngon par mkhyen/ /de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas/ /de dag ci 'dra'i khams
161b6(dkon brtsegs): la brten pa dang / /de dag sems rgyud ci 'drar 'byung ba dang / /de dag mos pa ci 'dra ma lus mkhyen/ /de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas/ /'dod chags spyod
161b7(dkon brtsegs): dang de bzhin zhe sdang spyod/ /mi yi gti mug spyod pa de bzhin mkhyen/ /phrag dog rnam pa'ang de bzhin mkhyen pa ste/ /de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas/ /'gro ba 'di
162a1(dkon brtsegs): dag lam rgyud gar 'khyams pa/ /de dag mtshungs med rnams kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /de la ye shes rgyun du rab 'byung bas/ /de bas mtshungs med
162a2(dkon brtsegs): kun tu mtha' yang yas/ /bde bar gshegs pas 'gro kun rab tu gzigs/ /chud za'i lam rgyud gang du 'khyams gyur cing / /byams pa'i stobs las rab tu
162a3(dkon brtsegs): nyams gyur ba/ /de dag ma lus khyod kyis rab tu gzigs/ /'gro ba rnams ni ji srid dus gnas shing / /ci 'dra'i sdug bsngal de dag reg 'gyur dang / /lus kyi rnam
162a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ci 'dra 'chang ba rnams/ /de dag 'dren pa khyod kyis rab tu gzigs/ /mi yi seng+ges lta ba ci 'dra dang / /gang gis sdug bsngal rnam pa 'thob 'gyur bar/ /gang la
162a5(dkon brtsegs): brten cing las rnams bgyid 'gyur ba/ /de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs/ /de dag rgyal ba'i bstan la rab byung ste/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo ni gang zhig
162a6(dkon brtsegs): gis| |ci 'dra'i lam la de dag brten bgyis shing / /ci 'dra'i zhi ba 'thob 'gyur khyod kyis mkhyen/ /byis pa gang rnams bde gshegs bstan pa la/ /rab tu
162a7(dkon brtsegs): byung zhing 'jig rten mkhas pa yi/ /bstan pa rab phra ji ltar spong 'gyur ba/ /de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs/ /'jig rten phan pa'i bstan la brnyas
162b1(dkon brtsegs): bgyis pas/ /dmyal ba chen po ji srid gnas pa dang / /ci 'dra sdug bsngal de dag myong 'gyur ba/ /de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs/ /gang dag rgyal ba rnams la
162b2(dkon brtsegs): dad bskyed de/ /rab tu byung nas rgyal ba'i bstan 'dzin cing / /chos kun stong pa nyid du yongs brtags nas/ /mtshan ma thams cad rnam par gzhig bgyis shing / /'gro rgyud kun
162b3(dkon brtsegs): tu smon pa rnams spangs te/ /lus 'di sgyu ma 'dra bar rab brtags nas/ /phung po brag ca 'dra bar rtogs gyur te/ /byang chub sems ldan de dag rab tu gzigs/ /mgon po
162b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams gang / /mtshungs med khyod kyis ji ltar thugs chud pa/ /de yis bla med sangs rgyas grub par shog /'gro ba kun kyang rang byung thob gyur
162b5(dkon brtsegs): cig / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gnod sbyin bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa
162b6(dkon brtsegs): rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ mi yi seng+ges 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa/ /mi yi zla ba rang byung gyur pa ni/ /rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi
162b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad na/ /'dzum pa de yi rgyu ni bka' stsal gsol/ /ston pa'i zhal nas 'dzum pa de mthong nas/ /bcom ldan 'jig rten 'di dag the tshom 'tshal/ /mgon pos de dag
163a1(dkon brtsegs): the tshom bsal du gsol/ /'jig rten 'di dag dga' ba'i yid du 'gyur/ /de ring su zhig rgyal la dad pa bskyed/ /gang gis chos rgya chen po
163a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtogs/ /gang gis sems ni bsgul nas gnas par gyur/ /de dag rgyal bas 'gro ba bstan du gsol/ /de ring 'khor rnams the tshom che 'tshal zhing / /kun kyang
163a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i zhal du blta zhing sdod/ /ci nas the tshom ma mchis kun 'gyur ba/ /de ltar dpa' bos the tshom bsal du gsol/ /de ring 'di ni gang gi rnam 'phrul lags/ /
163a4(dkon brtsegs): gang gis brtson 'grus bzang po 'di bstan lags/ /gang zhig khyod dang 'dir mjal don mchis 'gyur/ /de ni legs par 'gro la bka' stsal gsol/ /rgyal ba
163a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dag la phan bzhed pa/ /the tshom 'tshal ba yid gnyis legs bsal gsol/ /de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams/ /dga' zhing mgu ba dag kyang 'thob
163a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris/ /de ring
163a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dag gi don chen byas/ /rang byung 'dzum mdzad rgyu ni dris pas na/ /ston pa'i dgongs pa'ang khyed kyis legs par mthong / /de dag lung bstan ma lus bstan
163b1(dkon brtsegs): par byas/ /gnod sbyin tshogs kyi yid ni gzigs gyur nas/ /'gro la phan pa'i don du 'dzum mdzad pa/ /dad pa'i yid kyis rta thul mnyan par gyis/ /rgyal ba'i byang chub
163b2(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba shes gyur nas/ /gnod sbyin tshogs kyis mos pa'i sems bskyed de/ /'byung po'i tshogs dbus sangs rgyas bstod byas nas/ /byang chub dam pa mchog tu yid kyang
163b3(dkon brtsegs): btang / /chos rnams stong pa nyid du shes bya dang / /mtshan ma thams cad rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ /'gro ba kun tu smon pa rnams spangs shing / /byang chub mchog tu de
163b4(dkon brtsegs): dag yid kyang btang / /rnal 'byor stobs kyis phung po rnams bshig cing / /kun rdzob tsam du rig nas mi chags te/ /srid pa kun tu chu la pad+mo bzhin/ /byang chub mchog tu
163b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag yid kyang btang / /de dag srid pa gang du chags 'gyur ba/ /stong par bshig ste thams cad legs rtogs pa/ /de nyid rgyal ba'i bla med byang chub ste/ /byang chub phyir ni
163b6(dkon brtsegs): dben pa'i brtul zhugs shes/ /skye dang rga shi yong gis stong pa ste/ /de ni rgyal ba'i bla med byang chub yin/ /dngos po'i rang bzhin stong par shes gyur nas/ /zhi ba bla med byang
163b7(dkon brtsegs): chub thob par 'gyur/ /phung po'i rang bzhin dben zhing stong pa nyid/ /byang chub rang bzhin dben zhing stong pa nyid/ /gang spyod de yang rang bzhin stong pa ste/ /ye shes ldan pas
164a1(dkon brtsegs): shes kyi byis pas min/ /ye shes rang bzhin stong par rig gyur te/ /shes bya'i rang bzhin stong par rig gyur nas/ /shes pa po dang 'dra bar
164a2(dkon brtsegs): rtogs gyur na/ /byang chub lam la de dag spyod ces bya/ /stong pa'i rang bzhin stong par shes par bya/ /mtshan ma med pa'ang rang bzhin nyid kyis stong / /smon pa med pa'ang
164a3(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin stong pa ste/ /de ltar spyod na gzhan min spyod pa yin/ /de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams/ /dga' zhing de dag stobs dang ldan par gyur/ /rang byung
164a4(dkon brtsegs): chos la de dag yid ches te/ /zhi ba'i gnas shes byang chub yid ldan gyur/ /gnod sbyin tshogs rnams deng mos yid gyur te/ /'di ltar nga la mchod pa rab byas pas//
164a5(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin rgyud nas shi 'phos blo chen rnams/ /mtho ris dong zhing yun ring dga' bar 'gyur/ /de dag ma 'ongs dus na rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /zhing du dong zhing skad cig gcig
164a6(dkon brtsegs): la yang / /blo can de dag rgyal ba bye ba mchod/ /de dag bzod mkhyen rgyal ba gdams ngag ston/ /de dag 'jig rten phyogs bcur rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /mtshan ma med
164a7(dkon brtsegs): par spyod cing dong gyur te/ /'jig rten 'di dag sprul pa 'drar shes nas/ /'jig rten chags med mkhas pa spyad pa spyod/ /de ltar bstan pas rgyal ba rab mchod nas/ /
164b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub bla med de yang thob gyur te/ /de dag rnams kyi zhing ni mtha' yas 'gyur/ /sems can mtha' yas pa dag rnam par 'grel/ /sangs rgyas mkhyen pa mtha' yas grags
164b2(dkon brtsegs): pa can| |de dag ming ni 'jig rten mkhas zhes bya/ /zhi ba'i blo ldan rgyal ba de dag gi /tshe tshad bskal pa stong ni tshang bar 'gyur/ /de dag nyan thos dge 'dun 'byung ba ni/ /rgyal
164b3(dkon brtsegs): sras mang po skar ma'i tshogs rnyed de/ /kun kyang bde bas bsam pa thos par 'gyur/ /'jig rten mkhas pa rnams la sdug bsngal med/ /de skad thos nas lhar bcas 'jig
164b4(dkon brtsegs): rten dag / rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis byang chub tshol/ /ngoms par gyur nas brtson pa brtan brtsams te/ /kun kyang brtson 'grus stobs kyis brtan par 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin
164b5(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa mi'am ci bye ba phrag brgyad kyis lha ma yin gyi mchod pa
164b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag dang / gnod sbyin gyi mchod pa'i bar dag kyang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas shin tu ngo mtshar thob par gyur to/ /khyod 'di ltar sems can yang mi dmigs
164b7(dkon brtsegs): la| srog dang / skye ba po dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / gang zag dang / bdag dang / bdag gi yang gang yang med la/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched
165a1(dkon brtsegs): gang la sems can zhes gdags pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched de dag kyang mi dmigs/ las gang yod pas rnam par smin pa gdags
165a2(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i las de yang mi dmigs/ byang chub kyang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ sangs rgyas kyang mi dmigs la/ 'on kyang bcom ldan
165a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa mdzad pa 'di ni/ ngo mtshar rmad do/ /ci zhig las dgongs te bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams
165a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan pa mdzad/ ci zhig las dgongs te byang chub sems dpas yang dag par sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang / sems
165a5(dkon brtsegs): can yongs su smin pa dang / zhing gi bkod pa dang / der skye zhing yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhing nas zhing du 'dong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mchod
165a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mchod pa de'i mthu dang / sems can rnam par dgod pa dang / bskal pa 'di snyed cig gis sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba dang / bskal pa 'di snyed
165a7(dkon brtsegs): cig tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi nyan thos 'dus pa ni/ 'di snyed cig tu
165b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba dang / de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos bskal pa 'di snyed cig tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /zhes de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan
165b2(dkon brtsegs): pa mdzad/ ci zhig las dgongs te sems can rnams nye bar len pa med pas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa mdzad snyam ste/ de
165b3(dkon brtsegs): nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa de lta bu'i the tshom skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i
165b4(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ rgyal ba'i gsung ni thos gyur nas/ /shes rab che mnga' bdag dogs skyes/ /stong pa nyid dang lung bstan pa/ /bde gshegs bdag gis ma 'tshal
165b5(dkon brtsegs): ba| |gsung ba'i zla ba thos kyi dbyings/ /'gyur ma mchis la stong ba dang / /rang bzhin med gzung ji lta bu/ /mchod pa 'di ni gang zag mchog /skye ba'ang ma mchis byang chub tu/ /
165b6(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa ni ji lta bu/ /skyes bu mchog gis bka' stsal pa'i/ /ldem po dag de bdag ma 'tshal/ /mi dbang bdag po ji ltar na/ /'gag pa ma mchis 'chi 'pho gsung / /
165b7(dkon brtsegs): de ni yang dag lung bstan pas/ /thub pa bdag gi the tshom khum/ /sgyu ma 'dra la lha skye zhes/ /gsungs pa de ni 'di lta bu/ /ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang / /shAkya seng+ge bdag ma
166a1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal| |gnas pa'ang mchis pa ma lags la/ /dge bshes bsten gsum ji lta bu/ /ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang / /skyes bu khyu mchog
166a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag ma 'tshal/ /g.yo ba'ang ma mchis bgyi ba rnams/ /rkang gnyis mchog gsungs ji lta bu/ /ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang / /dgra bsal bcom ldan bdag ma 'tshal//
166a3(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin stong ste stong pa yang / /rtogs zhes mgon gsung ji lta bu/ /the tshom rnam pa 'di 'dra skyes/ /shes rab dpe med bdag ma 'tshal/ /zhi ba yod ces bka' stsal pa/ /
166a4(dkon brtsegs): chos kun zhi gsungs ji lta bu/ /mtshungs med 'di 'dra'i ldem po dag /bdag la rnam par bstan du gsol/ /sku mdzes gyur kyang chos kyi rnams/ /nam mkha' 'drar gsungs
166a5(dkon brtsegs): ji lta bu| |chos ni rab tu spangs bgyis na/ /mi mkhas dmyal lhung ji lta bu/ /brtan pa mtho ris 'jig rten dang / /'gro ba gzhan yang gsungs pa dang / /las de bgyis pa ma
166a6(dkon brtsegs): mchis la/ /rang las can gsungs ji lta bu/ /bka' stsal tshul 'di rnam pa yang / /zil gyis mi gnon bdag ma 'tshal/ /mgon po de la bdag dogs na/ /bde gshegs
166a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi the tshom sol/ /dge ba'i tshogs 'gyur ma mchis la/ /byang chub yang dag sgrub pa'ang gsungs/ /dge sbyong rgyal po'i gsung gi tshul/ /de skad bka' stsal bdag
166b1(dkon brtsegs): ma 'tshal/ /chos rnams zad pa med gsungs la/ /spong byed las ni zad bstan pa/ /tshad med blo mnga' 'di la yang / /bdag ni yid gnyis the tshom 'tshal/ /yang dag mtha' yang
166b2(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal la/ /ma nor sbyin pa'ang bstan mdzad pa/ /'di yang rab rib bral ba yi/ /spyan mnga' sdig spangs bstan du gsol/ /thams cad gzigs pa ma gtogs pa/ /gzhan
166b3(dkon brtsegs): gyis bdag gi the tshom 'di/ /sel nus ma mchis de lta bas/ /bdag ni rgyal ba mchog la dad/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas the tshom dris pa 'di
166b4(dkon brtsegs): dag gsan nas de la lan gdab pa'i phyir mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid dang lung bstan pa/ /bdag gis ma 'tshal ces
166b5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa| |gal te 'ga' zhig mi ston na/ /rgyal bas de lung bstan mi gsung / /ci'i phyir zhe na 'di lta bu/ /rang gi rang bzhin gnas gyur na/ /'gyur ba med cing ther zug ste/ /de la
166b6(dkon brtsegs): 'phel med 'grib pa med/ /me long shin tu yongs dag la/ /ji ltar rang bzhin med pa yi/ /gzugs brnyan snang ba de bzhin du/ /ljon pa chos rnams shes par gyis/ /chos kyi dbyings
166b7(dkon brtsegs): ni 'gyur med na/ /mchod pa'i yan lag 'gyur gang zhes/ /yan lag rnams la brtags byos la/ /ljon pa mchod pa 'di la spyod/ /chos dbyings rnam pa thams cad du/ /'gyur med skye
167a1(dkon brtsegs): bo mkhas pas rtogs/ /byis pa rnams ni 'di la 'khrul/ /blo sbyangs pas ni med par shes/ /skye ba'ang ma mchis sems kyang bskyed/ /de ni ma 'tshal
167a2(dkon brtsegs): ces smras pa/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba'i ldem po dag /gzhan du ma sems mnyan par gyis/ /byis pa 'khor bar dga' ba rnams/ /'khor bar mngon dga' sems zhen pa/ /
167a3(dkon brtsegs): log pa'i sems dang 'du shes can/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/ /de dag sngon chad ma thos pa'i/ /sems med chos ni ngas bshad na/ /byis pa'i blo dang ldan
167a4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams/ /'di la kun tu rmongs par 'gyur/ /byang chub gzhol ba'i sems nyid dang / /byang chub phan yon thos gyur nas/ /zil gyis ma non rang byung sems/ /rgya chen de ni thob
167a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /'gag pa ma mchis 'chi 'pho ba/ /de yang ma 'tshal ces smras pa/ /'chi 'pho yang dag lung bstan gyi/ /gzhan du ma sems mnyan par gyis/ /gang dag rtag
167a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin de dag la/ /'di la mi 'gyur ther zug med/ /dngos po 'di dag mi rtag ces/ /bde gshegs 'chi 'pho rnam par ston/ /sgyu ma 'dra la lhar skyes pa/ /ji lta bu zhes dogs
167a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa| |mthar phyin ma gyur slob pa dang / /skye bo rnams la mtho ris bshad/ /gnas pa'ang yod pa ma yin la/ /dge bshes bsten ces gang smra ba/ /gnas dang bral bar bya ba'i
167b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir| |gnas pa med pa'i dge bshes bsten/ /g.yo ba ma mchis bgyi ba rnams/ /bstan pa ma 'tshal ces smras pa/ /shing rta'i yan lag 'dus pa dang / /shing rta'i bya ba bzhin du
167b2(dkon brtsegs): rtogs| |mi gang bdag yid khas len cing / /bya ba'ang bdag gis byas zin pa/ /de dag la ni bya ba dang / /g.yo ba med par bde gshegs bshad/ /rang bzhin stong ste stong pa yang / /
167b3(dkon brtsegs): rtogs shes nga yis gang smras pa/ /byis pa log pa'i blo can rnams/ /rang bzhin stong par mi shes pa/ /de dag rnams la bstan pa'i phyir/ /rang bzhin stong zhes bde gshegs
167b4(dkon brtsegs): ston| |kun tu rtog pa'i rtog pas bskyed/ /yang dag ma yin rtog pas bcings/ /zhi ba yod cing chos kun kyang / /zhi bar mthong zhes smras pa ni/ /mi shes rmongs par gyur rnams
167b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi| |kun tu rtog las sred pa skye/ /skom pas ji ltar smig rgyu la/ /kun tu rtog pas skom pa skye/ /mi mkhas de ni rtog pa'i rgyu/ /yod pa min la log par brtags/ /chu yan par ni mthong
167b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur kyang / /smig rgyu la ni chu med do/ /de bzhin yongs su rtog pas dkrugs/ /sdug pa min la sdug par rtogs/ /byis pa 'dod chags ldan pa dag /sdug dang ldan pa rang bzhin gyis//
167b7(dkon brtsegs): sdug med smig rgyu chu bzhin te/ /smig rgyu la ni chu med do/ /de bzhin gzugs la sdug pa med/ /gzugs de sdug pa ma yin na/ /byis pa log pa'i 'du shes can/ /sdug par rtog pas
168a1(dkon brtsegs): bcings par gyur/ /chos rnams nam mkha' 'dra ba dang / /spong ba dmyal ltung zhes smras pa/ /med pa mthong bar ma gyur pa/ /mi mkhas rnams ni skrag
168a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /rang bzhin ngo bo nyid stong na/ /bdag zhen dus ni mi shes pa/ /de dag stong zhes thos gyur na/ /bdag med 'gyur zhes skrag pa skye/ /de dag bdag tu mngon zhen te/ /
168a3(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' la ni mdud bor nas/ /stong pa gya nom spong byed de/ /mi mkhas sems dmyal chen por ltung / /mtho ris 'jigs pa ngas bstan dang / /skye ba'i 'gro rgyud gzhan
168a4(dkon brtsegs): dag dang / /las kyang ngas ni bstan byas te/ /byed pa po ni rab tu bkag /yang dag tu na 'gro ba dag /rmi 'drar bshad par shes par gyis/ /rmi lam gang la'ang dngos po med/ /
168a5(dkon brtsegs): log pa'i blo ldan mngon par zhen/ /ngas ni las kyi rnam pa bstan/ /byed pa phyogs bcu rnams na med/ /shing rnams rlung gis bsgul ba las/ /me 'byung 'gyur ba ji bzhin
168a6(dkon brtsegs): no| |bdag cag me 'di bskyed bya zhes/ /rlung dang shing la sems pa med/ /'on kyang me ni 'byung ba ltar/ /las kyi byed po de bzhin no/ /bsod nams tshogs ni yod min la/ /
168a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub yang dag sgrub pa dang / /legs spyad yod ces zer ba ni/ /de tshul yang dag mnyan par byos/ /mi yi tshe tshad lo brgya ste/ /de srid 'tsho zhes brjod mod kyi/ /lo la phung
168b1(dkon brtsegs): por spungs pa med/ /sgrub pa de yang de dang mtshungs/ /zad pa med ces gang smras dang / /las zad ces ni ngas smras pa/ /stong pa'i tshul du zad pa med/ /tha snyad tshul du zad par bstan/ /yang dag mtha'
168b2(dkon brtsegs): ni ngas bshad pa/ /phyin ci log de'ang yang dag mtha'/ /log pa'i blo can byis pa rnams/ /gang dag mtha' ni mi shes so/ /mtshan nyid thams cad gcig nyid de/ /mtshan nyid med par shes
168b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yi/ /ye shes lam du zhugs rnams kyi/ /nges par ljon pa khyod nyon cig /yi ge gcig gis 'jug pa yi/ /byang chub blo ldan rnams la ston/ /chos rnams thams cad ma byas pa/ /
168b4(dkon brtsegs): a yi sgo yi gzungs su bstan/ /de ltar spyod pa byed rnams la/ /mtshan nyid mtha' yas ngas bstan te/ /'di 'dra'i tshul la 'jug pa ni/ /a yi sgo yi gzungs su bstan/ /chos
168b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams thams cad 'gag med pa/ /a yi chos la 'jug par bstan/ /a yi sgo yi gzungs bstan pa/ /de yang ljon pas shes par gyis/ /chos rnams rnam par rtog med pa/ /de yang
168b6(dkon brtsegs): chos la 'jug par gsungs/ /chos kun 'gyur ba med par yang / /a ni chos kun sgo mor bstan/ /a yi sgo yi gzungs 'di dag /ljon pas de ltar shes par gyis/ /mi zad
168b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang zad smras pa/ /chos kun mi zad brjod bya ste/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba thams cad kyis/ /mi zad sgo yi gzungs su bstan/ /chos rnams kun la sgo med de/ /de dag med pas sgo mi 'byung / /
169a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ /a la brten nas 'jug par bya/ /chos kun bsam gyis mi khyab ces/ /yang dag ji bzhin bde gshegs bstan/ /
169a2(dkon brtsegs): a yi sgo yi gzungs bstan pa/ /de yang ljon pas shes par gyis/ /chos kun lus med byang chub ces/ /blo ldan rnams la ngas bstan pa/ /'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ /
169a3(dkon brtsegs): a la brten nas 'jug par bya/ /chos rnams 'ong ba med pa ste/ /med pas de dag 'ong ba'ang med/ /'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ /a la brten nas 'jug par bya/ /chos
169a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams gdags pa med pa ste/ /med pas de dag gdags pa med/ /'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ /a la brten nas 'jug par bya/ /chos rnams rang bzhin med pa ste/ /med
169a5(dkon brtsegs): pas de dag rang bzhin med/ /'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ /bde bar gshegs pas gzungs su bstan/ /gzungs kyi sgo mo nga la nyon/ /chos kun yid la bya ba med/ /'di yang
169a6(dkon brtsegs): gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ /bde bar gshegs pas gzungs su bstan/ /med phyir chos kun sgrib med ces/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bstan mdzad pa/ /'di yang gzungs kyi sgo
169a7(dkon brtsegs): yin te| |a la brten nas shes par bya/ /chos kun thogs pa med pa ste/ /thogs par bya ba de mi dmigs/ /'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ /a la brten nas 'jug par bya//
169b1(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams thams cad ma skyes par/ /mkhas pas mtshan nyid gcig shes bya/ /chos rnams gang dag ma skyes pa/ /de dag ming med shes par bya/ /chos rnams yang dag ma yin te/ /
169b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag ma lus rang bzhin med/ /'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ /a la brten nas shes par bya/ /gang dag ma skyes ma byung ba/ /de dag mthong med bstan par bya/ /lta ba po ni med pa
169b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / /de dag rnams kyang med phyir ro/ /chos kun mnyam med de bas na/ /mtshan nyid gcig cing mtshan gzhi med/ /nam mkha' dang ni 'dra ba ste/ /chos kun yod pa ma yin no/ /
169b4(dkon brtsegs): de lta lhag med chad pa med/ /mnyam gzhag med cing gnyis su med/ /gdung med bsil med tsha ba'ang med/ /blta ba'i lam min med phyir ro/ /drang po ma yin yon po min/ /
169b5(dkon brtsegs): mun pa ma yin snang ba min/ /mthong ba med cing thos med de/ /med pas gzungs su shes par gyis/ /g.yo med drang po'ang med pa ste/ /chos rnams gsal med g.yo ba med/ /'khrug
169b6(dkon brtsegs): pa med cing khro ba med/ /ci yang mi byed nyer zhi byed/ /skye ba med cing gnas kyang med/ /'gro min ldog med 'gro sems med/ /nyal ba med cing mi nyal med/ /sad pa med par shes
169b7(dkon brtsegs): par gyis/ /mig can ma yin long ba min/ /lta ba ma yin mun bsgribs min/ /sbas pa ma yin bzhag pa min/ /dul ba ma yin ma dul min/ /rgod pa ma yin zhi ba min/ /'khor
170a1(dkon brtsegs): min mya ngan 'das pa min/ /bden min rdzun min de lta bur/ /rgyal ba'i spyod yul shes par gyis/ /'jig rten 'dul ba'i phyir yin gyi/ /'di la the
170a2(dkon brtsegs): tshom gang yang med/ /gang gcad bya ba'i the tshom med/ /dam pa'i don du byung ba med/ /de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zhus pa lung bstan pa dang /
170a3(dkon brtsegs): gzungs nges par bstan pas yongs su tshim par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ khang pa brtsegs pa shing la brten pa dang / pad+ma la brten
170a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ri la brten pa dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can rin po che'i gdugs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ gdugs kyi lda ldis mdzes par byas pa/ rgyal mtshan dang /
170a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dan gyis brgyan pa/ bla re dang / lda ldis brgyan pa bye ba phrag brgyad mngon par sprul te/ mi 'am ci'i rol mo'i sil snyan bye ba phrag brgyad kyang mngon par sprul nas ri spos kyi
170a6(dkon brtsegs): ngad ldang las skyes pa dang / thang las skyes pa dang / chu las skyes pa'i me tog thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas mi'am ci'i tshogs dang lhan cig
170a7(dkon brtsegs): tu khang pa brtsegs pa bye ba phrag brgyad po de dag tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te thang las skyes pa dang / chu las skyes pa'i me tog de dag gis
170b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /de nas khang ba brtsegs pa de dag las babs te rkang pas dong nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
170b2(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzum par blta zhing rnam pas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan
170b3(dkon brtsegs): rjes su dran par byed cing phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud
170b4(dkon brtsegs): nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bde gshegs dri bral spyan mnga' ba/ /rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi
170b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad| |lha mis mchod pa yang dag tu/ /'dzum mdzad rgyu de bka' stsal gsol/ /thams cad mkhyen pa 'dzum mdzad pa/ /'khor gyis mthong nas the tshom 'tshal/ /zla ba tshes la
170b6(dkon brtsegs): mi bzhin du/ /smra ba'i zla ba'i zhal du blta/ /bde gshegs mdzes pa deng su zhig /gnyis med chos la shes mchog skyes/ /bdag ni the tshom 'tshal bar gyur/ /mi mchog dam pa
170b7(dkon brtsegs): the tshom 'tshal/ /bde gshegs gang gis chos nyid la/ /dad pa thob na bcom ldan 'das/ /ji ltar 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur/ /smra mchog bdag gi the tshom khum/ /thams cad ldan pa'i
171a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'di yis/ /bcom ldan stan thos yid dga' zhing / /the tshom ma mchis som nyi chad/ /ji ltar bstan bzhin gnas par 'gyur/ /de ltar
171a2(dkon brtsegs): rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog / 'gro la thugs brtse mdzad pa dang / /the tshom gcad slad ljon pa dang / /mi ci rnams kyi lung bstan gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe
171a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal ba/ /skye bo tshogs chen rnams nang du/ /sangs rgyas yon tan bsten 'gyur ba/ /ljon pa'i lung bstan gang dris pa/ /rta
171a4(dkon brtsegs): thul khyod kyis legs par dris/ /ye shes mthong ba sgrib med pa/ /bde gshegs ye shes ngo mtshar can /de khyod dang ba'i yid kyis nyon/ /skye med yid kyis nga la nyon/ /
171a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten phan dang bde ba'i phyir/ /ljon pas the tshom gang dris pa/ /de yi 'bras bu brjod par bya'i/ /the tshom gcad pas nga la nyon/ /ljon pa la sogs mi 'am ci/ /bye ba
171a6(dkon brtsegs): phrag brgyad 'dir lhags pa/ /de dag nga la mchod byas nas/ /'di nas shi 'phos mtho ris 'dong / /bskal pa bye ba dgu bcu der/ /mi yi nang na 'khor bar 'gyur/ /
171a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa lnga bsgoms nas/ /sems la dbang bsgyur dbang ldan 'gyur/ /mi yi seng+ge de dag gis/ /sangs rgyas zhing phrag khrag khrig tu/ sprul bkye rang ni lha gnas
171b1(dkon brtsegs): na| |bsam gtan dga' ba'i bde ba myong / /bskal pa bye ba dgu bcur yang / /de dag lha mir 'khor 'khor nas/ /rang rang zhing rnams sna tshogs su/ /byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgyar 'gyur//
171b2(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu snang ba'i bskal pa la/ /mi yi seng+ge 'jig rten mgon/ /chags med ye shes mthong dpag yas/ /stobs bcu gzi brjid mtha' yas 'gyur/ /de dag zhing du sems can gang / /
171b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su ma smin 'ga' mi skye/ /nyan thos theg pas gang 'byung ba/ /kun kyang srid pa tha ma pa/ /mi yi seng+ge zhing der ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang skye ba/ /de dag tshe gcig thogs pa
171b4(dkon brtsegs): ste| |mi mchog byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /gang dag gtso bor gyur pa rnams/ /bdag cag dpag med sangs rgyas zhing / /yongs su sbyang bar bya'o zhes/ /de 'dra'i bsam pas rab tu
171b5(dkon brtsegs): zhugs| |sems can rlabs chen de dag ni/ /smon lam rgya chen yun ring btab/ /de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ /bsam pas rang bzhin rnam pa spyod/ /nyon mongs 'joms pa de dag
171b6(dkon brtsegs): gi / zhing gi bkod par 'gyur ba ni/ /dga' ldan gnas kyi longs spyod rnams/ /ngan song kun kyang yongs su dag /de dag zhing du rnam kun tu/ /mi khom gang yang 'byung mi 'gyur/ /zhing rnams
171b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs sbyangs de dag ni/ /sems can rnams kyang bde bar 'dren/ /de ltar 'jig rten mgon po yis/ /mi ci rnams kyi lung bstan bshad/ /lung bstan de thos 'khor rnams ni/ /kun
172a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang yid ni rangs par gyur/ /mi 'am ci lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas lha phreng ldan glang po can brgyad khris lha
172a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin rnams nas mi 'am ci'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / /lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes
172a3(dkon brtsegs): nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mos zhing bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ de dag gis ser skye'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad kyi khor yug
172a4(dkon brtsegs): tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad me tog man+dA ra bas pus mo nub tsam du gang bar byas so/ /de nas de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas tshigs su bcad pa
172a5(dkon brtsegs): dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ zhi ba'i dbang po 'dzum pa'i zhal/ srog chags kun la thugs brtse ba/ /bde bar gshegs pa thugs rje can/ /'jig rten bdag po mi yi stag/
172a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas chos la mos pa yi/ /'khor 'di ji srid 'dir gnas par/ /zhabs mchog mdzes shing dga' ldan par/ /thugs rjes can la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /ji ltar dgung zla nya
172a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshe/ /mi rnams zla ba phyag 'tshal dang / /de bzhin lha tshogs 'di rnams kyang / /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du blta/ /dpag tu med pa'i dge spyod pa/ /dpag med ye shes phung po
172b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan| |gzi brjid dpag yas phung po can/ /blo mchog khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /stobs bcu mnga' zhing dpal stug pa/ /de bzhin mi bsnyengs dri gsum sel/ /rgyal ba bco brgyad chos
172b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan/ /the tshom mi mnga' smra ba'i mchog /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' zhing / /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ldan/ /dbang po'i rgyal mtshan mtshungs med thugs/ /bde gshegs
172b3(dkon brtsegs): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshul khrims stobs kyis mthar phyin pa/ /ting 'dzin stobs gnas mi bskyod pa/ /ye shes stobs kyi mtshon cha can/ /bdud stobs bcom thub rgyal ba lags/
172b4(dkon brtsegs): ye shes stobs mchog rgyas gyur pa/ /ser sna mi mnga' nyan thos btul/ /zhi ba'i thugs kyis spyod mdzad cing / /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dul/ /skyes bu seng+ge bde gshegs khyod//
172b5(dkon brtsegs): gti mug zhi bgyid chos brnyes pa/ /bdag cag rnams kyang stobs bcu yi/ /chos rnams 'dir ni thos par shog /ji ltar thub khyod sems can gyi/ /bsam mkhyen dad mdzad de bzhin
172b6(dkon brtsegs): du| |'jig rten snang mdzad bdag cag kyang / /lha mir bcas pa'i 'gro dad bgyid/ /de ltar 'gro ba'i don slad du/ /snying brtse nye bar bzung nas ni/ /'gro ba 'khor ba'i mtshor bying ba/ /
172b7(dkon brtsegs): srid pa'i rgyud las bsgral bar bgyi/ /bdag cag lhar bcas 'jig rten gyi/ 'dren dang rab tu 'dren gyur cig/ 'gro ba sdug bsngal rgyas nyen pa/ /srid pa'i rgyud las dgrol bar
173a1(dkon brtsegs): bgyid| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha phreng ldan glang bo can rnams kyi bsam pa thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan
173a2(dkon brtsegs): ba rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bde gshegs rnam par 'dren pa po/ /rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad/ /stobs bcu khyod ni 'dzum
173a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa'i/ /rgyu gang lags pa bka' stsal gsol/ /rgyal ba'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad pa/ /'gro ba dang bgyid byung mthong nas/ /'khor kun the tshom 'tshal gyur te/ /'dzum
173a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don ni nyan par 'tshal/ /don chen 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don/ /bka' stsal bka' stsal 'dren pa mchog /dge sbyong rnams kyi rgyal po khyod/ /the tshom chad 'gyur bka'
173a5(dkon brtsegs): stsal gsol/ /gang gis rgyal ba mnyes par gyis/ /gang gis deng mchod bla med gyis/ /su zhig de ring gting thob gyur/ /bde gshegs bdag gi the tshom khum/ /de ring
173a6(dkon brtsegs): gang gis bdud kyi gnas/ /dkrugs g.yeng kun tu dkrugs par bgyis/ /deng sus lha gnas thams cad kyang / /rab tu dga' yid ldan par gyis/ /rgyal ba thub pa de lung ston/ /
173a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i the tshom myur du khum/ /de thos bde gshegs 'khor 'di rnams/ /kun kyang rab tu yid dga' 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de tshe dang ldan
173b1(dkon brtsegs): ba rta thul la slar bka' stsal pa/ phreng ldan glang po can lha yi/ /lung bstan rta thul khyod dris pa/ /dris na 'gro ba mang po yi/ /don chen shin tu deng byas gyur/ /stobs bcu rgyal
173b2(dkon brtsegs): ba ma dris par/ /sras mchog byang chub lung mi ston/ /de ni 'gro ba mang don du/ /de ring khyod kyis rgyal la zhus/ /phreng ldan glang po lha tshogs kyis/ /nga la sems dad nga mchod pas/ /
173b3(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa grangs med 'das 'og tu/ /nyon mongs pham byas rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ /mthun par mi yi nang skyes te/ /rgyal ba bye ba dpag med la/ /me tog
173b4(dkon brtsegs): mchog gi mchod par 'gyur/ /kun tu bde bar gshegs kyi sems/ /bskyed par 'gyur zhing 'phel byed 'gyur/ /rang byung mi yi seng+ge la/ /tshigs su bcad pas bstod par 'gyur//
173b5(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs dus na 'di kun gyis/ /rgyal ba khrag khrig dpag yas mang / /me tog gis mchod tshigs bcad kyis/ /mi mchog rnams la bstod byas te/ /de dag bde gshegs rnams
173b6(dkon brtsegs): mchod cing / /mthu po che yi sku bstod nas/ /rab tu dga' ba'i bskal pa la/ /rnam par 'dren par 'jig rten 'byung / /grags pa ma smad nags rgyu ba/ /brgyad khri bo rnams de dag
173b7(dkon brtsegs): kun| |bskal pa gcig la bde gshegs 'gyur/ /me tog rgyal mtshan ldan zhes bya/ /de na dmyal dang dud 'gro dang / /ngan song gshin rje'i 'jig rten med/ /zhing de na ni lha
174a1(dkon brtsegs): min med/ /mi khom thams cad rab tu bcom/ /phreng ldan glang po can lha yi/ /longs spyod sum cu rtsa gsum gyi/ /ci 'dra ba ni de 'drar 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i
174a2(dkon brtsegs): tshe tshad dpag tu med/ /de tshe mi dge sgra mi grag /mi dge byed pa smos ci dgos/ /de na rnam 'dren mchog rnams kyi/ /skye bo rnams kyang chos can 'gyur/ /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig
174a3(dkon brtsegs): phrag / gang+gA'i bye ma rab mang snyed/ /'gro bar byed 'gyur stobs bcu rnams/ /gnas pa med pa'i chos kyang ston/ /grags pa ma smad de dag gi /ring bsrel dag kyang rgyas par
174a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur| |de dag rnams kyi ring bsrel la'ang / /rgyal ba'i sku mang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /grags pa mtha' yas ldan rnams kyi/ /ring bsrel cho 'phrul sku mthong nas/ /srog
174a5(dkon brtsegs): chags bye ba khrag khrig mang / /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed 'gyur/ /phreng ldan gling po can rnams kyi/ /lung bstan 'dren pas bka' stsal pa/ /thos shing shes nas 'khor
174a6(dkon brtsegs): kun kyang / /de tshe sems ni rab tu dga'/ /phreng ldan glang po can lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha dgu
174a7(dkon brtsegs): khris lha ma yin rnams nas phreng ldan glang po can gyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / /lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing /

174b2(dkon brtsegs): phyin na| gru chag tu 'ong zhes tshu rol nas pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mos pa drag po skye ba de bzhin du/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dgu khri po dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid la dad pa
174b3(dkon brtsegs): s kyes nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir mos pa drag po skyes par gyur nas de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol zhing bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur
174b4(dkon brtsegs): te| de dag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lhan cig tu rin po che'i bla re bkra ba blta na sdug pa dgu khri mngon par sprul to/ /de dag kyang phal cher mu tig dmar po dang / skar mdog dang / bai
174b5(dkon brtsegs): DUR+Ya dang / gser dang / rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin can sha stag go /lha'i rol mo'i sil snyan dgu khri yang mngon par sprul te/ de dag nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi bla re dgu khri po de dag
174b6(dkon brtsegs): thogs nas rol mo'i sil snyan dgu khri po de dag byed cing steng gi bar snang las dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing me tog man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dang /
174b7(dkon brtsegs): many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab
175a1(dkon brtsegs): tu gtor te de dag gis mchod pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ rgyal ba'i
175a2(dkon brtsegs): yon tan mthong ba yi/ /lha ni dgu khri tham pa dag /'dren pa khyod kyi spyan snga na/ /thal mo rab tu sbyar nas mchis/ /rgod pa ma mchis zhum ma mchis/ /'dod pa ma mchis 'gyod ma

175a4(dkon brtsegs): tu phyung / /nga rgyal rgyal mtshan khyod kyis bsnyal/ /khyod ni zug rngu phyung ba ste/ /rma la gdug pa khyod kyis spangs/ /khyod ni mkhyen bzhin spyod pa ste/ /'dren pa khyod ni rma rnams

175b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis gzigs/ /sems can 'jig tshogs ltar lhung ste/ /stong pa nyid ni ma 'tshal bas/ /ma rig pa yi mun pas gtibs/ /'khor ba'i brtson rar dga' bar bgyid//

175b5(dkon brtsegs): gdags ma mchis/ /srog dang gang zag ma mchis ltar/ /de bzhin phung po khams rnams dang / /dbang po dag dang skye mched kyang / /yang dag ma yin sgyu ma zhes/ /skyes bu dam pas bstan

176a1(dkon brtsegs): skyu ru ra bzhin du/ /de ni kun mkhyen khyod kyis bstan/ /shes rab chen po khyed kyis ni/ /ye shes sgron ma rab bus te/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nas//
