179b7(dkon brtsegs): ji bzhin du/ /ston pa'ang de bzhin sprul dang 'dra ba ste/ /rgyal bas lung bstan bdag cag 'tshal gyur pas/ /'di la bdag cag the tshom ma mchis so/ /rgyal bas so so'i skye bo rnams mkhyen nas//
180a1(dkon brtsegs): byis pa'i sa thob tha snyad gang btags pa/ /de dag kun kyang sprul pa ji bzhin te/ /bde gshegs 'gro ba lung bstan de bzhin no/ /slob pa rnams dang gang
180a2(dkon brtsegs): dag mi slob dang / /bcom ldan nyan thos dul ba'i sa thob pa/ /de dag kun kyang bcom ldan sprul dang 'dra/ /bcom ldan bstan la the tshom ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan gang rnams mi smra
180a3(dkon brtsegs): lhur len cing / /bse ru lta bur gnyis med nyon mongs spangs/ /de dag rnams kyang sprul 'drar bcom ldan 'das/ /bde gshegs bstan la the tshom ma mchis so/ /gang rnams
180a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba kun la bde phan phyir/ /rgyal ba'i byang chub spyad spyod bag yod pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' bde gshegs sras dag kyang / /khyad par ma mchis sprul pa 'di dang 'dra/ /bde gshegs
180a5(dkon brtsegs): rang byung rnam par 'dren pa mchog / stobs bcu shes rab mtha' yas thugs rje can/ /ye shes stobs 'phags 'jig rten gtso bo dag /sprul pa 'di 'dra de dag rang bzhin
180a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs/ /'dren pas 'di la chos rnams gang gsungs pa/ /gnas med zhi bsil nyon mongs med gyur cing / /sdug bsngal zhi byed mthar thug grangs med pa/ /de yang sprul pa
180a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ji bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'di la chos rnams gang dag dag kyang / /sprul pa'i rang bzhin ma lags de ma mchis/ /gang tshe go 'u ta ma'i bstan pa 'di/ /bdag cag rtogs
180b1(dkon brtsegs): nas the tshom thams cad spangs/ /sprul pa 'di 'drar chos rnams kun mthong nas/ /bdag cag rnams kyang 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur/ /bde gshegs spyod yul 'di la spyod pa
180b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams| |the tshom ma mchis rang byung 'dren par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs
180b3(dkon brtsegs): su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gzhal med grags mang mtha' yas gzi brjid can/ /bde
180b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs rnams ni rgyu med 'dzum mi mdzad/ /rnam par 'dren pas 'dir ni 'dzum mdzad na/ /rgyal bas 'dzum pa'i tshig gsungs the tshom khum/ /rang byung bde gshegs zhal nas
180b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa 'di/ /byung bar rigs nas 'jig rten the tshom 'tshal/ /'gro ba'i the tshom thub pas bsal du gsol/ /'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis mdzod/ /lha tshogs 'di rnams
180b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu yid dga' bas/ /rgyal ba bstod de lha rdzas rnams kyis mchod/ /bde gshegs de dag don du 'dzum pa mdzad/ /rgyal ba 'khor 'di dga' mdzad bka' stsal to/ /zla 'drar dri
180b7(dkon brtsegs): med 'od mnga' mtha' yas gzi/ /ci nas bde gshegs bka' ni 'di thos pas/ /mgon po 'gro ba thams cad dgar 'gyur bar/ /rgyal ba lha tshogs mchod mkhyen bka' stsal
181a1(dkon brtsegs): gsol| |bde gshegs lha tshogs 'di yis chos rnams kun/ /sprul pa lta bur rnam par rtogs gyur na/ /stobs bcu mnga' bas don 'di bka'
181a2(dkon brtsegs): stsal te| |rab rib bral ba lha yi bslab pa gsungs/ /skye bo 'di dag the tshom bral gyur nas/ /thub pa de ltar byang chub spyod rtsom 'gyur/ /rab tu dpa' ba 'khor 'dis thos gyur
181a3(dkon brtsegs): te| |dgongs pa rig nas rgyal chen rtsom par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ lha tshogs 'di dag rab tu
181a4(dkon brtsegs): dga' shes nas/ /rta thul khyod kyis dus dang ldan pa'i tshig /smras pa de ni dus la bab pa ste/ /'dzum pa dris pa de ni lung bstan to/ /lha rnams bsam shes 'dzum pa de dris
181a5(dkon brtsegs): pa| |des ni khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don chen byas/ /'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de ngas bstan gyi/ /dga' zhing dang ba'i sems kyis nga la nyon/ /lha tshogs rnams kyis chos rnams 'di
181a6(dkon brtsegs): dag ni| |ma lus sprul pa lta bur shes gyur nas/ /chags med ye shes mthong ba dpag med cing / /rab rib bral ba'i 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur/ /srid pa'i rgyud na sngon yang
181a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i tshe/ /mi yi gtso bo gang+gA'i bye snyed mchod/ /sring rgyud de na 'di dag thub pa las/ /chos rnams sprul pa lta bur ma mthong ngo / /'di dag nga la mchod mchog 'dir
181b1(dkon brtsegs): byas pas/ /chos rnams sprul pa 'dra bar mngon du mthong / /bde gshegs bstan pa 'di la byas pa ni/ /chud zos mi 'gyur bar chad yod mi 'gyur/ /lha tshogs 'di yis nga la mchod
181b2(dkon brtsegs): byas te| |chos rnams thams cad sprul pa 'drar shes pas/ /bskal pa pad+ma zhes bya byung ba'i tshe/ /smra ba'i zla ba mi yi mchog tu 'gyur/ /khyu mchog ldan pa'i ming mchog 'gyur ba ni/ /
181b3(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs rab mkhas dbang po'i tog rgyal po/ /chos rnams thams cad sprul pa 'drar ston cing / /'gro ba khrag khrig dpag med 'grol bar 'gyur/ /bde gshegs de dag bstan
181b4(dkon brtsegs): la bag yod pa/ /chos rnams 'di dag sprul pa 'dra bar sems/ /zhi gnas de la su brten bag yod pa/ /myur du bla med byang chub mchog zhi thob/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa lung bstan
181b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i le'u ste/ bco lnga pa'o// //de nas de'i tshe 'thab bral gyi lha bye ba phrag bzhi bcus lha ma yin rnams nas sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bar du de dag gis mchod pa
181b6(dkon brtsegs): yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyang lung bstan pa la thogs
181b7(dkon brtsegs): pa mi mnga' bar shes shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ nyams dga' ba ste/ de dag thob na/ ma shes pa'am/ ma mthong ba'am/ ma rtogs pa'am/ mngon du ma byas
182a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'am| skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ las sam/ las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yang med do/ /zhes sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa bskyed do//
182a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas kun rdzob dang / don dam pa gnyis thugs su chud de/ shes par bya ba yang kun rdzob dang / don dam pa 'dir zad do/ /de yang bcom ldan
182a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis stong pa nyid rab tu gzigs/ rab tu mkhyen/ legs par mngon du mdzad pas/ de'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o/ /de la kun rdzob ni/ 'jig rten gyi
182a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod par de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs so/ /don dam pa gang yin pa de ni/ brjod du med pa ste/ shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ yongs
182a5(dkon brtsegs): su shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ ma bstan pa/ rab tu ma bstan pa/ ma thos pa/ thos par ma byas pa/ ma shes pa/ rnam par ma shes pa/ ma bstan pa/ ma mthong ba/ ma brtags
182a6(dkon brtsegs): pa| 'dzin du ma bcug pa/ rtogs par ma byas pa/ thob par ma byas pa/ ma thob pa/ nye bar ma bsnyen pa/ ma bor ba/ ma bzhag pa/ ma spangs pa/ bya ba med pa/ byad pa
182a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa| rab tu zhi ba med pa/ ma smad pa/ ma bstod pa/ thob pa ma yin pa/ ma thob pa ma yin pa/ bde ba ma yin pa/ sdug bsngal ma yin pa/ snyan pa ma yin pa/ mi snyan pa ma
182b1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa| gzugs ma yin pa/ gzugs med pa ma yin pa/ grangs med pa/ bgrang ba med pa/ 'jig rten med pa/ 'jig rten dang bral ba med pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/
182b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par byang ba med pa/ 'gro ba med pa/ ldog pa med pa/ ma brtags pa/ rnam par ma brtags pa/ ma g.yos pa/ ma bsam pa/ ma bskyod pa/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa/
182b3(dkon brtsegs): ma spros pa/ spros pa dang bral ba ste/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs
182b4(dkon brtsegs): pa| mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi mtshan ma mi
182b5(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba
182b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ yid kyi 'dus
182b7(dkon brtsegs): te reg pa las byung ba'i chor ba'i bar gyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs kyi 'du shes kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ chos kyi bar gyi 'du shes kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs
183a1(dkon brtsegs): su sems pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ chos kyi bar du sems pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ yid la bya ba'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ sa dang /
183a2(dkon brtsegs): chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi
183a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa ste/ 'di ltar chos gang dang gang brjod pa'i rang bzhin gang dang gang gis brjod
183a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos de dang de brjod pa'i rang bzhin de dang des mi brjod pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ de ltar nyams dga' ba yin na/ de byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi
183a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa mi shes pa rnams kyis thos na/ 'jigs shing sngangs pa dang / skrag par 'gyur te/ des 'jigs par gyur pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes las nyams par
183a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ de dag ni/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mya ngan du bya ba ste/ 'khor ba na yod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyun to/ /zhes te/ de dag gis 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos
183a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams la 'dod pa bskyed nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi don du bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ de dag gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i mchod pa las
183b1(dkon brtsegs): k hyad par du 'phags pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod de bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs
183b2(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas 'thab bral gyi lha de dag bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ rgyal ba khyod kyis phung po
183b3(dkon brtsegs): dben par gzigs/ /khams dang skye mched rnams kyang de bzhin te/ /dbang po'i grong ni mtshan mas dben pa dag /kun kyang thub pa khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs/ /'jig rten mkhas
183b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bden pa de gnyis te/ /khyod kyis gzhan las ma gsan rang gis gzigs/ /de ni kun rdzob bden dang don dam ste/ /bden pa gsum pa gang yang ma mchis so/ /gang gis bde
183b5(dkon brtsegs): bar gshegs la 'gro ba rnams/ /bde ba'i don du dad pa skye 'gyur ba/ /rgyal bas 'gro ba rnams kyi don slad du/ /'jig rten phan phyir kun rdzob de bstan to/ /sems can tshogs kyi
183b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro drug gang bstan pa/ /sems can dmyal dang dud 'gro yi dwags dang / /lha min ris dang mi dang lha yi rnams/ /mi yi seng+ges kun rdzob btags pa mdzad/ /rigs dma' de bzhin
183b7(dkon brtsegs): mtho ba'i rigs rnams dang / /phyug po'i khyim dang dbul ba'i khyim rnams dang / /bran gyi tshogs dang de bzhin g.yo gi tshogs/ /bud med tshogs dang skyes pa ma ning dang / /'gro
184a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i khyad par ji snyed gang yang rung / /mtshungs med khyod kyis 'jig rten bstan mdzad pa/ /kun rdzob bden par mkhas pas thugs chud nas/ /'jig
184a2(dkon brtsegs): rten phan pas mi la de bstan to/ /de la dga' ba'i 'gro ba 'khor ba ni/ /'gro ba'i chos brgyad de la mi 'byung ste/ /thob dang ma thob snyan dang mi snyan dang / /bstod dang smad dang bde
184a3(dkon brtsegs): dang sdug bsngal lo/ /thob pa rnyed na de la chags pa skyed/ /ma thob gyur na des kyang 'khrug par 'gyur/ /gang gzhan ma bstan tshul 'dis shes par bya/ /nad rnams brgyad
184a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis de rgyud gnod par 'gyur/ /kun rdzob de la don dam su smra ba/ /de dag nor ba'i blo ldan shes par bya/ /mi sdug sdug dang sdug bsngal bde ba dang / /bdag med rang bzhin bdag tu smra
184a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / /mi rtag chos la rtag ces smra bgyid cing / /de ltar dga' ste mtshan mar gang gnas pa/ /de dag bder gshegs gsungs ni thos gyur na/ /'jigs shing ji bzhin
184a6(dkon brtsegs): mi rtogs spong bar bgyid/ /de dag bde gshegs gsung ni spangs gyur pas/ /sems can dmyal bar sdug bsngal mi bzad myong / /de dag tshul min bde ba tshol bgyid
184a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang / /sdug bsngal brgyad dag byis pas myong bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten phan pa'i bstan pa su zhig gis/ /ma log blos ni rnam par rtogs gyur na/ /sbrul gyi pags pa rnying ltar rab
184b1(dkon brtsegs): spangs te/ /srid pa kun las 'das nas zhi bar 'gyur/ /chos 'di thams cad rang bzhin dben pa ste/ /stong pa mtshan ma med pa don dam zhes/ /gang gis thos nas dga' ba skye
184b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba/ /de dag bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /ji ltar bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos/ /de la lha rnams the tshom ma mchis te/ /'gro ba thams cad yongs su
184b3(dkon brtsegs): dgrol ba'i phyir/ /de dag bla na med pa'i byang chub tshol/ /byang chub blo can rnam dag blo can rnams/ /skyes bu mchog gis dga' ba bskyed du gsol/ /de thos 'gro ba kun la sman
184b4(dkon brtsegs): slad du| |bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'thab bral ris kyi lha bye ba phrag bzhi bcu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud
184b5(dkon brtsegs): nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol ba/ 'jig rten phan pas 'dzum pa gang mdzad des/ /khyod kyi
184b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ni the tshom 'tshal bar 'gyur/ /mi mchog 'dzum pa'i rgyu de bka' stsal gsol/ /des ni 'khor 'di rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /lha rnams lung bstan de ni thos gyur na/ /'khor
184b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di shin tu dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur/ /rigs pa ldan pa bstan pa 'di nyid la/ /bde ba nan tan bgyid cing rtsom par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba khyod 'khor 'dir ni mchog ldan te/ /drang
185a1(dkon brtsegs): srong chen po sangs rgyas yon tan snod/ /'gro ba 'di rnams bsdu ba mdzad slad du/ /snyan pa'i gsung ni legs par brjod du gsol/ /sangs rgyas
185a2(dkon brtsegs): yon tan mthu dag thos gyur na/ /skye rgu kun la rab tu sman par 'gyur/ /bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan de thos na/ /mkhas pa rnams ni tshul bzhin rtsom par 'gyur/ /
185a3(dkon brtsegs): mi yi dam pa smra ba'i mchog gis 'dir/ /the tshom 'tshal ba'i nem nur legs par gsol/ /'khor rnams thams cad thos par dga' zhing bstod/ /lha rnams lung
185a4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa ni bka' stsal gsol/ /kun kyang rim gror gus par rna blags te/ /khyod kyi lung bstan rab tu dga' ba la/ /sgrib pa rab tu spangs shing de dag nyan/ /'jig rten
185a5(dkon brtsegs): phan phyir skyes bu mchog gis gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten phan phyir mkhas pas
185a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum mdzad pa/ /rta thul khyod kyis dris pa dus dang ldan/ /sangs rgyas yon tan mthu ni thos gyur na/ /skye bo tshogs chen rnams kyi don du 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas yon tan tshogs la
185a7(dkon brtsegs): blo zhan cing / /'dod chags blo dang zhe sdang blo ldan dang / /tshe rabs brgyar ni rtsod pa'i blo can dang / /gti mgu blo can dga' ba skyer mi 'gyur/ /gang rnams rgyal bas bstan la
185b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / gang gis rgyal ba rnams la sngon dris dang / /gang rnams snying rje che dang ldan pa dag /de kun sangs rgyas yon tan ldan par 'gyur/ /gang gis 'gro ba gnod zin mthong
185b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur te| |mi yi seng+ge snying rje skyed byed pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas yon tan 'di thos na/ /ut+pal phreng bzhin mgo la khyer bar 'gyur/ /nga yi 'khor 'di rab tu dga' gyur pa/ /sngon gyi
185b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal la bsnyen bkur sngon byas te/ /de dag sangs rgyas yon tan yid 'ong 'di/ /me tog phreng bzhin de dag yang dag lta/ /'thab bral lha rnams sngon gyi rgyal kun la/ /bsnyen
185b4(dkon brtsegs): bkur byas shing chags pa spangs pa ste/ /nyon mongs smad cing sangs rgyas blo ldan 'gyur/ /snying rje ldan zhing nyon mongs med blo ldan/ /rgyal ba mi yi seng+ge gang+gA yi/ /bye snyed kun la
185b5(dkon brtsegs): sngon chad bsnyen bkur byas/ /byang chub bla na med par smon byed cing / /dge ba mtha' yas 'di dag kun gyis byas/ /sems can nyon mongs 'dam bying rig gyur nas/ /sdug bsngal
185b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa rnams la snying rje bskyed/ /de dag mi mchog sems can yang mdzad la/ /chos tshul mtha' yas yongs su dris par gyur/ /gang thos nas ni rnam par 'dren gyur pa/ /rnam 'dren
185b7(dkon brtsegs): chos la 'jug pa 'chad par gyur/ /mi yi nyon mongs spyod pa rab mkhyen nas/ /de dag rnams la rgya chen chos kyang 'chad/ /rnam 'dren skyes bu dam pa'i mchog de dag /rang bzhin med
186a1(dkon brtsegs): pa stong pa nyid kyang 'chad/ /de dag rgyal ba'i gsung de thos gyur nas/ /'gro ba thams cad stong par rab tu rtogs/ /cis stong zhe na mtshan ma'i rnam
186a2(dkon brtsegs): pas stong / /rang bzhin med cing mtshan ma med pa smra/ /rgyal ba'i chos rnams de ltar shes gyur nas/ /kun kyang sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la gnas/ /de dag nga la mchod pa
186a3(dkon brtsegs): rgya chen byas/ /bdag gis chos bzhin du ni lung bstan nas/ /skar tshogs mnyam pa'i bskal ba dam pa la/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /bde gshegs
186a4(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa med pa bye ba phrag / nyi shu nyi shus yongs su gang bar 'gyur/ /blo gros dag ces bya ba'i grangs su 'gro /sems can bsam yas yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur/ /
186a5(dkon brtsegs): 'thab bral 'khod pa'i lha yi bsam pa rnams/ /rta thul gyis ni yongs su zhus byas pa/ /rgyal ba dgra rgyal drang srong chen po yis/ /lung bstan lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten
186a6(dkon brtsegs): dga'| |'thab bral ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcu drug pa'o// //de nas dga' ldan ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas 'thab bral gyi
186a7(dkon brtsegs): ris kyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
186b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i chos de gang zhig / ci gzugs sam/ 'on te tshor ba'am/ 'on te 'du shes sam/ 'on te 'du byed dam/ 'on te rnam par shes pa zhig bcom
186b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan snyam nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gzugs ni|bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang
186b3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag
186b4(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs kyang ma skyes pa/ byang chub kyang ma skyes pa na/ ji ltar ma skyes pas ma skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par
186b5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgya bar bya/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes pa/ byang chub kyang ma skyes pa na/ de la ji ltar ma skyes pas ma skyes pa mngon
186b6(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ gzugs kyang 'gag pa med pa/ byang chub kyang 'gag pa med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang 'gag pa med pa/ byang chub kyang 'gag
186b7(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa/ gzugs kyang spros pa med pa/ byang chub kyang spros pa med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang spros pa med pa/ byang chub kyang spros pa med pa/ gzugs kyang gnyis
187a1(dkon brtsegs): su med pa/ byang chub kyang gnyis su med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang gnyis su med pa/ byang chub kyang gnyis su med pa/ gzugs kyang g.yo ba
187a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa| byang chub kyang g.yo ba med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang g.yo ba med pa/ byang chub kyang g.yo ba med pa/ gzugs kyang dmigs su med pa/ byang chub kyang dmigs
187a3(dkon brtsegs): su med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang dmigs su med pa/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med pa na/ ji ltar 'gag pa med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / gnyis su med pa
187a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / g.yo ba med pa dang / dmigs su med pas 'gag pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa'i bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ de ltar chos thams cad mi
187a5(dkon brtsegs): dmigs na/ 'di la sangs rgyas ni/ gang / byang chub sems dpa' ni/ gang / byang chub ni/ gang / lung bstan pa ni/ gang / gzugs ni/ gzugs kyis stong / tshor
187a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ rnam par shes pas stong / sangs rgyas ni/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong / byang chub sems dpa' ni/
187a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong / byang chub ni/ byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong / lung bstan pa ni/ lung bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ de ltar chos thams cad
187b1(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin gyis stong pa la gzugs zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i bar zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang / lung bstan pa'i bar zhes bya ba de dag ni/ tha snyad tsam/ ming
187b2(dkon brtsegs): tsam| brda tsam/ kun rdzob tsam/ brjod pa tsam/ gdags pa tsam ste/ de la mkhas pa rnams kyis mngon par zhen par bya ba'i mi cha'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi zhig nyal ba'i
187b3(dkon brtsegs): rmi lam na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing rtse rtse ba las/ de la nyal ba las sad na/ 'dod pa'i yon tan de dag mi mthong ste/ de rjes su dran na yang mi rnyed cing / de ltar ma rnyed
187b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir sdug bsngal du 'gyur ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyang byang chub tshol na/ de dag byang chub dang phrad par mi 'gyur te/ byang chub
187b5(dkon brtsegs): ma rnyed cing ro ma myong bas sdug bsngal du 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni/ rmi lam lta bu nor ba ste/ chos de dag gi don ni/ rnam pa gzhan la/ so so'i skye bo
187b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag kyang rnam pa gzhan du zhen to/ /chos de dag ni/ de ltar shes par bya ba yin na/ de la chos gang zhig sangs rgyas yin/ gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin/ gang zhig byang chub
187b7(dkon brtsegs): yin| gang zhig lung bstan pa yin/ /de ltar chos thams cad dmigs su med de/ so so'i skye bo yang dmigs su med de/ so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang dmigs su med/ nyan thos kyang
188a1(dkon brtsegs): dmigs su med/ nyan thos kyi chos kyang dmigs su med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang dmigs su med/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang dmigs su med

188a3(dkon brtsegs): med/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang dmigs su med do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de la ni/ bdag cag the tshom ma mchis/ yid gnyis ma
188a4(dkon brtsegs): mchis so/ /zhes gsol nas dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i bu de dag chos de dag la the tshom med cing nem nur med par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir
188a5(dkon brtsegs): b rtson par gyur nas de dag gis 'thab bral gyi mchod pa las khyad par du 'phags pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
188a6(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag
188a7(dkon brtsegs): gis mngon par bstod pa/ gang dag sangs rgyas yon tan rab gnas pa/ de dag 'jug pa de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /rnam thar sgo gsum de ni rnyed gyur pas/ /mtshungs
188b1(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i spyod yul spyod par 'gyur/ /gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes ma mchis te/ /sems dang bsam pa de bzhin ma mchis pa/ /chags med blo mnga' rnams kyi spyod
188b2(dkon brtsegs): yul lags/ /mi yi seng+ge phung po dben la dgyes/ /skyes bu dam pa mkhas pa de dag gi /byang chub sems kyang nam yang 'byung ma mchis/ /phung po dben pa'i yon tan myong
188b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas dgongs la nem nur spangs blo ldan/ /de dag byang chub smon pa ma mchis shing / /byang chub sems la'ang de dag mi smon de/ /dga' dang zhum par 'gyur
188b4(dkon brtsegs): ba ma mchis par/ /bde gshegs sras rnams spyad pa spyod byed pas/ /bde gshegs rnams kyis chos rnams mnyam par gzigs/ /de la rgyal sras 'jigs dang bral ba rnams/ /
188b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dang nyid du sangs rgyas legs spyod cing / /mkhas pa de dag 'jig rten 'di na spyod/ /gzugs kyi mtshan ma rnam par gzhig bgyis shing / /mtshan ma'i rnam pa thams
188b6(dkon brtsegs): cad rab spangs te/ /srid pa gsum la de dag yong mi smon/ /dngos po stong par smon lam de dag bgyid/ /phung po 'di dag ma skyes rtogs gyur cing / /lung bstan bde gshegs
188b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyang ma skyes la/ /byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyang ma skyes/ /de ltar gang 'tshal de la rmongs ma mchis/ /skye bo'i chos dang sangs rgyas yon tan rnams/ /de dag
189a1(dkon brtsegs): kun dang bde gshegs ma skyes te/ /mi yi seng+ge de ltar gang 'tshal ba/ /de ni khyod sras khyod ni de yi yab/ /gang zhig phung po 'gag pa ma mchis shing
189a2(dkon brtsegs): khams dang skye mched de bzhin rgyal ba'i chos/ /byang chub rgyal ba de bzhin lung bstan pa/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di kun 'gag med 'tshal ba dang / /gang rnams byang chub 'tshal

189a4(dkon brtsegs): dag dang khams rnams dang / /byang chub rgyal ba rgyal las mi g.yo bar/ /gang gis 'tshal ba de dag rgyal sras te/ /de dag rgyal ba'i chos 'di 'dzin pa lags/ /phung po
189a5(dkon brtsegs): sems med de bzhin skye mched dang / /khams dang byang chub rgyal ba rgyal sras dang / /lung bstan de bzhin sems dpa' ma mchis par/ /gang gis 'tshal ba de dag rgyal
189a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sras/ /rang byung phung po dngos nyid stong pa ste/ /khams dang skye mched dag dang rgyal ba dang / /byang chub dang ni lung bstan rgyal sras rnams/ /ngo bo nyid kyis stong par gang
189a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod dang / /phung po spros 'dra de bzhin khams rnams dang / /skye mched rkang gnyis mchog dang byang chub dang / /lung bstan spros pa med par gang spyod cing / /de ltar gang 'tshal de
189b1(dkon brtsegs): dag rgyal ba'i sras/ /gnas pa ma mchis mi gnas ma lags te/ /mchis pa ma lags ma mchis yod ma lags/ /'dus byas ma lags 'dus ma byas ma lags/ /de ltar gang
189b2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal de dag rgyal ba'i sras/ /rgyal dang 'gro 'di de ltar yongs mthong zhing / /ston pa'i dgongs pa de ltar 'tshal gyur la/ /de ltar bgyis na gang zag mchog mchod cing / /'dren
189b3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'khor dang bcas la bsnyen bkur lags/ /rnam par 'dren pa bstod pa'i bsod nams gang / /ji snyed 'jig rten phan mdzad mkhyen pa yi/ /dge ba 'di yis 'gro ba rang byung
189b4(dkon brtsegs): pa| |rgyal ba mtshan mchog ldan par 'grub par shog / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan ris kyi lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /
189b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'dren pa rgyu yi stobs ni gang zhig gis/ /stobs chen brnyes pa 'di ltar 'dzum mdzad pa//
189b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa'i rgyu de 'dren pas bka' stsal gsol/ /des ni 'jig rten 'di dag dga' bar 'gyur/ /shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad pa/ /'gro ba 'dis mthong the tshom 'tshal
189b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur te| |nyan par 'tshal zhing gzhan du mi sems par/ /kun kyang 'jig rten phan pa'i zhal du lta/ /'di ltar dper na nad pa nad skyo ba/ /sman pas bsgo ba bzhin du 'dzin bgyid pa/ /de
190a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin 'khor 'di lung bstan thos 'tshal zhing / /rkang gnyis dbang po bde gshegs zhal du lta/ /'khor 'di thams cad rgya chen ldan pa ste/ /sangs
190a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas dgongs la zhen pa'i yid dang ldan/ /rgyal bas lung bstan de dag thos 'tshal te/ /kun kyang bde gshegs zhal du lta zhing sdod/ /de la rgyal bas thugs rje che bskyed cing //
190a3(dkon brtsegs): ci nas 'khor 'di rab tu dga' 'gyur dang / /sangs rgyas dgongs la bsam pa gzhog 'gyur bas/ /ye shes stobs kyis the tshom gcad du gsol/ /mi yi khyu mchog lung
190a4(dkon brtsegs): bstan dus la bab/ /the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom bsal du gsol/ /sangs rgyas slar bsdo'i dgra ni mi mnga' na/ /rtog ge'i tshogs kyi sde ni gzhig tu gsol/ /de nas
190a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul khyod kyis 'jig rten sgron mdzad la/ /'dzum pa'i don dris de ni dus dang ldan//
190a6(dkon brtsegs): de ltar 'jig rten mkhas la dris pas na/ /de ring 'gro ba 'di yi don chen byas/ /'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa/ /gang gis chos rab 'di dag shes gyur te/ /
190a7(dkon brtsegs): nga la mchod pa rgya chen 'di byas pa'i/ /dga' ldan lha yi bsam pa mkhyen nas mdzad/ /'gro ba yang dag rtogs pa bzhin du mthong / /rgyal ba'i dgongs pas chos nyid brnyes
190b1(dkon brtsegs): par gyur/ /gang la 'gro ba thams cad rmongs gyur pa'i/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum rab tu rtogs/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag bya byas/ /bsam pa gcig gis zhu ba legs

190b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / /gang dag zhi ba thob nas spyod pa dang / /byang chub de bzhin de dag skye ba med/ /'gro ba kun gyi chos nyid de 'dra ba/ /de shes byang chub thob par 'gyur ro zhes/ /lha rnams gang yang

190b7(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams the tshom yod med do/ /chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med/ /byang chub sems dang de bzhin byang chub kyang / /thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med/ /de la'ang lha rnams

191a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul la sogs pa 'phrul dga' ba bye ba phrag bdun cus lha ma yin rnams nas dga' ldan ris kyi bar gyi lha de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / /lung bstan pa yang thos

193b2(dkon brtsegs): can de dag shes/ /de bzhin bde gshegs sras po tshul shes pa/ /ye shes dam pa thob par 'gyur du shes/ /chu klung ji ltar gzhol bar 'bab 'gyur zhing / /rgya mtshor 'bab par
193b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa rnams kyis shes/ /de bzhin bde gshegs sras po tshul shes pa/ /byang chub rgya chen thob par 'gyur bar shes/ /ji ltar gnam du bong ba 'phangs pa ni/ /sa la ltung
193b4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur du the tshom med/ /de bzhin rgyal sras mkhas pa de dag kyang / /'jig rten mkhas par myur 'gyur ye shes 'jug /gang thos nas ni the tshom med 'gyur zhing / /sangs rgyas
193b5(dkon brtsegs): yon tan gnas par bdag shes la/ /rang gi sar nye lag stong ma yin par/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis chos nyid rab tu mthong / /gal te bdud kyi tshogs ni bye ba dag /sangs rgyas gzugs
193b6(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur bar chad smra byas kyang / /chos la mkhas pa chos nyid rab mthong ba/ /de dag byang chub las ni bzlog mi nus/ /de ltar sangs rgyas yon tan rab gnas shing / /bdag gis
193b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid lung bstan rjod byed pa/ /de la 'dren pa chog tshul mkhyen pa/ /mi dbang lung bstan de la yi rang mdzad/ /de ltar lha tshogs 'di dag tshul 'di la/ /gzhan gyi dring la mi
194a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jog mngon shes shing / /de bas bde gshegs 'gyur zhes rang smra la/ /'jig rten mkhas pa rjes su yi rang mdzad/ /rta thul de bas mkhas pa gang
194a2(dkon brtsegs): gi rnams/ /bla med byang chub thob par byar sems pa/ /de dag tshul 'di shes par gang gyur ba'i/ /'phags pa'i skye bo mkhas la bsten par bya/ /gang dag tshul la 'jug par rab
194a3(dkon brtsegs): mthong zhing / /mkhas pa gang dag bde gshegs bsnyen bkur ba/ /de dag byang chub lag mthil 'dra bar gsal/ /tshul shes de dag rang gis rang 'byung 'gyur/ /gang gis
194a4(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa stong du dka' thub spyad/ /sha khrag pags la mi lta byas pa bas/ /gang gis tshul 'di skad cig rtogs gyur na/ /de ni khyad 'phags dka' thub de lta min/ /'das pa'i
194a5(dkon brtsegs): rang byung gang rnams byung ba dang / /ma 'ongs sems can phan bzhed gang 'byung dang / /da ltar dus na 'dren pa gang bzhugs pa/ /kun kyang tshul gyis bde bar gshegs pa thob/ /rab
194a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul lha tshogs thub pa'i tshul shes pa/ /'di dag nga la mchod pa mchog byas shing / /'dren pa thams cad bsnyen bkur rab byas nas/ /tshul gyis su ni rang byung thob par
194a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur| |'jig rten mkhas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa/ /de yis rgyal ba rang byung gnas pa'i rnams/ /de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i spyod yul pa/ /tshul thob rnams kyis sngon
194b1(dkon brtsegs): bsten myur du thob/ /de la rta thul sangs rgyas sras rnams ni/ /sangs rgyas gnas pa de la nem nur med/ /sangs rgyas tshul la sems can rnams rtse ba/ /tshul shes pa dag ston pa'i lam
194b2(dkon brtsegs): la spyod/ /de ltar tshul la dang ba'i yid byas te/ /brtsam par bya yi sdug bsngal spyod la min/ /rtag tu dge bshes mkhas pa bsten byas na/ /bla med byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur//
194b3(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung mchog thos nas ni/ /'khor kun rgyal ba'i byang chub yid rangs te/ /rjes su yi rang the tshom med gyur nas/ /mthar phyin blo gros la ni zhugs par gyur/ /
194b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul dga' ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bco brgyad pa'o// //bam po bdun pa/ de nas de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi
194b5(dkon brtsegs): ris kyi lha khrag khrig phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas 'phrul dga'i lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / /lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu
194b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes gang
194b7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa de la bdag cag gis ni/ yang dag pa yang ma dmigs na/ de'i mtha' lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig gis yang dag pa
195a1(dkon brtsegs): dmigs na ni/ mtha' yang des dmigs par 'gyur te/ de ni/ gnyis kyis spyod pa'o/ /de lta bu de ni/ theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i
195a2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi spyod yul ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la chos rnams ni/ gnyis
195a3(dkon brtsegs): su med do/ /zhes mi spyod ma mos na/ de 'di snyam du bdag gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/ /snyam du sems su lags kyang de ni/ lam log par zhugs
195a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang 'di byang chub tu smon pa de ni/ lam log par zhugs pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang
195a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos 'ga' zhig dmigs par gyur na/ byang chub
195a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos ni/ 'das pa ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa lags/ da ltar byung ba ma lags/ 'dus byas ma
195a7(dkon brtsegs): lags| 'dus ma byas ma lags/ dngos po ma lags/ dngos po ma mchis pa ma lags/ mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags/
195b1(dkon brtsegs): spang bar bgyi ba ma lags/ bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub ces bgyi ba de yang chos gang gi gnyen po yang ma lags
195b2(dkon brtsegs): la| chos gang yang chos de'i gnyen po ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos de ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags/ rnam par byang ba ma lags te/ gang gis chos gzhan
195b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi gnyen por gyur pa'i chos de yang rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs la/ gang chos de'i gnyen por gyur pa'i chos gzhan de gang yang rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i slad du
195b4(dkon brtsegs): zhe na| bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad ni/ mtshan ma dang bral ba ste/ de dag ni/ mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ spang bar
195b5(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba ma lags/ bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs ni/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du
195b6(dkon brtsegs): shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o/ /gzugs kyi skye ba'i mtshan ma nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi skye ba gang lags
195b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de yang skye ba'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o/ /gzugs kyi 'gag pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi 'gag pa gang lags pa de yang 'gag pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o/ /bcom ldan
196a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das| 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba yang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang bral ba'o/ /'dus byas kyang
196a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o/ /'dus ma byas kyang 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar ji tsam du phung pos bzung ba'am/ skye ba
196a3(dkon brtsegs): dang 'gag pas bzung ba'am/ 'das pas bzung ba'am/ ma 'ongs pas bzung ba'am/ da ltar byung bas bzung ba'am/ 'dus byas kyi bzung ba'am/ 'dus ma byas
196a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis bzung ba de dag ni/ rnam pa thams cad du mi dmigs te/ de ltar mi dmigs pa de ni/ mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma
196a5(dkon brtsegs): lags| spang bar bgyi ba ma lags/ bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag de ltar zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu
196a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bgyi'o/ /de nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lha de dag gis ji ltar
196a7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i chos de ltar lung bstan nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bcom ldan srid pa mthar phyin legs par gsungs/ /
196b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pas srid pa'i snying po ma brnyes na/ /skye bo mi mkhas de dag 'jigs pa yis/ /'khor ba'i pha rol bgrod phyir rab tu zhugs/ /phung po rnams ni kun tu mi dmigs te/ /phung
196b2(dkon brtsegs): po'i mtshan mas phung po stong pa nyid/ /chos gang gang gi gnyen por 'gyur ba ni/ /mtshan mas stong ste gang yang ma mchis so/ /ngo bo nyid kyis stong phyir dngos po gang / /yongs
196b3(dkon brtsegs): shes bya dang spang bsgom mngon bya ba/ /gang yang ma mchis gang du'ang mi dmigs te/ /dngos po rnams ni dngos med rang byung gsung / /byang chub gang yang mtshan mar mi
196b4(dkon brtsegs): dmigs te/ /byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams de bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas gang yang mtshan mar mi dmigs te/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtshan mas rtogs mi 'gyur/ /mi mkhas
196b5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag mtshan mar mngon zhen pa/ /de dag byang chub 'tshang rgyar sems bskyed kyang / /mtshan mar spyod cing spyod yul lag pa ste/ /blo gros ngan pas byang chub lam mi spyod/ /
196b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma sus spangs sangs rgyas spyod yul la/ /spyod pa de dag sangs rgyas bstan la mkhas/ /mtshan ma de bzhin mtshan ma med spangs te/ /stong dang mi stong de bzhin dmigs
196b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa| |mkhas pa de dag byang chub lam la spyod/ /de dag byang chub dam pa zhi ba 'thob/ /phas kyi rgol ba kun gyi spyod yul min/ /gnas de nyan thos rnams kyis bgrod bya min//
197a1(dkon brtsegs): rang rgyal rnams kyang de la mi 'gro ste/ /rnam grol sems ldan zag med tha ba med/ /dgra bcom bstan pa 'di la gang brtson dang / /de bzhin rang rgyal
197a2(dkon brtsegs): skyob par gyur pa dag / mkhas pa'i spyod yul de la spyod yul med/ /go 'phang de ni mtshan ma spyod pa dang / /nyi tshe'i stong pa nyid la sgom pa dang / /gang rnams stong pas stong zhes
197a3(dkon brtsegs): stong smra dang / /chos kun rang bzhin yod smras 'thob mi nus/ /sangs rgyas ma smad rnams kyi bslab pa la/ /slob dang rnam bral slob pa slob pa'i rnams/ /mkhas te rtogs pa med
197a4(dkon brtsegs): pas byang chub rtogs/ /ston pas bstan pa bzhin du dgyes byed lags/ /sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso bo bstod pas na/ /bdag cag bsod nams mi chung gang thob des/ /
197a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgya zhing / /mi shes ston mdzad sangs rgyas grub par shog /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul
197a6(dkon brtsegs): d bang byed kyi ris kyi lha khrag khrig brgyad cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas skye bo phal po che de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad
197a7(dkon brtsegs): do| |de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha yi bsam mkhyen nas/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod
197b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'dzum mdzad la/ /thub pas 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni ma gsungs na/ /rgyal ba 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni bstan du gsol/ /'dren pa rgyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad ces/ /rgyal ba khyu mchog dam
197b2(dkon brtsegs): pas de skad gsungs/ /'jig rten don slad 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu/ /'dren pa bka' stsol the tshom bsal du gsol/ /drang srong chen po'i zhal nas 'dzum rig nas/ /thub
197b3(dkon brtsegs): chen khyod ni 'khor rnams the tshom 'tshal/ /gau tam rgyal ba 'dren pas de dag la/ /'jig rten sman slad 'dzum rgyu lung bstan gsol/ /'di dag 'khor ba'i rgyud la rgyab phyogs te//
197b4(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan 'das pa'i sems kyis thal sbyar sdod/ /'khor 'di yangs pa'i sems ldan the tshom 'tshal/ /don yod grags mnga' som nyi bsal du gsol/ /bde gshegs bstan
197b5(dkon brtsegs): la the tshom ma mchis te/ /phyir zhing dad bskyed rim gror cher bgyid de/ /the tshom mi 'tshal sems ni grol 'gyur bar/ /rgyal bas skye bo'i the tshom legs par khum/ /bde
197b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs bstan la 'di dag bder gnas shing / /gang lam rang byung rgyal ba gshegs gyur pa/ /lam de nas ni the tshom ma mchis mchi/ /de bas skye bo'i the tshom gcad du
197b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ skye bo tshogs chen don dbang brten byas nas/ /tshigs su bcad de dus su
198a1(dkon brtsegs): gang smras shing / /'dzum pa'i don gyi rgyu ni yongs zhus pa/ /khyod kyi tshig ni dus dang ldan pa yin/ /rta thul dri ba de yi don dris pas/ /skye bo tshogs
198a2(dkon brtsegs): chen 'di yi don byas gyur/ /khyod kyis de dris skye bo tshogs chen don/ /byang chub mchog tu yang dag zhugs par 'gyur/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed bsam pa ngas mkhyen
198a3(dkon brtsegs): te| |rta thul 'dzum pa de ni ngas bstan to/ /'jig rten mkhyen pas bstan pa'i lam de nas/ /don du gnyer ba 'di dag de bzhin 'dong / /gang gis 'gro ba 'di dag mtshan
198a4(dkon brtsegs): med par/ /smig rgyu la ni ji ltar chu bzhin mthong / /byis pa rmongs pa mkhas pa'i tshul bzhin te/ /de dag rjes su byang chub 'dod pas bslab/ /mtshan ma'i 'du shes spang
198a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir mi rnams gang / /rtag tu mtshan ma mngon dga' 'jig 'gyur zhing / /mtshan ma'i 'du shes log pa'i lam du 'dong / /mtshan ma med pas byang chub mchog thob
198a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur| |med pa'i rtog ldan mtshan mar rnam brtags nas/ /ji ltar brtags pa de ltar 'ching ba yin/ /mtshan ma stong par rnam mthong mkhas pa yi/ /zhi ba dag ni
198a7(dkon brtsegs): grags ldan dam pa 'thob/ /'du shes mtshan can mi mnyam sems rgyud kyis/ /sdig pa brgya dag mi mkhas de dag byed/ /'gro ba kun tu sdug bsngal mi chung myong / /de ltar
198b1(dkon brtsegs): mi mkhas mtshan mar brtag pa byas/ /mtshan mar 'du shes pa ni phung po dang / /sangs rgyas byang chub byang chub sems dpa' 'thob/ /de ltar mtshan ma med cing stong mthong na/ /byang chub
198b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhal med bla na med pa 'thob/ /'du shes mtshan ma can la nyon mongs 'phel/ /mtshan ma med pa kun tu sbyor ba spong / /mtshan ma las ni kun sbyor gzhan med de/ /kun tu sbyor ba de
198b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid mtshan med yin/ /gang rnams byang chub 'thob par bya rtog pa/ /rtog pa de nyid mi mkhas par chad yin/ /mkhas pa'i longs spyod rnam par thob byed na/ /longs spyod de nyid
198b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med par 'gyur/ /chos rnams gang yang rang bzhin nyid kyis med/ /rnam par rtogs pas chos 'byung kun kyang stong / /rtog pa med pas mtshan ma med par 'gyur/ /de nyid
198b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub gzhan du mkhas mi smra/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa de dag thos gyur nas/ /mi 'jigs ldan pa'i 'khor ni the tshom bsal/ /dper na tsam pa'i phreng ba 'dzin pa ltar/ /mkhas
198b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams thub pas gsungs la legs zhes 'dzin/ /'jigs pa med pa'i lha tshogs 'di dag gis/ /mchod pa 'phags pa bla na med byas shing / /rgyal ba'i spyod yul chos kyang rnam
198b7(dkon brtsegs): shes nas/ /'gro ba rnam par 'dren pa kun mkhyen 'gyur/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcu dgu pa'o// //de nas tshangs ris kyi lha bye ba phrag
199a1(dkon brtsegs): drug cus lha ma yin rnams nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing
199a2(dkon brtsegs): mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / bsam
199a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan la mi 'dod pa skyes shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'di la ni/ snang ba thob ste/ chos zab mo la bzod
199a4(dkon brtsegs): pa thob par gyur nas de dag gis chos thams cad byas pa yang ma yin/ ma byas pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar shes par gyur to/ /de bzhin du skyes pa yang ma yin/ ma skyes pa
199a5(dkon brtsegs): yang ma yin/ /byung ba yang ma yin/ ma byang ba yang ma yin/ grub pa yang ma yin/ ma grub pa yang ma yin/ 'gag pa yang ma yin/ ma 'gag pa yang ma yin /
199a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa yang ma yin/ rnam par byang ba yang ma yin/ rjes su chags pa yang ma yin/ khong khro ba yang
199a7(dkon brtsegs): ma yin| rmongs pa yang ma yin/ ma rmongs pa yang ma yin/ shes pa po yang ma yin/ shes pa po med pa yang ma yin/ mthong ba po yang ma yin/ mthong ba po med pa
199b1(dkon brtsegs): yang ma yin/ tshor ba po yang ma yin/ tshor ba po med pa yang ma yin/ ston pa po yang ma yin/ ston pa po med pa yang ma yin/ yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin/
199b2(dkon brtsegs): dngos po yod pa yang ma yin/ dngos po med pa yang ma yin/ dmigs pa yang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa yang ma yin/ 'gro ba yang ma yin/ 'ong ba yang ma yin/ song
199b3(dkon brtsegs): ba yang ma yin/ ma song ba yang ma yin/ stong pa yang ma yin/ mi stong pa yang ma yin/ mtshan ma yod pa yang ma yin/ mtshan ma med pa yang ma yin/ smon pa yod pa

199b6(dkon brtsegs): shes can yang ma yin/ bya ba med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin /

200a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ 'khor
200a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ 'khor ba med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin te/ de ltar thams cad kyi thams cad du rtog pa med pa'i blo can nam mkha' bzhin du dag
200b1(dkon brtsegs): cing gos pa med par gyur nas de rnams dag pa dang gos pa med pa'i phyir de'i tshe de dag zhi bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ zhi la zhi ba'i
200b2(dkon brtsegs): thugs mnga' zhi ba spyad cing zhi ba'i pha rol byon/ /zhi ba bsten par mdzad cing 'gro la zhi ba ston pa rjes su ston/ /zhi ba'i spyod yul dgyes shing byang chub zhi la dri bral 'khrug ma mchis//
200b3(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis 'chi med zhi ba 'gro rgyud thams cad zad pa myur du brnyes/ /zhi ba thob par bgyid pa'i zhi ba'i lam mchog zhi ba yang dag bsten/ /yan lag brgyad pas nyon mongs klong rnams
200b4(dkon brtsegs): zhi mdzad 'gro ba thams cad bton/ /sngon gyi rgyal bas bsten pa'i byang chub gzhal yas zhi ba de la 'god/ /de ston sangs rgyas 'phags pas bsten pa'i grong khyer zhi bar deng
200b5(dkon brtsegs): zhes gsung / /'dren pa de ltar 'gro ba 'di la rgyal bas bsten pa'i bslab pa bstan/ /gal te bslab pa de slob 'gro ba 'di dag byang chub gzhal yas 'thob/ /bslab nas zhi
200b6(dkon brtsegs): zhing yid zhi zhi ba'i lam dong dbang po zhi ba dag / 'jig rten mkhas pa 'gro ba zhi byed mthu chen zhi ba shes par 'gyur/ /'dren pa khyod kyi sras mchog zhi ba 'gro ba zhi bgyid gang
200b7(dkon brtsegs): dag gis/ /'chi med zhi ba mtshan ma thams cad zad pa rnam par rtogs gyur pa/ /de dag 'dren pa tshul la mchod pa'i mchod pa mchog gis mchod par 'gyur/ /nyon mongs zhi zhing
201a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma kun spangs zhi ba rtag tu ston par 'gyur/ /'gro ba thams cad zhi zhing mtshan ma bral ba de nyid mya ngan 'das/ /thub pa gang dag zhi las
201a2(dkon brtsegs): zhi 'dod sems pa de dag nyon mongs 'gyur/ /rgyal ba khyod kyi byang chub dang ni 'gro kun chos kun bsam mi khyab/ /thub pa blo ldan 'dam las rgal ba de la bdag cag dogs
201a3(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis/ /gang dag phung po bor te byang chub zhi tshol de la zhi bar rtogs/ /phung pos 'jigs pa de dag shAkya thub pa'i bstan la dga' ma lags/ /dben pa'i blo gros ldan
201a4(dkon brtsegs): pa zhi tshol de dag blo 'khrugs gyur pa ste/ /chos kyi mtshan ma spyod yul 'di dag byis pa zhes ni ston pas gsungs/ /thams cad mkhyen pas zhi dang mtshan ma'i 'ching ba
201a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag rab tu gsungs/ /thub pa gang dag phung po rnams la rnam pa kun tu mtshan mi rnyed/ /de dag shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa mdzes byed gang dag mtshan med dga'/ /de
201a6(dkon brtsegs): dag byang chub skyon bral zhi ba mkhas pa'i spyod yul thob par 'gyur/ /bdud kyi rtsod las rgyal nas nyon mongs zhi ba thams cad mkhyen pa thob/ /rnam 'dren zhi ba mdzad la
201a7(dkon brtsegs): bstod pas bdag cag bsod nams gang rnyed pa/ /chags med thugs mnga' bde bar gshegs pas 'di tsam zhes ni mkhyen gyur pa/ /des ni 'gro ba thams cad lam
201b1(dkon brtsegs): mchog thams cad mkhyen pas bsten gyur pa/ /zhi byed zhi ba bsten nas mkhas pa mchod pa'i rang byung sdig med shog /de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas tshangs pa rnams dang
201b2(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod par rig nas bdag nyid kyis tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ mi dbang
201b3(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad ni/ /log par rmongs byed chang pa stong 'dra zhing / /ston gyi sprin 'dra mig 'khrul 'dra bar mkhyen/ /rgyal bas 'dod pa'i yon tan med par mkhyen//
201b4(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar mi zhig rmi lam bkres gyur pas/ /kha zas ro brgya zos kyang ma 'grangs pa/ /de la bkres med zas med sems can med/ /rmi lam de 'drar chos rnams thams cad gzigs//
201b5(dkon brtsegs): skom pa'i mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na/ /chu bsil dang zhing rnyog med 'thungs gyur kyang / /ngoms med tsha ba zhi bar mi 'gyur te/ /de bzhin khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad gzigs//
201b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di la byed med tshor med sems can med/ /byas pa de bzhin med cing rnam smin med/ /'bras bu myong bar 'gyur pa de med ces/ /'di 'dra'i chos mkhyen the tshom yong mi mnga'/ /
201b7(dkon brtsegs): mi zhig yid du 'ong ba'i tshig smra na/ /dga' bar 'gyur yang tshig la 'pho ba med/ /tshig nyid med cing dgar 'gyur dngos med kyang / /de mkhyen de la the tshom yong mi mnga'/ /
202a1(dkon brtsegs): pi wang sgra snyan mnyan na rnar snyan te/ /sgra de rang bzhin gang yang yod ma yin/ /de ltar mkhas pas phung po 'di gzigs na/ /phung po'i rang bzhin gang yang
202a2(dkon brtsegs): dmigs mi mnga'/ /nor bu rin chen rang bzhin gsal dag pa/ /gos gyi drung bzhag sna tshogs tshon du 'gyur/ /de ltar rang bzhin yongs dag chos rnams kyang / /log pa'i rnam
202a3(dkon brtsegs): par rtog pas de ltar 'gyur/ /tsan+dan dri med skyon dang bral ba yang / /rkyen dang sbyar na dri zhim gzhan du 'gyur/ /de ltar rang bzhin yongs dag chos rnams kyang / /so sor rang gis
202a4(dkon brtsegs): brtags pa'i rnam pa bzhin/ /ji ltar mi yi dung gi sgra thos te/ /sgra 'di ga las byung zhes brtags byas kyang / /rang bzhin stong pa'i dngos po de mi dmigs/ /mi dbang khyod kyis
202a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ /ji ltar mi zhig bsod pa'i kha zas la/ /yan lag srog phan ji ltar 'gyur brtags na/ /dngos med yan lag srog kyang de bzhin te/ /drang srong
202a6(dkon brtsegs): chen pos de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ /ji ltar mi zhig nam mkha'i 'ja' mthong na/ /yan lag gzhigs brtags rang bzhin med cing stong / /nam mkha'i 'ja' bzhin khyod
202a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis yan lag stong / /drang srong chen pos de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ /grong khyer mchog kyang yan lag rnam gzhigs na/ /grong khyer rang bzhin de bzhin ming mi dmigs/ /grong
202b1(dkon brtsegs): khyer ji bzhin de ltar yan lag stong / /mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ /skyes bu dga' bar rnga zhig brdungs bgyis na/ /dga' ba skyed kyang sgra yi rang bzhin stong / /ji ltar
202b2(dkon brtsegs): sgra bzhin de ltar yan lag stong / /mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ /skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe/ /sgra ni phyogs su mi 'gro 'byung ba med/ /phyogs su de
202b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin 'gags par mi 'gyur te/ /mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ /skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe/ /thogs pa med cing snyan pa'i rang bzhin te/ /khyod kyi
202b4(dkon brtsegs): yan lag rnga sgra de dang 'dra/ /mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ /skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe/ /sgra de 'jig rten dga' bar rtog pa med/ /ji ltar sgra bzhin
202b5(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis yan lag stong / /mi dbang khyod kyis chos kun de ltar gzigs/ /skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe/ /g.yo ba med cing zhi ba'i dngos kyang med/ /ji ltar rnga bzhin
202b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi yan lag stong / /mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ /skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe/ /sgra de yan lag ma byung rang dbang min/ /ji ltar sgra bzhin
202b7(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi yan lag stong / /mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs ris kyi lha de dag dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa de'i lhag pa'i
203a1(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa thugs su chud cing zhi gnas dang ye shes mthong ba'i bstod pa des de ltar bstod pas/ 'khor de yang dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par gyur par gzigs
203a2(dkon brtsegs): nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad dri med dag mthong
203a3(dkon brtsegs): nas| |lhar bcas mir bcas klu dang gnod sbyin bcas pa'i 'jig rten kun/ /skyob pa'i 'dzum mthong thams cad ldan pa'i 'gro ba the tshom 'tshal/ /bde gshegs zhal
203a4(dkon brtsegs): bzang de la blta zhing thos par dga' ste sdod/ /rgyal ba 'dzum mdzad legs par bka' stsol the tshom dgum du gsol/ /rnam par 'dren pa thub mchog kun mkhyen sangs
203a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'dren pa rnams/ /rgyu ma mchis par 'jig rten don byed 'dzum mdzad ma mthong na/ /bde gshegs khyod kyis gang slad 'dzum mdzad the tshom rgyu de gsungs/ /rgyal ba
203a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum mdzad rgyu thos 'gro ba rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /'khor 'di the tshom 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te khyod la sems/ /bde gshegs thub pa'i gsung mchog the tshom
203a7(dkon brtsegs): gcod pa nyan 'tshal na/ /rnam 'dren thub pa 'dzum mdzad rgyu de de dag rnams la gsungs/ /thos nas 'gro ba dga' zhing the tshom ma mchis 'phel bar 'gyur/ /
203b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'di snying po ldan zhing rnyog med sangs rgyas yon tan 'tshal/ /ston pa khyod kyi zhal mdzes zla ba mdzes pa 'dra la blta/ /'dren pa chags med rdzogs pa tshangs pa 'dra ba'i
203b2(dkon brtsegs): gsung bsgrag gsol/ /de thos 'khor rnams the tshom chad cing chos la gnas par 'gyur/ /khyod kyi tshangs pa'i gsung mchog don ldan 'jig rten 'das rig nas/ /skye bo dga'
203b3(dkon brtsegs): zhing mgu ba'i yid ldan thams cad mkhyen pas tshim/ /de dag dogs bsal sbyangs pa'i yid kyis thams cad mkhyen du sgrub/ /brtson 'grus stobs chen bskyed nas 'dun pa stobs
203b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan rtsom par bgyid/ /de lta lags pas 'jig rten 'dren pa phan mdzad gsung bsgrag gsol/ /rkang gnyis dam pa'i gsung mchog mi g.yo thos nas de yis ni/ /dge ba thob
203b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'khor 'di thams cad mkhyen du sems 'gyur bar/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba 'gro ba kun la phan pa lags par dgongs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la
203b6(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul nga yis phan ched 'dzum pa 'gro ba kun la gang bstan pa/ /rtse gcig yid kyis snyan cing bsngags pa mdzes pa de ni mnyan par byos/ /
203b7(dkon brtsegs): de thos 'gro ba yon tan bsags pa myur du 'jig rten don byed pa/ /phan dang ldan pa'i bya ba sangs rgyas bka' stsal de la brtson 'grus rtsom/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor 'di dag dga'
204a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing chos rnams la ni the tshom med/ /bskal pa khrag khrig gang+gA'i bye ma snyed du dge ba legs par spyad/ /kun tu rnam par dge la ma chags yid
204a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur 'du shes mkha' 'dra ste/ /de ltar gyur kyang bde gshegs byang chub rdzogs par 'tshang rgya sems ma bskyed/ /'di dag ma 'ongs dus na bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag gzhal
204a3(dkon brtsegs): yas pa| |gang+gA'i bye ma snyed na rdul bsal thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs la gnas/ /de dag phyi nas bde bar gshegs pa tshe ldan sangs rgyas 'dren che ba/ /sred pa sel cing
204a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba stong par ston pa'i bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur/ /skyob pa de dag ji ltar spyod pa sku tshe'i tshad kyang de ltar 'gyur/ /bde gshegs mtha' yas grags ldan 'jig rten
204a5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal 'grel cing gnas par 'gyur/ /de dag rnams kyi sangs rgyas zhing ni zhing gi 'byor pa gzhal yas te/ /'dren pa chen po rnams kyis bskal pa khrag khrig rnam pa du
204a6(dkon brtsegs): mar ni| |sangs rgyas mtha' yas rnams kyis gsungs kyang de dag bkod pa zas mi nus/ /de tshe de dag ye shes stobs ldan zhes bya'i rgyal bar mthun par 'gyur/ /g.yo ba med
204a7(dkon brtsegs): cing sems med mi gnas chos ni 'gro la ston par 'gyur/ /de dag zhing mchog rnams su skyob pa'i thams cad mkhyen lam ma sbyangs pa'i/ /sems can gcig kyang mi 'byung
204b1(dkon brtsegs): srid pa de la phal cher mya ngan 'da'/ /de dag na ni de tshe 'gro ba de dag sdug bsngal gcig shes te/ /mi rtag 'du byed sdug bsngal rab tu 'jigs pa sems can yid 'byung ba'o/ /
204b2(dkon brtsegs): de na 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang ni sdug bsngal sdug bsngal yod mi 'gyur/ /de dag thams cad blo mthun 'gyur zhing sla yi lam la myur bar 'gyur/ /de na mi rnams dag gi sgra
204b3(dkon brtsegs): skad rang bzhin gzhan ni 'byung mi 'gyur/ /mi sdug mi rtag de bzhin nyid dang sdug bsngal de bzhin bdag med dang / /zhi ba stong nyid mtshan med 'chi med mya ngan 'das dang byang chub zhi/ /sgra
204b4(dkon brtsegs): skad de dag yang dang yang 'byung de dag rna la gnas par 'gyur/ /sgra gang thos nas de dag 'khor ba grol gnas thob par mi 'gyur ba/ /de 'dra'i sgra de shing ngam rtsig pa dag dang
204b5(dkon brtsegs): gang na'ang yod mi 'gyur/ /bla gab med dang mkha' dang gtsug lag khang dang gnas dang gnas khang rnams na med/ /de tshe sangs rgyas mthu yis yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i
204b6(dkon brtsegs): sgra dbyangs 'byung / /de tshe 'dren pa'i nyes pa med cing 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang dang / /gti mug dag gis gzir ba rnams kyi rnar ni dge ba'i sgra grag 'gyur/ /'gro ba thams
204b7(dkon brtsegs): cad 'khor ba las ni 'byung zhing mya ngan 'das 'gror 'gyur/ /de tshe zhing mchog stong pa thams cad dga' ba'i skye bos gang bar 'gyur/ /skyes bu dam pa de dag bskal ba khrag khrig byang
205a1(dkon brtsegs): chub brtson byas nas/ /drang srong chen po de dag smon lam gyis ni 'byor pa 'di brtsams te/ /zhing mchog de na sems can tshogs gang yod pa de
205a2(dkon brtsegs): kun bde gshegs 'gyur/ /tshangs pa'i smon lam yangs pa rgya cher zhi ba 'gro bas mthong gyur na/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas bka' stsal bzhin du tshangs pa'i tshogs kyis
205a3(dkon brtsegs): bsten gyur pa/ /de la bslab nas 'gro ba thams cad thogs pa med pa'i 'dren par 'gyur/ /de dag rgyal ba thob nas 'gro ba 'di kun dngos po med ces ston/ /de lta bas na
205a4(dkon brtsegs): tshul kun 'jug la mkhas pa'i spyod pa bsten par gyis/ /tshangs pa lung bsten pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu pa'o// //de nas 'od gsal gyi lha bye ba phrag lnga bcu
205a5(dkon brtsegs): rtsa brgyad kyis lha ma yin rnams nas tshangs pa'i bar gyi lha dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga'
205a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal
205a7(dkon brtsegs): mo sbyar ba btud nas bco ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpas tshul la 'jug pa'i slad du gang la bslab pas chos thams
205b1(dkon brtsegs): cad snang bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ des chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa rtogs par bgyid do/ /de rtogs pas bsam gyis
205b2(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab pa'i spobs pa dang / thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa dang / byin gyis brlabs pa'i spobs pa dang / sna tshogs kyi spobs pa dang / 'jam pa'i spobs pa dang / dge ba'i

205b4(dkon brtsegs): pa can du 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di la byang chub
205b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa'i slad du rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa thams cad yid la mi bgyid de/ de 'di snyam du chos
205b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni/ rnam par rtog pa med de/ rnam par rtog pa yongs su chad pa'o/ /gang rnam par mi rtog pa de ni/ thams cad du song ba ste/ chos gang yang rnam par rtog par
205b7(dkon brtsegs): nus pa ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de la ji ltar rnam par rtog par 'gyur zhes chos thams cad
206a1(dkon brtsegs): la rnam par mi rtog par a la 'jug pa'i spobs pa rab tu thob cing / /de dag a'i sgo la zhugs pas spobs pa mtha' yas par 'gyur te/ a zhes
206a2(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba ni/ mtha' yas pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ ma bgyis pa/ mngon par 'dus ma bgyis pa/ yongs su ma grub pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa/ mi gnas pa/ mi g.yo
