207a5(dkon brtsegs): chos gang ma skyes pa de dag ni/ rtogs par bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o/ /chos gang ma byung ba de dag ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs
207a6(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi'o/ /chos gang ma grub pa de dag ni/ ma grub pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o/ /chos gang ma 'gags pa de dag ni/ 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis
207a7(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos gang mngon par 'du ma bgyis pa de dag ni/ 'dus ma bgyis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyis te/ de ni/ chos
207b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi tshul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos gang ma skyes pa de dag gi tha snyad ji ltar rtogs par bgyi zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rmi lam na bya ba sna tshogs 'byung ba de bzhin
207b2(dkon brtsegs): du chos thams cad blta bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ rmi lam gyi bya ba ni/ ma skyes pa/ ma byung ba/ dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ 'on kyang de dag la
207b3(dkon brtsegs): gdags par gsungs so/ /de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi byed pa yang 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ brag ca la tha snyad mchis pa bzhin du
207b4(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad kyi tha snyad kyang blta bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la gdags pa ma mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi gdags
207b5(dkon brtsegs): par blta'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ smig rgyu la chab tu gdags pa'i tha snyad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad blta bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan
207b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me long gi dkyil 'khor la bud med kyi gzugs sam/ skyes pa'i gzugs kyi tha snyad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad blta bar bgyi
207b7(dkon brtsegs): ste| bcom ldan 'das/ byis pa rnams dga' bar bgyi ba'i slad du rmi lam gyi bya ba tha snyad du bgyi yi/ rmi lam gyi bya ba de dag ni/ ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin
208a1(dkon brtsegs): du byis pa dga' bar bgyi ba'i slad du mig yor dang / smig rgyu dang / brag ca'i bya ba dag kyang tha snyad du bgyi ste/ brag ca la bya ba ma mchis so/ /
208a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni/ chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi
208a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de skad ces gsol nas 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bde gshegs
208a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis tshul gcig mkhyen te 'on kyang gzhan dang gzhan du gsungs/ /thub pa 'jig rten mkhas pa'i sras rnams rnam par rol pa'ang de bzhin no/ /de la 'jig rten
208a5(dkon brtsegs): blo med bdag tu lta ba rnams kyis khong mi chud/ /bdag gi don de phyogs bcur ma mchis bdag nyid kyis ni 'gro ba stong / /sgyu ma gsog dang smig rgyu chu ma mchis la chab
208a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'du shes can/ /byis pa de dag blo log de bzhin 'khrul te bdag tu sbyor ba bgyid/ /de dag yang dag ma 'tshal mi mkhas gnas min dngos la brten kyang 'tshal/ /de
208a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin byis pa'i skye bo smig rgyu 'dra ba'i phung po yong ma 'tshal/ /'khor bar dga' bas zug rngus zug cing sdug bsngal de yis dbang po 'das/ /gang la mi mkhas nges par sdug
208b1(dkon brtsegs): bsngal myong ba de la dngos ma mchis/ /blo stor yid nor sdug bsngal rnams la bde bar 'du shes nor pa la/ /nyon mongs 'jigs pa che dang dug gsum rnams kyang rjes su 'gro
208b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'brang / /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dug chen nyon mongs mtshungs med rjes su 'brang / /blo stor de dag sdug bsngal gang gis sdug bsngal gyur ba'i sdug bsngal ba/ /de rnams
208b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag rjes 'brang byis pa mi mkhas gnod pa khur yang khyer/ /de dag rgyal ba'i tshul sgo thar par bgyid pa stong pa 'di thos nas/ /skyes bu ngan pa blo zhan de dag bstan dag bde ba
208b4(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis 'jigs/ /bde gshegs khyod kyis a yi yi ge tshul chen sgo gcig de ltar bstan/ /de la yang dag blo can sa las shing skye bzhin du yid bskyed cing / /bdud rnams bye
208b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dpung dang bcas btul byang chub zhi ba mngon 'tshang rgya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i grur bcas skye bo nyon mongs rgya mtsho che las sgrol/ /bde bar gshegs pa cang mkhyen nges pa
208b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni tshul gyi dam pa des/ /myur du nyon mongs dug bsal byang chub dpag yas zhi ba thob 'gyur zhing / /grol nas dug med gyur pa skye bo gzhan mthong nges pa'i mkhyen brnyes
208b7(dkon brtsegs): nas| |pha rol myur phyin dug med bde zhing gdug pa thams cad 'joms par mdzad/ /bde gshegs thams cad stong yang bdag tu rtog rnams tshul dang tshul min rtog /'gro ba
209a1(dkon brtsegs): kun gyi nang nas mkhas pa tshul dang tshul min bslab pa dag / grol nas 'gro ba kun la chags med yid kyis ngo bo nyid kyi chos/ /de yi tshul
209a2(dkon brtsegs): mthong tshul la mkhas pa de dag mthu chen mgon por 'gyur/ /'ching dang bcings pa med cing bde bar gshegs pa chos rnams chos nyid med/ /de bzhin nyid dang ma nor
209a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid zhi mi dga' nyon mi mongs/ /nyon mongs mtshan ma med cing zhi byed med la nyon mongs rnams kyang med/ /gang gis tshul chen dam pa 'di mthong de dag thams
209a4(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen du 'gyur/ /grol zhing 'grol mdzad zhi ba'i chos can zhi mdzad ngo mtshar 'gyur mi mnga'/ /bcom ldan 'das lhar bcas 'jig rten dpyid kyi smig rgyu bzhin du 'khrul
209a5(dkon brtsegs): ba de| |kun rtogs bdag nyid zil gnon bdag dang gzhan med skyes pa bud med rtog / 'gro ba sdug bsngal de na sna tshogs kyis bskyed sems kyis sems kyang ni/ /las dang
209a6(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu med cing de myong gang gyur de yang med/ /bde gshegs de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul tshul ni bdag cag 'tshal/ /des na de ltar bde gshegs zhi thugs
209a7(dkon brtsegs): dbang po zhi zhing nges pa ste/ /dge ba'i blo mnga' dgra gtsang dri med chos kyis rab tu mchod par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'phags pa'i gtso bo bstod pas bsod nams
209b1(dkon brtsegs): gang byung ba/ /ji snyed dpal stug rkang gnyis gtso bo rnam smin yongs su mkhyen gyur pa'i/ /bdag cag dge rtsa de yis 'gro ba 'di kun kun mkhyen nyid thob shog /bsod nams 'di
209b2(dkon brtsegs): kun 'gro ba kun gyi don bsngo kun kyang rgyal bar shog / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gsal gyi lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang / /tshul gyi rjes su
209b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang thugs su chud la/ 'khor de dag gis kyang khyad par thob par 'gyur bar mkhyen nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan
209b4(dkon brtsegs): pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'jig rten don mdzad rnam par 'dren mchog kun mkhyen thams cad zil gnon pa/ /bde gshegs
209b5(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje ldan rnams rgyu ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na/ /rgyal ba dpal stug rkang gnyis mchog gis 'jig rten thugs brtses bka' stsal gsol/ /'jig rten 'das
209b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod ci slad 'dzum mdzad de rgyu bdag cag rnams la gsungs/ /gtso bo de thos 'gro ba 'di dag yid ni rab tu dang 'gyur zhing / /rnam par 'dren pa nges 'byung las dang 'bras bu gzhan
209b7(dkon brtsegs): yang bgyid par 'gyur/ /des ni lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'khor bar sdug bsngal nyam thag 'di/ /'phags lam yan lag brgyad bstan srid pa'i rgya mtsho 'di las sgrol
210a1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ /drang srong chen po'i gsung mchog yan lag brgyad ldan bzang po 'di thos nas/ 'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas nyid 'tshal dge la
210a2(dkon brtsegs): brtson zhing dga' bar 'gyur/ /the tshom bral gyur rnam dag yid kyis brtson 'grus drag po'i stobs bskyed cing / /bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa bzhin bgyid khyod dang mthun
210a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung sras su 'gyur/ /'khor rnams 'di dag rten pa gzhan ma mchis par khyod kyi zhal du lta/ /'gro ba'i rtsa lag rtog pa yid gnyis bsal zhing lung bstan bka' stsal
210a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol| |bcom ldan 'jig rten 'di dag khyod kyi zham ring gnas shing nyan par 'tshal/ /gsung rab legs brjod bdud rtsi'i char phob gang dag skom pa 'tshal bar
210a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur| |'dren pa chen po khyod kyi 'khor 'di dag cing sangs rgyas yon tan 'tshal/ /ring du song ba'i ma la bu lta bzhin du khyod kyi zhal du lta/ /bde gshegs lha rnams
210a6(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan bka' stsal bzhad pa'i don kyang bstan du gsol/ /skyob pa'i gsung mchog thos na 'jig rten don chen shin tu thob par 'gyur/ /thub pa de ring su zhig dge ba
210a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phel cing grags pa don du gnyer/ /su zhig 'dren pa'i yon tan gter rnyed 'gyur pa bdag cag de nyan 'tshal/ /rgyal ba'i 'khor rnams khyod kyis gsungs pa de dag thos
210b1(dkon brtsegs): shing dag gyur nas/ /tshul 'di ston cing ting 'dzin stobs ldan shes rab la yang sgom par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad
210b2(dkon brtsegs): de slar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul khyod kyi spobs pa legs par dus ldan skyes pa shin tu legs/ /bde gshegs rnam par sprul bzhin de ltar khyod kyi blo gros 'byung 'gyur zhing / /
210b3(dkon brtsegs): spobs ba che 'byung de phyir gang dang gang dag khyod kyis dris gyur pa/ /de dag lung bstan ngas bshad kun kyang dbang po zhi bas mnyan par gyis/ /'od gsal ba yi lha rnams blo dag
210b4(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi rgyal ba mthong ba ste/ /'jig rten mgon med yid can dag mthong byang chub yang dag zhugs/ /byang chub nges 'byung lam mchog yang dag rgyal bas spyad pa spyod/ /byang
210b5(dkon brtsegs): chub 'gro 'dod gang tshe ston med lam stor rnams la ston par 'gyur/ /tshul gyi dam pa shin tu gsal sgra thun mong ma yin 'di thos nas/ /sangs rgyas yon tan don gnyer blo
210b6(dkon brtsegs): sbyangs de dag byang chub zhi thob 'gyur/ /de dag stobs skyes tshul dang tshul min mkhas shing byang chub yid nges gyur/ /bu skyes ma bzhin dga' bas byang chub mchog tu de dag smon
210b7(dkon brtsegs): lam btab/ /'od gsal lha rnams 'di dag byang chub 'dod la tshul gyi sgo bstan te/ /bskal pa khrag khrig brjod du med par phra ba'i tshul 'di bstan byas nas/ /sems can skar
211a1(dkon brtsegs): ma'i grangs pas ches mang ba dag byang chub dga' byas te/ /de yi 'og tu 'jig rten mkhas pa rang byung skyon bral kun mkhyen 'gyur/ /de dag zhing
211a2(dkon brtsegs): mchog brjod du med pa zhing rnams bye ba brgya bgrangs par/ /yangs shing shin tu dga' la mtha' dag bkod pa rnams kyis brgyan pa ste/ /kun gyi zhing du ngan song rnams dang de
211a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin mi khom yong mi 'byung / /bde bar gshegs rnams thugs brtses sems can thams cad rang byung mdzad par 'gyur/ /zhing rnams de dag gang na'ang nyan thos theg pa
211a4(dkon brtsegs): ston par mi 'gyur te/ /sems can thams cad rang byung nyid du mngon phyogs 'phrog pa med par 'gyur/ /de na rang byung sangs rgyas nyid ston mdzad pa 'jig rten mkhas rnams
211a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi| |sku tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bye ba brgya grangs gang+gA'i bye snyed 'gyur/ /rta thul 'jig rten khrag khrig khams kyi nyan thos mya ngan bzlas pa bas/ /gang yang skyes pa'am bud med
211a6(dkon brtsegs): gcig cig byang chub yang dag dga' byas na/ /bsod nams de la snga mas grangs sam dper yang bya bar mi nus so/ /de bas byang chub zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa byang chub dga'
211a7(dkon brtsegs): bar gyis/ /rta thul 'di la 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'byung ba rnyed sla min/ /de ni u dum wa ra'i me tog 'dra zhes sangs rgyas mtha' yas blo mnga' gsungs/ /de phyir bla
211b1(dkon brtsegs): na med pa'i zhi bde byang chub mi gang 'dod pa yis/ /shin tu blo phra bsten bzang mkhyen pa tshul mkhas 'dren la brten par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi zhal nas don byed gsungs dge
211b2(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra thos gyur nas/ /'khor rnams thams cad yi rang mchog tu dga' zhing yang dag dga' bar gyur/ /khrag khrig lha rnams nam mkhar 'khod nas gos kyi g.yab mo 'dor
211b3(dkon brtsegs): bar byed/ /dga' nas sangs rgyas dbang phyug khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes sgra yang phyung / /zhi ba thugs zhi skye bo nyon mongs rgod pas rgod gyur zhi bar mdzod/ /bdud rtsi ston cing
211b4(dkon brtsegs): dug gsum zhi mdzad sems can dug ni skyug tu gsol/ /khyod kyi ye shes thos nas skye rgu'i dug med 'gyur zhing dgra med 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal rnams kyi 'dren las tshul thos
211b5(dkon brtsegs): mi zad srid pa'i rgyud las 'grol/ /'od gsal ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu gcig pa'o// //bam po brgyad pa/ de nas dge rgyas kyi ris kyi lha khrag
211b6(dkon brtsegs): khrig phrag bcu gnyis kyis lha ma yin rnams nas 'od gsal ba'i lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab
211b7(dkon brtsegs): tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / /yid bde ba skyes nas bdag cag tshul phun sum tshogs par gyur pa yang brjod cing / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
212a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin mchis te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob pas byang chub sems dpa' sems
212a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po dmigs pa'i dngos po thams cad la bde ba'i tshor ba sha stag myong bar 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi myong la/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags/ bde ba
212a3(dkon brtsegs): yang ma lags pa yang mi myong ste/ sems can dmyal ba'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang / mi'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis
212a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang / lag pa bcad dam/ rkang pa bcad dam/ rkang lag bcad dam/ rna ba'am/ sna'am/ rna ba dang / sna gtubs kyang bde
212a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / sba lcag gis bzhus sam/ spa lcag phyed tshal lam/ lcag gis bzhus kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par
212a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / btson rar bcug gam/ lcags sgrog dang / shing sgrog tu bcug gam/ btson chad ma po la rgyas btab bam/ byis pa'i gtsug phud ltar bcings sam/
212a7(dkon brtsegs): dugs kyi snod ltar gdugs sam/ bu ram shing brdung ba ltar brdungs sam/ 'dam bu bcom pa ltar bcom mam/ 'bru mar gyi mar me ltar 'bar bar byas sam/ mar
212b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi mar me dang / zho bskol ba ltar 'bar bar byas kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / me'i nang du bor ram/ seng+ge'i khar bstabs sam/ stag gi khar
212b2(dkon brtsegs): bstabs sam/ skam ril bya ba ltar dril tam/ byi ba'i chad pa lta bus bcad dam/ nyes pa byung ba bsgrags pa ltar bsgrags sam/ kaR+sha pa Ni tsam du gtubs sam/ 'bras phye
212b3(dkon brtsegs): btso ba ltar btsos sam/ glang po che rnams kyis bcom yang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / mig phyung ngam/ gsal shing gi rtse mo la bzhag gam/ bsad
212b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas su khrid de rnam pa thams cad du mgo gcod kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ bde ba yang ma lags mi bde ba yang ma lags pa'i 'du shes rnam
212b5(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad du mi 'byung ngo / /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yun ring po nas spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe smon lam 'di ltar btab ste /
212b6(dkon brtsegs): gang gis bdag la kha zas byin pa de dag nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig /gang gis bdag la sgom blud pa de dag dang / gang gis bdag la rim gro byas pa dang / bkur
212b7(dkon brtsegs): stir byas pa dang / bsti stang du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa de dag thams cad kyang nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig /gang yang bdag la gshe ba dang / mi bde bar
213a1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / brdeg pa dang / mtshon gyis 'debs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du srog gcod pa'i bar du byed pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub
213a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi bde ba thob cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig / ces smon lam btab ste/ de yid la bya ba de dag dang ldan
213a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing / de lta bu'i las dang / de lta bu'i smon lam dang ldan pas sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i bde ba'i 'du shes la brten cing bsnyen la sgom zhing mang du byed
213a4(dkon brtsegs): de| de las de'i rnam par smin pas chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob bo/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro
213a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur pa de'i tshe bdud kyi las thams cad kyis mi 'phrog cing mi 'khrugs par 'gyur te/ de'i tshe 'di ltar tshe la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang /
213a6(dkon brtsegs): las la dbang ba dang / rnam par rtog pa la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba ste/ dbang lnga thob par rig par bgyi'o/ /de 'tshal na/ tshe brjes ma thag tu byang chub
213a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de 'tshal na/ bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gnas so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
213b1(dkon brtsegs): de theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs shing byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'dzin pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad rab tu bsal ba dang / 'gro
213b2(dkon brtsegs): ba drug po kun tu skyes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad la bslab pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan
213b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bdud kyi las las rnam par rgyal ba dang / chos thams cad khong du chud par rig par bgyi ba'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang gis byang chub sems dpa' chos
213b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la nges pa'i rtogs pa thob par 'gyur ba thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o/ /de nas dge rgyas ris kyi lha rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin 'di brjod nas de'i tshe
213b5(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ dge rgyas lha tshogs 'di dag thams cad chos la mthar thug gyur pa ste/ /ston pa dbang po zhi zhing zhi ba
213b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen la mgo bos skyabs su mchi/ /de dag mkhas pas mchod pa'i sangs rgyas don mkhyen 'khor ba brgal gyur pa/ /thub pa mi yi 'dren pa tshul mkhas rgyal ba 'dren pa 'dren la
213b7(dkon brtsegs): bstod| |'di na rang bzhin nges pa'i thub chos gnas pa gang na'ang ma mchis te/ /sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma ji bzhin khyod kyis thub pa legs par mkhyen/ /yan lag sna tshogs sgra
214a1(dkon brtsegs): brnyan ri khrid 'byung ba mkhas pas rtogs pa ltar/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i drang srong khyod kyis lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten gzigs/ /'di ni
214a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can srog dang shed bu gso ba gang zag ma mchis te/ /mi mchog khyod kyis 'du shes rnam par bshag cing stong par rnam bzhag la/ /rkang gnyis dam pa sems can
214a3(dkon brtsegs): gtso bo byams pa gzhal yas sgom pa'ang mdzad/ /rgyal ba sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'di ni 'gro ba kun gyis rtogs par dka'/ /byams pa dge sgom sems can dmigs pa
214a4(dkon brtsegs): yin zhes 'dren pas bka' stsal la/ /sems can rnam par bshig cing 'gro ba thams cad sems can med par mkhyen/ /de ltar rkang gnyis dam pa rnyog pa mi mnga'
214a5(dkon brtsegs): the tshom bral thugs ldan/ /des na bde gshegs pa rnam brtags blo mnga' mchod 'os khyod la mchod par 'tshal/ /bde bar gshegs pa sdug bsngal phyogs bcur gnas pa kun tu mi dmigs
214a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang / /lha yi lhar gyur khyod kyis sems can rnams la snying rje bgyi bar gsungs/ /de ltar rgyal mchog bdag cag rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ji bzhin kun tu 'tshal/ /des na
214a7(dkon brtsegs): rkang gnyis gtso bo mi mchog mchod 'os khyod la mchod par 'tshal/ /thub pa khyod kyis sems can dang ni bsal bgyi sdug bsngal mi gzigs la/ /dgyes pa skyes
214b1(dkon brtsegs): nas rab tu dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mi dgyes rnam par bsal/ /de ltar sangs rgyas tshul ni bsam gyis mi khyab tshul 'di ji bzhin 'tshal/ /des na mi mchog khyod la mchod
214b2(dkon brtsegs): nas brnyes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi/ /skyon bral khyod kyis 'gro ba kun tu sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das ma dmigs/ /'on kyang 'khor bar sems can gzigs shing don
214b3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad stobs dang ldan pa bskyed/ /sems can sdug bsngal 'gro dang thub dang mya ngan 'das dang gnas ma mchis/ /sangs rgyas tshul 'di rtogs nas thub pa mchod 'od khyod la
214b4(dkon brtsegs): mchod par 'tshal/ /'dren pa tshad med bzhi po gzigs shing de yang gnyis su med par bstan/ /gang zhig der rdul ma gzigs gang yang tshad med gnas pa de ma gzigs/ /
214b5(dkon brtsegs): thub pas bag med gang yang ma gzigs bag yod mi yang ma gzigs te/ /sangs rgyas tshul 'di 'tshal nas thub pa ston pa khyod la mchod par bgyis/ /thub pa sku ni rnam par
214b6(dkon brtsegs): spangs pas sku btsal mdzad na ma brnyes kyang / /de ltar 'dren pa dran pa ma gsung ma lags bsnyel ba yong mi mnga'/ /bde bar gshegs pas lus la song ba'i sgom pa
214b7(dkon brtsegs): sgom par gyis zhes gsungs/ /sangs rgyas tshul 'di ni gnas bde bar gshegs pa skyob la mchod pa bgyis/ /'dren pas tshor ba'i rang bzhin btsal ba mdzad na brnyes par ma
215a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur la| |tshor ba tshor bar bgyid pa'ang thub pas yongs su btsal na ma brnyes te/ /de ltar gang zhig dran sgom de ni sangs rgyas kyis kyang yong ma
215a2(dkon brtsegs): gzigs/ /sangs rgyas tshul 'di 'tshal nas ston pa la ni bdag cag mchod pa bgyis/ /thub pas sems dang sems las byung ba dgongs te btsal na ma rnyed la/ /gang gi
215a3(dkon brtsegs): nye bar bzhag pa de yang dran pa med par rab mkhyen kyang / /thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis sems 'dus dran pa sgom par gyis zhes gsungs/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i dgongs
215a4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di 'tshal nas ni ston la mchod par bgyis/ /'jig rten phan par bzhed pas chos dang chos la gang spyod de ma gzigs/ /sgom par gang gsungs dran pa de yang
215a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di na rang bzhin ma mchis la/ /thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis chos 'dus dran pa sgom par gyis zhes gsungs/ /sangs rgyas tshul bzhi po 'di rab tu 'tshal nas skyob la
215a6(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa bgyis/ /gnas gcig mchis pa ma lags gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi lta ga la mchis/ /gang gi gnas su brjod pa'i dran pa de yang gang na'ang ma mchis
215a7(dkon brtsegs): te| |de bas gang gi bde ba'am sdug bsngal yang dag gang na'ang de ma mchis/ /ston pa'i tshul 'di 'tshal nas des na bdag cag khyod la mchod pa 'tshal/ /ston pa'i tshul
215b1(dkon brtsegs): mchog bzhi po 'di rnams dge slong gang dag 'dzin bgyis na/ /'di dag thar pa nyid kyi lam ste 'khor ba las ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de ltar de ni tshul 'dir ma bcings ma
215b2(dkon brtsegs): grol byang chub 'dren pa min/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis btags pa ma bshig des na khyod la mchod par 'tshal/ /thar mdzad slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis lam zhi rdzu 'phrul
215b3(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa gsungs/ /'di dag bsgoms na mi rnams dbang po dul zhing mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ /yang dag tu ni rdzu 'phrul dang ni rkang pa sgom pa mi dmigs te/ /chad par mi 'gyur
215b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'ang ston cing byed pa po yang mi dmigs la/ /thams cad mkhyen gyi bstan 'dir lha tshogs the tshom gang na'ang ma mchis te/ /de dag de na nem nur ma mchis de bzhin som
215b5(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma mchis 'gyur/ /'di na mchod pa bzang po mchog ces mchod 'os sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/ /des na bde gshegs dpe med spyod mnga' mchod 'os khyod la
215b6(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa 'tshal/ /thar par mdzad slad 'jig rten mkhas pas nges 'byung dbang po lnga yang gsungs/ /rtag tu bag yod byos la mya ngan 'das 'gro'i lam 'di sgoms zhes
215b7(dkon brtsegs): bstan| |thub pa dbang po dang ni sgom pa po dang thar pa'ang mi dmigs te/ /'di la lha 'khor the tshom ma mchis de slad khyod la mchod pa 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya
216a1(dkon brtsegs): ngan 'das par 'gro ba'i drang lam stobs lnga po/ /de dag nyon mongs zad bgyid thar par bgyid ces ston pa thub pas gsungs/ /de dag rang bzhin
216a2(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis nyon mongs ma mchis rgyal ba ma mchis te/ /thub pa bdag cag gang la'ang the tshom ma mchis de slad khyod la mchod/ /byang chub yan lag bdun po 'di dag dge
216a3(dkon brtsegs): ba lam gyi dam pa ste/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya ngan 'das 'gro'i drang lam mchog ces thub pas gsungs/ /'ching ba mchis pa ma lags grol ba ma mchis bcings
216a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang ma mchis te/ /sems can dkon mchog 'di la bdag cag the tshom ma mchis khyod la mchod/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis bzhi phrag gnyis lam sems can
216a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams la bstan/ /brtson 'grus ldan par 'phags lam sdug bsngal mthar mar 'byin pa sgoms zhes gsungs/ /mi mchog lam dang de bzhin nyon mongs 'di
216a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis g.yo ba ma mchis te/ /'di la lha tshogs the tshom ma mchis gyur pas mchod 'os khyod la mchod/ /'dod chags gnyen por zhi gnas bka' stsal zhe sdang
216a7(dkon brtsegs): gnyen por byams pa gsungs/ /gti mug gnyen por lhag mthong thub pa mchog gis sems can rnams la bstan/ /'di dag thams cad g.yo ba ma mchis skad cig dag
216b1(dkon brtsegs): min nyon mongs min/ /'di la lha tshogs the tshom ma mchis thub pa mchod slad rtag tu brtson/ /sdug bsngal zhi bya phyir ni zhi gnas lhag mthong lam yang sgoms zhes gsungs//
216b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan gang gis 'gro ba nyon mongs bag chags bcas dri de dag zhi/ /thub pa zhi gnas lhag mthong de bzhin dri ma thams cad stong pa ste/ /'di la lha tshogs gang du'ang
216b3(dkon brtsegs): the tshom ma mchis skyon bral khyod la mchod/ /stobs bcu sems can rnams la dge ba bcu yi las lam bstan mdzad de/ /gsod dang 'khrig dang ma byin phra ma rdzun dang zhe
216b4(dkon brtsegs): gcod kyal tshig dang / /gnod sems dang ni mi rigs 'dod dang de bzhin log par rtog pa rnams/ /mi dge'i las lam 'di yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can rnams la
216b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan| |sems can mi dmigs gsod pa ga la mchis te lhag ma de dang 'dra/ /gnyen po dge ba ma mchis de ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/ /bde gshegs thub pa zag pa mi
216b6(dkon brtsegs): mnga' rnams kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong / /rnam 'dren the tshom som nyi ma mchis de slad khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas sras po dge ba'i blo can gang zhig spyod pa 'di bstan
216b7(dkon brtsegs): pa| |mkhas pa kun tu dge ba nyid myong sdug bsngal myong bar yong mi 'gyur/ /bcom ldan bde gshegs ye shes des ni tshul 'di bde bar thob par bgyis/ /'di la lha tshogs
217a1(dkon brtsegs): the tshom ma mchis mchod 'os khyod la mchod par 'tshal/ /de ltar dge rgyas kyis lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas cang
217a2(dkon brtsegs): mi zer bar 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge rgyas kyi lha rnams cang mi zer bar 'khod pa yang mkhyen/ de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pas bsgrubs pa yang thugs su chud nas 'dzum
217a3(dkon brtsegs): pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol ba/ skye bo 'di kun bcom ldan khyod kyi mkhyen pa'i zil gyis zil mnan
217a4(dkon brtsegs): nas| |bde gshegs rgyal ba mchog khyod kyis ni 'dzum pa mdzad 'di 'jig rten bstan/ /rgyu ma mchis par chos kun mkhas pa rnams ni 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ /'dzum
217a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyu don gnyer mi mig med rnams la 'jig rten mkhas pas bka' stsal gsol/ /ma lus 'di dag thams cad gzhan du mi sems khyod 'dzum re zhing 'khod/ /dpal
217a6(dkon brtsegs): stug khyod la bstod pa bgyid cing nyan pa 'tshal ba'i yid kyis gnas/ /sangs rgyas gsung gi dbang phyug thos nas yid ni rab tu rangs gyur te/ /chos rnams kun la
217a7(dkon brtsegs): nges pa'i blo dge ldan pa'i ston par skye bar 'gyur/ /bde gshegs mi mchog dge ba'i thugs can de ring su zhig blo gros bskyed/ /de ring gang gis 'chi med zhi ba rtogs
217b1(dkon brtsegs): shing phyogs rnams snang bar bgyis/ /su zhig 'jig rten thugs brtse rgyal ba 'dren pa dpag tu med 'gyur ba/ /de dag bka' stsol drang srong 'khor 'di legs par gsungs pas
217b2(dkon brtsegs): tshim par mdzod/ /rgyal ba khyu mchog dge sbyong dam pa deng su btsun la dad pa skyes/ /bdud kyis mi 'phrog blo ldan gang zhig chos la yang dag yongs su gnas/ /sangs rgyas sras
217b3(dkon brtsegs): po tshul mkhas gang zhig de ring nges pa thob par 'gyur/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag bka' stsol 'gro 'di the tshom ma mchis mdzod/ /bde gshegs deng su 'gro la dad bskyed skye rgu
217b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams la byams gyur cing / /byang chub mthar phyin blo gros brtan zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas/ /gang la 'dzum pa deng bstan bde gshegs bstan pa 'dzin pa de
217b5(dkon brtsegs): gang lags/ /bsod nams brgya yi mtshan mnga' de dag bka' stsol bdag gi the tshom khum/ /'dren pa khyod gsung yan lag brgyad ldan legs par bka' stsal thos gyur na/ /
217b6(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs gsung gis thog mar bdag cag 'dong zhing 'gro ba gzhan yang 'dren/ /de ltar gyur na bde gshegs bstan rab 'di ni sras la gnas par 'gyur/ /'jig rten
217b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag yid ni myur du bde gshegs rnams la gnas par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ nga yi 'jig
218a1(dkon brtsegs): rten don byed 'dzum mdzad rta thul khyod kyis mthong gyur cing / /skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis dus su dris te 'gro ba'i don byas pa/ /khyod kyi bsod nams
218a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phel ba brjod du med de de ni zad mi 'gyur/ /de ni khyod la bstan gyi khyod dang 'gro ba 'di dag dga' bas nyon/ /dge rgyas lha tshogs 'di dag nga yi chos nyid la ni the tshom med//
218a3(dkon brtsegs): kun kyang yi rang rab zhi yid kyis tshigs bcad dag gis nga la bsngags/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong grangs mchod 'os mchod byas te/ /the tshom med pa'i yid kyis
218a4(dkon brtsegs): tshul dris kun tu som nyi med par gyur/ /de ltar sngon gyi rgyu des 'dir yang tshigs su bcad pas nga la bstod/ /bskal pa bzang po'i rgyal ba bstod 'os kun la'ang 'di dag
218a5(dkon brtsegs): bstod par 'gyur/ /'di dag bskal pa ut+pal la la rgyal ba dgra rgyal mthu chen 'gyur/ /'di dag sems can khrag khrig bsam yas yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar byed/ /sangs
218a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas drang srong chen po de dag yid 'ong mtshan du gang 'gyur ba/ /de yang bstan gyi dang ba'i yid kyis sems kyi tha ba spangs te nyon/ /rgyal ba de kun chos kyi tog ces bya ba'i 'dren pa
218a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhal yas 'gyur/ /'di dag re res kyang ni khrag khrig bsam yas mya ngan zlo bar 'gyur/ /de yi tshe na bde gshegs kun gyi ring bsrel shin tu rgyas 'gyur te/ /de tshe zhing rnams
218b1(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rgyal ba'i mchod rten me tog rgyas par 'gyur/ /thub pa grags chen de dag yongs su mya ngan 'das par gyur pa na/ thub pa skyob pa de dag kun gyi ring bsrel rgyas pas don
218b2(dkon brtsegs): chen 'gyur/ /sems can khrag khrig bsam yas rnams kyis de'i tshe ring bsrel mchod byas te/ /ring bsrel de dag mchod nas mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba 'chi med 'thob/ /thub
218b3(dkon brtsegs): pa rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag grags pa rgyun chad mi 'gyur te/ /slob pa khrag khrig bsam yas rnams kyang de tshe rgyal ba'i drung du 'du/ /ji ltar bye ba brgya grangs nga la legs par
218b4(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa byas nas su/ /byams pa blta phyir rgya chen yid kyis byams pa'i 'khor du 'dong 'gyur ba/ /de ltar rgyal ba'i nyan thos slob tshogs de dag rgyal nas rgyal 'khor du/ /rkang
218b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis gtso bo de dag kun gyi ring bsrel mchod pa bya phyir 'dong / /bde gshegs gsung snyan 'gro ba thams cad ngo mtshar gyur pa des thos shing / /dge rgyas ris kyi lha yi
218b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid chen po de tshe thos gyur nas/ /'khor rnams thams cad rab tu dga' ste phal cher byang chub sems kyang bskyed/ /bdag nyid chen po de tshe shes nas thub pa'i zhabs
218b7(dkon brtsegs): la mgo bos rab tu gtugs/ /dge rgyas ris lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de nas de'i tshe 'bras bu che ba'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus lha
219a1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin rnams nas dge rgyas kyi lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing
219a2(dkon brtsegs): mgu ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas tshul gcig la zhugs pa dang / chos re re las kyang chos kyi sgo mtha' yas pa 'byung bar yang dag par mthong zhing tshul la 'jug pa
219a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad las kyang mtha' yas pa'i spobs pa dang / mi chod pa'i spobs pa dang / rig pa'i spobs pa dang / grol ba'i spobs pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa
219a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / nye ba'i spobs pa dang / phra ba'i spobs pa dang / zab pa'i spobs pa dang / sna tshogs kyi spobs pa dang / 'jam pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dag kyang
219a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar shes nas bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba skyes te chos nyid brjod cing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sgo'i tshul mtha'
219a6(dkon brtsegs): yas pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin mchis te/ de la brtson par bgyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa thob cing mi chod pa'i spobs pa thob par
219a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / dmigs pa dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la rmongs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /de la dmigs pa gang yang gzugs lags par ma 'tshal ba'i
219b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul gyis sgrib par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ni/ phung po la 'jug pas kyang sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur/ khams la 'jug pa dang / skye mched la 'jug pa
219b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / dbang po la 'jug pa dang / bden pa la 'jug pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa dang / sems can la 'jug pa dang / sems can ma mchis pa la
219b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa dang / dngos po la 'jug pa dang / dngos po ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / dmigs pa la 'jug pa dang / dmigs pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / bdag la
219b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa dang / stong pa la 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma la 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / smon pa la 'jug pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa
219b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / gnas pa la 'jug pa dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / 'dus byas la 'jug pa dang / 'dus ma byas la 'jug pas kyang sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa'i
219b6(dkon brtsegs): gzungs thob par 'gyur te/ thams cad la thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de ni/ phung po la 'jug pas kyang 'di lta ste/ phung po zhes bya ba'i chos
219b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni| yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /zhes gzungs rab tu thob bo/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzugs ni/ gang yang yongs su grub pa ma mchis te/ sa ni/ sar yongs su ma grub/ de bzhin
220a1(dkon brtsegs): du chu dang / me dang / rlung ni/ rlung du yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sa ni/ rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang la yang rang bzhin ma
220a2(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa de ni/ yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /chu dang / me dang / rlung ni/ rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang la yang rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni/ yongs su ma grub
220a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'o| |de ltar yongs su ma grub pa'i gzugs ni/ 'das pa zhes gdags par mi bgyi/ ma 'ongs pa zhes gdags par mi bgyi/ da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par mi
220a4(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o| |de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o/ /gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de
220a5(dkon brtsegs): la 'gag pa ma mchis te/ gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni/ gdags su ma mchis pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pas kyang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar
220a6(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i gzugs gang ci yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad gcig du bsdus nas gzugs kyi phung po'o/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni/ dmigs su ma
220a7(dkon brtsegs): mchis na/ 'das par lta ga la 'gyur/ /ma 'ongs bar lta ga la 'gyur/ da ltar byung bar yang lta ga la 'gyur te/ de bas na/ gzugs kyi phung po ni/ dmigs su
220b1(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnams kyang de bzhin te/ de'i slad du phung po rnams ni/ dmigs su ma mchis so/ /
220b2(dkon brtsegs): phung po dmigs su ma mchis pas/ gzungs dmigs su ma mchis te/ de ltar phung po la 'jug pas gzungs la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs de yang ming tsam dang / tha
220b3(dkon brtsegs): snyad tsam dang / brda tsam dang / kun rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam dang / gdags pa tsam ma gtogs par gzungs la 'jug pa mi dmigs te/ 'di la phung po yang mi dmigs
220b4(dkon brtsegs): gzungs kyang mi dmigs/ 'jug pa yang mi dmigs/ gzungs kyang rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang 'di phung po zhes bgyi ba de ni/ ma bgyis pa'i
220b5(dkon brtsegs): chos te| chos gang yang ma bgyis pa de la spungs pa yang ga la mchis te/ phung po ni/ spungs pa'i slad du phung po zhes bgyi'o/ /dper na/ khyim dang / khang bzang dang / bsil
220b6(dkon brtsegs): khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / skar khung khol ma dang / ba gam dang / dra ba dang / stegs bu dang / kha khyer dang / skar khung dang / rta babs dang / ra ba dang / shing thags
220b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'obs dang / chos mang po bsags pa la grong khyer zhes bgyi ba bzhin du phung po zhes bgyi ba'ang de bzhin te/ gzugs de yang ngo bo nyid kyis mi dmigs na/ de la spungs
221a1(dkon brtsegs): pa lta ga la mchis/ spungs pa ma mchis pas na/ gzugs kyang ma mchis/ gzugs kyi phung po yang ma mchis so/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
221a2(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin gyis dmigs su ma mchis na/ de la spungs pa lta ga la mchis te/ spungs pa ma mchis pa'i slad
221a3(dkon brtsegs): du rnam par shes pa yang ma mchis/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po yang ma mchis so/ /de ltar phung po la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur/ gzungs thob pas spobs
221a4(dkon brtsegs): pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de la skye mched la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur ba ni/ mig gi skye mched ces bgyi ba ni/ ci'i skye mched ces bgyi na/ sdug bsngal gyi
221a5(dkon brtsegs): skye mched do/ /de la mig gang zhe na/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ba ste/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang ba'o/ /de la sa'i
221a6(dkon brtsegs): khams dang ba ni/ rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang gis rang bzhin mi dmigs pa de ni/ yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /de bzhin du chu'i khams dang ba dang / me'i khams
221a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ba dang / rlung gi khams dang ba ni/ rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang gi rang bzhin mi dmigs pa de ni/ yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /de ltar yongs su ma grub pa'i
221b1(dkon brtsegs): mig gi skye mched de ni/ 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na /
221b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar mig gi skye mched ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o/ /gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis pa
221b3(dkon brtsegs): ste| gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni/ gdags su ma mchis pa'o// /de ltar mig kyang ma skyes ma 'gags/ skye mched dang sdug bsngal yang ma skyes ma 'gags
221b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'o| |gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni/ ming tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang / brda tsam dang / kun rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam ma gtogs par gdags su ma mchis pa ste/
221b5(dkon brtsegs): ming de yang ming gis ma mchis pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos gang la mig ce'am/ skye mched ce'am/ sdug bsngal zhes gdags par bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang
221b6(dkon brtsegs): dmigs su ma mchis te/ ming yang ming du brjod du ma mchis so/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya
221b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos rnams kyang de bzhin te/ de'i slad du skye mched la 'jug pas gzungs thob/ gzungs la 'jug pas spobs pa thob bo/ /de la khams la 'jug pas gzungs thob
222a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ni| mig ni/ mig gis ma mchis pa/ khams ni/ khams kyis ma mchis pa ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mig ni/ mig gi rang bzhin dang bral
222a2(dkon brtsegs): ba| khams ni/ khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'i slad du ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'o/ /gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de
222a3(dkon brtsegs): ni| yongs su ma grub pa'o/ /gang yongs su ma grub pa de la ni/ skye ba ma mchis so/ /gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis so/ /gang ma skyes ma 'gag pa de ni/
222a4(dkon brtsegs): ming tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang / brda tsam dang / kun rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam ma gtogs par 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang /

222a6(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa de ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'o/ /gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni/ yongs su ma grub pa ste/ yongs su ma grub pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o/ /gang la

223a1(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos de mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos

223b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor te/ de ltar na/ khams la 'jug pas gzungs thob/ /gzungs la

228b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ dmigs su ma mchis pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa/ rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa/ rjes
229a1(dkon brtsegs): su chags pa ma mchis pa/ khong khro ba ma mchis pa ste/ chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ chos thams cad
229a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'o/ /de'i slad du chos thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar na/ chos gang dang gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs
229a3(dkon brtsegs): pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dang de dag gis chos thams cad ma mchis te/ de'i slad du chos thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la
229a4(dkon brtsegs): zhig 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /zhes mchi na/ de dag
229a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni/ lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ gnyis su ma mchis pa ste/ byang chub kyang gnyis su ma
229a6(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa lags pas gnyis su ma mchis pas ni/ gnyis su ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du gang la la zhig
229a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to/ /zhes mchi na/ de dag thams cad ni/ lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/ /de ci'i slad
229b1(dkon brtsegs): du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ bzlog pa'am bskor bar mdzad pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas sems can
229b2(dkon brtsegs): tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las bzlas so/ /zhes mchi na/ de dag thams cad ni/ lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos
229b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni/ sems can ma mchis pa ste/ de la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa gang yang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs
229b4(dkon brtsegs): pas sems can tshad med pa'i don mdzad do/ /zhes mchi na/ de dag thams cad ni/ lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin
229b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni chos gang la yang phan pa'am gnod pa'i rnam par nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs
229b6(dkon brtsegs): pas tshe'i 'du byed bor ro/ /zhes mchi na/ de dag thams cad ni/ lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi dbyings ni/
229b7(dkon brtsegs): ci'ang 'dor ba'am/ len pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
230a1(dkon brtsegs): dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /zhes mchi na/ de dag thams cad ni/ lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe
230a2(dkon brtsegs): na/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi dbyings ni/ 'khor ba'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig 'di lta bu'i
230a3(dkon brtsegs): chos la nges par gyur na/ de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi dbyings la ni/ 'gyur
230a4(dkon brtsegs): ba ma mchis kyang gda'i/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur mi
230a5(dkon brtsegs): gda'o|| ||bam po dgu pa/ de nas 'bras bu che ba'i lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos nyid la nges pa 'gro ba brjod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
230a6(dkon brtsegs): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang de'i tshe bcom
230a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bde gshegs mthu chen 'dren pa tshul dang tshul min mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba kun la thugs
230b1(dkon brtsegs): brtse thub pa yang dag ji bzhin ston mdzad pa/ /'dren pa tshul mkhas khyod kyis tshul ni yang dag nyid du yang dag bstan/ /mtha' yas yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes mngon
230b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'phags la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /khyod kyis byang chub nges par 'byung ba'i drang lam gcig pu bgrod pa bstan/ /khyod kyis byang chub dam pa gzhal yas zhi ba shis pa mi
230b3(dkon brtsegs): g.yo brnyes/ /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyam thag 'grol mdzad pa/ /mtha' yas yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes mngon par 'phags la mgos phyag
230b4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal| |phung po rnams ni ngo bo nyid stong shin tu phung po rnams dang bral/ /byis pa rmongs byed rnams ni rab tu bral bar khyod kyis yongs su brtags/ /shes pa mi ldan skye bo phal
230b5(dkon brtsegs): chen 'dir bcings rnyong la spre 'u thogs pa bzhin/ /grol ba mkhas pa rnams ni mkha' la rlung bzhin chags pa med par 'dong / /khams rnams khams kyi rnam pa kun tu stong
230b6(dkon brtsegs): par thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs/ /dper na brag ca rnam pa kun tu shin tu sgra dang bral ba 'dra/ /des ni mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ji bzhin mi shes mang po bcings/ /grol
230b7(dkon brtsegs): ba mkhas pa yang dag rtogs pa rnams ni khams gsum chags ma mchis/ /skye mched ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu stong zhes thams cad mkhyen pas bstan/ /yang dag ma lags rdzun
231a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing byis pa bslu ba chad pa stong ba 'dra/ /mi mkhas skye bo chos la gcig tu ma nges mang po de la chags/ /dper na 'gron po rgya mtsho chen por
231a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khyams pa bzhin du 'khor bar lhung / /'dren pa dbang po 'di dag dbang po nyid kyis shin tu stong pa ste/ /thub pa me long nang gi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor lta bur shin tu
231a3(dkon brtsegs): stong / /mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ma 'tshal mang po dag ni de la chags/ /bya dang mtsho yi nya dang srog chags dag ni rgya la thogs pa bzhin/ /sems can sems can
231a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid stong sems can bral zhing ngo bo nyid kyis stong / /thub pa sems can ri mo mkhan gyis gzugs bris bzhin du ma mchis na/ /mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ji bzhin
231a5(dkon brtsegs): ma 'tshal mang po de la chags/ /mkhas pa yang dag rtogs rnams sgo nga'i sbubs nas byung ba'i bya bzhin grol/ /rten 'byung chos rnams de dag skad cig pa ste stong
231a6(dkon brtsegs): zhing dmigs ma mchis/ /rmi lam dga' ba bzhin du gzung du ma mchis byis pa rmongs bgyid pa/ /mi shes rtog pa'i slad du des kyang mi mkhas skye bo mang po bcings/ /
231a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa yang dag rab tu rtogs rnams gzeb nas thar pa'i bya bzhin grol/ /thub pas chos nyid bsam yas ji bzhin chos rnams thams cad bsam mi khyab/ /thub pa
231b1(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba mya ngan 'das pa ji bzhin chos kun mtshan nyid bral/ /thub pa khams gsum mi chags bzhin du chos kun gnas pa ma mchis te/ /de slad tshul gcig 'di 'tshal gyur na 'gro
231b2(dkon brtsegs): kun bde bar gshegs par 'gyur/ /thub pa bdag dang gzhan du mi mkhyen lta bur chos kun g.yo ba med/ /thub pa'i ye shes rgyal ba'i bstan pa ji bzhin chos kun bsam mi khyab/ /
231b3(dkon brtsegs): thub pa byis pa'i spyod yul ma lags ji bzhin chos kun brtags ma lags/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul 'di ni rab gsal de bzhin shes par gyis/ /mi mkhas gang
231b4(dkon brtsegs): dag rgyal bas byang chub gzhal yas brnyes zhes smras pa dang / /gang dag rgyal bas 'khor lo dam pa gzhal yas mchog bskor smra ba dang / /gang dag bde gshegs skyob pas
231b5(dkon brtsegs): srog chags khrag khrig mya ngan 'das smra ba/ /de dag thams cad yang dag ma 'tshal lta ba thibs pos yongs su dkris/ /gang dag bde bar gshegs pas tshe yi 'du byed btang
231b6(dkon brtsegs): bzung smra ba dang / /gang dag stobs bcu 'gro ba'i don mdzad yongs su mya ngan 'das smra ba/ /de dag thams cad lta bar song la yid chags bdud kyi lag tu mchis/ /chos kyis
231b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid ma 'tshal te 'dren pas mkhyen bzhin 'tshal bar bgyi/ /gang dag tshul dang tshul min 'di la mkhas pa de dag 'dren pa 'tshal/ /de dag rkang gnyis gtso bos dpal
232a1(dkon brtsegs): stug 'jig rten thugs brtse rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin nyid 'di 'gyur ba'i dbang dang ldan te de nyid chos nyid lags/ /de ltar 'di 'tshal
232a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas tshul la mkhas pa mi yi mchog tu 'gyur/ /de ltar 'bras bu che ba'i lha tshogs chos rnams nges par rtogs gyur pa/ /ston pa'i spyan sngar brjod de lhag pa'i bsam
232a3(dkon brtsegs): pa de yang bstan byas nas/ /kha cig yi rang dogs med yid kyis sangs rgyas nyid du bdag mthong nas/ /'dren sras de dag tshul 'di nyid kyis bdag gis bdag lung
232a4(dkon brtsegs): bstan par gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bras bu che ba'i lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / chos rnams nges par rtogs pa thugs su chud nas
232a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ dpal
232a6(dkon brtsegs): stug 'dren pa rnams ni rgyu zhig gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad lags te/ /rgyu med mi mdzad bka' stsal bdag gis bde gshegs mngon sum de skad thos/ /'di ltar
232a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa khyod kyis zhi ba bde ba bsil ba'i 'dzum mdzad na/ /rgyal ba lha mi lha min bla ma 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de gsungs/ /de ring 'di ltar 'dren pa khyod kyis zhal nas 'dzum
232b1(dkon brtsegs): mdzad bsil mthong nas/ /'gro ba 'di kun the tshom 'tshal te bde gshegs khyod kyi zhal du blta/ /mi mchog thugs rje ldan pa khyod kyis 'dzum rgyu de ni myur du gsungs/ /de
232b2(dkon brtsegs): thos gyur nas rgyal mchog 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis 'gyur/ /'dren pa dam pa lha tshogs gang dag rang gis rang la lung bstan pa/ /de dag su zhig gang gis ci thob
232b3(dkon brtsegs): mtha' bcas rnam par 'phrul ba gsungs/ /mi mchog tshangs pa'i gsungs dbyangs bsgrags te the tshom kun tu bsal du gsol/ /de thos rgyal ba'i 'khor 'di rab tu
232b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' zhing mchog tu mgu ba 'thob/ /bde gshegs rgyal mtshan mthon po de dag thams cad gzhan du mi sems par/ /'dren pa'i sras rnams byang chub gzhal yas zhi
232b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dam pa sems shing mchis/ /thub pa 'dren mchog the tshom 'tshal ba de dag rnams kyi the tshom khum/ /des ni ye shes stobs ldan tshul dang tshul min mkhas kun rgyal
232b6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo'i yan lag brgyad ldan gsung thos gyur nas rab dga' ste/ /bde gshegs bstan pa bzhin du bgyid cing gsungs pa'i rjes 'jug mkhas
232b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /de dag don gyi dbang la brten nas bde gshegs 'dren pa bka' stsal gsol/ /des ni yid rangs gyur te 'gro ba chos kyi mtha' mar phyin par 'gyur/ /'dren pa
233a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po lha de dag gi sngon gyi spyod pa thos gyur cing / /rgyal ba'i gsung thos gyur nas brnag pa yongs rdzogs zhi zhing rab dga' ste/ /tshul la
233a2(dkon brtsegs): zhugs shing tshul la mkhas rnams myur du thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur/ /'gro ba rab tu 'grol mdzad ji bzhin yang dag ston par mdzad par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan
233a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ lha tshogs rnams kyi ched du nga yis 'dzum pa 'jig rten bstan mdzad pa/ /rta thul khyod
233a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis dus dang tshod shes nga la dris pa shin tu legs/ /gang phyir nga yis 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di yi tshul dang rgyu/ /de khyod bstan gyi khyod dang 'gro brtse gcig yid kyis
233a5(dkon brtsegs): nyon| |thams cad mkhyen pa rnams ni rgyu yi 'bras bu rnam pa gsum gzigs shing / /rgyu la gzigs nas rkang gnyis dam pa dpal stug rnams ni 'dzum pa mdzad/ /kha
233a6(dkon brtsegs): cig blo zhan bdag cag nyan thos 'gyur zhes mya ngan 'das zhugs dang / /kha cig kha rog 'dug la dga' zhing rang rgyal byang chub 'dod zhugs dang / /kha cig bdag cag
233a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'dren pa mthu bo cher ni 'gyur byas te/ /skye bo sdug bsngal lhung ba 'grol zhes zhugs pa'i bsam pa mkhyen gyur nas/ /'dzum pa chung mdzad gang byung nyan thos
233b1(dkon brtsegs): don du mdzad par shes par bya/ /'dzum pa 'bring mdzad gang byung rang rgyal don du mdzad par rig par bya/ /'dzum mchog ngas gang mdzad pa 'di ni 'dren pa'i don du shes
233b2(dkon brtsegs): par bya| |rab 'bring tha ma rnam pa 'di gsum 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyur gsungs te/ /kha cig thar pa don gnyer lam gsum zhugs pa'i 'jig rten 'di mkhyen nas/ /des na
233b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mkhas pa rnam par 'dren pa dam pa 'dzum pa mdzad/ /rta thul de la nyan thos don du 'dzum mdzad zhal du nub par 'gyur/ /rang rgyal don du 'dzum pa gang mdzad sku
233b4(dkon brtsegs): yi dbus su nub par 'gyur/ /'dren pa stobs bcu'i don du 'dzum pa mdzad pa gtsug tu nub par 'gyur/ /de ltar rta thul khyod kyis 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni rnam gsum shes par gyis/ /
233b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba mchog rnams don du gang 'dzum de kun nga yi gtsug tu nub/ /sdig pa gzhom pa'i tshul du de ltar 'dzum pa ngas bstan shes par gyis/ /'dren pa rnams kyi 'dzum pa
233b6(dkon brtsegs): gang yin de rgyu rnam gsum yang bshad kyi/ /kun kyang rtse gcig yid byos de ni nga las legs par nyan par gyis/ /dang po'i don du 'dren pa 'dzum pa ngas mdzad myur du
233b7(dkon brtsegs): thog mar nub/ /'bring gi don ni dus tshod cung zad bsdad cing phyi nas nub par 'gyur/ /blo mchog ldan phyir 'dzum pa rgyal ba ngas mdzad shin tu ring du gnas/ /rta thul nyan thos
234a1(dkon brtsegs): don du gang gnas 'dzum de theg pa'i dbang gis mdzad/ /gzhan yang 'dzum rgyu rnam gsum bshad kyi rta thul khyod kyis nyan par gyis/ /gang dag rgyal
234a2(dkon brtsegs): ba drang po stobs bcu po la bskor ba byed pa ni/ /de dag nga la skyen par bskor nas myur du shin tu mkhas par 'gyur/ /'bring don phyir ni srab cing che la dal gyis bskor ba byed
234a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /dal gyis g.yas phyogs bskor ba byas nas rgya cher 'gyur zhing mnan par 'gyur/ /gang dag gser rgyan la dkar steng bzhag 'dra ba'i bde gshegs mthong
234a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur na| |de ni rkang gnyis dam pa thub pa'i sku kun khyab par gnas par 'gyur/ /thams cad mkhyen pas 'dzum bstan 'di ni zhing gi dbang du shes par bya/ /gang tshe gdugs
234a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dra mtha' yas mig ldan pas ni 'dren de 'gebs pa dang / /gang tshe me tog 'dra la 'dren pa'i steng gi mkha' la lding ba dang / /gang tshe sgo mo 'dra zhing bde bar gshegs
234a6(dkon brtsegs): la lan gsum bskor byed pa/ /de ni 'jig rten 'das pa tshe yi dbang du 'dzum mdzad shes par bya/ /bde gshegs rgyal ba rnams kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu ni rnam gsum de
234a7(dkon brtsegs): tsam bstan/ /rta thul khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu rnam gsum po de dag shes par gyis/ /des na 'jig rten don bstan bzhed nas 'jig rten rnam 'dren 'dzum pa mdzad/ /de thos gyur
234b1(dkon brtsegs): nas thams cad mkhyen gyi stan la the tshom med par gyis/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha tshogs bye ba brgyad cu tham pa 'di dag ni/ /zhing rnams dag tu chos tshul shin tu rgya chen smra ba'i
234b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bar 'gyur/ /mkhas pa de dag dpag med tshe ldan bskal pa mang por gnas par 'gyur/ /de'i phyir bde bar gshegs pas 'dzum pa rgya chen mchog gi cha 'di bstan/ /de dag
234b3(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi bskal pa sum cu drug gi rgyal ba rnams kyang mthong / /bskal pa sum cu drug tu thams cad mkhyen pa bsnyen bkur spyad pa spyod/ /da dung tshul mkhas 'di dag bskal pa
234b4(dkon brtsegs): grangs med sum cu rtsa drug tu/ /gang zag chen po 'di dag rgyal ba khyu mchog mchod pa byed cing gnas/ /thams cad du yang phun sum tshul rtogs rgyal ba'i mchog la mchod pa
234b5(dkon brtsegs): byed| |rkang gnyis gtso bo mchod de byang chub zhi ba yongs su btsal byas nas/ /de dag de yi 'og tu dpal stug rkang gnyis dam pa skyes bu mchog /'dren pa mthu chen yon tan
234b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan par gser gyi rgyal mtshan bskal la 'byung / /rgyal ba de dag sna tshogs zhing na gnas shing rang rang zhing sbyangs te/ /sems can dam pa de kun nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
234b7(dkon brtsegs): dpal zhes bya/ /de tshe yon tan ldan pa de dag rnams kyi 'dus pa grangs med de/ /de tshe thub pa re re'i nyan thos 'dus par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ /gal te bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu stobs
235a1(dkon brtsegs): bcus nyan thos de bgrangs kyang / /legs mdzad rnams kyi nyan thos 'dus pa dag ni mthar phyin bgrangs mi 'gyur/ /'dus pa de dag thams cad
235a2(dkon brtsegs): grangs med 'dus pa des ni ci 'dra ba/ /de las nyis 'gyur de tshe byang chub tu ni yang dag zhugs par 'gyur/ /de tshe rgyal bar zhugs kyi rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin//
235a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad yongs dag zhing du spyad nas kun kyang rgyal bar 'gyur/ /bde gshegs de dag spyod pa gang yin pa de dag rnams kyi'ang de nyid 'gyur/ /'jig rten mkhas pa
235a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag mya ngan 'das par gyur nas dam pa'i chos/ /de tshe sras kyis bzung zhing bskal pa bye ba brgyad cur gnas par 'gyur/ /de dag 'das nas ston pa'i gsung rab de la byang
235a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems bskyed pa/ /gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bas kyang shin tu mang ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de dag 'das nas ston pa skyob pa rnams kyi gsung rab de la ni/ /nyan thos rgya mtsho kun
235a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi bye snyed dpag yas mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ /de ltar 'jig rten don rnams mdzad pa rang byung de dag thams cad kyi/ /bstan pa gang yin de ni chos dang yongs su legs
235a7(dkon brtsegs): par ldan gyur cing / /yang dag shar bar 'gyur te de ni bstan pa rnams kyi chos nyid yin/ /mi mchog de yi gsung rab de thos 'gro ba ma lus dad gyur nas/ /rkang gnyis dam pa
235b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhal yas 'jig rten don byed bdag cag 'gyur zhes te/ /thams cad dga' nas rgyal ba'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal skye bo rab tu dga'/ /bde bar gshegs la dga' ba gzhal
235b2(dkon brtsegs): yas bskyed nas chos kyis bsnyen bkur byas/ /de lta bas na dga' bar byos la mgo la 'bar bzhin spyad spyod de/ /rtag tu shes rab pha rol phyin dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten
235b3(dkon brtsegs): byos la| |yang dag mthong ba'i spyod pa dge ba 'di la kun tu bsten byos te/ /dge slong khyed cag rkang gnyis gtso bo 'jig rten thugs brtser 'gyur bar gyis/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha
235b4(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis de'i tshe sems can dpag tu med pa byang chub tu yang dag
235b5(dkon brtsegs): par zhugs par rig cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la the tshom med par gyur par rig nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas
235b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis so so nas mngon par bstod do/ /de nas lha'i bu sbyin pa la mos pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis sdug pa'i sras
235b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / /btsun mo dang ni srog phangs btang / /rgyal srid btang ba ci smos te/ /sbyin mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu tshul khrims la mos pas gsol pa/ khyod kyi
236a1(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims rnams sbyangs pa/ /rnam pa kun tu bsnyengs mi mnga'/ /shin tu bslab pas mthar phyin pa/ /khrims mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal//
236a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu bzod pa la mos pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis bzod pa bsten mdzad pas/ /yan lag gtubs pa'ang bzod par mdzad/ /zab mor sgyid lug ma lags te/ /bzod
236a3(dkon brtsegs): mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu brtson 'grus la mos pas gsol pa/ brtson pa ma btang brtson 'grus te/ /stobs chen brtson 'grus ldan gyur pas/ /rdzogs
236a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mchog brnyes pa/ /brtson mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu bsam gtan la mos pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis bsam gtan bsten mdzad pa/ /de
236a5(dkon brtsegs): la 'jig rten gting mi rnyed/ /dus gsum mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ /bsam gtan mthar phyin phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu gzi brjid dang ldan pas gsol pa/ dpa' bos
236a6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab pha rol phyin/ /yang dang yang du bsgoms pas na/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pa/ /shes rab mthar phyin phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu khams kyi blo gros
236a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol pa/ sbyin pa dag dang ngag snyan dang / /don spyad mthun pa'i don dag gis/ /'jig rten 'di dag khyod kyis btul/ /'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i
236b1(dkon brtsegs): bu dge ba'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ byams chen thugs rje chen po dag /yun ring dus nas bsgoms mdzad de/ /sems can dpag yas yongs su bsgral/ /gdos 'dzin khyod la
236b2(dkon brtsegs): phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu dag pa'i sems kyis gsol pa/ nyon mongs med pa'i mthar phyin cing / /thub chen dul ba'i sems mnga' bas/ /ma thul thams cad dul mdzad pa/ /
236b3(dkon brtsegs): kha lo sgyur la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu blo gros dri ma med pas gsol pa/ sems dag mnyen pa'i sems mnga' ba/ /sems dul dbang po zhi mnga' ba/ /sems can kun gyis
236b4(dkon brtsegs): sems mkhyen pa/ /sems mkhyen khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu blo gros rnam par dag pas gsol pa/ shes rab ldan pa'i blo gros can/ /blo gros mchog la rab tu
236b5(dkon brtsegs): zhugs| |thugs gsal phun sum tshogs pa'i blo/ /mi mkhas rtogs mdzad phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu sems rgyan gyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis sems ni rnam par sbyangs/ /sangs
236b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas zhing yang rnam dag mdzad/ /sems can blo yang rnam sbyangs pa/ /kun dag khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu pham pa med pas gsol pa/ dgongs pa pham pa mi mnga' ba/ /khyod
236b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis bdud kyi dpung yang bcom/ /khyod kyis lha tshogs thams cad kyang / /rab tu dga' ba'i yid du bsgyur/ /lha'i bu myur du byed pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis chos rnams myur bar
237a1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen| |sems can myur bar rnam par sbyangs/ /zab cing blta dka'i chos dag la/ /myur du mdzad la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu brtson 'grus brtan
237a2(dkon brtsegs): bas gsol pa/ bral gyur yongs su bral gyur pa/ /chu bo rgal te zag pa spangs/ /pha rol phyin cing thang la bzhugs/ /brtson 'grus brtan la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu spyod
237a3(dkon brtsegs): lam dang ldan pas gsol pa/ 'dod chags spangs shing zhe sdang spangs/ /gti mug spangs pa zag med pa/ /sbyin gnas bsod nams zhing gyur pa/ /'jig rten mchod
237a4(dkon brtsegs): 'os phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu shin tu brtan pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis dam chos shin tu bstan/ /'jig rten gsum du rab tu mchod/ /gcig pu bgrod pas bde ba
237a5(dkon brtsegs): brnyes| |de phyir khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu mi 'khrugs pas gsol pa/ lhun stug gcig tu gyur pa'i ri/ /rlung gis bskyod par mi nus te/ /de bzhin bstod dang smad
237a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yis| |bde gshegs bskyod par mi nus so/ /lha'i bu mnyam pa nyid thob pas gsol pa/ dpa' bo chen po zab cing mnyam/ /mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis can/ /shes rab
237a7(dkon brtsegs): zab mo blo ldan pa/ /rgyal ba mdzes la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu zab pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ sku chen khyod la sku mi mnga'/ /de bzhin nyid la rab tu zhugs/ /yang dag
237b1(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yang rab tu ston/ /khyod mtshungs gang zag yong ma mchis/ /lha'i bu blo gros dang bas gsol pa/ gnyis su med pa yang dag ston/ /dpa' bo dpa' bos rnam par gnon/ /
237b2(dkon brtsegs): gang zag zab la zhum ma mchis/ /de dag khyod chos pha rol phyin/ /lha'i bu rab tu dga' bas gsol pa/ mchog tu dga' yid brtan pa dag /khyod kyi slob la bslab pa'i rnams//
237b3(dkon brtsegs): sprul rnams bags pa rnying 'dor bzhin/ /srid pa gsum po 'di dag 'dor/ /lha'i bu zhi ba'i yid kyis gsol pa/ ji ltar mar me mar zad cing / /snying po zad pas zhi gyur bzhin/ /
237b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi bstan pa myur thos na/ /shes rab chen po mya ngan 'da'/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas la gnas pas gsol pa/ gang gis kun mkhyen khyod mthong ba'i/ /mi rnams 'dod chags bcings
237b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang / /shes rab mtshon gyis mkhas pa dag /'dod chags zhags pa gcod par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas mang gis gsol pa/ zhi ba'i sems mnga' zhi la spyod/ /cho ga spyod
237b6(dkon brtsegs): yul rab tu zhi/ /nyon mongs thams cad zhi gyur pa/ /dgra rnams zhi la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas 'jigs med kyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis zhi gnas bslab pa yi/ /
237b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' grags chen dag /zhi gnas nyid kyis 'byung 'gyur zhing / /sems zhi de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas zas kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams kun
238a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi zhi ba ni/ /dpa' bo khyod kyis rab tu bstan/ /shes rab chen pos de 'tshal na/ /de dag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu rtag tu rnam par
238a2(dkon brtsegs): blta bas gsol pa/ khyod kyis sems can rtag tu gzigs/ /mkhas pa khyod ltar slob pa rnams/ /ye shes mchog gis mnyam bzhag cing / /byang chub mchog kyang thob
238a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu snang 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ shes rab pha rol phyin gyur pa/ /thub chen khyod las gang slob pa/ /de dag 'jig rten snang 'dzin cing / /sgrib pa med par
238a4(dkon brtsegs): gzigs par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu 'od byed kyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten sgron ma khyod kyi gsung / /ye shes rgya mtsho de thos nas/ /de dag dri med bde ba 'thob/ /bsam gyis mi
238a5(dkon brtsegs): khyab 'od kyang 'byung / /lha'i bu dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad rnam mi rtog /thabs la mkhas pas de dag gsungs/ /de 'dra'i ye shes
238a6(dkon brtsegs): ston bgyid pa/ /de dag gang zag mchog tu 'gyur/ /lha'i bu rab tu mi gnas kyis gsol pa/ gnas ma mchis shing blang ma mchis/ /chos rnams thams cad sems ma mchis//
238a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang gzhan gyi rnam 'gyur ba/ /de dag khyod kyis de bzhin mkhyen/ /lha'i bu gnas med blo gros kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad gzhi med par/ /rnam par 'dren
238b1(dkon brtsegs): pa khyod kyis gzigs/ /de dag khyod kyis lugs bzlog ste/ /sems can rnams la bstan pa mdzad/ /lha'i bu mi rten blo gros kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad rten ma
238b2(dkon brtsegs): mchis| |sems can ma mchis phan tshun min/ /lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin/ /yang dag ji bzhin khyod kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu bar snang rgyu bas gsol pa/ bde gshegs
238b3(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis chos kyi rnams/ /bar snang lta bur snang ba ste/ /skye dang 'gog pa med par gzigs/ /de slad 'jig rten chags mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu ngar 'dzin med pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis
238b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba 'di dag kun/ /lus kyi ngo bo nyid kyis ni/ /g.yo ba med cing ngar 'dzin med/ /spyod med rtsol ba med par gzigs/ /lha'i bu blo gros rnam par bsgoms kyis gsol pa/ sgyu
238b5(dkon brtsegs): ma sna tshogs lags bgyis pa/ /sgyu ma'i mkhan pos bstan gyur na/ /de bzhin ma lags de bzhin gda'/ /thub pa de ltar mnyam ma mchis/ /lha'i bu rab tu sad pa'i ngang tshul
238b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis gsol pa/ gzugs brnyan ji ltar me long la/ /gda' yang de ltar ma mchis pa/ /de bzhin chos rnams khyod kyis gzigs/ /de bas 'jig rten rmongs mi mnga'/ /lha'i
238b7(dkon brtsegs): bu yid bzhin rnam par 'jig gis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas chos kyi rnams/ /de bzhin khyod kyis bstan pa mdzad/ /de ltar 'gro ba kun
239a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang mkhyen/ /lha'i bu spobs pa thogs med kyis gsol pa/ chos nyid la ni khor yug tu/ /spobs pa rab tu 'byung 'gyur zhing / /chos nyid de yang
239a2(dkon brtsegs): brnyes pas na/ /de slad khyod ni spobs pa ldan/ /lha'i bu chags med blo gros kyis gsol pa/ khyod yis chos 'di thams cad ni/ /rang bzhin mtshan nyid ma mchis par/ /yang
239a3(dkon brtsegs): dag ji bzhin rab tu mkhyen/ /de bas thub pas rab rib bsal/ /lha'i bu mya ngan bral gyis gsol pa/ mya ngan med cing nyer len med/ /spros pa med cing rnyog pa med/ /chos
239a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kun tu nyon ma mongs/ /de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu rtogs pa phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ chos rnams yang dag ma lags te/ /'gro dang 'ong
239a5(dkon brtsegs): ba ma mchis pa/ /de dag khyod kyis yang dag mkhyen/ /de bzhin rab tu bstan pa mdzad/ /lha'i bu blo gros mchog gis gsol pa/ lhun gyis grub cing blang med pa/ /rmongs pa
239a6(dkon brtsegs): med cing shes pa med/ /chos rnams ci yang mi bgyid pa/ /khyod kyis rang bzhin thugs su chud/ /lha'i bu sgrib med thob kyis gsol pa/ snang ba ma mchis mun ma mchis//
239a7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med ma lags gzugs can min/ /bzung ba ma mchis grol ma mchis/ /khyod kyis rang bzhin thugs su chud/ /lha'i bu mig dpas kyis gsol pa/ yul dang
239b1(dkon brtsegs): phyogs na mi gnas pa/ /yod dang med pa ma lags par/ /rmi lam 'dod pa ji bzhin du/ /de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu mig mi 'dzum gyis gsol pa/ byis
239b2(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyis blo rmongs pa/ /ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa/ /bar na'ang gnas pa ma mchis pa/ /de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pas
239b3(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ gang zag sems can ma mchis pa/ /ma mchis tha snyad ma mchis pa/ /bstan pa'i slad du brjod bgyi ba/ /de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu mtshan
239b4(dkon brtsegs): ma med pa la gnas pas gsol pa/ gang gis tha snyad gdags pa yi/ /mtshan ma de dag ma mchis te/ /chos kun mtshan ma mchis par/ /rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis
239b5(dkon brtsegs): gzigs/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pa la gnas pas gsol pa/ ji ltar mtshan ma stong gyur cing / /smon pa dmigs su ma mchis dang / /su la smon lam mchis gyur pa/ /de yang
239b6(dkon brtsegs): de lta'i tshul du mkhyen/ /lha'i bu ting 'dzin la gzhol bas gsol pa/ rnam thar sgo la brten bgyis shing / /gang zhig dgrol 'gyur de ma mchis/ /de bzhin kun nas nyon
239b7(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa/ /de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu ma smad pas gsol pa/ khyod ni sdig pa kun spangs shing / /bsod nams thams cad bsags gyur te/ /bde gshegs
240a1(dkon brtsegs): khyod la smad mi mnga'/ /su smod de dag mkhas ma lags/ /lha'i bu glog gi sprin gyis gsol pa/ ji ltar glog bcas sprin gyi tshogs/ /char gyis sa
240a2(dkon brtsegs): chen ngoms par bgyid/ /de bzhin 'dren pas chos char gyis/ /'jig rten rnams ni ngoms par mdzad/ /lha'i bu bsam pa don yod kyis gsol pa/ thub mchog gsung ni don
240a3(dkon brtsegs): mchis te/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /shin tu brtags te mdzad pas na/ /de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan/ /lha'i bu blo gros phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ chos
240a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams thams cad dngos nyid kyis/ /ma skyes 'gags pa ma lags te/ /de dag bde gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen/ /gzhan yang de bzhin rtogs par mdzad/ /lha'i bu seng+ge nga ros
240a5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ khyod kyis stong pa nyid bstan te/ /seng+ge'i nga ro bsgrags mdzad pas/ /mu stegs can kun rab 'jigs pa/ /seng+ges ri dwags phra mo bzhin/ /lha'i bu bag yod las
240a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol pa/ bag yod sngon du btang mdzad de/ /khyod kyis spyod pa spyad bgyis pas/ /sangs rgyas chos la 'dren pa khyod/ /bag yod pas ni nges par byung / /lha'i bu bag
240a7(dkon brtsegs): yod rab gnas kyis gsol pa/ bag yod pa la rab gnas te/ /khyod kyis nyid kyi chos kyang spel/ /stobs bcu gzhal yas sangs rgyas chos/ /bsam gyis mi khyab rab tu
240b1(dkon brtsegs): spel| |lha'i bu bag yod skyes kyis gsol pa/ bag yod pa la brtson rnams ni/ /byang chub phyogs rnams yang dag skyes/ /thub chen rang yang grol gyur nas/ /de dag rnams ni
240b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'grel/ /lha'i bu bag yod nges par 'byung gis gsol pa/ byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dag /ji snyed thar la brten pa'i rnams/ /kun kyang khyod la bslab pa ste/ /ngag
240b3(dkon brtsegs): yod pas ni nges par 'byung / /lha'i bu bag yod gnas pas gsol pa/ bag yod yongs su ma btang bas/ /rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras/ /'gro ba 'di la ma chags par/ /thams
240b4(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen du nges par 'byung / /lha'i bu bag yod srung gis gsol pa/ byang chub lam la brten mdzad cing / /khyod ni bag gis bsrungs pas na/ /thugs rje chen po mkhas pa
240b5(dkon brtsegs): yi/ /byang chub dam pa brnyes par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu bag yod brtson gyis gsol pa/ bag yod pa la rab brtson zhing / /mtshan nyid gcig po rtogs bgyis pa/ /dpa' bo chen po
240b6(dkon brtsegs): khyed kyi sras/ /yab kyi dkor kyang thob par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu bag yod mngon par dga' bas gsol pa/ bag yod dga' ba'i brtan pa rnams/ /de dag sangs rgyas ye shes
240b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis/ /dpa' bo nyon mongs ri 'jigs pas/ /nga rgyal ri yang de bzhin bsnyil/ /lha'i bu bag yod 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas ye shes tshol mdzad tshe/ /khyod ni bag gis
241a1(dkon brtsegs): bzung ba na/ /bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/ /khyod kyi thugs ni skyor ma gyur/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas brtson gyis gsol pa/ chos rnams de dag rang
241a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin zhi/ /de ni sangs rgyas spyod yul lags/ /byang chub yang dag gang zhugs dang / /thams cad mkhyen pa der mi 'jigs/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas la yang dag par gnas pas
241a3(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ sangs rgyas zhi gnas bzhugs pa ste/ /'on kyang de la chags mi mnga'/ /sems can nyon mongs zhi bar mdzad/ /rdul 'thul ba la char ba bzhin/ /lha'i bu zhi
241a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas la rab tu gnas kyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas zhi la rab tu zhugs/ /sus kyang mi bskyod ri bo bzhin/ /khyod la gnod bgyir mi nus te/ /sems zhi khyod la phyag kyang
241a5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas dul gyis gsol pa/ khyod kyi sras rnams ma smad pa/ /zhi gnas kyis ni yongs su dul/ /bdud rnams bye bas mi tshugs te/ /'dod chags
241a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni gnod mi 'gyur/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas nges par 'byung gis gsol pa/ zhi ba'i yid mnga' zhir gnas la/ /dpa' bo chen po sgrol mdzad pas/ /ci la gnas te bsam
241a7(dkon brtsegs): gtan mdzad/ /sus kyang khyod kyi tshul ma 'tshal/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas sngon du 'gro bas gsol pa/ ston pas sangs rgyas chos rnams kyi/ /sngon du zhi gnas 'gro zhes
241b1(dkon brtsegs): gsungs/ /gang gis byang chub 'grub 'gyur ba'i/ /chos gzhan de yi rjes su 'brang / /lha'i bu zhi gnas rjes su 'brang gis gsol pa/ 'jig rten sgron mas zhi gnas
241b2(dkon brtsegs): ni| |sems kyi rnyog pa dang bar bgyi/ /zhi ba'i sems ldan rnams kyi 'ching / /de khyod mtha' yas dbang du mdzad/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ chos rnams kun gyi spyod
241b3(dkon brtsegs): yul ni| |zhi gnas yin zhes 'dren pas gsungs/ /de la chags med spyod pa ni/ /rnam par 'dren pa sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas brlan gyis gsol pa/ bsam gtan
241b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis ni mngon brlan te/ /shes rab kyis ni sems bsgoms pas/ /de phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes/ /de bzhin skye bo rnams kyang 'dren/ /lha'i bu zhi gnas lhur len gyis gsol pa/
241b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas chos rnams gang la yang / /lam gzhan dag gis ma mthong ste/ /zhi gnas ye shes che thob na/ /rang byung nyid du nges par 'byung / /lha'i bu lhag mthong mngon dgas
241b6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ dpa' bo chen po lhag mthong ni/ /chos rnams thams cad ston pa ste/ /de la khyod kyi sras spyod cing / /rang byung nyid ni thob par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong 'byung gis
241b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ shes rab pha rol phyin gnas shing / /rnam par 'dren pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sman pa'i rgyal po ston pa ste/ /de bas lhag mthong dge ba lags/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong
242a1(dkon brtsegs): rab gnas kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad btsal bgyis te/ /yang dag ji bzhin mthong gyur na/ /brtan pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub
242a2(dkon brtsegs): thob| |byang chub nyid la gnas par 'dong / /lha'i bu lhag mthong nges 'byung gis gsol pa/ gang zag mchog rnams ye shes kyis/ /byang chub mchog tu nges par
242a3(dkon brtsegs): byung / /rdzogs pa'i byang chub ye shes kyis/ /brnyes pa'i dran pa skye mi 'gyur/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong mngon dgas gsol pa/ yang dag ji bzhin yang dag tu/ /chos
242a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams rnam par gzigs pas na/ /byang chub gzhal yas brnyes gyur te/ /de bas rnam 'dren sangs rgyas lags/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong la mngon par brtson pas
242a5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ mkhas pa ye shes gang brtson zhing / /dka' ba mang po spyod bgyid pa/ de dag rgol tshogs thams cad kyis/ /pham par bgyi bar yong mi nus/ /lha'i
242a6(dkon brtsegs): bu lhag mthong 'byung gis gsol pa/ chos rnams rnam mthong bgyi slad du/ /rgyal sras gang dag zhugs pa'i rnams/ /chos rnams ngo bo nyid 'tshal zhing / /rang byung
242a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid ni thob par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong la brten pas gsol pa/ rnam 'dren khyod kyis yun ring du/ /ye shes la ni brten mdzad pas/ /thams cad mkhyen
242b1(dkon brtsegs): pa brnyes nas ni/ /srog chags bye ba grol bar mdzad/ /lha'i bu khyad par ldan gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas mkhyen pas thams cad mkhyen/ /'dren pa dam pa mngon par
242b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags/ /srid pa'i rgya mtshos khyer ba yi/ /'jig rten de yis sgrol bar mdzad/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong gnas kyis gsol pa/ lhag mthong la ni gnas mdzad cing / /chos
242b3(dkon brtsegs): kun rnam par gzigs pas na/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams 'phel 'gyur te/ /sa bzang n+ya gro d+ha skyes 'dra/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong dang ma bral bas gsol pa/ rnam par 'dren pa khyod
242b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sras| |ye shes kyis ni yongs bzung ste/ /byang chub mchog ni thob bgyis shing / /skye bo mang po 'grol bar bgyid/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong la rnam par rtse bas gsol pa/
242b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mkhyen pas rnam par rol/ /chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'/ /zhum pa ma mchis dngang mi mnga'/ /thub pa 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen/ /lha'i bu lhag
242b6(dkon brtsegs): mthong la yang dag par 'jug gis gsol pa/ dpa' bo chen pos chos kun ni/ /lhag mthong nyid du yang dag 'du/ /rang bzhin med par rnam mthong na/ /de ni rang byung byang
242b7(dkon brtsegs): chub lags/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong snying pos gsol pa/ sangs rgyas lhag mthong snying po ste/ /chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'/ /'jig rten sdug bsngal 'di gzigs
243a1(dkon brtsegs): shing / /thugs rje chen po shin tu bskyed/ /lha'i bu lhag mthong 'gros kyis gsol pa/ byang chub phyir ni shes 'grol ba'i/ /'jig rten mkhas
243a2(dkon brtsegs): pa nges par 'byung / /de dag byang chub mchog kyang thob/ /grol nas skye rgu 'di dag 'grel/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid la rton gyis gsol pa/ stong pa nyid kyi chos bsten pa'i/ /
243a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa byang chub 'tshang rgya ste/ /sems can bcings las grol bgyid cing / /'ching ba thams cad rnam par gcod/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid la mos kyis gsol pa/
243a4(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid la mos gyur pas/ /'gro ba 'di dag srog med gzigs/ /dmigs med ngo bo nyid med pa/ /de ltar srog chags rnams la ston/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyi
243a5(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul ni/ /chos rnams rang bzhin stong pa ste/ /srog chags rnams la thugs brtse bas/ /dpa' bos de la spyad
243a6(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyi bsam pas gsol pa/ skyon dang bral zhing bcings med la/ /'jigs skrag thams cad rab tu spangs/ /chos rnams kun la mi
243a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas shing / /nam mkha'i rlung bzhin spyod pa mdzad/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid la mngon par dga' bas gsol pa/ stong nyid chos la brten bgyid cing / /sangs rgyas
243b1(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul gang mos pa/ /de dag ston pa mchod pa ste/ /mchod pa de ni bla na med/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis yang dag par 'phags kyis gsol pa/ gang gis 'dren pa
243b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags gyur pa'i/ /de ni yang dag 'phags zhes gsungs/ /stong nyid chos la brten bgyid pa/ /ma smad de dag sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis 'dren gyis
243b3(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ dpa' bo chen po chos rnams kyang / /mya ngan 'das min ston pa mchis/ /kun kyang mya ngan 'das par 'dren/ /drang srong chen po'i byang chub lags/ /lha'i bu
243b4(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid kyis yang dag shar gyis gsol pa/ stong nyid zhi la brten nas ni/ /khyod kyi slob ma yang dag shar/ /stong pa nyid la gang brten pa/ /de dag rim gro bgyid pa lags/
243b5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu stong pa nyid la brten gyis gsol pa/ /gang rnams stong pa nyid brten pa/ /mkhas pa de dag rmongs mi 'gyur/ /nyon mongs med cing lta med rnams/ /byang chub rdul med
243b6(dkon brtsegs): 'thob par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ gang rnams stong nyid brten bgyid pa/ /sangs rgyas chos kun phun sum tshogs/ /rang byung pham pa
243b7(dkon brtsegs): med par 'gyur/ /'jig rten don kyang bgyid par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu stong pa nyid la yang dag par zhugs pas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas chos la zhugs gyur te/ /stong pa nyid
244a1(dkon brtsegs): la gang brten pa/ /de la bdud rnams bye ba phrag /stong gis dkrugs par mi nus so/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la dga' bas gsol pa/ mtshan
244a2(dkon brtsegs): ma med la mngon dgyes te/ /dngos po thams cad rnam bshig nas/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten rnams nas byung / /mtshan ma rnams la chags mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma
244a3(dkon brtsegs): med la gnas pas gsol pa/ mtshan ma med la spyod gyur cing / /zhi ba zhi la spyod pa rnams/ /mtshan ma rnam par bshig rnams kyis/ /tshul ni bdud kyis shes mi nus
244a4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul la/ /'dren pa khyod ni spyod mdzad de/ /mtshan ma mi mnga' rtogs dka' zhing / /zhi spyod khyod
244a5(dkon brtsegs): la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas skom gyis gsol pa/ thub pa'i 'khor 'di thams cad ni/ /mtshan ma med pas skom gyur te/ /yab kyi dkor ni 'tshal gyur
