244a6(dkon brtsegs): nas| |de bzhin gshegs la bkur sti bgyid/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la spyod pas gsol pa/ mtshan ma med la nyin mtshan du/ /gang zag mchog ni spyod mdzad pa/ /lha
244a7(dkon brtsegs): dang dri za mi dag kyang / /khyod kyi tshul ni ma 'tshal to/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas rnam par grol gyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad rnam bshig cing / /dpal chen 'jig
244b1(dkon brtsegs): rten sgron ma khyod/ /mtshan ma med la gnas par mdzad/ /de bas khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la rnam par rtse bas gsol pa/ thub chen dpa' bo chen
244b2(dkon brtsegs): po khyod| |mtshan ma med la rnam par rol/ /'gro rnams yongs su smin mdzad cing / /sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la zhugs/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas yongs grub kyis gsol
244b3(dkon brtsegs): pa| gang gis mtshan ma spangs gyur pa/ /de dag byang chub grub pa ste/ /yab kyi chos kyi brtul zhugs can/ /de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la
244b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' bas gsol pa/ gang gis mtshan ma rnam bshig pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas chos la dga'/ /bla ma'i gnas la gnas pa ste/ /sems can kun kyi mchod rten lags/ /lha'i
244b5(dkon brtsegs): bu mtshan ma med pa la brten pas gsol pa/ zhi la spyod cing rnam grol ba/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten bla na med/ /'byung po kun gyi skyabs dang rten/ /dpung gnyen de bzhin gnas
244b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang lags/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la mos pas gsol pa/ mtshan ma med la mos gyur cing / /zhi bas dgra las rgyal gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas brgal ba 'gro sgrol ba/ /de
244b7(dkon brtsegs): dag tshad ni ga la mchis/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pa rtogs kyis gsol pa/ mgon po gang dag smon lam ni /rnam pa kun tu mi dmigs pa/ /de dag 'jig rten bral ba ste/ /sangs
245a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'jig rten nang nas byung / /lha'i bu smon pa med pa la brten pas gsol pa/ zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan pa khyod/ /srid pa rnams su smon mi mdzad/ /srid
245a2(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su chad pas na/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten yongs mi gos/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pas skyes kyis gsol pa/ gang gis sred pa yongs bcom pa/ /de dag gzi mchog
245a3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa ste/ /de dag 'jig rten mgon po'i sras/ /rang gi yab la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pas skyes kyis gsol pa/ khyod kyi sras rnams ma smad pa/ /sred
245a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su bcad pas na/ /srid pa 'jigs bgyid srid pa la/ /de dag smon pa mi bgyid do/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pas yongs su grol bas gsol pa/ gang dag smon pa mi
245a5(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa/ /gzi ldan khyod kyi sras kyi rnams/ /re ba btang zhing bcings grol ba/ /de dag yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pas byung gis gsol pa/ gang gis sred
245a6(dkon brtsegs): pa rab bcom pa/ /de dag mya ngan dgon pa rgal/ /de dag mi skom zang zing med/ /dpal chen khyod la deng phyag 'tshal/ /lha'i bu smon pa med la nges pas gsol pa/ gang gis
245a7(dkon brtsegs): srid dang sdug bsngal dang / /bde ba dngos po med bsgoms la/ /mgon khyod de dag rnams kyi yab/ /de dag khyod kyi sras kyang lags/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pa'i 'khor gyis
245b1(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ srid pa'i sdug bsngal sus mthong ba/ /de dag khyod kyi bstan la dul/ /kha lo bsgyur zhing srid sel ba/ /sems dul khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pas
245b2(dkon brtsegs): byung gis gsol pa/ srid pa'i dgon las byung ba rnams/ /bde ba thob cing zhi gnas te/ /nyon mongs dgra rnams pham mdzad pa/ /'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal/ /lha'i
245b3(dkon brtsegs): bu smon pa med pas ya mtshan du gyur pas gsol pa/ g.yul las rgyal bar gyur pa ste/ /khyod ni rnam rgyal pham mi mnga'/ /bdud kyi dpung rnams pham mdzad cing / /srid pa
245b4(dkon brtsegs): kun tu smon mi mdzad/ /lha'i bu smon pa med pa stobs ldan gyis gsol pa/ thar pa'i chos la stobs ldan pas/ /bdud kyi zhags pa yongs bcad cing / /khyod kyi sras rnams bdud
245b5(dkon brtsegs): dag la/ /bskyab pa'i 'du shes mi bgyid do/ /lha'i bu lus rnam par brtags kyis gsol pa/ lus med 'chi ba med tshul du/ /lus 'di gang gis mthong gyur pa/ /de dag sangs
245b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas spyod yul dga'/ /'dren pa khyod kyi rjes su zhugs/ /lha'i bu lus nges par sems pas gsol pa/ mi gtsang rul pa'i rnag zag pa/ /lus 'di mi zad nges bsam ste/ /yang
245b7(dkon brtsegs): dag ji bzhin 'tshal gyur nas/ /rnam 'dren khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu lus rtogs kyis gsol pa/ lus la mi gtsang brtags bgyis te/ /lus la dran pa rnam dpyad cing //
246a1(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi sdug bsngal rnam grol nas/ /nges pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu lus yongs su gtong gis gsol pa/ sprul gyi pags pa rnying
246a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du/ /rnag can lus 'di spangs nas ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sku bo che/ /sku mi mnga' la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu lus la smod pas gsol pa/ mi gtsang dri nga
246a3(dkon brtsegs): rnag zag cing / /rul pa'i lus la rtag smad de/ /mi gtsang gang ba rnam spangs nas/ /'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu lus kyis yongs su skyo bas gsol pa/ gang
246a4(dkon brtsegs): dag rul pa'i lus skyo zhing / /rgyal sras gtsang ba 'tshal ba rnams/ /chos kyis rab tu bskyed pa'i sras/ /de dag sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal 'gyur/ /lha'i bu lus kyis skrag
246a5(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa/ 'byung ba chen po sprul gdug 'dra/ /gang gis shin tu rtogs gyur pa/ /de dag lus las 'das pa ste/ /rkang gnyis gtso la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu lus
246a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi skyon mthong bas gsol pa/ lus kyi skyon la mngon sum ste/ /ye shes gzigs pa'i spyan mnga' ba/ /sangs rgyas mkhyen pa mkhas pa dag/ srid gsum thams cad yongs
246a7(dkon brtsegs): su gzigs/ /lha'i bu lus la 'dod chags dang bral bas gsol pa/ lus kyi 'du shes 'dod chags bral/ /chos kyi 'du shes mi gnas pas/ /kun sbyor kun las
246b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa ste/ /rnam 'grel sangs rgyas phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu srid pa'i dgra'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ srid par srid pa 'joms mdzad pa/ /khyod kyis dgra yi 'du shes
246b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen| / khyod kyi sras rnams sgom bgyid cing / /mkhas pa byang chub mngon 'tshang rgya/ /lha'i bu srid pa sel bas gsol pa/ srid pa kun gyi nyes dmigs mthong / /mya ngan 'das
246b3(dkon brtsegs): la 'jigs med mthong / /khyod kyi sras rnams 'gro phan phyir/ /byang chub spyad pa spyod pa bgyid/ /lha'i bu srid pa rnam par spangs kyis gsol pa/ gang gis srid pa rnam spangs
246b4(dkon brtsegs): shing / /'jig la mngon par mi dga' ba/ /bral bar gyur cing sems dag pa/ /mkhas khyod zhabs la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu srid pa bsal gyis gsol pa/ mi yi
246b5(dkon brtsegs): dam pa khyod kyi sras/ /srid par khrid pa rab bsal te/ /khyod kyi bslab la bslab pa dag /stong gsum 'di na rnam par mdzes/ /lha'i bu srid pa las brgal bas gsol pa/
246b6(dkon brtsegs): srid pa'i mtsho las brgal ba yi/ /'jig rten mgon mchog skyob rnams la/ /grangs kyi rgyud du bgrang ba yi/ /grangs ni 'jig rten 'di na med/ /lha'i bu srid pa 'joms kyis
246b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba/ /srid pa thams cad yongs bcom ste/ /gang dag rtag tu dran spyod pa/ /de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod/ /srog chags rnams la chos kyang ston/ /lha'i bu srid pa
247a1(dkon brtsegs): las rab tu grol bas gsol pa/ srid pa'i rgyun las rab tu grol/ /rnam par 'dren pa srid pa rgal/ /srid pa mthar 'byin sangs rgyas te/ /srid pa
247a2(dkon brtsegs): sel la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu srid pa rab tu zhi byed kyis gsol pa/ srid par khrid pa rab zhi zhing / /srid pa pham par mdzad nas gshegs/ /bstan pa srid pa mthar
247a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byin pa/ /khyod la do zla ma mchis so/ /lha'i bu srid pa'i mthar 'gro bas gsol pa/ srid pa'i mthar phyin rab zhi ba/ /mgon po khyod kyi srid pa'i mtha'/ /srid par phyir
247a4(dkon brtsegs): log thams cad mkhyen/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten rtogs par mdzad/ /lha'i bu srid pa tha ma'i lus 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ srid pa'i rgyu ni rnam spangs te/ /srid pa tha ma
247a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin mdzad pa/ /gang gis srid pa len gyur pa'i/ /khyod kyis kun tu sbyor ba mthong / /lha'i bu srid pa rab tu zhi ba thob kyis gsol ba/ khyod kyis srid pa stong mkhyen te/ /srid
247a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyu yang de bzhin no/ /zhum dang rab tu zhum mi mnga'/ /mnyam nyid gyur la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu srid pa'i pha rol tu 'gro bas gsol pa/ srid pa'i pha rol brgal
247a7(dkon brtsegs): ba ste| |srid par khrid pa yang dag bsal/ /rnam par 'dren pa thugs brtse bas/ /skye bo gzhan ni sgrol ba mdzad// //bam po bcu pa/ lha'i bu tshor bas mnar gyis gsol pa/
247b1(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba bdag tu bgyi ma mchis/ /sems pa ma mchis rtsol ma mchis/ /bsam gtan mdzad pa che khyod kyis/ /tshor ba chu bur lta bur mkhyen/ /lha'i bu tshor ba ston pas gsol
247b2(dkon brtsegs): pa| ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med par/ /tshor ba khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /rmi lam sdug gu'i dga' 'dra ba/ /de la so so'i skye bo chags/ /lha'i bu tshor ba la yongs su rtog pas gsol
247b3(dkon brtsegs): pa| shes rab bcas pas yongs brtags na/ /tshor ba 'gro bar ma song zhing / /'ong ba med la dngos med par/ /de ni thub chen khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu tshor ba dang bral bas
247b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa| tshor ba dang ni tshor ba po/ /rang bzhin med par khyed kyis gzigs/ /zab mo bstan dka'i tshig de yang / /khyod kyis sems can rnams la bstan/ /lha'i bu tshor ba'i
247b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyud la nges pas gsol ba/ tshor ba de ni kun rdzob tsam/ /don dam nyid du mi dmigs te/ /khyod kyis sems can der btul bas/ /'gro ba the tshom ma mchis 'gyur/ /lha'i bu
247b6(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba la mkhas pas gsol pa/ tshor ba'i phung po mkhas pa po/ /mkha' la rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /byis pa'i blo can rmongs bgyid na/ /de ni khyod kyis yang dag gzigs/ /
247b7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu tshor ba mngon par shes pas gsol pa/ tshor ba'i phung po mngon mkhyen pa/ /rig cing rig pa'i mthar byon pa'i/ /mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog khyod kyis/ /tshor ba bdag med
248a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gzigs/ /lha'i bu tshor ba las brgal bas gsol pa/ rkang gnyis gtso bo dam pa khyod/ /brgal dka' tshor ba'i mtsho las brgal/ /
248a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dam las brgal cing sdig med pa/ /byang chub mchog 'di sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /lha'i bu tshor ba las byung gis gsol pa/ rnam par 'dren pas 'jig rten du/ /tshor ba
248a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni 'byung mkhyen nas/ /tshor ba'i phung po rab brgal te/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten chags mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu tshor ba rig pas gsol pa/ mi rnams dag la gang
248a4(dkon brtsegs): 'ching ba'i/ /tshor ba thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen/ /nyon mongs zhags pas 'ching 'gyur ba/ /de yi rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu sems la mkhas pas
248a5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ khyod kyis sems kyi nyon mongs pham/ /bdud rnams kyang ni spa bkong ste/ /sems de rang bzhin ma mchis par/ /thub pa chen po khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu
248a6(dkon brtsegs): sems yongs su shes pas gsol pa/ ji ltar sgyu ma'i mkhan po yis/ /sgyu ma sna tshogs sprul pa bzhin/ /sems ni bde gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen/ /de phyir khyod la
248a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mchod/ /lha'i bu sems la yang dag par rtog pas gsol pa/ sgyu ma mkhan nam slob ma bzhin/ /gang gis 'gro ba 'di bcings pa'i/ /sems de khyod kyis yang
248b1(dkon brtsegs): dag brtags/ /de ni khyod kyis ji bzhin mkhyen/ /lha'i bu sems kyi spyod yul la spyod pas gsol pa/ sems kyi spyod yul khyod kyis mkhyen/ /rnam par 'dren pa rmi lam na/ /ji ltar
248b2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyi grangs bzhin du/ /byis pa'i sems rmongs bgyid par gzigs/ /lha'i bu sems kyi dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ dul gyur las su rung ba yi/ /sems kyi rang bzhin rtogs
248b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa| |gang la 'jig rten gting mi rnyed/ /mtshan nyid brtan pa khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu sems la dpa' bas gsol pa/ gang gis sems la sems med shes/ /mkhas
248b4(dkon brtsegs): pa sgyid lug mi 'gyur zhing / /bdud sde rab tu 'dul bgyid pa/ /de dag 'dir ni dpa' zhes bgyi/ /lha'i bu sems kyis yang dag 'phags kyis gsol pa/ gang dag sems la
248b5(dkon brtsegs): sems med shes/ /de dag sangs rgyas sras lags te/ /dpa' chen sangs rgyas chos rnams la/ /skyes bu de dag yang dag 'phags/ /lha'i bu zhi ba'i sems kyis gsol pa/ gang
248b6(dkon brtsegs): gis sems la dbang bgyis pa/ /sems can de dag zhi rab zhi/ /bdud kyi zhags las rab grol bas/ /de dag bdud kyi dbang mi mchi/ /lha'i bu sems mnyen pas
248b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ mi rnams gang dag sems mnyen zhing / /bsnyen par dka' dang dpa' ba dang / /khyod kyi bstan la gang mos pa/ /de dag 'dod par zhum mi 'gyur/ /lha'i bu sems
249a1(dkon brtsegs): dag pas gsol pa/ sems dag las rnams gtsang gyur cing / /yang dag rtogs pas spyod bgyid pa/ /de dag rgyal ba'i bstan thos na/ /zab mo
249a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la zhum mi 'gyur/ /lha'i bu chos nyid la gnas pas gsol pa/ gang gi yid ni chos nyid la/ /rab tu dga' zhing thogs med pa/ /de dag mi dbang sras po ste/ /zhi
249a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sar ni phyin pa lags/ /lha'i bu chos la sems pas gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad chos dbyings su/ /'dren pa de la bslab pa rnams/ /chos nyid la ni gang sems
249a4(dkon brtsegs): pa| |de dag spyod yul ma yin med/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings las nges par byung gis gsol pa/ mi mchog khyod kyi sras kyi rnams/ /chos kyi dbyings la nges 'byung
249a5(dkon brtsegs): ste| |'dren pa khyod kyi sras de dag / mtshan nyid gcig gis nges byung lags/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ chos rnams kun gyi spyod yul ni/ /
249a6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings zhes rgyal bas gsungs/ /dpa' bo khyod ni gang spyod pa'i/ /ye shes de ni bsam mi khyab/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pas gsol pa/ chos kyi
249a7(dkon brtsegs): dbyings la gang zhugs pa/ /de dag ye shes bsam yas te/ /sangs rgyas chos la the tshom med/ /sems can bsam la de dag mkhas/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la bab
249b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis gsol pa/ gang dag chos kyi mtshan nyid gcig /chos kyi dbyings la bab pa rnams/ /de dag spobs pa'i stobs bskyed pa/ /bsam gyis mi khyab thob par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu
249b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings la 'jigs pa med pas gsol pa/ gang la de dag gnas pa yi/ /'jigs pa med pa thob med pas/ /de dag rnams kyi spobs dang stobs/ /de la mtshungs pa
249b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa 'byung / /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pas gsol pa/ khyod ni chos dbyings mkhas pa ste/ /chos rnams kun la shin tu mkhas/ /lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin//
249b4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par ston/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la gnas pas gsol pa/ chos rnams rang bzhin med gzigs pas/ /khyod ni chos kyi dbyings la zhugs/ /mi
249b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas zhum pa ma mchis te/ /gzung ba ma mchis btang ma mchis/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la spyod pas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas spyod yul gang lags pa'i/ /chos kyi dbyings
249b6(dkon brtsegs): la khyod spyod de/ /bar snang mkha' dang 'dra ba yi/ /'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la rton pas gsol pa/ gang dang gang gi sgo dag nas/ /skyes
249b7(dkon brtsegs): bu dam pa ston mdzad pa/ /de yi sgo nas chos dbyings ston/ /de phyir rtags dang gzugs ma mchis/ /lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la brtson pas gsol pa/ mngon par brtson pas
250a1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings/ /skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis mkhyen/ /brtson pas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /ye shes pha rol phyin par gyur/ /lha'i bu
250a2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyis tshim gyis gsol pa/ dpa' bo khyod kyis skye bo 'di/ /chos kyis rab tu tshim par mdzad/ /chos kyi dbyings ni rnam mkhyen pas/ /'dren pa byang chub mchog la zhugs
250a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu chos nyid kyi gting rnyed pas gsol pa/ gting rnyed gyur pa'i 'gro ba kun/ /'dren pa khyod kyi zhal du lta/ /chos dbyings rnam par mkhyen pa yi/ /'dren pa khyod la
250a4(dkon brtsegs): phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu gnas shes pa la rab tu gnas pas gsol pa/ mi mchog 'dren pa sangs rgyas kyi/ /ye shes gnas 'di chos dbyings te/ /rnam par 'dren
250a5(dkon brtsegs): pa stobs bcu po/ /gang la spyod pa de lags so/ /lha'i bu gnas la gnas pas gsol pa/ chos kyi dbyings ni gnas chen te/ /thams cad mkhyen pa bzhud pa'i lam//
250a6(dkon brtsegs): de ni chos rnams thams cad kyang / /mtshan nyid gcig par shes pa lags/ /lha'i bu gnas mngon par shes pas gsol pa/ khyod ni chos dbyings mngon par mkhyen//
250a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid gcig la mkhas pa ste/ /sems can kun gyi bsam pa yang / /rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu gnas nas nges par byung gis gsol pa/ rnam
250b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras/ /gnas su bya ba chos dbyings zhes/ /gsal bar 'tshal ba'i mkhas pa rnams/ /rang byung nyid du nges par byung / /lha'i bu gnas la bslab pas gsol
250b2(dkon brtsegs): pa| chos kyi dbyings la gang bslab pa'i/ /skyes bu de dag byang chub zhugs/ /rang byung nyid du gnas rnyed pas/ /de dag rkang gnyis mchog tu 'gyur/ /lha'i bu gnas med pa la
250b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas gsol pa/ gnas med pa ni gang 'tshal ba/ /de dag bde gshegs dgongs la mos/ /bdud rnams bye ba stong gis kyang / /de dag rmongs par yong mi nus/ /lha'i
250b4(dkon brtsegs): bu gnas med pa la mngon par shes pas gsol pa/ gnas med gang gis rig gyur pa/ /de dag bdag cag bdud kyi tshogs/ /bye bas byang chub mi bskyod ces/ /mkhas pa de
250b5(dkon brtsegs): dag shin tu dga'/ /lha'i bu gnas med pa'i dgongs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ gnas med 'du shes mkhas pa ni/ /chos nyid la ni rab gnas te/ /sdig can bdud rnams
250b6(dkon brtsegs): bshal ba ni/ /ji ltar rta yis shing rta bzhin/ /lha'i bu gnas med pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ mtshan nyid gcig la mkhas pa po/ /chos kyi dbyings la bgegs bgyid
250b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i| |bdud kyi las ni gnas med de/ /gnas med do zhes rgyal bas gsungs/ /lha'i bu gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rtogs pas gsol pa/ gnas dang de bzhin gnas min
251a1(dkon brtsegs): pa| byis pa'i blo can rnams la bstan/ /rang gis de ni thugs chud nas/ /sems can rnams la khyod kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu sbyin pa la mkhas pas
251a2(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ sngon chad rgyu ni gang dag dang / /las 'dra 'byung ba ma 'tshal ba'i/ /rgyu de khyod kyis thugs su chud/ /las kyi gnas kyang rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu las la mkhas
251a3(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa/ chags dang zhe sdang gti mug ni/ /las kyi rgyu zhes khyod kyis mkhyen/ /gang gis rgyu yis bgyid de yang / /gang zag mchog gis thugs su chud/ /lha'i
251a4(dkon brtsegs): bu ma 'ongs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ ma 'ongs pa yi dus dag na/ /mi rnams las gang bgyid 'gyur ba/ /de yi rgyu dang len pa dang / /gnas dang las kyang khyod
251a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu da ltar byung ba la lta bas gsol pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 'di dag gi /sems can rnams dang rgyu dang las/ /gnas dang las kyi len pa
251a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams| |kun kyang 'dren pa khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu stobs kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ mi dbang khyod kyis ma gzigs pa'i/ /las dang rgyu dag ma mchis te/ /gnas
251a7(dkon brtsegs): dang skye ba'ang ma mchis so/ /de bas khyod ni gang zag mchog /lha'i bu stobs la mngon par dga' bas gsol pa/ las dang rgyu dang de bzhin gnas/ /dus la rnam smin rnam
251b1(dkon brtsegs): gsum dang / /ji ltar de yi len pa yang / /khyod kyis mkhyen pas de slad mchod/ /lha'i bu stobs kyi blo gros kyis gsol pa/ rgyu dang las dang len pa dang / /rnam par smin dang
251b2(dkon brtsegs): rkyen dang gnas/ /rang bzhin bral bar khyod kyis mkhyen/ /de phyir rgyal ba mnyam pa med/ /lha'i bu stobs kyis byung gis gsol pa/ rgyu dang las dang len pa dang / /gnas
251b3(dkon brtsegs): dang rkyen dang rgyud rnams dang / /rnam smin so so yang dag rig /thams cad stong pa rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu stobs la dga' bas gsol pa/ rgyu dang las dang len pa dang / /
251b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud kyi rnams/ /khyod nyid rang gis mngon mkhyen te/ /rang bzhin med par bstan pa mdzad/ /lha'i bu stobs kyis rnam par rtse bas gsol pa/ rgyu dang las
251b5(dkon brtsegs): dang len pa dang / /gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud kyi rnams/ /'pho med dbang phyug med pa ste/ /rten cing 'byung bar khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu stobs kyis 'phags kyis gsol pa/ rgyu
251b6(dkon brtsegs): dang rkyen dang las rnams dang / /rnam par smin pa brten pa rnams/ /de kun rang bzhin stong ngo zhes/ /seng+ge'i nga ror khyod kyis gsungs/ /lha'i bu stobs kyi rjes su 'brang bas gsol
251b7(dkon brtsegs): pa| 'jig rten las ni gang zhig gis/ /khams ni gang zhig spel gyur pas/ /de dag rkang gnyis gtso bos mkhyen/ /de bas khyod ni do zla med/ /lha'i bu stobs dang ldan gyis
252a1(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ khams gang la ni brten bgyis shing / /gang gis mngon par las bgyis dang / /de yi rnam smin ci 'dra ba/ /de kun spyan dang ldan pas mkhyen//
252a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu stobs yang dag 'phags kyis gsol pa/ khams gang la ni brten bgyis shing / /ci 'dra'i rang bzhin gyur pa yi/ /sems can thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen/ /phyag gi
252a3(dkon brtsegs): sor mo lnga dang 'dra/ /lha'i bu stobs la spyod pas gsol pa/ khams gang la ni brten bgyis shing / /bshes gnyen ci 'dra rnyed gyur nas/ /'du 'dzi ji 'dra bgyid gyur
252a4(dkon brtsegs): pa| |de kun bla na med pas mkhyen/ /lha'i bu stobs kyis byin gyis brlabs pas gsol pa/ stobs kyi byin gyis brlabs mkhyen cing / /'dren pa de yi khams dang ni/ /'du
252a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin bshes gnyen tshogs kyi rnams/ /de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu khams nges pas gsol pa/ khams de dang ni de len dang / /bshes gnyen de
252a6(dkon brtsegs): dang de 'grogs pa/ /de la khyod kyi mkhyen pa nges/ /de phyir the tshom yong mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu khams la brten pas gsol pa/ sems can gang na gnas gnas pa'i/ /
252a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba de dang khams de dang / /spyod dang skad dang 'gro ba rnams/ /mi mchog khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu khams la mkhas pas gsol pa/ ye shes gang gis
252b1(dkon brtsegs): khams de ni/ /'dren pas mngon par mkhyen pa yi/ /mkhyen te mkhyen pas stong ngo zhes/ /blo mchog mnga' bas yang dag bstan/ /lha'i bu khams na nges par byung gis
252b2(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ khams gang la ni brten bgyis na/ /'dus byas dag la ji srid gnas/ /de ni khyod kyis ji bzhin mkhyen/ /khyod la do zla ma mchis so/ /lha'i bu khams kyi rjes su
252b3(dkon brtsegs): song bas gsol pa/ khams gang la ni brten bgyis pa/ /yon tan ji snyed bskyed pa dang / /rnam par smin dang 'bras bu dag /de dag ma lus khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu
252b4(dkon brtsegs): khams la yang dag zhugs pas gsol pa/ khams gang la ni brten bgyid cing / /'gro ba ci 'dra 'dod bgyis pa/ /de yang khyod kyis thogs med mkhyen/ /de phyir khyod ni
252b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas mchod/ /lha'i bu lam mngon par shes pas gsol pa/ khams gang la ni brten bgyis pas/ /'gro ba ci 'drar mchis pa yi/ /sems can rnams kyi lam
252b6(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang / /ye shes mkhas pa khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu lam la mi 'jigs pas gsol pa/ sems can log pa nyid nges shing / /mya ngan 'das 'gro skal med pa/ /
252b7(dkon brtsegs): phung po gsum po de dag la/ /khyod kyis ye shes nges par 'jug /lha'i bu lam gyis nges par byung gis gsol pa/ sems can yang dag nyid nges te/ /ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i skal
253a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa| |de la 'jig rten sgron ma khyod/ /rtogs pa thogs pa med par 'jug /lha'i bu lam la mos pas gsol pa/ ma nges phung por gyur pa la/ /
253a2(dkon brtsegs): gang zag gang rnams gnas pa rnams/ /de la ngan song ngan 'gro dang / /mya ngan 'das pa'ang khyod kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu stobs kyi brdas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas brda tsam nyid
253a3(dkon brtsegs): lags te/ /de bzhin stobs dang ye shes dang / /mi 'jigs bzhi yang de bzhin du/ /kun rdzob ces ni thub pas gsungs/ /lha'i bu yang dag pa mthong bas gsol pa /
253a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas sangs rgyas chos rnams mos/ /ye shes gnas pa gzhan yang med/ /don dam nyid du bstan to zhes/ /de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu stobs
253a5(dkon brtsegs): la gnas kyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas chos la stobs gnas pas/ /des na de la 'jigs med de/ /rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs kyi sras/ /ji ltar 'dod rgu rnam par
253a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul| |lha'i bu chos la 'jigs med kyis gsol pa/ kun rdzob dang ni don dam dang / /de dag rab tu bstan mchis kyang / /kun rdzob dang ni don dam dang / /brda yang dmigs
253a7(dkon brtsegs): su ma mchis so/ /lha'i bu ye shes lhur len gyis gsol pa/ brjod pa thams cad rnam pa gzhan/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa gzhan/ /mtshan nyid ma mchis brjod ma
253b1(dkon brtsegs): mchis| |khyod kyis chos kyi mtshan nyid gzigs/ /lha'i bu lam la brtson pas gsol pa/ nges par gyur pa'i sems can rnams/ /gzhan gyi rgyud mchi'i gnas ma mchis/ /
253b2(dkon brtsegs): log par nges rnams kun tu 'gror/ /drang srong chen po khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu mos pa'i stobs kyis gsol pa/ khams gang la ni brten bgyis te/ /gang rnams ci 'drar mos
253b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing / /'dod chags khams la sdug bsngal ba/ /de dag thub chen khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu mi sdug pa las nges par byung gis gsol pa/ ma mchis yongs su
253b4(dkon brtsegs): brtags pas na/ /'dod chags khams ni rab tu byung / /de la mos pa nges 'byung ba/ /de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs/ /lha'i bu byams pas nges par byung gis
253b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na/ /zhe sdang khams ni rab tu byung / /de la mos pa nges 'byung pa/ /de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs/ /lha'i bu rkyen gyis
253b6(dkon brtsegs): nges par byung gis gsol pa/ ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na/ /gti mug khams ni rab tu byung / /de la mos pa nges 'byung ba/ /de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs /
253b7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu gtong bas nges par byung gis gsol pa/ mtsho med 'jigs pa rnyed pa dag /ser sna mngon du 'phel 'gyur te/ /de la mos pa nges 'byung ba/ /de dag thub chen khyod
254a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis nges par byung gis gsol pa/ sdig pa'i grogs dang 'grogs pa na/ /mthun
254a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams ni rab tu byung / /de la mos pa thob 'gyur ba/ /de dag 'dren pas rnam par mkhyen/ /lha'i bu rnam par shes pa snying por 'dzin pas gsol pa/ 'khor
254a3(dkon brtsegs): ba na ni 'khor rnams kyis/ /ci 'dra'i khams la brten pa dang / /mos pa de mthar phyin pa dag /khyod kyis ma lus rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu nan tan snying por byed pas
254a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ 'khor ba na ni 'khor rnams kyis/ /gang gis rgyu 'byung nan tan dang / /mos pa de las 'byung ba yang / /smad pa med pa khyed kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu dbang
254a5(dkon brtsegs): po la mos pas gsol pa/ sems can gang gis khams gang la/ /brten na ji ltar 'gyur ba yi/ /rgyu de khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /des na khyod ni dga' bar mdzad/ /
254a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu dbang po la spyod pas gsol pa/ sbyor ba gang gis skye ba dang / /gang gis rgya chen skye ba dang / /dmigs pa dang ni zhing rnams dang / /dbang po khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen//
254a7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu dbang pos nges par byung gis gsol pa/ 'dod pa'i sdug bsngal gnod gyur dang / /srid par mngon pa 'jug pa dang / /sred pa zhi bar bgyid pa'i don/ /de dag smra
254b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mchog gis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu dbang po'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ dbang po nyam chung rnam dag ni/ /gzugs kyi 'dod chags dben par 'tshal/ /sred pa rnam par
254b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhig pa yang / /rkang gnyis dam pas bsten pa mdzad/ /lha'i bu dbang po rnam par rgyal bas gsol pa/ dbang po rtul po dur khrod bsten/ /rang gi 'dod chags zhi bar
254b3(dkon brtsegs): bgyid| |rkang gnyis gtso bo'i zhal mthong nas/ /sred dang bcas pas khyod la blta/ /lha'i bu dbang po rtogs kyis gsol pa/ 'dod chags can dang 'dod chags dang / /
254b4(dkon brtsegs): zhi dang shes dang mi shes dang / /sred pa zhi dang dbang po rnams/ /rnam par gzigs la mngon mi dmigs/ /lha'i bu dbang po la gnas pas gsol pa/ zhe sdang gnyen por
254b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa yi/ /gnod sems med dang dben pa dag /dbang po rtul po bsten pa'i tshe/ /khyod kyi 'gro ba'i bsam pa gzigs/ /lha'i bu dbang po la brtson pas gsol pa/ zhe
254b6(dkon brtsegs): sdang gnyen por byams pa gsungs/ /sems can shes pa rjes su skye/ /zhe sdang khams ni zhi bar bgyid/ /de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu dbang po tshol bas
254b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ gnod sems med dang byams pa dang / /zhi ba'i ngo bo nyid ma gzigs/ /dgra dang nyon mongs ma dmigs te/ /des na 'jig rten khyad par 'phags/ /lha'i bu dbang
255a1(dkon brtsegs): po rjes su 'brang gis gsol pa/ log par rnam par rtog pa dang / log pa nye bar ston pa yang / /nyon mongs dam phyir kun sbyor te/ /ldog
255a2(dkon brtsegs): pas thar bar 'gyur ba gzigs/ /lha'i bu ye shes yang dag shar gyis gsol pa/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /dngos la 'dzin pa mun pa ste/ /ldog pas
255a3(dkon brtsegs): snang ba chen por 'gyur/ /de ni grags chen khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu ye shes 'dod chags chad pas gsol pa/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /mun pa snang
255a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dngos po rnams/ /rang bzhin nyid kyis ma mchis te/ /de ni rkang gnyis gtso bos gzigs/ /lha'i bu snang ba 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ sems can gang gis shes
255a5(dkon brtsegs): pa gang / /ji tsam yongs su bsgrubs bgyis dang / /snod du gang rung ji snyed pa/ /de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu dbang po dang zhe 'gras pas gsol pa/
255a6(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs spang phyir shes gang gis/ /shes pa de la rtog bgyid pa/ /de yang ston pa khyod kyis mkhyen/ /de bas khyod la mngon par dga'/ /lha'i bu dbang po la dga'
255a7(dkon brtsegs): bas gsol pa/ yul dang dus dang gnas dag dang / /spyod pa rnam par sgom pa dang / /nyon mongs nyon mongs rnam dag pa/ /thub pa khyod kyis stong par gzigs/ /lha'i
255b1(dkon brtsegs): bu ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/ dbang po rno rtul 'bring dag dang / /gang zag gang gi bsam pa dang / /bcings dang thar dang zad pa'ang shes/ /g.yo ba med par khyod
255b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu dbang po'i rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/ dbang po rab 'bring rtul ba dang / /nyon mongs ye shes tshor ba dang / /gdul dang 'dul bar bgyid pa dag /khyod
255b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis mtshan nyid med par gsungs/ /lha'i bu dbang po rnam par brtags kyis gsol pa/ sems can rnams kyi bsam gtan dang / /rnam thar kun nas nyon mongs dang / /snyoms
255b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jug ting 'dzin ldan pa dang / /rnam byang thub pa khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu stobs kyi shugs kyis gsol pa/ zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsten te/ /chos kun ngo bo nyid kyis ni/ /rang bzhin med par khyod
255b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis mkhyen/ /des na thams cad mkhyen zhes bgyis/ /lha'i bu stobs kyi go chas gsol pa/ chos rnams gang dag rang bzhin gang / /chos gang gis ni brjod bgyis pa/ /yang
255b6(dkon brtsegs): dag ji bzhin thugs su chud/ /des na dus gsum chags mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu stobs 'dod kyis gsol pa/ log par brtags pas kun nyon mongs/ /rnam pa bzhi ni skye
255b7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ /las las skyes par de dag mkhyen/ /des na khyod ni do zla med/ /lha'i bu stobs shes kyis gsol pa/ nyon mongs rnams dang las rnams kyi/ /gnyen po rnam par
256a1(dkon brtsegs): byang ba dang / /bstan pa'ang khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /des na khyod la do zla med/ /lha'i bu stobs kyi 'od kyis gsol pa/ bsam gtan rnam thar
256a2(dkon brtsegs): ldang ba dang / /snyoms par 'jug dang ting 'dzin dang / /kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang dag /ming tsam mo zhes khyod kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu stobs las byung gis gsol pa/
256a3(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan rnam thar rnam byang dang / /snyoms par 'jug dang ting nge 'dzin/ /bag yod pa las byung ba ste/ /de la khyod kyi ye shes 'jug /lha'i bu stobs rnam par
256a4(dkon brtsegs): spel bas gsol pa/ dpa' bo khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni/ /bsam gtan la sogs de dag dang / /ldan dang rnam par byang la 'jug /de ni rlung ltar chags pa med/ /lha'i
256a5(dkon brtsegs): bu sngon gyi mtha' la mkhas pas gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/ /srid pa 'di na sngon bzhugs tshe/ /srid pa'i skyon dang yong ma 'dres/ /des na khyod la do zla
256a6(dkon brtsegs): med| |lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la gnas pas gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/ /byang chub gzhal yas tshol mdzad cing / /'dren pas yongs su spyad pas na/ /
256a7(dkon brtsegs): des na khyod ni dpa' bo lags/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la rtog pas gsol pa/ sngon mthar sbyin pa sna tshogs dag /blo mchog gsung tshe gsol bas na/ /spobs pa sna
256b1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs rab mnga' bar/ /rnam par 'dren pa de nges byung / /lha'i bu sngon mtha' la byang bas gsol pa/ sngon chad 'khor bar spyod pa'i tshe/ /tshul rnams la ni tshul mkhas
256b2(dkon brtsegs): pa| |'jig rten sgron rnams khyod kyis gzigs/ /des na khyod ni tshul la mkhas/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' tshar phyin pas gsol pa/ sngon mthar chos rgyal mang po la/ /dpa'
256b3(dkon brtsegs): bos sngon chad spyod mdzad pas/ /thams cad mkhyen du nges par byung / /sems can mkhas la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/
256b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mchog ni btsal ba'i phyir/ /bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/ /sangs rgyas bye ba mtha' yas pa/ /de la khyod kyis sa bon btab/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul la nges pas
256b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba brtags mdzad pas/ /chos kun sems can med pa zhes/ /chos rnams thams cad nges par mkhyen/ /'du 'phrod tsam du rgyal bas gsungs/ /
256b6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la sems pas gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/ /gnas dang gnas min rab mkhyen par/ /rnam par 'dren pa spyod mdzad pas/ /des na
256b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten rmongs mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la spyod pas gsol pa/ gnas dang gnas min bsten bgyis nas/ /las dang rgyu rnams dpyad pas na/ /khams dang
257a1(dkon brtsegs): dbang po mos pa dang / /bsam gtan sngon gyi mtha' yang mkhyen/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la yongs su rtog pas gsol pa/ khyed kyis
257a2(dkon brtsegs): sngon mtha' yongs brtags pas/ /stobs kyi ye shes rnam bcu po/ /dpa' bo chen pos rnam par spel/ /des na 'jig rten 'di la gzigs/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha'i
257a3(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ dpa' bos sems can thams cad kyi/ /sngon gyi mtha' yi spyod pa dang / /dge dang mi dge'i rgyu ba rnams/ /mkhyen pas 'jig rten gso
257a4(dkon brtsegs): ba mdzad/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa la so sor rtog pas gsol pa/ thub pas sngon gyi sems can gyi/ /sngon mtha'i spyod pa rab mkhyen cing / /khams dang mos
257a5(dkon brtsegs): pa mkhyen pas na/ /de phyir sems can gso ba mdzad/ /lha'i bu mos pa'i stobs can gyis gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas su/ /sngon gyi mtha' la brtags
257a6(dkon brtsegs): bgyis kyang / /khyod kyi dgongs pa chags mi mnga'/ /des na mgon la bdag mos lags/ /lha'i bu ye shes la mos pas gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med
257a7(dkon brtsegs): du| |sngon mtha'i srid pa bsam bgyis kyang / /rkang gnyis gtso bos yon tan gyi/ /pha rol phyin nus 'ga' ma mchis/ /lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' la mkhas pas gsol pa/
257b1(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 'di dag gi /skye rgu sna tshogs las ldan pa/ /shi 'pho skye bar 'gyur ba dag /khyod kyis sangs rgyas spyan gyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' las
257b2(dkon brtsegs): nges par byung gis gsol pa/ rgyu gang gis ni las gang zhig /bgyis shing rgyud drug mchir 'gyur pa/ /de dag thams cad rgyal bas mkhyen/ /des na thams cad mkhyen ces
257b3(dkon brtsegs): bgyi| |lha'i bu shi 'pho dang skye ba mngon par shes pas gsol pa/ khams gang gi ni sems can gang / /bsgos par gyur cing las bgyis pa'i/ /bag chags las dang
257b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can dag / khyod kyis g.yo ba med par mkhyen/ /lha'i bu shi 'pho dang skye ba rig pas gsol pa/ bshes gnyen ji 'dra bsten bgyis shing / /las gang mngon par
257b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dus bgyis pa/ /'gro ba gang du mchis 'gyur ba/ /thub pa khyod kyis de yang mkhyen/ /lha'i bu dgongs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ las de yi ni bgyis pa gang / /dgos
257b6(dkon brtsegs): pa khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /gang gis slad du las bgyis pa'i/ /de yang ma lus rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu dngos po la mkhas pas gsol pa/ dngos po gang dag dmigs pa
257b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / /las gang mngon par 'du bgyis pa/ /thams cad mkhyen pas de mkhyen te/ /de ni sangs rgyas spyod yul lags/ /lha'i bu dngos po la rig pas gsol pa/ sems
258a1(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi bsam mkhas pa/ /dngos de ji ltar chags pa dang / /de ni ji ltar grub pa yi/ /las de khyod kyis mngon par mkhyen/ /lha'i bu
258a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ shes pa gang gis dngos po de/ /brtags par gyur pa rab tu mkhyen/ /de la ji ltar chags gyur pa'ang / /thub pa khyed kyis
258a3(dkon brtsegs): shin tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu mngon par 'du byed pa la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ chags pa gang gis las de rnams/ /nyon mongs gang gis 'du bgyis pa'i/ /nyon mongs
258a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag yang dag mkhyen/ /de bas khyod ni bdag gi mgon/ /lha'i bu 'gro ba la mkhas pas gsol pa/ 'gro ba gang du las gang gis/ /mchi zhing sgrib pa gang rnyed nas//
258a5(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur ba/ /de kun spyan ldan khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu dmigs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ 'gro ba dag tu skyes rnams kyi/ /gang gi las rnams
258a6(dkon brtsegs): smin gyur pa'i/ /dmigs pa khyod kyis rab mkhyen te/ /de la khyod kyi blo gros 'jug /lha'i bu bag chags la mkhas pas gsol pa/ 'gro dang 'gro bar mi rnams kyis/
258a7(dkon brtsegs): sngon chad bgyis pa'i sdig las dang / /de bzhin dge ba'i las rnams kyi/ /bag chags khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu las la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ 'gro bar
258b1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung po thams cad kyi/ /rnyed dang gser dang slad ma dang / /las rnams gsum po khyod kyis mkhyen/ /de la so so'i skye bo 'khrul/ /lha'i bu rnam par smin pa la mkhas
258b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol pa/ chung zhing rnam smin che ba dang / /che zhing rnam smin chung ba dang / /chung ngam che 'am mnyam pa'ang rung / /de la mu stegs can rnams rmongs/ /lha'i bu las
258b3(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ /tshe 'di'i las rnams gang lags dang / /skyes pa'i las rnams gang lags dang / /lan gsum gzhan gyi gang lags pa/ /de dag spyan ldan
258b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu tshe 'di la myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ tshe 'di la ni gang bgyis pa'i/ /las kyi rnam smin mi gang dag /myong bar 'gyur ba
258b5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag la/ /so so'i skye bo rmongs pa mkhyen/ /lha'i bu skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ gang gis las gang bsags gyur te/ /skyes nas rnam
258b6(dkon brtsegs): par smin gyur pa/ /gang la 'jig rten gting mi rnyed/ /shes rab chen pos de yang mkhyen/ /lha'i bu lan grangs gzhan na myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol
258b7(dkon brtsegs): pa| las gang bskal pa bye ba yi/ /phyi dus rnam par smin 'gyur zhing / /dus gzhan dag ni yang 'byung ba/ /de dag yang dag nyid du mkhyen/ /lha'i bu yongs su ma smin pa
259a1(dkon brtsegs): myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ las rnams gang zhig bgyis gyur pa/ /yongs su smin par ma gyur na/ /de srid 'bras bu
259a2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'byin pa/ /rkang gnyis mchog gis de yang mkhyen/ /lha'i bu yongs su ma smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba la rtog pas gsol pa/ las gang dang ni ldan pas na/ /sems
259a3(dkon brtsegs): can 'di ni skyer 'gyur ba/ /pham pa med pas de mkhyen te/ /yongs su brtags nas rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu yongs su smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas pas
259a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ las ni ji ltar yongs smin na/ /'bras bu dkar bar 'gyur ba mkhyen/ /de la stong par rnam par mkhyen/ /de la khyod kyi ye shes 'jug /lha'i bu yongs
259a5(dkon brtsegs): su smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba la nges pas gsol pa/ thams cad mkhyen pas las kyi rnams/ /lci dang yang ba rab tu mkhyen/ /sems can bsam pa thugs su
259a6(dkon brtsegs): chud| |de slad bcom ldan bdag gi bla/ /lha'i bu lci yang la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ las gang gis ni sems can rnams/ /ngan song mchi bar 'gyur ba dang / /
259a7(dkon brtsegs): lci ba dang ni yang ba gzigs/ /de shes mkhyen pas rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu sems can gyi spyod pa la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ sems can spyod pa nyer bzung zhing / /
259b1(dkon brtsegs): las kyi lci dang yang ba dag /dpa' bo khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/ /mu stegs can rnams de la rmongs/ /lha'i bu sems can gyi spyod pa la spyod pas gsol pa/ sems can
259b2(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa spyad mdzad cing / /las kyi rnam par smin pa bstan/ /phor bu'i chu dang gang+gA'i chu/ /lan tshwas rnam par bstan pa bzhin/ /lha'i bu las la mkhas kyis gsol
259b3(dkon brtsegs): pa| slob dang mi slob rnam par smin/ /rkang gnyis dam pa ston mdzad cing / /kun nas nyon mongs las myong nas/ /las ni zad par 'gyur ba bstan/ /lha'i bu sangs
259b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi ye shes la reg par byed pas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas spyan gyis khams gsum na/ /las kyi 'bras bu bstan pa na/ /byis pa dag dang mkhas pa gzigs/ /
259b5(dkon brtsegs): phra gzigs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha'i bu las zad par byed pas gsol pa/ 'jig rten dag na rnam 'dren khyod/ /sems can rnams kyi shi 'pho dang / /skye ba kun
259b6(dkon brtsegs): la ye shes 'jug / mkhyen pas 'jigs med phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu dmigs pa med pa la spyod pas gsol pa/ 'chi 'pho ba dang skye dang las/ /'gro dang de bzhin
259b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can dang / /rnam smin rmi lam 'drar bstan pa/ /'dren pa rkang gnyis mchog gis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu nyon mongs pa la rtog pas gsol pa/ /ji ltar rmi lam skom pa
260a1(dkon brtsegs): zhi| |shin tu bsil ba'i chu 'thungs bzhin/ /rkang gnyis mchog khyod 'dod chags dang / /zhe sdang gti mug rnams kyang zad/ /lha'i bu yongs
260a2(dkon brtsegs): su rtog pa dang bral bas gsol pa/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /yongs su rtog las skyes pa ste/ /rmi lam dga' bar rtse ba bzhin/ /smra mchog khyod
260a3(dkon brtsegs): la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu yongs su rtog pa zhi bar byed pas gsol pa/ yongs su rtog pa rab zhi bas/ /nyon mongs zad pa rab bstan te/ /rmi lam na ni
260a4(dkon brtsegs): sprin med ltar/ /mi mchog khyod kyis rab tu bstan/ /lha'i bu zag pa la rtog pas gsol pa/ rmi lam char chen 'bab pa ltar/ /de bzhin zag pa rnams
260a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar/ /zag pa 'byung ba mkhas pa po/ /dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu rmi lam rtog gis gsol pa/ rmi lam char chen 'bab pa ltar/ /de
260a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin zag pa rnams 'byung ste/ /nor ba rnams la zag 'byung bar/ /dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pas gsol pa/ ji
260a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar bu mo'i rmi lam na/ /bu zhig byung la shi 'phos na/ /dga' dang sdug bsngal tshor 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin 'gro ba khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu rmi lam
260b1(dkon brtsegs): rtog pas gsol pa/ rmi lam dag na mgo bcad bzhin/ /khyod kyis zag pa zad pa gzigs/ /de ni mkhas pa rnams la bstan/ /thams cad gzigs la phyag kyang 'tshal//
260b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu blo gros nges par rtogs kyis gsol pa/ chos kun mkhyen pa khyod kyis ni/ /ji ltar rmi lam mdza' phrad dang / /bral ba yang dag ma mchis gzigs/ /'gro ba ji bzhin
260b3(dkon brtsegs): tshim par mdzad/ /lha'i bu ye shes yid kyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis dam pa'i chos ston pa/ /thos nas yid ni dga' 'gyur te/ /rmi lam dag na rmi bstan bzhin/ /de ltar rgyal
260b4(dkon brtsegs): pas bstan par mdzad/ /lha'i bu yongs su dga' ba'i yid kyis gsol ba/ me long gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin/ /'gro ba mtha' dag gzigs pas na/ /bsam gtan
260b5(dkon brtsegs): mnga' ba khyod la ni/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten yid kyang dga'/ /lha'i bu blo gros nges pas gsol pa/ thub pa pi wang sgra 'dra ba'i/ /khyod kyi dam chos thos gyur na/ /lha'i bu rnams
260b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang the tshom bor/ /rgyal ba mchog la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu sgyu mas tshim gyis gsol pa/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma dag /byis pa rmongs byed yongs bstan na/ /mi mkhas
260b7(dkon brtsegs): de la rmongs par 'gyur/ /sgyu ma bzhin du khyod kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu sprul pa la sems kyis gsol pa/ ji ltar rmi lam sgyu mthong ba/ /de ltar khyod kyis 'gro ba gzigs/ /
261a1(dkon brtsegs): mgon po'i bstan pa de thos nas/ /bdag cag the tshom ma mchis so/ /lha'i bu sgyu ma las nges par byung gis gsol pa/ sgyu ma'i mkhan
261a2(dkon brtsegs): pos sgyu sprul kyang / /sgyu ma lags par 'tshal bas na/ /de la rmongs par 'gyur ma mchis/ /de bzhin khyod kyis 'gro ba gzigs/ /lha'i bu rtogs pa'i rjes su rtogs
261a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol pa/ ji ltar brtson pas rmi lam na/ /sangs rgyas sku gzigs brtags pa bzhin/ /de ltar rtog pas 'jig rten bskyed/ /rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs
261a4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu kun tu rtog pa 'joms gyis gsol pa/ kun rtog 'dod chags rgyu las te/ /'dod chags dngos pos bskyed ma lags/ /rtog pa ngan las 'dod chags byung / /de
261a5(dkon brtsegs): ni rnam 'dren khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas gsol pa/ ri sul dag na sgra byung ba/ /brag ca sems can sgra ma lags/ /de bzhin 'jig
261a6(dkon brtsegs): rten khyod kyis gzigs/ /de slad 'jig rten chags mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu ston pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ sgra ni gang yang ma mchis te/ /sgra ni brag ca 'dra ba lags/ /'on
261a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi dbang khyod kyis bstan/ /byis pa mang po rab tu btsud/ /lha'i bu nan tan la mkhas pas gsol pa/ chos rnams don ni gzhan lags kyang / /byis pa rnams kyis
261b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du brtags/ /nan tan chos las shes par gyis/ /de la bdag ni the tshom chad/ /lha'i bu don gyi rjes su 'brang bas gsol pa/ chos don yang dag gang lags pa/ /de ni
261b2(dkon brtsegs): sus kyang ma rtogs shing / /sus kyang ma bstan 'tshal ma gyur/ /de skad thub pa'i mchog gis gsungs/ /lha'i bu chos kyi brda rtogs pas gsol pa/ zag dang dri ma nyon mongs
261b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / /bag chags dang ni rtogs dang rtog /kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag pa/ /thub pa brda yi tshig kyang lags/ /lha'i bu kun tu rtog pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ kun nas
261b4(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs rnam dag dang / /zag pa dag dang nyon mongs dang / /ngag dang bshad dang nye du dang / /ston pa 'di kun ming tsam lags/ /lha'i bu mi gnas pa'i blo gros kyis gsol
261b5(dkon brtsegs): pa| khams gsum rnams la ma chags te/ /nam mkha' 'dra ba'i thugs mnga' ba/ /bral bar gyur cing sbyin pa'i gnas/ /zhi ba'i sems la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu ma
261b6(dkon brtsegs): gos pas gsol pa/ thub pa khyod kyis thugs yid ni/ /gzugs dang gzugs med mi gnas shing / /'dod dang mya ngan 'das pa la/ /gnas pa ma mchis bar snang 'dra/ /lha'i
261b7(dkon brtsegs): bu re ba med pas gsol pa/ 'dod pa'i khams la re ba spangs/ /gzugs dang gzugs med gnyi gar min/ /'du 'dzi dag dang bral gyur ba/ /sred zad khyod la phyag kyang
262a1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal| |lha'i bu sred pa byung bas gsol pa/ 'byung ba dag dang 'jig pa la/ /khyod kyi sred pa yang dag chad/ /khams gsum kun la
262a2(dkon brtsegs): chags mi mnga'/ /rnam par 'dren la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu sred pa zil gyis gnon gyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten 'di dag zil mnan nas/ /khyu mchog dam pa
262a3(dkon brtsegs): spyod mdzad cing / /sems can 'jig rten sgrol mdzad pa/ /thugs brtse khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu sred pa dang bral gyis gsol pa/ kun tu sbyor dang bral ba
262a4(dkon brtsegs): ste| |yang srid bas pas zhir gyur ba/ /dag pa'i bdag nyid dag pa'i sems/ /dus dang bral la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha'i bu ji lta ba bzhin du rig pas gsol pa/ chos
262a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams thams cad dngos med pa/ /ji bzhin dpa' bo khyod kyis mkhyen/ /bcings pa ma mchis grol ma mchis/ /yang dag gzigs la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu
262a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dam las brgal bas gsol pa/ 'dod pa'i 'dam las brgal ba ste/ /srid pa'i 'dam las de bzhin brgal/ /gzigs pa mi mnga' len mi mnga'/ /yang srid
262a7(dkon brtsegs): brgal la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu zang zing spangs kyis gsol pa/ zang zing spangs shing dri ma spangs/ /re ba spangs shing sdig pa'ang spangs/ /sangs rgyas sgrib pa
262b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams spangs pa/ /don rtogs khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu re ba spangs kyis gsol pa/ don dang don ma lags pa spangs/ /chags pa mi mnga' nges rtogs pa/ /bdud
262b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhags las rnam 'das pa/ /len med khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu phan par 'dod pas gsol pa/ bdag nyid dang ni gzhan rnams kyi/ /lam gang nyon mongs
262b3(dkon brtsegs): rim med pa/ /sgrib pa med par gzigs pa po/ /dpa' chen khyod kyis de yang gzigs/ /lha'i bu grags pa thob kyis gsol ba/ 'dren pa 'jig rten rnam grags pa/ /
262b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis mkhyen la brtson pa rnams/ /ji skad bstan bzhin rab rtog na/ /nyon mongs rnams ni nub par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu 'jigs pa med pas gsol pa/ chos rnams
262b5(dkon brtsegs): kun la nges pas na/ /bsngo ba gang yang yong ma gzigs/ /ye shes rgya mtsho mi bsnyengs par/ /seng+ge'i sgra ni sgrog par mdzad/ /lha'i bu gang nas kyang 'jigs pa med pas
262b6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ 'jigs pa kun las yang dag brgal/ /zug rngu thams cad kun tu ston/ /bsnyengs pa mi mnga' zhum mi mnga'/ /thams cad zil gnon phyag kyang 'tshal/ /
262b7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu gnas med kyis gsol pa/ lha rnams dang ni dri za dang / /bdud dang tshangs par bcas pa yis/ /khyod kyi chos la brgal mi nus/ /de bas khyod la bsnyengs mi mnga'//
263a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu seng+ge'i rtsal gyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad yongs mkhyen pas/ /sangs rgyas gyur la 'jigs mi mnga'/ /bdag la chos
263a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis sus rgol zhes/ /bde gshegs khyod la dogs mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu skrag med kyis gsol pa/ seng+ge ri sul gnas pa ni/ /'jigs pa ma mchis skrag ma mchis/ /
263a3(dkon brtsegs): ri dwags phra mo yongs btul te/ /spa bkong gnas na nga ro sgrog /de bzhin thams cad mkhyen pa yang / /mu stegs can rnams yongs skrag ste/ /lha klu dri za'i 'jig rten na/ /
263a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs med gzigs nas gsung yang sgrog /lha'i bu thams cad zil gyis gnon gyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten rnam 'dren 'jig rten na/ /sangs rgyas nyid la bsngo
263a5(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa/ /'jig rten gsum na ma mchis te/ /des na rgyal ba bdag gi skyabs/ /lha'i bu seng+ge'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs//
263a6(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'/ /khyod 'dra 'jig rten ma mchis te/ /cis mi bsnyengs la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu rjes su mthun par skyes kyis gsol pa/
263a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas nyid du dam bcas na/ /'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis/ /'jig rten 'dren pa chos kyis ni/ /khyod la gang rgol de ma mchis/ /lha'i bu mdzod 'dzin gyis
263b1(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ seng+ge'i nga ro gsung bsgrags te/ /khyod kyi chos kyi mdzod bzung bas/ /srog chags bye ba stong dag gis/ /byang chub mchog tu sems kyang skyes/ /lha'i bu brtul zhugs
263b2(dkon brtsegs): rjes su mthun gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas rjes mthun brtul zhugs can/ /dpal chen de dag thob chen thob/ /byang chub mchog tu sems btud cing / /gang zag mchog tu
263b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag 'gyur/ /lha'i bu rjes su mthun pa'i chos la dga' bas gsol pa/ khyod kyi bstan pa sus thos te/ /byang chub mchog tu sems btud pa/ /de dag 'jig rten sems
263b4(dkon brtsegs): can che| |gang zag mchog tu de dag 'gyur/ /lha'i bu sems dag pas gsol pa/ 'jig rten dag na rgol med pa'i/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsung thos nas/ /srog chags
263b5(dkon brtsegs): bye ba stong dag gis/ /byang chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed/ /lha'i bu sems rgyun yongs su dag pas gsol pa/ yun ring dus na mi dbang gis/ /sangs rgyas bslab
263b6(dkon brtsegs): la legs bslab pas/ /de slad khyod ni thugs rgyud dag /mtshan rab sum cu gnyis dang ldan/ /lha'i bu zag pa med pa'i yid kyis gsol pa/ zag pa zad pa'i sangs
263b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyis/ /seng+ge'i nga ro bsgrags mdzad de/ /dam bcas pa la mngon bzhugs na/ /rgol ba 'di na yong ma mchis/ /lha'i bu de kho na'i rjes su song bas gsol pa/ khyod kyi
264a1(dkon brtsegs): gsung la smra 'gyur ba'i/ /lha dang lha bu mi dag ni/ /'jig rten gsum na ma mchis te/ /des na thub pa stobs dang ldan/ /lha'i bu zag pa
264a2(dkon brtsegs): zad pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ dge sbyong dam pa'i zag pa ni/ /ma lus yongs su bas pa ste/ /'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis/ /des na sangs rgyas bdag gi pha/ /lha'i
264a3(dkon brtsegs): bu rtag tu brtson gyis gsol pa/ khyod la nyon mongs lus so zhes/ /mi dbang khyod la gang rgol ba/ /rnam pa kun tu mi dmigs te/ /des na sangs rgyas bsnyengs mi
264a4(dkon brtsegs): mnga'| |lha'i bu sems zhi bas gsol pa/ 'dod chags zhe sdang zhi ba ste/ /gti mug bag chags bcas par zhi/ /nyes spyod las kyang zhi bas na/ /sems zhi khyod la
264a5(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha'i bu rnal 'byor spyod pas gsol pa/ rnal 'byor gang gis nyon mongs gang / /bas par 'gyur ba lta ba'i tshe/ /de la khyod kyis mkhyen kun 'jug /
264a6(dkon brtsegs): des na khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu rnal 'byor la mkhas pas gsol pa/ 'dren pas gang la bslab pa yi/ /rnal 'byor tshogs ni mtha' yas te/ /thams cad
264a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa de slad du/ /nyon mongs thams cad ma lus bsal/ /lha'i bu rnal 'byor blo gros kyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten sgron ma khyod kyi blo/ /rnal 'byor las ni nyams
264b1(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis/ /des na khyod kyis nyon mongs kun/ /bag chags bcas par yongs su btsal/ /lha'i bu zhi ba rig pas gsol pa/ nyon mongs thams cad zhi gyur nas/ /bag
264b2(dkon brtsegs): chags ma lus yongs su bsal/ /bsnyengs pa mi mnga' rgyal sras dang / /cis kyang mi bsnyengs spyod pa mdzad/ /lha'i bu zad pa la rtog pas gsol pa/ thub pa thams cad
264b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa khyod/ /nyon mongs bag chags bcas par bas/ /'jig rten sgron ma khyod la ni/ /mtshungs pa gang yang mi dmigs so/ /lha'i bu bag la nyal phyung gis gsol
264b4(dkon brtsegs): pa| khyod kyis bag chags ma lus bsal/ /khyod la skyon dri yong ma mchis/ /de slad sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen/ /lha rnams kun gyi thub pa'i thub/ /lha'i bu mtha' la gnas
264b5(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa/ zag pa rnams ni spangs pas na/ /skye ba yang skye ma lags te/ /thub khyod skye ba tha ma pa/ /des na mgon po bsnyengs mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu tshad srung gis gsol
264b6(dkon brtsegs): pa| dpa' bo khyod kyis sa bon spangs/ /sdug bsngal myu gu tshig par gyur/ /mya ngan 'khri shing rnam par bskams/ /gdung ba med la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu shing thags
264b7(dkon brtsegs): bton gyis gsol pa/ thub pa thams cad mkhyen pa khyod/ /ma rig shing thags rnams kyang bsal/ /sangs rgyas spyod pa rnam par sbyangs/ /de bas tshon pa bsnyengs mi
265a1(dkon brtsegs): mnga'| |lha'i bu srid pa'i pha rol tu song bas gsol pa/ srid pa'i mtsho las yang dag brgal/ /rnam par 'dren pa bya ba byas/ /khyod kyis snang
265a2(dkon brtsegs): ba yang dag phyung / /'jigs med khyod ni don kyang grub/ /lha'i bu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro bas gsol pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa zhir gyur pa/ /nyon mongs thams
265a3(dkon brtsegs): cad rab tu bshig / bag chags rdul tsam yong mi mnga'/ /mgon po khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis chos kyi rgyal
265a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan bsgrangs/ /nga rgyal rgyal mtshan rab tu bsnyal/ /chos kyi lam srang mtha' yas pa/ /dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu chos kyi 'byung gnas kyis gsol
265a5(dkon brtsegs): pa| sangs rgyas chos kyi 'byung gnas so/ /thub pa chos rnams kun mkhyen pa/ /sems can kun gyi dge bshes gnyen/ /ye shes gtso la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i
265a6(dkon brtsegs): bu chos kyi gos can gyis gsol pa/ khyod kyi sras po 'jigs med pa/ /seng+ge'i nga ro rnam sgrog kyang / /rgyal sras de dag chog med cing / /sangs rgyas chos kyi don gyis
265a7(dkon brtsegs): bsgom| |lha'i bu chos don du gnyer bas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas chos rnams don gnyer bar/ /khyod kyis sras rnams sems bskyed cing / /khyod kyis mi 'jigs thos
265b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas/ /mkhas pa de dag byang chub tshol/ /lha'i bu chos kyis skom gyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis mi 'jigs thob gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams btsal ba'i phyir/ /srog chags
265b2(dkon brtsegs): bye ba skom gyur te/ /brtson 'grus brtan pa rab tu brtson// //bam po bcu gcig pa/ lha'i bu chos kyi 'phags kyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas chos kyis mngon 'phags shing / /'jigs
265b3(dkon brtsegs): pa med par 'dul mdzad pa'i/ /gsung ba'i mchog gyur khyod mthong nas/ /brtul zhugs mchog can byang chub tshol/ /lha'i bu chos 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ thub pa zab
265b4(dkon brtsegs): cing blta dka' ba'i/ /chos ni khyod kyis rab bstan pa/ /khyod kyi sras kyis thos gyur nas/ /de dag bla med byang chub tshol/ /lha'i bu lta ba med pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis
265b5(dkon brtsegs): seng+ge'i gsung thos nas/ /khyod kyi sras po dpa' nges pa/ /lus dang srog la mi lta bar/ /byang chub don du gnyer bar bgyid/ /lha'i bu gzhan du mi sems pa'i blo gros kyis
265b6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ thub pa bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/ /khyod kyi dam chos 'dir thos nas/ /gzhan du sems pa ma mchis par/ /brtul zhugs mchog can byang chub tshol/ /lha'i bu
265b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du mi 'gro bas gsol pa/ mi dbang khyod kyi gsung thos nas/ /theg pa gnyis po spangs bgyis shing / /lam gzhan du ni mi mchi bar/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub tshol//
266a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu nye bar gnas kyis gsol pa/ seng+ge'i nga ro 'di bsgrags pa/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis thos gyur nas/ /byang chub mchog la nyer gyur
266a2(dkon brtsegs): cing / /de dag rkang gnyis dam par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu spobs pa nye bar gyur pas gsol pa/ grags chen khyod kyis gsung brjod pa'i/ /spobs pa de ni thos gyur nas/ /sangs
266a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas chos la khyod kyi sras/ /kun kyang dga' ba rab tu skyes/ /lha'i bu spobs pa thob pas gsol pa/ 'jigs med khyod kyis gsung bsgrags pa/ /ma smad sras kyis thos
266a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur na| |de dag spobs pa nam du yang / /sangs rgyas nyid las phyir mi ldog /lha'i bu rtag tu rab dgas gsol pa/ 'jigs med khyod kyis gsung bsgrags pas/ /stobs
266a5(dkon brtsegs): chen khyod kyi sras kyi rnams/ /rtag tu rab tu dga' gyur cing / /ma smad de dag byang chub tshol/ /lha'i bu yid zhum pa med pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis gsung bsgrags thos
266a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas/ /rkang gnyis dam pa khyod kyi sras/ /dga' zhing zhum pa ma mchis par/ /byang chub mchog ni tshol bar bgyid/ /lha'i bu thogs med yid kyis gsol pa/ khyod
266a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsung bsgrags thos pas na/ /sems rangs gyur cing yid dga' ste/ /de dag yid ni nam du yang / /byang chub nyid du thogs ma mchis/ /lha'i bu chos la bar chad
266b1(dkon brtsegs): med la mkhas pas gsol pa/ chos rnams gang la brten bgyis kyang / /dkar po'i phyogs dag mi 'grib cing / /de yi bar chad mi 'gyur ba'i/ /gnas ni thub pa khyod kyis
266b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen| |lha'i bu chos nges par bstan pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ dkar po'i phyogs la spyod pa la/ /bar chad 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / /gnas kyang med par thub pas
266b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen| |des na ston pa bsnyengs mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas pas gsol pa/ dge la kun nas nyon mongs pa/ /nag po'i phyogs kyi rang bzhin te/ /khyod kyi
266b4(dkon brtsegs): thugs ni des mi gos/ /gnas kyang med par thub pas mkhyen/ /lha'i bu rigs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ nag po'i chos ni nam du yang / /dkar po'i chos dang mi 'grogs
266b5(dkon brtsegs): par| |rigs par bcom ldan khyod kyis gsungs/ /des na bcom ldan bdag gi bla/ /lha'i bu dge ba dang mi dge ba rig pas gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad ma 'dres pa//
266b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis mkhyen/ /kun nas nyon mongs brtags pas na/ /dkar po'i phyogs las 'grib par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu lam la mkhas pas gsol pa/ kun nas
266b7(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs spyod pa la/ /dkar po'i phyogs ni mi 'byung ste/ /de ltar 'tshal bar ma gyur la/ /bar chad du ni 'gyur bar gsungs/ /lha'i bu thar pa 'dod kyis gsol pa/ nag
267a1(dkon brtsegs): po'i phyogs la brten bgyid na/ /thar par 'dod pa mang po yi/ /bar du gcod par 'gyur zhes gsungs/ /des na rgyal khyod thams cad mkhyen//
267a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu dag pa'i sems kyis gsol pa/ sems grol bgyi bar gang 'tshal bas/ /kun nas nyon mongs shes bya zhes/ /dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis gsungs/ /de khyod
267a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mchod rten lags/ /lha'i bu nyon mongs mthong gis gsol pa/ kun nas nyon mongs spyod bgyid pa/ /kun nas nyon mongs ma 'tshal na/ /dam pa'i chos ni
267a4(dkon brtsegs): shes mi nus/ /de skad bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/ /lha'i bu sdig mthong gis gsol pa/ sdig pa rnams la brten byas kyang / /dge ba mi 'grib gang smra ba/
267a5(dkon brtsegs): de ni thar chos skal med ces/ /rkang gnyis dam pa khyod kyis gsungs/ /lha'i bu gdul bar bya bas gsol pa/ chags pa gdul bar gang 'dod dang / /zhe sdang gti
267a6(dkon brtsegs): mug gdul 'dod pas/ /thub pa'i spobs pa ci 'dra ba/ /de lta bu ni nan tan bgyi/ /lha'i bu kun nas nyon mongs pa dag pas gsol pa/ dag dang kun nas nyon mongs pa/ /mi
267a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas gang rnams mi shes pa/ /de dag ston pa sangs rgyas min/ /de skad drang srong mchog gis gsungs/ /lha'i bu thar pa la brtson pas gsol pa/ nyon mongs 'grib
267b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'i chos/ /rgyal ba yis ni gang bstan pa/ /de brten nyon mongs mi zad ces/ /khyod la rgal ba yong ma mchis/ /lha'i bu thar pa la mngon par phyogs pas gsol
267b2(dkon brtsegs): pa| chos gang nyon mongs gang gi rnams/ /zad 'gyur thub pas bstan pa la/ /yang dag brtson byas mi zad ces/ /rgol ba 'di na yong mi dmigs/ /lha'i bu rnal 'byor la
267b3(dkon brtsegs): brtson pas gsol pa/ rgyal ba khyod kyis nyan thos la/ /gang gi don du chos bstan pa/ /de brtson bgyis pas mi thob ces/ /'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis/ /lha'i bu mi 'jigs
267b4(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis gsol pa/ 'dod chags spang phyir mi sdug pa/ /bstan la yang dag brtson bgyis na/ /'dod chags zad par mi 'gyur zhes/ /khyod la rgol ba yong ma mchis/ /
267b5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu 'gro ba med pa rab tu shes kyis gsol pa/ shin tu bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/ /zhe sdang spang phyir byams gsungs pa/ /de bsgrubs sel bar mi 'gyur zhes/ /dgra
267b6(dkon brtsegs): 'joms khyod la rgol ma mchis/ /lha'i bu mig rnam par dag gis gsol pa/ /shes rab gti mug spang ba'i phyir/ /gsungs pa de la brten bgyis kyang / /gti mug sel
267b7(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur zhes/ /'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis/ /lha'i bu rnam par rtog pa 'joms kyis gsol pa/ rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen por ni/ /dbugs 'byung rngub pa dran
268a1(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa/ /de la brtson bgyis mi zhi zhes/ /'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis/ /lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa lhur len pas gsol pa/ nga'o
268a2(dkon brtsegs): snyam pa spang slad du/ /stong nyid khyod kyis bka' stsal te/ /des ni de zhi mi 'gyur zhes/ /'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis/ /lha'i bu nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal spangs kyis
268a3(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ nga snyam nga rgyal spang slad du/ /mtshan ma med pa khyod kyis gsungs/ /bstan kyang zhi bar mi 'gyur zhes/ /'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis/ /lha'i bu sems
268a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyud rnam par dag pas gsol pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa yis/ /nyon mongs thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ /des ni nyon mongs mi zad ces/ /'di na khyod
268a5(dkon brtsegs): la rgol ma mchis/ /lha'i bu 'du shes rnam par bshig gis gsol pa/ phyogs dang gnyen po'i rnam pa dang / /nyon mongs lam dang lam 'jug pa/ /'jigs
268a6(dkon brtsegs): pa med par rgol ba na/ /thub pa chen po ma mthong ngo / /lha'i bu tha snyad shin tu shes pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan phyogs dang phyogs min dang / /zad dang ma zad tha snyad
268a7(dkon brtsegs): tsam| |'jigs pa ma mchis rgol bgyid pa/ /thub pa de ni ming tsam mo/ /lha'i bu lus kyi las dul bas gsol pa/ mkhyen pas yongs su mkhyen gyur nas/ /khyod kyi
268b1(dkon brtsegs): sku yi 'phrin las 'jug / thams cad ma lus mkhyen pas na/ /des na 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen/ /lha'i bu lus kyi las yongs su shes pas gsol pa/ sems can
268b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la thugs brtse bas/ /dpa' khyod sku yi 'phrin las ni/ /mtha' dag shin tu nges pa lags/ /'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu lus kyi las shin
268b3(dkon brtsegs): tu nges pas gsol pa/ sku yi 'phrin las rab nges par/ /lus can kun la sman slad du/ /'jig rten sgron ma khyod mdzad de/ /des na khyod ni gang zag mchog /lha'i bu
268b4(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi las kyi mtha' shin tu mthong bas gsol pa/ sems can kun la sman slad du/ /'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni/ /sku yi 'phrin las dag pa dang / /legs par
268b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su brtags dang ldan/ /lha'i bu lus kyi las kyi mtha' shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas gsol pa/ shin tu mnyam par bzhag sku dang / /sku yi 'phrin las dag pa
268b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / /ldan par sems can bde don du/ /gang zag mchog ni spyod pa mdzad/ /lha'i bu tshig grub kyis gsol pa/ snyan cing yon tan ldan pa dang / /rtsub pa yongs su spangs
268b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gsung / /mkhyen pas shin tu yongs brtags shing / /mgon po khyod ni gsung ba mdzad/ /lha'i bu dus su smra bas gsol pa/ dus su don dang ldan pa dang / /don
269a1(dkon brtsegs): med yongs su spangs pa'i gsung / /gzung bar 'os dang blang 'os pa/ /'dren pa khyod ni gsung ba mdzad/ /lha'i bu sdums byed blo gros kyis
269a2(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ dbyen du 'gyur ba yongs spangs te/ /'dum par 'gyur dang yid 'ong ba/ /dbyen med 'bras bu rnam par smin/ /sngon chad khyod kyis gsung du brjod/ /lha'i bu
269a3(dkon brtsegs): mi slu bas gsol pa/ srog gi don du'ang khyod kyis ni/ /srid pa rnams su rdzun ma gsungs/ /de bas khyod kyi grags pa kun/ /'jig rten dag na thogs ma mchis/ /lha'i
269a4(dkon brtsegs): bu yang dag par smra bas gsol pa/ 'di ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyang / /sangs rgyas chos rnams btsal slad du/ /thub pa'i gsung la bstod pa ni/ /yang dag gsungs
269a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rgyu mthun lags/ /lha'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha' las nges par byung gis gsol pa/ mi mchog khyod kyi bden pa yis/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di bsgrubs te/ /
269a6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi yang dag rang bzhin yang / /rkang gnyis dam pa khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu yang dag pa la brtul bas gsol pa/ 'dus byas dag ni chos kyi rnams/ /yang dag
269a7(dkon brtsegs): ji bzhin lta ba dang / /chos rnams yang dag mtshan nyid kyang / /mi yi dbang bos rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu las la rtog pas gsol pa/ ye shes yongs su dag pa yis/ /
269b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid dang ni gzhan dag gi /tshig gi las kyang rab tu mkhyen/ /des na rgyal ba mnyam ma mchis/ /lha'i bu yid la rtog pas gsol pa/ mi yi dbang po'i thugs kyi
269b2(dkon brtsegs): las| |ji snyed gang dag 'jug pa ni/ /de dag 'gro ba thugs rjes 'jug /'gro phan khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu yid kyi rnam par rtog pa la mkhas pas gsol pa /
269b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba thugs rje bskyed nas ni/ /gang la khyod ni spyod mdzad pa/ /de la thugs ni dul bar byung / /'gro phan khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ /lha'i bu thabs la mkhas pas gsol
269b4(dkon brtsegs): pa| 'gro ba'i bsam pa rnam dpyod nas/ /rnam 'dren thugs kyi 'phrin las 'jug /thub pa ye shes sna tshogs ni/ /mkhyen bzhin kun tu rab tu 'jug /lha'i bu yid rnam par
269b5(dkon brtsegs): bshig gis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas sa dang yid kyi las/ /sems can thugs rjes gzigs pas 'byung / /sangs rgyas nyid la ye shes thabs/ /rang bzhin med par
269b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu 'das pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang / /brtson 'grus bsam gtan dag la yang / /gang gis gang la mngon
269b7(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa| |sngon gyi dus kyang rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu 'das pa la rtog pas gsol pa/ byang chub mchog ni tshol mdzad cing / /gang drung khyod kyis sngon spyad pa/ /sngon gyi spyod pa
270a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs brtags nas/ /sangs rgyas bye ba rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba grangs
270a2(dkon brtsegs): med du| |gang du khyod kyis sngon spyad pa/ /sngon gyi tshul ni dgongs mdzad kyang / /khyod kyi thugs yid thogs mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul la yongs su rtog pas
270a3(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ sangs rgyas mang las byung ba yi/ /ting 'dzin mngon par bsgrub bya ba/ /sangs rgyas bye ba grangs med la/ /rnam pa 'dren pa khyod kyis zhus/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi
270a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba las nges par byung gis gsol pa/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas drung dag tu/ /grangs med dpag tu med pa yi/ /ting 'dzin sgo dag 'dren pa yis/ /zhus shing sgom pa
270a5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad par 'gyur/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi gnas la rtog pas gsol pa/ 'khor ba'i nyes pa rab mang dang / /bkur sti rnam pa sna tshogs dag /gzigs pas sems can
270a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams la ston/ /sems can long ba rnams kyang 'grel/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi dus na 'phrul pas gsol pa/ gzhan dang gzhan dag zos shing 'tshal/ /rtse zhing rab tu dga'
270a7(dkon brtsegs): ba bgyis/ /gnod pa mi zad bgyis pa dag /gzhan dang gzhan yang khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi spyod pas yang dag par byung gis gsol pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa
270b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro rtogs pa/ /khyod kyi ye shes 'das dus kyi/ /las dang bsam gtan snyoms 'jug dang / /'gro ba rnams la thogs ma mchis/ /lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' la mkhas pas
270b2(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ 'dren pa khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni/ /ma 'ongs dus kyi 'chi 'pho dang / /skye dang las kyi rnam smin la/ /thogs par 'gyur ba ma mchis so/ /lha'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i spyod
270b3(dkon brtsegs): yul gyis gsol pa/ brtan pa 'gro ba mkhas khyod kyi/ /mkhyen pa phyi dus sems can gyi/ /bsam dang las kyi 'bras bu dang / /'gro ba rnams la thogs ma mchis/ /lha'i
270b4(dkon brtsegs): bu srid pa las bskyod kyis gsol pa/ khams rnams gsum po 'di dag dang / /dus gsum kun la mkhas khyod kyi/ /ye shes mchog ni mi chags te/ /srid pa'i spyod yul
270b5(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis mkhyen/ /lha'i bu tha snyad la spyod pas gsol pa/ las dang sems can 'gro ba dang / /rnam par smin pa myong ba dag /de dag thams cad ming tsam du/ /rkang gnyis
270b6(dkon brtsegs): dam pa bstan pa mdzad/ /lha'i bu da ltar byung ba la yang dag par rtog pas gsol pa/ dpa' bo khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni/ /da ltar byung ba thogs ma mchis/ /grangs med
270b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas zhing rnams ni/ 'jig rten mgon po rab tu mkhyen/ /lha'i bu da ltar byung ba la rnam pa dpyod pas gsol pa/ mi yi dbang pos rnam dpyad nas/ /byis pa'i blo gros rmongs
271a1(dkon brtsegs): bgyis pa/ /dus gsum dngos po ma mchis par/ /nges par mnyam pa nyid du gzigs/ /lha'i bu mi gnas pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/
271a2(dkon brtsegs): dus gsum gnas pa ma mchis shing / /ngo bo nyid la mi gnas te/ /dngos po thams cad dngos med par/ /rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu dus
271a3(dkon brtsegs): gsum mngon par bskul bas gsol pa/ 'das pa dag dang ma 'ongs dang / /da ltar byung ba'i phung po rnams/ /ma mchis dngos po ma mchis par/ /skyes bu dam pas bstan
271a4(dkon brtsegs): pa mdzad/ /lha'i bu chags med yid kyis gsol pa/ dus gsum sems can thams cad la/ /snying po mchis par ma bstan te/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu mig yor dang / /brag
271a5(dkon brtsegs): ca lta bur khyod kyis bstan/ /lha'i bu dus gsum dpog gis gsol pa/ 'dren pa khyod kyis mkhyen pa ni/ /dus gsum po dag kun tu yang / /sgyu ma lta bur mkhyen pa na/ /
271a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi dbang po chags mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu mos pa yongs su rig par byed kyis gsol pa/ gang gi nub mo dpa' khyod kyis/ /byang chub mngon du bgyis gyur pa/ /de dus tshun chad
271a7(dkon brtsegs): mos pa la/ /bri bar gyur par yong mi gda'/ /lha'i bu mos pa yang dag thob kyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten sgron ma'i mos pa ni/ /rab tu rgyun chad mi 'gyur te/ /rtag par
271b1(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi mos pa des/ /khyod kyi sras rnams mos pa che/ /lha'i bu mos pas mngon 'phags kyis gsol pa/ chab las pad+ma ji bzhin du/ /khyod ni mos pas mngon du 'phags/ /
271b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten dag gis mi gos te/ /pad+mar chab kyis ji bzhin no/ /lha'i bu mos pas yongs su grol gyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten mgon dang mos pa ni/ /chos kyi dbyings zhes
271b3(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa ste/ /gnyis med gnyis su bgyir ma mchis/ /smad pa med pa khyod kyis gzigs/ /lha'i bu brtson 'grus yang dag thob kyis gsol pa/ gzi brjid chen po brtson
271b4(dkon brtsegs): 'grus kyis/ /byang chub yang dag brnyes par gyur/ /mdzad pa mdzad kyang mgon po khyod/ /brtson 'grus btang ba yong ma mdzad/ /lha'i bu dran pa phun sum tshogs pas
271b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ dpa' bo chen po'i dgongs pa ni/ /thams cad kun tu rjes su 'jug /mdzad pa mdzad kyang mgon po khyod/ /dgongs pa bri ba yod ma mchis/ /lha'i bu sems
271b6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par bzhag pas gsol pa/ mgon po rtag tu mnyam bzhag ste/ /sems can rnams kyi spyod pa mkhyen/ /'dren pa spyod pa'i dbang gis ni/ /sems can rnams la
271b7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyang ston/ /lha'i bu shes rab lhur len gyis gsol pa/ /'jig rten sgron mar gyur khyod kyis/ /ye shes rgya mtsho'i mtha' ma ni/ /bskal pa bye bar brjod bgyid kyang / /sangs
272a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnams kyis bshad mi spyod/ /lha'i bu rnam par grol ba la mkhas pas gsol pa/ rnam par grol dang ma grol ba/ /gang slad khyod
272a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis ma brnyes pas/ /mtshungs pa med pa khyod la ni/ /rnam grol yongs su nyams mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu rnam par grol ba'i ye shes la brtson pas gsol pa/ thub
272a3(dkon brtsegs): pa khyod ni rnam grol nas/ /ngo bo nyid med mkhyen pas na/ /rnam grol ye shes gzigs pa ni/ /yang dag mkhyen pa nyams mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu sngon gyi srid pa rnam
272a4(dkon brtsegs): par spyod kyis gsol pa/ mar me mdzad pa tshun chad du/ /dpa' bo yang dag gzigs khyod kyis/ /spyod la 'khrul pa mi mnga' ste/ /des na sangs rgyas lags zhes
272a5(dkon brtsegs): bstod| |lha'i bu zab mo la spyod pas gsol pa/ srog chags gzhan dag ji bzhin du/ /bde gshegs khyod la chags mi mnga'/ /chos kyi rang bzhin mkhyen pas na/ /
272a6(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin de la rmongs mi mnga'/ /lha'i bu blo gros yangs pas gsol pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa khyod la ni/ /rnam pa kun tu bsnyel mi mnga'/ /mgon po dgongs pa
272a7(dkon brtsegs): nyer bzhag pas/ /thub pa 'bru mar snod dang 'dra/ /lha'i bu sems g.yeng ba med kyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten sgron ma khyod la ni/ /mnyam par ma bzhag sems mi
272b1(dkon brtsegs): mnga'| |ma 'dres sangs rgyas chos kyi rnams/ /srog chags kun gyis shes par dka'/ /lha'i bu ye shes la rab tu gnas kyis gsol pa/ bde bar gshegs pa khyod
272b2(dkon brtsegs): la ni| |ma brtags btang snyoms mi mnga' ste/ /mi yi dbang po'i sangs rgyas chos/ /ma 'dres pa ni bsam mi khyab/ /lha'i bu thams cad zil gnon gyis gsol pa/ skyes
272b3(dkon brtsegs): bu khyu mchog khyod la ni| |'jig rten gsum na mtshungs ma mchis/ /thams cad mkhyen pa ma pham pa/ /khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad mkhyen/ /lha'i bu snying po blangs
272b4(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa/ sems can snying po bla na med/ /chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam brnyes pa/ /sangs rgyas byang chub phyag 'tshal lo/ /
272b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas gtsang ma'i le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de nas de'i tshe gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa can dang / kun tu rgyu drug khris lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
272b6(dkon brtsegs): lding dang / klu'i bu mo dang / klu dang / grul bum dang / dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi 'am ci dang / phreng ldan glang po che can dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang / sum cu rtsa
272b7(dkon brtsegs): gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs pa dang / 'od gsal dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che
273a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lha dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha dag gis bstod pa brjod pa yang thos nas ngo
273a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshar thob par gyur te/ chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa 'di thos nas 'di ltar sngon chad ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshul thos pas yid gnyis su gyur/ nem nur dang the tshom
273a3(dkon brtsegs): za bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye gau ta ma/ sngon chad ma thos pa'i chos bstan pa 'di thos nas bdag cag ni/ kun tu rgyu'i gnas
273a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi 'tshal/ khyim gyi gnas kyang mi 'tshal bar gyur cing / 'di ltar sngon chad ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas chos 'di la nem nur dang the tshom du gyur
273a5(dkon brtsegs): te| sems dang bar yang ma gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang dge sbyong gau ta ma khyod la bdag cag yid ches pa mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar dge sbyong gau ta ma
273a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'di lta bu mngon par mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par mdzad pas bdag cag gis lha'i 'khor
273a7(dkon brtsegs): rgya chen po 'di dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor phal cher gau ta ma khyed kyis legs par gsungs pa 'tshal cing yid rangs par gyur pa mthong ste/ des na/ bdag cag
273b1(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong gau ta ma khyod la dad pa mchis par gyur to/ /kye gau ta ma/ gang 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis chos thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /zhes smras pa de la ji
273b2(dkon brtsegs): ltar chos thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa snyam du bdag cag the tshom cher 'tshal lo/ /dge sbyong gau ta ma/ khyod ni/ ci nas bdag cag legs par bshad pa'i don de
273b3(dkon brtsegs): rtags nas mun pa med par gyur te stan 'di las ldang bar 'gyur ba de ltar bdag cag la chos ston spyod do/ /snyam ste/ bdag cag dge sbyong gau ta ma khyod la de ltar mngon

274b1(dkon brtsegs): to| |kun tu rgyu dag / 'di la ji snyam du sems/ mngal na gnas pa mi dang / lha ma yin dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
274b2(dkon brtsegs): rten nas shi 'phos te ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye gau ta ma/ ma 'tshal lo/ /kun tu rgyu dag /'di la ji snyam du sems/ mngal na gnas pa de gzugs yod pa'am /
274b3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med pa zhig ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye gau ta ma/ ma 'tshal to/ /kun tu rgyu dag /'di la ji snyam du sems/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /

274b6(dkon brtsegs): tu med cing brtag pa'i yul ma yin la blta dka' zhing shes par dka' bas de ni/ khyod yun ring por gzhan du bltas pa/ gzhan du mos pa/ gzhan du dad pa/ gzhan du

275a7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs bu long bas byas na gang 'di bkri ba dang / khrid pa de gnyi ga yang tshul ma yin par sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/ /kun tu rgyu dag /de bzhin
275b1(dkon brtsegs): du dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze gang la la ston pa ma yin par bdag cag ni/ ston pa yin no/ /zhes khas 'che ba dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin par
