277a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'phel lo/ /'phel nas spyod pa snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'gro ba gang dang gang nas shi 'phos nas de dang der skyes nas de dang 'dra ba'i spyod pa de dag spyod par 'gyur
277b1(dkon brtsegs): te| de dag kyang mkhas pas shes par bya ba yin gyi/ glen pas ni/ ma yin no/ /yun ring po nas 'grogs 'grogs pas shes par bya ba yin gyi/ yun thung ngus ma yin
277b2(dkon brtsegs): no| |yang dag par sems pas shes par bya ba yin gyi/ mi brtson pas ma yin no/ /kun tu rgyu dag /de la sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags
277b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas shes par bya ba ni/ 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ skad sha sha po yin/ skad gyo dum gyi sgra lta bu yin/ skad brtag dgos pa yin/ skad che ba yin/
277b4(dkon brtsegs): skad lhang lhang po yin/ rtag tu dngang pa yin/ rtag tu 'dar ba yin/ rtag tu spu zing zhes byed pa yin/ rmi lam na me'i phung po 'bar ba mthong ba yin/ ri rgyug par mthong
277b5(dkon brtsegs): ba yin| me mdag 'bar ba mthong ba yin/ lcags zangs kyi nang du btso ba mthong ba yin/ lag na dbyig pa thogs pa'i mi dag mthong ba yin/ srin po dag gis bdag
277b6(dkon brtsegs): 'phangs par mthong ba yin/ bdag nyid gson por gsal shing gis gzugs par mthong ba yin/ khyi dag gis bdag 'brad par mthong ba yin/ khyi dag gis bdag
277b7(dkon brtsegs): bskor bar mthong ba yin/ bdag nyid glang po che dang sbrul gyis gtses par mthong ba yin/ phyogs bzhir bros na phyogs mi shes pa yin/ sems can kun la yid mi
278a1(dkon brtsegs): rton pa yin te/ kun tu rgyu dag /rnam pa nyi shu po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag tu rig par bya'o/ /kun tu rgyu
278a2(dkon brtsegs): dag / de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni/ 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ rmugs shing gnyid che ba yin/ le lo che ba yin/ mang
278a3(dkon brtsegs): du za ba yin/ sa la 'drud pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa med pa yin/ mi gsal bar smra ba yin/ glen pa la dga' ba yin/ mun pa la dga' ba yin/ 'dam rdzab la dga'
278a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin| yang dang yang sos rtswa gcod pa yin/ rgyun du rkang pa'i mthe bos sa rko ba yin/ yang dang yang mgo la sbrang ma 'du ba yin/ yang dang yang nam mkha' la sos
278a5(dkon brtsegs): 'debs pa yin/ kun tu bskums te nyal ba yin/ sa la nyal ba yin/ mi gtsang bas mi 'dag pa yin/ yang dang yang nam mkha' la snam pa yin/ yang dang yang
278a6(dkon brtsegs): ma smin pa za ba yin/ gzhan du smra zhing gzhan du byed de g.yo byed pa yin/ bab bab tu spyod pa yin/ rmi lam na bdag rdzab kyis gos par rmi ba yin/ rmi lam na bdag
278a7(dkon brtsegs): nags su song ste rtswa za bar rmi ba yin/ sbrul gdug pas bdag bskor bar mthong ba yin/ bdag nyid ri khrod du zhugs par mthong ba yin te/ kun tu rgyu dag /de dag la sogs
278b1(dkon brtsegs): bdud 'gro'i skye gnas nas 'chi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma rnam pa du mar shes par bya ste/ de dag ni/ bskal pa'am bskal pa las lhag par brjod kyang zad
278b2(dkon brtsegs): par mi nus so/ /kun tu rgyu dag /de la gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni/ 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ skra ser ba yin/ mig wa'i mig
278b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba yin/ rtag par bkres pa yin/ rtag tu skom pa yin/ ser sna cha ba yin/ 'dod chen che ba yin/ thob pa mi rnyed pa yin/ gzhan gyi la re ba yin/ khro ba yin/ mig
278b4(dkon brtsegs): dmar ba yin/ bza' ba thams cad la sred pa yin/ bdog pa thams cad la chags pa yin/ sbyin pa'i gnas dag mthong bar mi 'dod pa yin/ dngos po kun la yang
278b5(dkon brtsegs): de rku ba'i sems yod pa yin/ dngos po ngan pa rnams la yang dga' ba yin/ thob pa la mos pa yin/ zas skom mi gtsang ba la dga' ba yin/ gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs
278b6(dkon brtsegs): pa la phrag dog byed pa yin/ gzhan gyi longs spyod la sred pa bskyed pa yin/ gzhan gyi longs spyod gang yin pa de dag la bdag gi snyam du sems pa yin/ zas gtod na
278b7(dkon brtsegs): sems mi dga' ba yin/ tshong 'dus kyi srang dag nas kyang shing tog len pa yin te/ kun tu rgyu dag /gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags kyi bye brag
279a1(dkon brtsegs): ni| de dag la sogs pa mtha' yas par shes par bya'o/ /kun tu rgyu dag /de la lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni/
279a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag yin te/ /'di lta ste/ khengs pa yin/ 'thab bkrol che ba yin/ 'khon du 'dzin pa yin/ nga rgyal che ba yin/ lus che ba yin/ mig che ba yin/ mig
279a3(dkon brtsegs): dkar ba yin/ mche ba snang ba yin/ mthu dang ldan pa yin/ 'thab mo'i blo can yin/ dbyen la dga' ba dang / bya ba thams cad la nga rgyal che ba yin/ /so snang
279a4(dkon brtsegs): ba yin| 'jig rten thams cad la brnyas pa'i 'du shes can yin/ mtshon cha rno ba yin/ tshig na ba yin/ bdag gzengs bstod pa can yin/ mi shes pa'i
279a5(dkon brtsegs): stobs can yin/ nyon mongs pa'i stobs can yin te/ kun tu rgyu dag/ de dag la sogs pa ni/ lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan mar shes
279a6(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ /kun tu rgyu dag /de la mi las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni/ 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ ngo mtshar du 'dzin pa can yin/ 'phags pa dang
279a7(dkon brtsegs): bsten pa yin/ 'phags pa ma yin pa la smod pa yin/ dge ba byed pa yin/ mngon rtags 'dod pa yin/ grags pa 'dod pa yin/ snyan pa 'dod pa yin/ bzo
279b1(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba yin/ shes pa la dga' ba yin/ nyon mongs pa chung ba yin/ khrel yod cing ngo tsha shes pa yin/ rigs kyi bu'i tshul phun sum tshogs pa yin/ byas pa
279b2(dkon brtsegs): gzo ba yin/ mdza' bo la gdung pa yin/ yongs su gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/ bye brag shes pa yin/ byas pa dang ma byas pa la rtog pa yin/ tshig gi mthu yod pa
279b3(dkon brtsegs): yin| gros gzung bar bya ba'i mthu yod pa yin/ 'dum par bya ba dang / 'thab mo bya ba la mngon par mkhas pa yin/ pho nya nus pa yin/ skad thams cad 'dzin pa'i
279b4(dkon brtsegs): mthu yod pa yin/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mngon par shes pa yin te/ kun tu rgyu dag /de dag la sogs pa ni/ mi las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags
279b5(dkon brtsegs): yin no| |kun tu rgyu dag / de la lha las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags ni/ 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ mdzes pa yin/ gtsang sbra che ba yin/ phreng ba la dga'
279b6(dkon brtsegs): ba yin| spos la dga' ba yin/ bdug pa la dga' ba yin/ glu len pa'i ngang tshul can yin/ byug pa la dga' ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan ngan ngon gyis mi mgu zhing rgya
279b7(dkon brtsegs): chen pos dga' ba yin/ rol mo'i sgra thams cad la dga' ba yin/ /glu thams cad la dga' ba yin/ skye bo rgya chen po dang 'grogs par dga' ba yin/ khang pa dang /
280a1(dkon brtsegs): khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khyim dang / longs spyod rgya chen po la dga' ba yin/ /de'i sems byams pa sngon du 'gro ba yin/ rgod pa'i
280a2(dkon brtsegs): ngang tshul can yin/ 'jam par smra ba yin/ dga' ba la mkhas pa yin/ rgyan la dga' ba yin/ che ba'i ngang tshul can yin/ 'gro ba'i ngang tshul can yin/
280a3(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi shugs 'byin pa'i ngang tshul can yin/ /chags pa'i mtshan ma dang / mi chags pa'i mtshan ma shes pa yin/ phan par bya ba la mkhas pa yin
280a4(dkon brtsegs): te| kun tu rgyu dag / mtshan ma de dag la sogs pas mtho ris nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag tu shes par bya'o/ /kun tu rgyu dag /de la mtshan ma de dag las
280a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag mtshan ma de dag las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir
280a6(dkon brtsegs): chos ston par byed pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsten par bya/ bsnyen par bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /de la sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos
280a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gang zag gis ni/ sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe zhe sdang la yongs su brten pas des zhe sdang las byung ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas pas de las des sems can
280b1(dkon brtsegs): dmyal bar skye ste/ de'i phyir de sems can dmyal bar gnas pa rnyed nas sems can dmyal ba'i spyod pa can du gyur pas de mi'i nang du skyes te spyod pa'i rtags 'di dag
280b2(dkon brtsegs): thos nas bdag ni/ sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'o/ /zhes bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing / des sems can dmyal ba'i las kyi rgyu spang ba'i phyir dge ba'i
280b3(dkon brtsegs): bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/ de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag zhe sdang gi gnyen por byams pa ston to/ /byams pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
280b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / byams pa dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to/ /des kyang de'i zhe sdang gi bag la nyal spong bar 'gyur te/ byams pa chen po bsgoms pas pha
280b5(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /kun tu rgyu dag /de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni/ sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe gti
280b6(dkon brtsegs): mug la yongs su bsten pas des gti mug las byung ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas pas de las des dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes te/ de'i phyir dud 'gro'i skye gnas na
280b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa rnyed nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi spyod pa can du gyur pas/ de dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos te mi'i nang du skyes kyang dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi spyod pa de dag nyid spyod
281a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/ des spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas/ shi 'phos nas mi'i nang du skyes so/ /zhes bdag nyid kyis
281a2(dkon brtsegs): shes par bya zhing / de dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi las de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/ de dag la dge
281a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bshes gnyen de dag gti mug spang ba'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ston to/ /des kyang de'i gti mug gi bag la nyal spong bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na
281a4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ston te/ des de'i gti mug de ni/ rang bzhin med pa'o/ /zhes bya bar shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na
281a5(dkon brtsegs): de la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ston te/ des de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs shing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /kun tu rgyu
281a6(dkon brtsegs): dag / de la gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni/ sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe ser sna la kun tu brten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas/ des ser sna
281a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa bag chags las byung ba'i las mngon par 'du byas pas de las byas pa dang / bsags pa dang / zin par byas pa dang / rdzogs par byas pa dang / blangs pa
281b1(dkon brtsegs): des gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ de dag gshin rje'i 'jig rten na gnas pa des gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i spyod pa can du gyur pas/ de dag gshin rje'i 'jig
281b2(dkon brtsegs): rten nas shi 'phos te mi'i nang du skyes kyang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te/ des spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas
281b3(dkon brtsegs): shi 'phos pa'o/ /zhes bya bar bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing / des spyod pa de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar
281b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ste| de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag ser sna spang ba'i phyir gtong ba ston te/ des kyang de'i ser sna'i bag la nyal spong bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na de la gtong ba dang
281b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ston/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ de bsgoms pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /kun
281b6(dkon brtsegs): tu rgyu dag / de la lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni/ sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dag kyang mngon par 'du byas la/ nga rgyal la yang
281b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su brten pas de nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i las byas pa dang / bsags pa dang / zin par byas pa dang / rdzogs par byas pa dang / blangs pa des lha ma yin du skye ste/ lha ma
282a1(dkon brtsegs): yin du skyes te lha ma yin gyi gnas na gnas pa des lha ma yin gyi spyod pa can du gyur pas/ de lha ma yin nas shi 'phos te mi'i nang du
282a2(dkon brtsegs): skyes kyang lha ma yin gyi spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te/ des spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni/ lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'o/ /zhes bya bar bdag nyid kyis shes
282a3(dkon brtsegs): par bya zhing / des spyod pa de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/ de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag nga
282a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal spang ba dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gzhom pa'i phyir skye mched rnams stong to/ /des kyang de'i nga rgyal spong bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na de la stong pa nyid ston te/
282a5(dkon brtsegs): des de'i nga rgyal gyi bag la nyal spong ba dang / bdag rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /yang na ji ltar bya ba 'byung ba sna tshogs pa las 'byung ba'i tshul ston te/
282a6(dkon brtsegs): ngas de'i nga rgyal gyi bag la nyal spong bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na de la chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gcig pa ston te/ des de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
282a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / de bsgoms pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /kun tu rgyu dag/ de la mi las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni/ sngon
282b1(dkon brtsegs): mir gyur pa'i tshe'ang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la kun tu brten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas des las de byas pa dang / bsags pa dang / zin par byas pa dang /
282b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byas pa dang / blangs pa des mir skyes te/ mi'i nang na gnas pa des mi'i spyod pa can du gyur pas/ de mi'i nang nas shi 'phos te mi'i nang du skyes kyang mi'i
282b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te/ de spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni/ mi'i nang nas shi 'phos pa'o/ /zhes bya bar bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing / des mi'i spyod pa
282b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/ de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag mi rtag pa'i 'du shes ston te/ des
282b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang de'i spyod pa bag la nyal dang bcas par spong bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na de la 'khor ba'i mi bsngags pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsngags pa ston te/ des de
282b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba la mi dga' zhing mya ngan las 'da' ba don du gnyer bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na de la pha rol tu phyin pa drug ston te/ de thos pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
282b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /de la thabs mkhas pa yang ston te/ des de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag bzung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa
283a1(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyang myur du thob par 'gyur ro/ /kun tu rgyu dag /de la mtho ris nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni/ sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe tshangs par
283a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa mchog tu bzung ste spyad pa dang / sbyin pa mchog tu bzung ste byin pa dang / tshul khrims mchog tu bzung ste bsrungs pas las de byas pa dang / bsags pa
283a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / zin par byas pa dang / rdzogs par byas pa dang / blangs pas lha'i nang du skyes te/ de lha'i nang na gnas pa des lha'i spyod pa can du gyur pas/ de lha las shi
283a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phos te mi'i nang du skyes kyang lha'i spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te/ des spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni/ lha'i nang na shi 'phos pa'o/ /zhes bdag nyid kyis shes
283a5(dkon brtsegs): par bya zhing / des spyod pa de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/ de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag tshangs par
283a6(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa mchog tu 'dzin pa'i nyes pa ston cing / mi gnas pa'i tshangs par spyod pa'i yon tan brjod do/ /mchog tu 'dzin pa'i sbyin pa la smod cing mchog tu 'dzin pa
283a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i sbyin pa bsngags par 'gyur ro/ /mchog tu 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims la smod cing mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'i tshul khrims la bsngags par 'gyur ro/ /des
283b1(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa bag la nyal dang bcas par spong bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ de bsgoms
283b2(dkon brtsegs): pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de la thabs mkhas pa yang ston te/ de dang ldan pas myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung
283b3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro/ /kun tu rgyu dag /de la sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten te dus gsum mnyam pa nyid mnyan
283b4(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ /thos nas kyang shes cher gnas par bya ste/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag na dge
283b5(dkon brtsegs): slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / 'khor bzhi po yod pa dag tu gnas par bya zhing de dag dang 'grogs par bya'o/ /des 'gro ba byas
283b6(dkon brtsegs): te goms pa'i rjes su 'gro bas chos thams cad ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do/ /zhes dus gsum mnyam pa nyid mthong du 'gyur ro/ /kun tu rgyu dag /de la dud
283b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten te gti mug gi gnyen por bstan bcos la mkhas pa'i skye bo dang lhan
284a1(dkon brtsegs): cig dga' bar gnas par bya'o/ /des de'i gti mug spong bar 'gyur te/ des bstan bcos de dang / bstan bcos shes pa de dag
284a2(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin gyis yang dag par brtag par bya'o/ /de'i phyir de la bstan bcos dang / bstan bcos shes pa rnams kyang rang bzhin med do/ /drang bzhin med do/ /zhes
284a3(dkon brtsegs): bya bar snang bar gyur te/ des de la dus gsum mnyam pa nyid mngon du 'gyur zhing / myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /kun tu rgyu
284a4(dkon brtsegs): dag / de la gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni/ gang la brten na sbyin pa'i blo skye bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gis de la dus gsum mnyam
284a5(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid dang / gang 'di mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig mngon du 'gyur ba dang / de bsgoms pas myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur
284a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten par bya/ yon tan la brten par bya'o// //bam po bcu gnyis pa/ kun tu rgyu dag /de la lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'i gang
284a7(dkon brtsegs): zag gis ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten te nyon mongs pa'i 'dud dang 'thab par bya'o/ /'di sta ste/ nga rgyal zhes bya ba'i chos de ni/ gang zhig /de ni/ ci
284b1(dkon brtsegs): zhig gis yongs su bzung / de ni/ su las kun nas langs/ su zhig de spang bar byed ces de yang dag par btsal na/ nga rgyal de mi dmigs so/ /gang gis de yongs
284b2(dkon brtsegs): su bzung ba dang / gang la de kun nas langs pa dang / gang de spang ba'i phyir rtsol ba de yang mi dmigs pa de ni/ yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su bzung bas bdag
284b3(dkon brtsegs): dang 'jig rten bslus par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /des chos thams cad rang bzhin med par yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing chos gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni /
284b4(dkon brtsegs): dngos po med pa'o/ /zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dngos po med pas yongs su ma grub bo/ /zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ yongs su ma grub pas mi skye ba ste/ gang ma
284b5(dkon brtsegs): skye ba de ni/ mi 'gag go/ /gang mi skye 'gag pa de ni/ gdags su med pa'o/ /zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /gang gdags su med pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/
284b6(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no/ /gang du gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni/ thob pa yang ma yin/ chud zos pa yang ma yin no/ /zhes bya bar
284b7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu shes so/ /kun tu rgyu dag /de ltar na/ de ni/ chos thams cad kyi chos nyid de/ chos nyid gang gis thams cad de bzhin nyid/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma
285a1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de bzhin nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang de bzhin nyid/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid pas de'i
285a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir chos thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /kun tu rgyu dag/ ngas ni/ sngon chad dang / da ltar yang 'jig rten brtags pa ni/ nga rgyal gyi rang bzhin no/ /zhes
285a3(dkon brtsegs): bshad de/ nga rgyal gyis ni/ mi las shi 'phos pa gdags par 'gyur ro/ /nga rgyal gyis ni/ mtho ris nas shi 'phos pa gdags par 'gyur ro/ /nga rgyal gyis
285a4(dkon brtsegs): ni| sems can dmyal ba'i bar du shi 'phos pa gdags par 'gyur ro/ /nga rgyal med na/ gdags pa med do/ /kun tu rgyu dag /de ni/ nga rgyal med pa'i ye shes
285a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o/ /de yang thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pas shes par nus so/ /
285a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas kun tu rgyu drug khri bo de dag gis bstan pa 'di thos nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te/ de dag ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas stan
285a7(dkon brtsegs): las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang de'i tshe bcom ldan
285b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ mgon po ye shes stobs kyis yang dag 'phags/ /'gro ba kun la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /'gro ba
285b2(dkon brtsegs): kun na spyod pa rnams gzigs te/ /lag pa'i mthil du skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin/ /'jig rten lta ba'i rnam pas kun tu dkrigs/ /sprin stug dag gis nam mkha' yog pa
285b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin| |de dag gis ni byis pa rmongs nas spyod/ /long ba'i tshogs rnams rab tu lam stor bzhin/ /'jig rten rtag dang 'jig rten mi rtag dang / /rtag kyang rtag la mi rtag kha
285b4(dkon brtsegs): cig mchi/ /rtag pa ma yin mi rtag min zhes te/ /glang po'i dbang po khyim du btags ltar brlag/ /'jig rten mtha' yod 'jig rten mtha' med dang / /mtha' yang yod la
285b5(dkon brtsegs): mtha' med kha cig mchi/ /mtha' yod ma yin mtha' med min ces te/ /dper na bya ni gzeb tu bcug pa bzhin/ /la la dag ni lus la bdag ces mchi/ /la la dag ni
285b6(dkon brtsegs): lus 'di gzhan zhes mchi/ /rtog pas yongs su dkris nas nyal bgyid de/ /bya ni bya rgyar chud nas thogs pa bzhin/ /la la dag ni dbang phyug sprul zhes mchi/ /la la rgyu
285b7(dkon brtsegs): med byung zhes 'dogs par bgyid/ /lta ba'i rnam pa dag gis kun nas dkris/ /mkha' la gnas pa'i zla ltar rgyal bas gzigs/ /ji ltar gzeb tu bcug pa'i bya rmongs
286a1(dkon brtsegs): pa| |pu ga bu gar thar du re ba ltar/ /mi mkhas lta ba'i rnam pas 'das par 'gyur/ /thar pa mi thob rkang gnyis btags pa bzhin/ /tshangs
286a2(dkon brtsegs): dang skye rgu bdag dang skem byed dang / /gzhon dang 'khor lo 'dzin dang rnam thos bu/ /phyogs dang rgya mtsho kun la phyag 'tshal te/ /rgyal pos mtshan mo rkun po bzung ba
286a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin| |dbul po bu lon chags pa bu lon pas/ /bzung na gnyen sbron gsol ba 'debs pa bzhin/ /lha ba'i rnam par gnas pa'i byis pa dag /dbang phyug las
286a4(dkon brtsegs): ni bde ba tshol bgyid pa/ /rkun po'i tshogs rnams btson rar stsal ba bzhin/ /'gro ba rnams su sdug bsngal brgya myong ba/ /de dag de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis
286a5(dkon brtsegs): gzigs/ /phyag gi mthong na sor mo lnga dang mtshungs/ /de la mi dbang thugs rje bskyed nas ni/ /'gro ba mkhyen pa 'gro ba spyod mdzad de/ /blo mchog tshe rabs 'gro ba
286a6(dkon brtsegs): bkrol ba ni/ /dper na rgyal pos btson rnams bkye ba bzhin/ /'jig rten sman slad bskal pa bsam yas su/ /dka' ba mdzad nas byang chub mchog brnyes te/ /lta
286a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rnam par sems can 'khyams mkhyen nas/ /de dag bcings las khyod kyis grol bar mdzad/ /bde gshegs mi yi seng+ge rkang gnyis gtso/ /chos tshogs gang la
286b1(dkon brtsegs): mnga' dbang khyod mdzad pa/ /lta ba'i rnam pa sgyu 'drar rmongs mi mnga'/ /bde gshegs khyod ni de 'drar bdag cag 'tshal/ /stobs rnams gang gis rgyal ba stobs brnyes
286b2(dkon brtsegs): shing / /mi 'jigs gang gis bsngo ba'i dgra bsal te/ /'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra sgrog pa/ /blo mchog de ni bdag cag thob par shog /gang gis rgyal ba 'jig rten
286b3(dkon brtsegs): gsum bskyod dang / /gang gis mtha' yas 'od ni 'gyed pa dang / /bdag gis mi mchog sems can lung ston pa/ /de ring yud kyis bdag cag de thob shog /de nas
286b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu rgyu de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das
286b5(dkon brtsegs): la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'jig rten phan bzhed 'dzum pa gang mdzad pa/ /mu stegs tshogs 'di shin tu 'phags gyur tam/ /mi mchog rang byung ci slad 'dzum
286b6(dkon brtsegs): pa mdzad/ /'dzum rgyu de ni khyod kyis bka' stsal gsol/ /bde bar gshegs pas 'dzum pa mdzad mthong nas/ /'jig rten phan bzhed 'gro 'di the tshom 'tshal/ /zla ba
286b7(dkon brtsegs): nya la 'gro ba blta ba bzhin/ /blta zhing mchis na rgyal ba 'dzum rgyu gsungs/ /su zhig rgyal la mchod pa dam pa bgyis/ /gang gis de ring yab ni mnyes par bgyis//
287a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i yon tan de ring gang gis mthong / /mkhas pa myur du legs par bka' stsal gsol/ /mu stegs can rnams lung bstan de

287a3(dkon brtsegs): the tshom legs par bsal du gsol/ /som nyi 'tshal ba'i som nyi dgum du gsol/ /des na 'khor rnams 'di yid rangs shing gnas/ /sangs rgyas khyod kyi dgongs
287a4(dkon brtsegs): la dad par mchi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul khyod kyis dus 'di shes gyur na/ /rgyal

287a6(dkon brtsegs): pa| |'dzum rgyu ngas de khyod la bstan par bya'i/ /yang dag ji bzhin nga yi bstan pa la/ /dga' ba'i yid du byos te deng nyon cig /mu stegs tshogs 'di rab tu dul

287b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi rgyal ba dag la dad bskyed de/ /thugs rje ldan pa rkang gnyis dam pa po/ /rgyal ba bye ba nyi shur tshang ba la/ /bla med byang chub tshol zhing bsnyen bkur byas/ /rgyal ba

287b6(dkon brtsegs): pas lta ba'i rnam pa spangs/ /ston pa'i dgongs pa yang dag rnam par rtogs/ /ston pa'i dgongs pa rnams la dad pa gnas/ /ma 'ongs dus na byang chub tshol byed
287b7(dkon brtsegs): cing / /rgyal ba bye ba bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur/ /ma 'ongs bskal pa skar ma 'dra ba la/ /rgyal ba nga rgyal bcom pa mtshan mthun pa/ /grags pa chen por phyogs su rnam
288a1(dkon brtsegs): par grags/ /'jig rten mkhas pa 'gro ba 'grel bar 'gyur/ /de dag sangs rgyas zhing yang dag 'gyur te/ /de dag bkod pa sna tshogs
288a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa med/ /sangs rgyas zhing der sdig pa'i blo can med/ /blo gros dag par mthun pa sha stag gnas/ /de ni ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyangs/ /mi khom

292a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'byung ba yang ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo / /rgyal po chen po/ sa'i khams ni/ tha snyad tsam ma gtogs par sa'i khams nyid du mi dmigs te/ tha snyad de yang bud
292a6(dkon brtsegs): med ma yin/ skyes pa ma yin gyi/ rgyal po chen po/ de ltar de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi shes rab kyis rtogs shig /rgyal po chen po/ de la chu'i khams ni /
292a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa gnyis te/ nang gi dang / phyi rol gyi'o/ /nang gi chu'i khams gang zhe na/ gang ci yang rung ste/ lus 'di la nang gi khong na chu dang / chu'i rnam pa dang / chu nyid
292b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / rlan pa dang / rlan pa'i rnam pa dang / rlan pa nyid dang / gsher ba nyid dang / lus su gtogs pa dang / zin pa'o/ /de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mchi ma
292b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / rdul dang / mchil ma dang / snabs dang / chu ser dang / tshil bu dang / mkhris pa dang / ngar snabs dang / rnag dang / khrag dang / 'o ma dang / gcin dang /
292b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang gang lus 'di la nang gi khong na chu dang / chu'i rnam pa dang / chu nyid dang / rlan pa dang / rlan pa'i rnam pa dang / rlan pa nyid dang / gsher ba nyid dang / lus
292b4(dkon brtsegs): su gtogs pa dang / zin pa 'di ni/ nang gi chu'i khams zhes bya'o/ /phyi rol gyi chu'i khams gang zhe na/ gang phyi rol gyi chu dang / chu'i rnam pa dang / chu nyid dang / rlan
292b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rlan pa'i rnam pa dang / rlan pa nyid dang / gsher ba nyid dang / lus su ma gtogs pa dang / ma zin pa 'di ni/ phyi rol gyi chu'i khams zhes bya'o/ /rgyal po
292b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po| de la nang gi chu'i khams 'byung ba'i tshe gang nas kyang mi 'ong ngo / /rgyal po chen po/ sdug pa mthong na mchi ma 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa dang / chos
292b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi shugs kyis mchi ma 'byung ba dang / rlung gis btab bam/ rnam pa gzhan dag gis kyang mchi ma 'byung ste/ dpyad byas pas kyang nang gi chu'i khams 'phel bar 'gyur
293a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dus de yod de/ rgyal po chen po/ chu'i khams de 'byung ba'i tshe gang nas kyang mi 'ong ngo / /rgyal po chen po/ gang nang gi chu'i khams
293a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su skam par 'gyur ba'i dus de yod de/ de yongs su skam zhing 'gag pa'i tshe gang du'ang mi 'gro'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ gang nang gi me'i khams shas che bar
293a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur na| des nang gi chu'i khams yongs su gdung bar gyur pa'i dus de yod de/ gdungs pa'i tshe gang du'ang mi 'gro'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin du nang gi chu'i
293a4(dkon brtsegs): khams 'byung ba'i tshe gang nas kyang mi 'ong / /'gag pa'i tshe gang du'ang mi 'gro'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ gang 'jig rten 'di chags par 'gyur ba'i dus de yod de /
293a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di chags par 'gyur ba'i tshe nam mkha' 'di la kun tu sprin shin tu stug po'i tshogs sum cu rtsa gnyis 'khrigs par 'gyur te/ de dag
293a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khrigs pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad yog par 'gyur te/ de las bskal pa bar ma lnga'i bar
293a7(dkon brtsegs): du gshol mda' tsam gyi char gyi rgyun 'bab bo/ /bskal pa bar ma lnga'i bar du glang po che'i pho mtshan tsam gyi char 'bab bo/ /bskal pa bar ma lnga'i bar du rgyun mi 'chad
293b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i char 'bab bo/ /bskal pa bar ma lnga'i bar du thigs pa chen po'i char 'bab bo/ /nges sa chen 'di nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du chus khyab par gang bar 'gyur
293b2(dkon brtsegs): te| rgyal po chen po/ chu'i phung po chen po de 'byung ba'i tshe'ang gang nas kyang mi 'ong ngo / /rgyal po chen po/ gang 'jig rten 'di 'jig par 'gyur ba'i dus de yod de/ 'jig
293b3(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams 'jig par 'gyur ba'i tshe nyi ma gnyis 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ nyi ma gnyis 'jig rten du byung bas chu mig dang / chu bran rnams skam par 'gyur
293b4(dkon brtsegs): ro| |de nas nyi ma gsum 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ nyi ma gsum 'jig rten du byung bas chu mig chen po dang / chu klung chen po rnams skam par 'gyur ro/ /de nas nyi ma bzhi
293b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ nyi ma bzhi 'jig rten du byung bas gang na chu klung chen po bzhi po 'di dag 'bab pa'i mtsho chen po ma dros pa de yang yongs su skam par 'gyur ro//
293b6(dkon brtsegs): thim par 'gyur te med par 'gyur ro/ /de nas nyi ma lnga 'jig rten du byung ste/ nyi ma lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bas rgya mtsho chen po yang dpag tshad gcig tsam gyi chu yongs su zad
293b7(dkon brtsegs): cing yongs su 'grib par 'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / dpag tshad lnga bcu tsam gyi chu
294a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su zad cing yongs su 'grib par 'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad brgya dang / nyis brgya dang / sum brgya dang / bzhi brgya dang / dpag tshad
294a2(dkon brtsegs): lnga brgya dang / dpag tshad stong dang / nyis stong dang / sum stong dang / dpag tshad bzhi stong tsam du rgya mtsho chen po las chu yongs su zad cing yongs su 'grib par 'gyur
294a3(dkon brtsegs): ro| |rgyal po chen po/ rgya mtsho chen po la dpag tshad bzhi khri'i chu lus par 'gyur ba dang / dpag tshad sum khri dang / nyi khri dang / khri dang / dgu stong dang / brgyad stong
294a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / bdun stong dang / drug stong dang / lnga stong dang / bzhi stong dang / sum stong dang / nyis stong dang / stong gi chu lus par 'gyur ba dang / dpag tshad dgu brgya'i chu
294a5(dkon brtsegs): lus par 'gyur ba dang / dpag tshad brgyad brgya dang / bdun brgya dang / drug brgya dang / lnga brgya dang / bzhi brgya dang / sum brgya dang / nyis brgya dang / brgya'i chu lus par
294a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / dpag tshad lnga bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang / sum cu dang / nyi shu dang / bcu dang / dgu dang / brgyad dang / bdun dang / drug dang / lnga dang / bzhi dang / gsum
294a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / gnyis dang / dpag tshad gcig gi chu lus par 'gyur ba dang / shing ta la bcu dang / dgu dang / brgyad dang / bdun dang / drug dang / lnga dang / bzhi dang / gsum
294b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / gnyis dang / shing ta la gcig tsam gyi chu lus par 'gyur ba dang / mi 'greng bcu dang / dgu dang / brgyad dang / bdun dang / drug dang / lnga dang / bzhi dang / gsum
294b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / mi 'greng gnyis tsam gyi chu lus par 'gyur ba dang / lkog ma nub tsam dang / mchan khung nub tsam dang / lte ba nub tsam dang / pus mo nub tsam gyi chu lus par
294b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba nas ba lang gi mig rjes kyi chu tsam gyi bar du lus par 'gyur ba'i dus de yod do/ /rgyal po chen po/ gang rgya mtsho chen po las zil pa phram phrum tsam lus par
294b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i dus de yod do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ char pa'i thigs pa chen po bab na/ sa chen po la thogs mar zil pa phram phrum tsam du 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po/ de
294b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du rgya mtsho chen po de yang zil pa phram phrum tsam lus par 'gyur ba'i dus de yod do/ /rgyal po chen po/ gang rgya mtsho chen po la mdzub mo bsnun pa tsam gyi chu'ang ma
294b6(dkon brtsegs): lus par 'gyur ba'i dus de yod do/ /rgyal po chen po/ de tsam du chu'i khams de 'gags pa'i tshe'ang gang du'ang mi 'gro ste/ shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub
294b7(dkon brtsegs): phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs mtshams su mi 'gro'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ chu'i khams de ni/ skye ba yang stong / 'jig pa yang stong / gnas
295a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshe'ang chu'i khams de rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rgyal po chen po/ chu'i khams de ni/ tha snyad tsam ma gtogs par chu'i khams kyis
295a2(dkon brtsegs): stong zhing mi dmigs pa ste/ tha snyad de yang bud med ma yin/ skyes pa ma yin no/ /de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis rtogs shig /
295a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po/ de la me'i khams ni/ rnam pa gnyis te/ nang gi dang / phyi rol gyi'o/ nang gi me'i khams gang zhe na/ gang ci yang rung ste/ lus 'di la me dang /
295a4(dkon brtsegs): me'i rnam pa dang / dro ba dang / dro ba'i rnam pa dang / lus la gtogs pa dang / zin pa'o/ /de yang gang zhe na/ gang gis lus 'di gdungs pa dang / kun tu gdung ba dang / yongs su gdung ba
295a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / gang gis zos pa dang / 'thungs pa dang / 'chos pa dang / myang ba rnams bde zhing legs par zhu bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gi shas ches na/ rims so/ /
295a6(dkon brtsegs): rims so/ /zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba dang / gzhan yang gang lus 'di la nang gi khong na me dang / me'i rnam pa dang / dro ba dang / dro ba'i rnam pa dang / lus

295b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rnam pa dang / lus su ma gtogs pa dang / ma zin pa ste/ de ni/ mi dag rtsub shing dang ldan pa'am/ rtswa dang ldan pa'am/ ba lang gi lci ba'i bur ma'am/ shing bal
295b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi sgo nga dang ldan par byas shing me 'byin te/ de byung nas grong yang tshig /grong gi phyogs kyang tshig /grong khyer ram/ grong khyer gyi phyogs sam/ yul lam/ yul gyi phyogs
295b3(dkon brtsegs): sam| gling ngam/ rtswa'i gtos sam/ nags sam/ shing ngam/ rtswa'am/ ba lang gi lci ba dag bsreg cing 'gro ba dang / gzhan yang gang tshul 'di dang 'dra ba 'di ni/ phyi
295b4(dkon brtsegs): rol gyi me'i khams zhes bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ de la phyi rol gyi me'i khams ni/ 'byung ba'i tshe'ang gang nas kyang mi 'ong / /'gag pa'i tshe yang gang du yang gsog par mi
295b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ste| de ni/ rang bzhin dang bral ba'i phyir med pa las yod par 'gyur zhing / yod par gyur nas kyang med par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po/ de la rlung gi khams kyang
295b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa gnyis te/ nang gi dang / phyi rol gyi'o/ /de la nang gi rlung gi khams she na/ gang lus 'di la rlung dang / rlung gi rnam pa dang / yang ba nyid dang / g.yo ba nyid dang /

296a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyab tu gnas pa dang / lto na gnas pa dang / 'chad par byed pa dang / 'gag par byed pa dang / gzer ba dang / 'dar bu dang / sna skad
296a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / rlung skran dang / dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa dang ldan pa dang / yan lag dang ldan pa dang / yan lag dang nyid lag la gnas pa'i rlung dag dang / gzhan
296a3(dkon brtsegs): yang gang dag lus 'di la nang gi khong na rlung dang / rlung gi rnam pa dang / yang ba nyid dang / g.yo ba nyid dang / lus su gtogs pa dang / zin pa 'di ni/ nang gi rlung

296a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ma zin pa dag ste/ phyi rol gyi rlung de la yang shar phyogs kyi rlung yod do/ /lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs kyi rlung yod do/ /rdul dang bcas
296a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rdul med pa dang / chung ba dang / che ba'i rlung yod do/ /kun tu khyab pa'i rlung dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i rlung dang / tshub ma'i rlung dag kyang yod do/ /rgyal po
296a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po| rlung gi phung po chen po langs na/ shing dag kyang gcog /rtsig pa'i kha dog dang / ri'i rtse mo dag kyang bsnyil zhing / bsnyil nas rmog med par 'gyur ba dag dang //
296b1(dkon brtsegs): yang sems can dag gos kyi mtha' ma'am/ sbud pa'am/ rlung yab dag gis rlung de g.yob pa'i dus de yod de/ gzhan yang gang tshul 'di dang 'dra ba de ni/ phyi rol gyi
296b2(dkon brtsegs): rlung gi khams zhes bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ de la nang dang / phyi'i rlung gi khams ni/ 'byung ba'i tshe'ang gang las kyang mi 'ong / 'gag pa'i tshe'ang gang du yang gsog
296b3(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gro ste/ rang bzhin dang bral ba'i phyir med pa las yod par 'gyur zhing / yod par gyur nas kyang med par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po/ de la nam mkha'i khams
296b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang rnam pa gnyis te/ nang gi dang / phyi rol gyi'o/ /nang gi nam mkha'i khams gang zhe na/ gang ci yang rung ste/ lus 'di la nang gi khong na lus la yod pa dang / zin
296b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / nam mkha' dang / nam mkha'i dam pa nang zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba ma gang ba/ pags pa dang / sha dang / khrag gis dgang bar bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /de
296b6(dkon brtsegs): yang gang zhe na/ lus 'di la mig gi nang zhe'am/ rna ba dang / sna'i nang zhe'am/ kha zhe'am/ kha'i nang zhe'am/ kha'i sgo zhe'am/ lkog ma zhe'am/ mid pa zhe'am /
296b7(dkon brtsegs): gang nas mid ba dang / gang du gnas pa dang / gang gis zos pa dang / 'thungs pa dang / 'chos pa dang / myangs pa rnams thur du rgyu bar byed pa dang / gzhan yang gang lus
297a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di la nang gi khong na lus la yod pa dang / zin pa dang / phung por gyur pa'am/ khams su gyur pa'am/ skye mched du gyur pa dag gi
297a2(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' dang / nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / ma gang ba dang / pags pa dang / sha dang / khrag gis dgang bar bya ba ma yin pa nang gi grangs su 'gro ba khong stong
297a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / bu ga zhes bya ba dag ste/ de ni/ nang gi nam mkha'i khams so/ /phyi rol gyi nam mkha'i khams gang zhe na/ gang ci yang rung ste/ phyi rol gyi nam mkha'
297a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / ma gang ba dang / gzugs su gyur pas dgang bar bya ba ma yin pa/ ma 'dres pa/ khong stong dang / bu gar gyur pa 'di ni/ phyi rol
297a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi nam mkha'i khams zhes bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ gang las kyi rkyen gyis skye mched rnams 'byung ba'i dus de yod de/ de dag nam mkha'i khams la sgrib par
297a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ de nang gi nam mkha'i khams zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro yang de ni/ gang las kyang ma 'ongs so/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzugs zhig na/ thams cad nam
297a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhar 'gyur ba'i dus de yod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha'i khams ni/ zad mi shes pa'i phyir ro/ /de ni/ nam mkha'i khams zhes bya ste/ gnas shing mi
297b1(dkon brtsegs): g.yo ba'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'dus ma byas ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings te/ de bzhin du nam mkha'i khams kyang thams cad du song
297b2(dkon brtsegs): bar blta bar bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi zhig gis thang la khron pa'am/ rdzing bu'am/ khron ring ngam/ rdzing zhig brkos na/ rgyal po chen po/
297b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di la ji snyam du sems/ de'i nam mkha' de gang las 'ongs/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ gang nas kyang ma mchis so/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'di lta ste /
297b4(dkon brtsegs): dper na/ mi des khron pa nas rdzing gi bar de dag phyir bkang na/ rgyal po chen po/ de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i nam mkha' de gang du song / gsol pa/ bcom ldan
297b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das| de ni/ gang du yang ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ nam mkha'i khams ni/ 'gro ba'am 'ong bar nye bar gnas pa ma lags/ bud med kyi dngos po dang /
297b6(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa'i dngos por nye bar gnas pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de ltar na/ phyi rol gyi nam mkha'i khams ni/ mi g.yo mi 'gyur
297b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'o| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha'i khams ni/ nam mkha'i khams kyis stong zhing / nam mkha'i khams ni/ nam mkha'i khams dang bral ba ste/ nam mkha'i khams
298a1(dkon brtsegs): ni| bud med kyi dngos por nye bar mi gnas/ skyes pa'i dngos por nye bar mi gnas kyi/ de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag
298a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shes rab kyis rtogs shig / rgyal po chen po/ de la rnam par shes pa'i khams gang zhe na/ mig gi dbang po ni/ bdag po dmigs/ gzugs ni/ dmigs
298a3(dkon brtsegs): pa| gzugs so sor rnam par rig pa ste/ sngon po rnam par rig pa'am/ ser po dang / dmar po dang / khra bo rnam par rig pa'am/ ring po dang / thung ngu dang /
298a4(dkon brtsegs): sbom po dang / phra mo rnam par rig pa ste/ rgyal po chen po/ de ltar gang ci yang rung / kha dog dang / dbyibs rnam par rig pa 'di ni/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams
298a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o/ de bzhin du gang ci yang rung / rna ba'i dbang po ni/ bdag po nas yid kyi dbang po ni/ bdag po/ chos ni/ dmigs pa ste/ sgra rnam par rig pa'am/ dri
298a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rig pa'am/ ro rnam par rig pa'am/ reg rnam par rig pa'am/ chos rnam par rig pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams nas yid kyi rnam par shes
298a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bar gyi khams zhes bya ste/ de ltar dbang po drug ni/ bdag po/ yul drug ni/ dmigs pa yin la/ yul rnam par rig pa 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams
298b1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ rnam par shes pa'i khams de ni/ dbang po la mi brten/ yul rnams las ma 'ongs/ bar gyi dbus na mi gnas te/ de ni/ nang na yang
298b2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ phyi rol na yang ma yin/ gnyi ga med pa la yang ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams de ni/ dngos po so sor rnam par rig nas 'gag ste/ de 'byung
298b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshe gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ 'gag pa'i tshe gang du yang mi 'gro'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams de 'byung ba yang stong / 'jig pa yang stong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i
298b4(dkon brtsegs): khams de byung yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rgyal po chen po/ de ltar na/ tha snyad ma gtogs par rnam par shes pa'i khams de ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid
298b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis stong ste/ tha snyad de yang skyes pa ma yin/ bud med ma yin gyi/ de ni/ de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis rtogs shig /rgyal po
298b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po/ de la mig gi skye mched gang zhe na/ de ni/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ba ste/ 'di ltar sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams
298b7(dkon brtsegs): so| |de la sa'i khams dang ba ni/ mig gi skye mched ma yin no/ /chu'i khams dang ba yang ma yin no/ /me'i khams dang ba yang ma yin no/ /rlung gi khams dang ba yang
299a1(dkon brtsegs): mig gi skye mched ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa'i khams dang ba ni/ chos gang la yang skye mched dam/ skye mched thob par bya bar
299a2(dkon brtsegs): nye bar mi gnas so/ /de bzhin du rlung gi bar gyi khams dang ba ni/ chos gang la yang skye mched dam/ skye mched thob par bya bar nye bar mi gnas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
299a3(dkon brtsegs): chos de dag ni/ sems pa med cing byed pa med la ci yang mi nus pa ste/ rgyal po chen po/ chos rnams ni/ re re nas btsal na tha snyad tsam ma gtogs par mig gi skye
299a4(dkon brtsegs): mched mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa'i khams dang ba ni/ sa'i khams dang bas stong / rlung gi khams dang ba'i bar ni/ rlung gi khams dang bas stong ste/ chos
299a5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag rang bzhin gyis stong pa de dag la dang ba'am/ 'khrugs par 'gyur ba'ang ga la yod de/ gang la dang ba'am/ 'khrugs pa mi dmigs pa de dag ji ltar gzugs
299a6(dkon brtsegs): la lta bar 'gyur/ de ltar mig gi skye mched ni/ mig gi skye mched kyi rang bzhin gyis shin tu stong ste/ de ni/ 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba med pa'i phyir sngon gyi mthar mi
299a7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs so/ /phyi ma'i mthar yang mi dmigs so/ /rang bzhin med pa'i phyir de la gnas pa yang mi dmigs so/ /gang rang bzhin gyis med pa de ni/ bud med kyang ma
299b1(dkon brtsegs): yin| skyes pa yang ma yin no/ /gang bud med kyang ma yin/ skyes pa yang ma yin pa de ni/ des rlom sems su ni/ ga la 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po/ rlom sems ni/ bdud
299b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod yul lo/ /rlom sems med pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni/ rlom sems dang bral ba'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ yang
299b3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs na/ mig gi skye mched ni/ mig gi skye mched kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi skye mched 'di la ni/ mtshan ma med de/ de'i phyir mig
299b4(dkon brtsegs): gi skye mched kyi mtshan ma 'di ni/ mig gi skye mched kyis stong ste/ 'di ni/ stong pa nyid do/ /mig gi skye mched ni/ mtshan mas mtshan ma dang bral ba ste/ 'di ni/ mtshan
299b5(dkon brtsegs): ma med pa'o/ /de ni/ smon par mi byed pas 'di ni/ smon pa med pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ de ltar na/ mig gi skye mched ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum ste/ mig gi skye
299b6(dkon brtsegs): mched ni/ rnam par thar pa la mngon par phyogs pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ de la rna ba'i skye mched nas lus kyi skye mched kyi bar gang zhe na/ gang 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang
299b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o| |rgyal po chen po/ de ltar na/ chos thams cad kyi bar ni/ rnam par thar pa la mngon par phyogs pa/ chos kyi dbyings su nges pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas klas
300a1(dkon brtsegs): pa| gdags su med pa/ tha snyad med pa/ brjod pa med pa/ brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ gang la dbang po rnams thogs
300a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba de ni/ yul rnams zhes bya ste/ mig ni/ gzugs rnams la thogs par 'gyur bas de'i phyir gzugs rnams ni/ mig gi yul zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin
300a3(dkon brtsegs): du rna ba ni/ sgra rnams la/ sna ni/ dri rnams la/ lce ni/ ro rnams la/ lus ni/ reg bya rnams la/ yid ni/ chos rnams la thogs par 'gyur bas de'i phyir chos
300a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni/ yid kyi yul zhes bya'o/ /de la mig gzugs rnams la thogs so/ /zhes bya ba 'di ni/ 'bab pa'i thogs par 'gyur bar bstan te/ 'di ltar mig ni/
300a5(dkon brtsegs): gzugs rnams la rnam pa gsum du 'bab ste/ mthun pa rnams la sdug pa'i 'du shes kyis 'bab pa dang / mi mthun pa rnams la khong khro ba'i 'du shes kyis 'bab
300a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mthun pa yang ma yin/ mi mthun pa yang ma yin pa rnams la btang snyoms kyi 'du shes kyis 'bab pa'o/ /de bzhin du yid ni/ chos rnams la thogs par
300a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba 'di ni/ 'bab pa'i thogs par 'gyur bar bstan te/ 'di ltar yid ni/ chos rnams la rnam pa gsum du 'bab ste/ mthun pa rnams la rjes
300b1(dkon brtsegs): su chags pas 'bab pa dang / mi mthun pa rnams la khong khro bas 'bab pa dang / mthun pa yang ma yin/ mi mthun pa yang ma yin pa rnams la rmongs pas 'bab pa'i yul
300b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni/ yid kyi spyod yul zhes bya ste/ de la yid spyod cing rnam par spyod pas de'i phyir yid kyi spyod yul zhes bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ yid de mthun pa'i gzugs
300b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la rjes su chags par spyod pa des ni/ de'i 'dod chags skye bar 'gyur/ mi mthun pa'i gzugs rnams la khong khro bar spyod pa des ni/ de'i zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur/
300b4(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa yang ma yin/ mi mthun pa yang ma yin pa rnams la rmongs par spyod pa des ni/ de'i gti mug skye bar 'gyur/ de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rnams
300b5(dkon brtsegs): la yang chos rnam pa gsum la dmigs pa myong bar 'gyur te/ rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang / rmongs par 'gyur ba'o/ /yid kyi shes bya mthun pa'i chos rnams
300b6(dkon brtsegs): la rjes su chags par spyod pa des ni/ de'i 'dod chags skye bar 'gyur/ mi mthun pa'i chos rnams la khong khro bar spyod pa des ni/ de'i zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur/ mthun pa yang
300b7(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ mi mthun pa yang ma yin pa'i chos rnams la rmongs par spyod pa des ni/ de'i gti mug skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po/ de la dbang po rnams ni/ sgyu ma lta bu /
301a1(dkon brtsegs): yul rnams ni/ rmi lam lta bur shes par bya ste/ rgyal po chen po/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na yul gyi bzang
301a2(dkon brtsegs): mo dang lhan cig tu yongs su spyod par rmi lam/ de la nyal ba las sad na/ bud med yul gyi bzang mo de rjes su dran par gyur na/ rgyal po chen po/ de la ji snyam du sems/
301a3(dkon brtsegs): rmi lam na mthong ba'i yul gyi bzang mo de yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma mchis so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ 'di la ji snyam du
301a4(dkon brtsegs): sems| skyes bu gang rmi lam na yul gyi bzang mo mthong ba'i bud med de dag lhan cig rtse ba dang / dga' ba dang / mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin
301a5(dkon brtsegs): can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ rmi lam na mthong ba'i yul gyi bzang mo de ni /
301a6(dkon brtsegs): shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de dang lhan cig yongs su spyod pa lta ga la mchis te/ gzhan du na gang de la mngon par zhen pa'i mi de ni/ phongs shing
301a7(dkon brtsegs): dub pa'i skal pa can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ /de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa yang mig gis
301b1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs mthong na/ yid bde bar 'gyur ba rnams la mngon par zhen par 'gyur te/ de mngon par zhen pas rjes su chags par 'gyur ro/ /rjes su chags par gyur nas yongs
301b2(dkon brtsegs): su chags par 'gyur ro/ /yongs su chags par gyur nas 'dod chags las byung ba'i las lus kyis rnam pa gsum/ ngag gis ni/ rnam pa bzhi/ yid kyis ni/ rnam pa
301b3(dkon brtsegs): gsum mngon par 'du byed de/ de las mngon par 'du byas pa de yang thog ma nyid nas zad cing 'gags la bral zhing rnam par gyur pa ste/ shar phyogs su brten te
301b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ma yin/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs mtshams rnams su brten te gnas pa ma yin/ 'di na ma yin/
301b5(dkon brtsegs): pha gi na ma yin/ bar ma don ma yin te/ dus gzhan zhig na 'chi ba'i dus dang tshod nye bar gnas pa'i tshe srog gi dbang po 'gags te tshe yongs su zad cing de dang / skal ba
301b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba'i las rnams kyang zad nas rnam par shes pa tha ma 'gag pa'i tshe 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyal nyal ba las sad pa'i yul gyi bzang mo dang 'dra bar yid kyis dmigs
301b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po/ de la rnam par shes pa tha ma'i dbang dang / las dmigs pa de dang / rkyen gnyis kyis skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i rnam par shes pa dang
302a1(dkon brtsegs): po 'byung ste/ yang na ni/ sems can dmyal bar/ yang na ni/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su/ yang na ni/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du/
302a2(dkon brtsegs): yang na ni/ lha ma yin gyi ris su/ yang na ni/ mi'i nang du/ yang na ni/ lha'i nang du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rnam par shes pa dang po skye ba'i char gtogs pa de 'gags
302a3(dkon brtsegs): ma thag tu bar ma chad par gang la rnam par smin pa de myong bar 'gyur ba mngon pa'i sems kyi rgyud skal ba 'dra ba 'byung ngo / /de la gang rnam par shes pa tha ma 'gag pa
302a4(dkon brtsegs): de ni| 'chi 'pho zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gyur/ gang rnam par shes pa dang po 'byung ba de ni/ skye ba zhes bya ste/ rgyal po chen po/ de ltar na chos gang yang 'jig rten 'di
302a5(dkon brtsegs): nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'pho ba'ang med na/ 'chi 'pho dang skye bar mngon pa'ang yod de/ rgyal po chen po/ rnam par shes pa tha ma de skye ba'i tshe yang gang nas kyang mi
302a6(dkon brtsegs): 'ong / 'gag pa'i tshe yang gang du yang mi 'gro'o/ /las de yang skye ba'i tshe yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong / 'gag pa'i tshe yang gang du yang mi 'gro'o/ /rnam par shes
302a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang po de yang skye ba'i tshe yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong / 'gag pa'i tshe yang gang du yang mi 'gro'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir te/ rnam par shes pa tha
302b1(dkon brtsegs): ma ni| rnam par shes pa tha mas stong / las ni/ las kyis stong / rnam par shes pa dang po ni/ rnam par shes pa dang pos stong / 'chi 'pho ni/ 'chi 'phos stong /
302b2(dkon brtsegs): skye ba ni/ skye bas stong la/ las rnams 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur zhing / rnam par smin pa myong bar mngon pa yang yod de/ de la ming gi brda tsam ma gtogs par byed
302b3(dkon brtsegs): pa po'am za ba po gang yang med do/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na dgra dang 'thab pa zhig rmis la/ nyal nyal pa las sad nas de
302b4(dkon brtsegs): nyid dran par gyur na/ rgyal po chen po/ de la ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam du rmis pa'i dgra de'am/ dgra de dang 'thab pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de
302b5(dkon brtsegs): ni| ma mchis so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ 'di la ji snyam du sems/ 'o na skyes bu gang rmi lam gyi dgra la mngon par zhen pa'am/ dgra dang 'thab par gyur
302b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ rmi lam na mthong ba'i dgra
302b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyang shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de dang 'thab pa lta ga la mchis te/ gzhan du na/ gang de la mngon par zhen pa'i mi de ni/ phongs shing dub pa'i skal
303a1(dkon brtsegs): pa can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa
303a2(dkon brtsegs): yang mig gis gzugs mthong na/ yid mi bde bar gyur pa rnams la yang mngon par zhen par 'gyur te/ mngon par zhen par gyur nas khong khro bar 'gyur/ khong khro
303a3(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur nas zhe sdang bar 'gyur/ zhe sdang bar gyur nas zhe sdang las byung ba'i las lus kyis ni/ rnam pa gsum/ ngag gis ni/ rnam pa bzhi/ yid kyis ni/ rnam pa
303a4(dkon brtsegs): gsum mngon par 'du byed de/ las mngon par 'du byas pa de yang thog ma nyid nas zad cing 'gags la bral zhing rnam par gyur pa ste/ shar phyogs su brten te
303a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ma yin/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs mtshams rnams su brten te gnas pa ma yin/ 'di na ma yin/

303b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis dmigs par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po/ de la rnam par shes pa tha ma'i dbang dang / las dmigs pa de dang / rkyen gnyis kyis skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i rnam par
303b2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang po 'byung ste/ skyes so/ /zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /rnam par shes pa dang po de 'gags ma thag tu bar ma chad par gang la rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur

303b4(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa'i tshe yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong / 'gag pa'i tshe yang gang du yang mi 'gro'o/ /las de dang / skye ba de dang / rnam par shes pa dang po skye ba'i char gtogs pa yang
303b5(dkon brtsegs): de skye ba'i tshe yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong / 'gag pa'i tshe yang gang du yang mi 'gro'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir te/ rnam par shes pa tha ma ni/ rnam par
303b6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa tha mas stong / rnam par shes pa dang po ni/ rnam par shes pa dang pos stong / las ni/ las kyis stong / 'chi 'pho ni/ 'chi 'phos stong / skye ba ni/ skye bas
303b7(dkon brtsegs): stong la| las rnams 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur zhing rnam par smin pa myong bar mngon par yang yod de/ de la ming gi brdar bya ba ma gtogs par byed pa po'am zab po gang
304a1(dkon brtsegs): yang med do/ /bam po bcu gsum pa// //rgyal po chen po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na 'dres non pa rmis te/ 'jig
304a2(dkon brtsegs): pas shin tu rmongs par gyur la/ nyal ba las sad nas 'dre de dang shin tu rmongs par gyur pa de dran par gyur na/ rgyal po chen po/ de ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam na mthong
304a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'dre dang / shin tu rmongs par gyur pa de yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma mchis so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de ji snyam du

304a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ rmi lam gyi 'dre de ni/ shin tu ma mchis na/ shin tu rmongs pa lta ga la mchis te/
304a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du na/ gang de la mngon par zhen pa'i mi de ni/ phongs shing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de
304a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa yang mig gis gzugs mthong na/ btang snyoms su gyur pa rnams la yang mngon par zhen par 'gyur te/ mngon
304b1(dkon brtsegs): par zhen par gyur nas shin tu rmongs par 'gyur ro/ /shin tu rmongs nas kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ro/ /kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa'i gti mug las byung ba'i las lus kyis ni/ rnam
304b2(dkon brtsegs): pa gsum/ ngag gis ni/ rnam pa bzhi/ yid kyis ni/ rnam pa gsum mngon par 'du byed de/ las mngon par 'du byas pa de yang thog ma nyid nas zad cing 'gags
304b3(dkon brtsegs): la bral zhing rnam par gyur pa ste/ shar phyogs su brten te gnas pa ma yin/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs
304b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshams rnams su brten te gnas pa ma yin/ 'di na ma yin/ pha gi na ma yin/ bar ma do na ma yin te/ dus gzhan na 'chi ba'i dus dang tshod nye bar gnas pa'i tshe
304b5(dkon brtsegs): srog gi dbang po 'gags te tshe yang yongs su zad cing de dang skal ba 'dra ba'i las rnams kyang zad nas rnam par shes pa tha ma 'gag pa'i tshe 'di lta ste/ dper na /
304b6(dkon brtsegs): nyal nyal ba las sad pa'i 'dre dang / shin tu rmongs pa dang 'dra bar yid kyis dmigs par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po/ de la rnam par shes pa tha ma'i dbang dang /
304b7(dkon brtsegs): las dmigs pa de dang / rkyen gnyis kyis skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i rnam par shes pa dang po 'byung ste/ rnam par shes pa dang po de byung ste/ rnam par shes pa dang po

305a2(dkon brtsegs): gang rnam par shes pa tha ma 'gag pa de ni/ 'chi 'pho zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gyur/ gang rnam par shes pa dang po 'byung ba de ni/ skye ba zhes bya ste/ rgyal po chen po/ de

305a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshe yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong / 'gag pa'i tshe yang gang du'ang mi 'gro'o/ /las de yang skye ba'i tshe yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong / 'gag pa'i tshe yang gang du'ang mi

305a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa tha ma ni/ rnam par shes pa tha mas stong / las ni/ las kyis stong / rnam par shes pa dang po ni/ rnam par shes pa dang pos stong / 'chi 'pho ni/
305a7(dkon brtsegs): 'chi 'phos stong / skye ba ni/ skye bas stong la/ las rnams 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur bar mngon zhing rnam par smin pa myong bar mngon pa yang yod de/ de la ming gi brda
305b1(dkon brtsegs): tsam ma gtogs par byed pa po'am/ za ba po gang yang med do/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na yul gyi bud med bzang mo glu len
305b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i glu snyan pa dang / pi wang len pa'i sgra snyan pa nyan cing / de glu dang rol mo'i sgra des yongs su spyod pa rmis la/ nyal ba las sad nas glu dang rol mo'i sgra de nyid bran
305b3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na/ rgyal po chen po/ de la ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam na mthong ba'i yul gyi bud med bzang mo dang / glu dang rol mo'i sgra de yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom

305b6(dkon brtsegs): lam na mthong ba'i yul gyi bzang mo de ni/ shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de'i glu dang rol mo'i sgra lta ga la mchis te/ gzhan du na/ gang de la zhen pa'i
305b7(dkon brtsegs): mi de ni| phongs shing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi
306a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa yang rna bas sgra thos na/ yid du 'ong ba rnams la mngon par zhen par 'gyur te/ de mngon par zhen pas rjes su chags par 'gyur
306a2(dkon brtsegs): ro| |rjes su chags par gyur nas yongs su chags par 'gyur ro/ /yongs su chags par gyur pas 'dod chags las byung ba'i las lus kyis ni/ rnam pa gsum/
306a3(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis ni/ rnam pa bzhi/ yid kyis ni/ rnam pa gsum mngon par 'du byed de/ las de mngon par 'du byas pa de yang thog ma nyid nas zad cing 'gags la bral
306a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing rnam par gyur pa ste/ shar phyogs su brten te gnas pa ma yin/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs mtshams
306a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams su brten te gnas pa ma yin/ 'di na ma yin/ pha gi na ma yin/ bar ma do na ma yin te/ dus gzhan na 'chi ba'i dus dang tshod nye bar gnas pa'i tshe srog
306a6(dkon brtsegs): gi dbang po 'gags te tshe yongs su zad cing de dang skal ba 'dra ba'i las rnams kyang zad nas rnam par shes pa tha ma 'gag pa'i tshe 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyal nyal ba las
306a7(dkon brtsegs): sad pa'i yul gyi bzang mo'i glu dang rol mo'i sgra lta bur yid kyis dmigs par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po/ de la rnam par shes pa tha ma'i dbang dang / las kyi dmigs pa
306b1(dkon brtsegs): de dang / rkyen gnyis kyis skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i rnam par shes pa dang po 'byung ste/ rnam par shes pa dang po skye ba'i char gtogs pa de 'gags ma thag tu gang la
306b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba mngon pa'i sems kyi rgyud skal ba 'dra ba 'byung ngo / /de la gang rnam par shes pa tha ma 'gag pa de ni/ 'chi 'pho zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gyur
306b3(dkon brtsegs): ro| |gang rnam par shes pa dang po 'byung ba de ni/ skye ba zhes bya ste/ rgyal po chen po/ de ltar na/ chos gang yang 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'pho ba yang med
306b4(dkon brtsegs): la| 'chi 'pho ba dang skye bar mngon pa yang yod de/ rgyal po chen po/ rnam par shes pa tha ma de skye ba'i tshe yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong / 'gag pa'i tshe yang gang du yang mi
306b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro'o| |las de yang skye ba'i tshe yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong / 'gag pa'i tshe yang gang du yang mi 'gro'o/ /rnam par shes pa dang po de yang skye ba'i tshe yang gang nas kyang
306b6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'ong / 'gag pa'i tshe yang gang du yang mi 'gro'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir te/ rnam par shes pa tha ma ni/ rnam par shes pa tha mas
306b7(dkon brtsegs): stong / las ni/ las kyis stong / rnam par shes pa dang po ni/ rnam par shes pa dang pos stong / 'chi 'pho ni/ 'chi 'phos stong / skye ba ni/ skye bas stong la/ las
307a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur zhing rnam par smin pa myong bar mngon pa yang yod de/ de la ming gi brda tsam ma gtogs par byed pa
307a2(dkon brtsegs): po'am za ba po gang yang med do/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na ma shi ba'am/ pha shi ba'am/ sdug pa gang yang rung ba dag dang
307a3(dkon brtsegs): bral te| sdug pa dang bral bas mya ngan du gyur nas nyam thag par ngu ba zhig rmis la/ de nyal ba las sad nas sdug pa dang bral ba de dang / sdug bsngal zhing ngu ngu ba de
307a4(dkon brtsegs): dran na| rgyal po chen po/ de ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam gyi sdug pa dang bral ba de yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma mchis so/ /bka' stsal pa/
307a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po/ 'o na skyes bu gang rmi lam gyi sdug pa dang bral ba dang / sdug bsngal bar ngu ngu ba la mngon par zhen pa de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin nam/ gsol
307a6(dkon brtsegs): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ rmi lam na mthong ba'i sdug pa nyid kyang shin tu ma mchis na/ de dang
307a7(dkon brtsegs): bral ba dang / mya ngan bgyis pa dang / ngus pa dang / smre sngags bton pa lta ga la mchis te/ gzhan du na gang rmi lam na sdug pa dang bral ba dang / sdug bsngal ba
307b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / dus pa la mngon par zhen pa'i mi de ni/ phongs shing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin du byis
307b2(dkon brtsegs): pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa yang rna bas sgra thos na/ yid du mi 'ong ba rnams la yang mngon par zhen par 'gyur te/ mngon par zhen nas khong khro bar 'gyur/ khong
307b3(dkon brtsegs): khro bar gyur nas zhe sdang bar 'gyur/ zhe sdang bar gyur nas zhe sdang las byung ba'i las lus kyis ni/ rnam pa gsum/ ngag gis ni/ rnam pa bzhi/ yid kyis ni/ rnam
307b4(dkon brtsegs): pa gsum mngon par 'du byed de/ las mngon par 'du byas pa de yang thog ma nyid nas zad cing 'gags la bral zhing rnam par gyur pa ste/ shar phyogs su brten te gnas
307b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs mtshams rnams su brten te gnas pa ma yin/ 'di na ma yin/ pha gi na
307b6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin| bar ma do na ma yin te/ dus gzhan na 'chi ba'i dus dang tshod nye bar gnas pa'i tshe srog gi dbang po 'gags te tshe yongs su zad cing de dang skal ba 'dra ba'i las
307b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang zad nas rnam par shes pa tha ma 'gag pa'i tshe 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyal nyal ba las sad pa'i sdug pa dang / sdug bsngal bar du ba lta bur yid kyis dmigs
308a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po/ de la rnam par shes pa tha ma'i dbang dang / las dmigs pa de dang / rkyen gnyis kyis skye ba'i char

308b6(dkon brtsegs): sad nas sgra de dran par gyur na/ rgyal po chen po/ de ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam na thos pa'i sgra de yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma mchis so/ /bka'

313b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mi de ni phongs shing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa
314a1(dkon brtsegs): yang snas dri tshor na/ btang snyoms su 'gyur ba rnams la yang mngon par zhen par 'gyur te/ mngon par zhen nas shin tu rmongs par 'gyur ro
314a2(dkon brtsegs): shin tu rmongs par gyur nas gti mug las byung ba'i las lus kyis ni/ rnam pa gsum/ ngag gis ni/ rnam pa bzhi/ yid kyis ni/ rnam pa gsum mngon par 'du byed de/ las
314a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du byas pa de yang zad cing 'gags la bral zhing rnam par gyur pa ste/ shar phyogs su brten te gnas pa ma yin pa nas 'di na ma yin/ pha gi na ma yin/ bar ma
314a4(dkon brtsegs): do na ma yin pa'i bar du ste/ dus gzhan na 'chi ba'i dus dang tshod nye bar gnas pa'i tshe srog gi dbang po 'gags te tshe yongs su zad cing de dang skal ba 'dra ba'i las rnams
314a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang zad nas rnam par shes pa tha ma 'gags pa'i tshe 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyal nyal ba las sad pa'i sna'i dbang po nyams pa lta bur yid kyis dmigs par

314b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gag pa'i tshe yang gang du yang mi 'gro'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir te/ rnam par shes pa tha ma ni/ rnam par shes pa tha ma'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa nas 'khor

314b6(dkon brtsegs): po'am za ba po gang yang med do/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na bkres pa las ro sna brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas la tshim tshim du zer
314b7(dkon brtsegs): ba zhig rmis la/ nyal nyal ba las sad nas de nyid dran par gyur na/ rgyal po chen po/ de ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam na mthong ba'i kha zas ro sna brgya dang ldan pa de yod dam
