385b4(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mtshan ma med pa yin no/ /'jig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni/ smon pa med pa yin no/ /gang gis kyang mngon par
385b5(dkon brtsegs): 'du ma byas la/ gang gis kyang 'jig pa med par dbyer med pa gang yin pa de ni/ gang po/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
385b6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
385b7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs su med pa gang yin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dmigs su ma mchis pa de
386a1(dkon brtsegs): nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po/ chos thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dmigs su med pa yin no/ /bcom ldan
386a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das| gal te de ltar na ni/ chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub lags par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po/ de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad
386a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yin yang byang chub de ni/ chos thams cad ces mi bya'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub yin no/ /zhes bya ba yang kun rdzob tu btags pa tsam du
386a4(dkon brtsegs): brjod par zad de/ de ni/ le lo can rnams kyis rtogs par dka' zhing rig par dka' ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ le lo can gang yin pa de dag ni/ chos rnams mnyam pa nyid du mngon
386a5(dkon brtsegs): par sgrub par mi byed la/ mnyam par ma gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas dang rtsod par byed pas so/ /gang po/ gang dag mnyam pa nyid mngon par sgrub par mi byed ce na/ gang po/
386a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pa thams cad ni/ mnyam pa nyid mngon par sgrub par mi byed do/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub la ni/ mnyam pa yang med/ mi mnyam pa yang med de/ gang po/ ngas
386a7(dkon brtsegs): lam 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na/ rgyu dang rkyen de'i phyir mdo sde 'di dag las chos thams cad ni/ yang dag pa'i
386b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas skabs su thams cad kyang nges pa nyid du zhugs pa yin pas/ de ni/ nges par byang chub kyi sgor zhugs pa zhes bstan pa yin te/ de'i phyir gang po/ chos thams cad ni/ byang
386b2(dkon brtsegs): chub ces bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
386b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub gang lags pa de ni/ nges pa yang lags/ ma nges pa yang lags/ tshig 'bru dang yi ger zhugs pa yang lags/ tshig 'bru dang yi ger ma zhugs pa yang lags/ tshig
386b4(dkon brtsegs): 'bru la zhugs pa yang lags/ tshig 'bru la ma zhugs pa yang lags pa de ni/ shin tu ngo mtshar che lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ deng bdag gis bcom
386b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das las mdo sde 'di lta bu thos pas chos thams cad la rnam par nges pa'i snang ba thob lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ deng bdag gis chos rnams la rnam par nges pa'i
386b6(dkon brtsegs): snang ba thob pas/ dngos po gcig las kyang dngos po thams cad rtogs par gyur la/ dngos po thams cad las kyang dngos po gcig rtogs par gyur pas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
386b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis tshe dang ldan pa gang po la bka' stsal pa/ gang po/ khyod kyis 'di ltar myur ba kho nar sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi don la rab tu zhugs par gyur pa legs so/ /legs so/ /
387a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di yang khyod kyis sngon 'das pa'i dus su sangs rgyas mang po rnams la mchod cing rim gro byas pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed nas nye bar bsten te zhu ba
387a2(dkon brtsegs): dag zhus pa las gyur pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /gang po/ ngas mngon par dran te 'das pa'i dus kyi zhing 'di nyid kyi nam mkha'i phyogs gcig na khyod kyis sangs rgyas drug khri brgyad
387a3(dkon brtsegs): stong las mdo sde 'di thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i yon tan gyi rgyu dang rkyen gyi dbang gis khyod kyis chos rnam par nges pa'i snang ba thob pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te bdag gis
387a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mang po las mdo sde 'di sngon thos par gyur pa zhig lags na/ ci'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rjes su dran pa'i bsam pa gcig tsam yang ma
387a5(dkon brtsegs): mchis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po/ ngas sngon mngon par dran te 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe khyod kyis bskal pa gcig gi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
387a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las slar ldog cing nyams par gyur kyang de'i bsod nams kyi rgyu dang / rkyen gyis ngas deng 'dir khyod chos smra ba rnams kyi nang nas mchog tu gyur pa zhes
387a7(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis sngon mi dge ba'i las ci zhig bgyis na/ bskal pa gcig gi
387b1(dkon brtsegs): bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las slar ldog cing nyams par gyur pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po/ khyod
387b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis mi dge ba'i grogs po la brten pa'i phyir dang / gzhan yang khyod kyis dam pa'i chos rgya cher ma spel ba'i phyir khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar
387b3(dkon brtsegs): ldog cing nyams par gyur pa yin no/ /gang po/ chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog cing nyams pa nas nyan thos kyi theg par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi
387b4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa mi dge ba'i grogs la brten pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su spangs nas 'di skad du 'di ltar bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed ci dgos/
387b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i mtha' ni/ shin tu thag ring ste/ 'gro ba lnga po rnams su kha brgyud cing sdug bsngal tshad med pa myong bas khom pa dang 'phrad pa yang shin tu dkon/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'phrad pa
387b6(dkon brtsegs): yang shin tu dkon/ shin tu dang ba'i dad pa thob pa yang shin tu dkon/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'phrad par gyur na yang khyim nas khyim med par 'byung ba ches shin tu dka' bas/ deng khyod khom
387b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan pa chud ma gsan cig / khyod de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar lung bstan pa
388a1(dkon brtsegs): thob pa yang ma yin la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba nges par gyur ba yang ma yin pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang mi 'thob cing 'gro ba lnga po rnams su
388a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras pas/ gang zag des de skad smras pa thos pa'i dbang gis sems bying nas byang chub kyi lam las ldog cing le los mos par mi 'gyur te/ gang po/ byang
388a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' gang chos dang po 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ bla na med pa'i byang chub las slar log nas nyan thos kyi theg par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang gang po/ byang
388a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' gang byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su mthun pa'i mdo sde 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i mdo dang /
388a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba yang dag par sdud pa'i mdo dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang rjes su mthun pa'i mdo thos par ma gyur na/ 'di ltar thos par ma gyur pa'i phyir
388a6(dkon brtsegs): ji skad bstan pa bzhin du spyod par mi 'gyur/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du yang dag par slob par mi 'gyur bas/ des byang chub sems dpas chos gang ni/ bsten par bya/
388a7(dkon brtsegs): chos gang ni/ yongs su spang bar bya/ chos gang ni/ yang dag par blang bar bya ba'i rigs/ chos gang ni/ yang dag par blang bar bya ba'i mi rigs/ chos gang ni/ byang chub
388b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i chos yin/ chos gang ni/ nyan thos kyi chos yin pa dag rab tu mi shes so/ /'di ltar mi shes shing rab tu 'byed par mi nus pa'i phyir bsten par bya ba'i rigs pa'i
388b2(dkon brtsegs): chos ni| sten par mi byed la/ bsten par bya bar mi rigs pa'i chos la ni/ rab tu sten par 'gyur ro/ /des bsten par bya ba'i rigs pa'i chos ni/ sten par mi byed la/ bsten
388b3(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i mi rigs pa'i chos la ni/ rab tu sten par byed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems las rab tu nyams shing log par gyur pas sems kyang zhum ste/
388b4(dkon brtsegs): le lo can du gyur nas sngon gyi smon lam rnams kyang yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ gang po/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gnyis pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ bla na med pa'i
388b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub las slar log nas nyan thos kyi theg par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang gang po/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos rnams yod pa nyid du 'dzin cing bdag tu mngon par zhen pa
388b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / log par lta ba rnams spyod cing mthar 'dzin pa'i lta bar lhung ba dang / log pa'i sdig pa rnams su bying ste drang dka' bar gyur nas mdo sde zab mo don dam pa'i rjes su
388b7(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa dag thos par gyur na yang mngon par yid ches pa'i rtags cung zad tsam yang med cing 'gal bar byed pa dang / mngon par ma rtogs nas yang dag pa'i chos 'jig
389a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i kha na ma tho ba dag slong bar byed na/ rgyu dang rkyen des mi khom pa'i gnas su skyes nas sangs rgyas rnams dang yang phrad par mi 'gyur/ dam pa'i
389a2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyang thos par mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis rjes su bstan pa dag dang yang phrad par mi 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas sangs
389a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnams mi mthong ba'i phyir yang dag pa'i chos kyang thos par mi 'gyur ro/ /yang dag pa'i chos ma thos pa'i phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis rjes su bstan pa dag dang yang
389a4(dkon brtsegs): phrad par mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis rjes su bstan pa'i chos dang phrad par ma gyur pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i bshes
389a5(dkon brtsegs): gnyen ma rnyed pa'i phyir khom pa'i gnas dang bral nas mi khom pa'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /mi khom pa'i gnas su skyes pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang
389a6(dkon brtsegs): bral nas mi dge ba'i grogs po dang phrad par 'gyur ro/ /mi dge ba'i grogs po'i rjes su 'brangs pa'i phyir sngon gyi yi dam brjed cing stor bar 'gyur ro/ /des sngon
389a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi yi dam brjed cing stor bar gyur pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems kyang spong bar byed/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa yang spong bar byed pas slar ldog par 'gyur zhing /
389b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi bsam pa yang gtan du stor nas 'khor ba'i chos 'ba' zhig spyod cing theg pa chen po'i spyod pa'i chos mngon par sgrub par mi 'gyur te/ gang po/ byang chub sems
389b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' gang chos gsum pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ bla na med pa'i byang chub las slar log nas nyan thos kyi theg par 'gyur/ gzhan yang gang po/ byang chub sems dpa'
389b3(dkon brtsegs): g ang 'di lta bu'i mdo sde thos par gyur kyang lhag pa'i bsam pas gzhan dag la yang dag par ston par mi byed cing sems zhum par gyur nas gcig tu 'gro ba la dga' zhing
389b4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi ser sna byas nas gzhan dag la bstan pa'i 'dun pa med pa dang / chos kyis gzhan dag rgya cher yongs su sdud par mi byed na/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i rgyu dang / rkyen gyis
389b5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab dang dran pa rab tu nyams par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab dang dran pa nyams par gyur pa'i dbang gis gzhan pa dag dang lhan cig mdo sde'i chos klog cing 'don par mi byed la/
389b6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyis gzhan dag dang mthun par mi byed pas gang zag de lus brjes ma thag tu byang chub kyi sems kyang stong par 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yang brjed
389b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/ gang po/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan par gyur na/ bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems las slar log nas nyan thos kyi theg par
390a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid yang dag par rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal
390a2(dkon brtsegs): pa| mi dge'i grogs po sten byed cing / /byang chub la ni mi brtson na/ /rgyu dang rkyen ni de yi phyir/ /bla med byang chub sems stor 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i bdag lta rab bskyed nas//
390a3(dkon brtsegs): mtha' dang log ltar gang lhung ba/ /chos 'jig sdig ni bslang bas na/ /mi khom gnas su skye bar 'gyur/ /mi khom gnas su skyes nas kyang / /byang chub sems ni gcod
390a4(dkon brtsegs): byed cing / /sngon gyi yi dam stor 'gyur bas/ /de phyir byang chub sems kyang nyams/ /de yis byang chub sems skye ba'i/ /chos ni thos par yod mi 'gyur/ /de yi sems ni
390a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phel gyur na/ /byang chub sems ni sgrub par 'gyur/ /dam chos rgya cher thos gyur kyang / /ser snas gzhan la ston mi mos/ /rgyu dang rkyen ni de yi phyir/ /byang chub las ni ldog
390a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' theg chen gnyer/ /chos 'di bzhi ni shes par bya/ /chos 'di bzhi ni shes gyur na/ /byang chub sems ni skye bar 'gyur/ /de phyir sdig
390a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos 'di bzhi/ /nan tan gyis ni rab spangs nas/ /stong nyid chos ni sgom byed na/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten par 'gyur/ /'di lta'i mdo sde thos gyur na/ /
390b1(dkon brtsegs): ser sna dag ni mi bskyed par/ /nan tan gzhan la bstan par bya/ /de las byang chub rab tu skye/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po/ byang chub sems dpa' chos
390b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhi dang ldan na/ ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa bzhin du byang chub kyi sems las ldog par mi 'gyur zhing / ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su
390b3(dkon brtsegs): nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul khrims rnam par dag pa yongs su bsrungs nas bsam pa rnams mngon par grub par byed pa dang /
390b4(dkon brtsegs): dran pa dang ldan zhing shes rab la yang dag par gnas pa dang / rab tu brtson pa'i sems kyis brtson zhing le lo med pa dang / mang du thos pa phun sum tshogs shing shes rab
390b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phel bar 'gyur ba dag yin te/ gang po/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan par gyur na/ ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa bzhin du byang chub kyi sems
390b6(dkon brtsegs): las yongs su ldog par mi 'gyur zhing / ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis
390b7(dkon brtsegs): don de nyid gsal bar rab tu bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims ldan/ /dran pa zab cing thag kyang ring / /brtson pa'i sems
391a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis rab brtson zhing / /mang thos shes rab rgyan dang ldan/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ni/ /chos 'di bzhi la rten byed na/ /yid la bsam pa'i dngos
391a2(dkon brtsegs): po kun/ /thams cad rab tu grub par 'gyur/ /de phyir rtag tu khrims bsrung zhing / /nan tan brtson 'grus ldan par bya/ /chos dran rgyun ni mi gcod cing / /rtag par mang thos
391a3(dkon brtsegs): gnyer bar bya/ /khrims bsrungs gnas gtsang rab tu skye/ /dran pas shes rab sbyong bar 'gyur/ /brtson 'grus sangs rgyas chos kyang sbyong / /mang thos shes rab chen po skye/ /
391a4(dkon brtsegs): de phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /de 'dra'i chos ni bslab par bya/ /de 'dra'i chos ni rab bslab na/ /bla med 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang gang po/ byang
391a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan par gyur na/ byang chub la phan 'dogs par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims srung ba ni/ byang chub la phan 'dogs pa'i
391a6(dkon brtsegs): chos so| |bzod pa sgom pa ni/ byang chub la phan 'dogs pa'i chos so/ /brtson 'grus rtsom pa ni/ byang chub la phan 'dogs pa'i chos so/ /mang du thos pa ni/ byang chub
391a7(dkon brtsegs): la phan 'dogs pa'i chos te/ gang po/ chos bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub la phan 'dogs pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid gsal
391b1(dkon brtsegs): bar rab tu bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' khrims srung ba/ /byang chub la ni phan 'dogs te/ /brtson 'grus dang ni bzod pa dang / /
391b2(dkon brtsegs): mang du thos pa de bzhin no/ /tshul khrims dag pa gang srung ba/ /smon lam thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /khrims gtsang phan 'dogs mang bas na/ /byang chub thob par yong mi
391b3(dkon brtsegs): dka'| |byang chub sems dpa' bzod sgom pa/ /lus kyi mtshan dang shes rab 'grub/ /de phyir bzod pa rab sgom na/ /sangs rgyas mtshan dang shes rab gter/ /brtson 'grus
391b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang ni de bzhin du/ /byang chub mang du phan 'dogs pas/ /rtag tu brtson 'grus gang brtson pa/ /byang chub thob par yong mi dka'/ /mang thos kyis kyang phan 'dogs pas/ /thos
391b5(dkon brtsegs): nas chos la rab brten cing / /chos min dag ni spong byed pas/ /byang chub thob par yong mi dka'/ /chos bzhi sa bon yin pas na/ /de las byang chub rab tu skye/ /de phyir byang chub
391b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams/ /chos kyi phan la brten par bya/ /gzhan yang gang po/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos bzhi dang ldan par gyur na/ lus kyi kha
391b7(dkon brtsegs): dog phun sum tshogs pa dang / longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur/ nam yang rtag par sdig pa mi dge ba'i gnas mi khom pa
392a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur/ rtag par sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab tu bsngags par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe
392a2(dkon brtsegs): na| byang chub sems dpa' ni/ byams pa bsgoms pas sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med cing gnod pa mi byed pa yin te/ gang po/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa
392a3(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms pas sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med cing gnod pa mi byed pa ji lta bu zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' byams bsgom pa ni/ sems can rnams la
392a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis yongs su bskyab par bya'o/ /snyam pa'i byams pa bskyed pas/ sems can lus dang sems sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dag mthong na/ 'di snyam du bdag gis
392a5(dkon brtsegs): nan tan gyi brtson 'grus kyis sems can de dag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su bzlas nas sems can de dag la bdag gis bde ba sbyin par bya'o/ /bdag gis
392a6(dkon brtsegs): drangs nas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dang bral bar bya'o/ /zhes sems can rnams la de lta bu'i sems bskyed par byed do/ /de lta bu'i sems bskyed nas kyang nan tan
392a7(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag yong
392b1(dkon brtsegs): su goms par byed do/ /gang po/ byang chub sems dpa' ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyus pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag phun sum tshogs par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i
392b2(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gang yin/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyus nan tan brtson 'grus bskyed par byed ce na/ gang po/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ 'di
392b3(dkon brtsegs): snyam du chos gang ni/ bdag ces bya ba yin/ chos gang ni/ bdag gi zhes bya ba yin snyam du sems shing 'jal bar byed do/ /de ltar sems shing 'jal ba na bdag ces bya
392b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ bdag gi zhes bya ba'i chos kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /snyam du sems pas/ chos 'di la ni/ bdag ces bya
392b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos kyang med la/ bdag gi zhes bya ba'i chos kyang med do/ /snyam du sems so/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i phyir lus stong pa
392b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid du rab tu shes so/ /lus stong pa'i phyir sems can yang stong ngo / /snyam mo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos rnams la bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang / stong pa yin na/ sems
392b7(dkon brtsegs): can lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du sems pas so/ /byang chub sems dpas bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i phyir sems can stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyur ro/ /
393a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can stong pa'i phyir gzugs kyi phung po yang stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs kyi phung po stong pa'i phyir tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
393a2(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po yang stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' de ltar bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i phyir lus kyang
393a3(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyur ro/ /lus stong pa'i phyir sems can yang stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyur ro/ /sems can stong pa'i phyir phung po rnams kyang stong pa nyid du rig par
393a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /phung po rnams stong pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyur te/
393a5(dkon brtsegs): sa'i khams kyang sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid kyis stong / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan
393a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis stong pas/ khams 'di dag la ni/ byed pa yang med la/ byang chub kyang med do/ /gang byed pa med pa'i chos de ni/ stong pa yin snyam mo/ /gang po/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di
393a7(dkon brtsegs): dag la bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa sangs pa'i phyir lus stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyur ro/ /lus stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can yang stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyur ro/ /
393b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can stong pa'i phyir phung po rnams kyang stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyur ro/ /phung po rnams stong pa'i phyir khams rnams kyang stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyur ro/ /khams rnams
393b2(dkon brtsegs): stong pa'i phyir skye mched rnams kyang stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyur ro/ /skye mched rnams stong pa'i phyir skye mched rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyang stong zhing skye mched rnams la byed pa
393b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / bya ba med pa nyid du rig par 'gyur te/ chos gang byed pa dang / bya ba med pa gang yin pa de ni/ stong pa yin no/ /snyam mo/ /gang po/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ de ltar
393b4(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad stong pa nyid du lta bar byed do/ /chos thams cad stong par lta ba'i tshe chos rnams la ngo bo nyid kyis zhe sdang skye ba'i gnas yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/
393b5(dkon brtsegs): gang po/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byams pa chen pos lus stong pa nyid du rig pa'i byams pa dang / sems can stong pa nyid du rig pa'i
393b6(dkon brtsegs): byams pa dang / phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams rnams stong pa nyid du rig pa'i byams pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di lta bu'i byams pa sgom pa gang
393b7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi byams pa sgom pa zhes bya ste/ gang po/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa chen po sgom pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ltar byang chub
394a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ni/ bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i sems kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la shin tu 'dun
394a2(dkon brtsegs): pa skyes nas sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyed par byed pas/ sems can gang 'di ltar chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid khong du ma chud pa dag khong du
394a3(dkon brtsegs): chud par bya ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgos pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po spyod pa zhes bya ste/ bdag gis bskyab par bya'o/ /snyam du sems
394a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir byams pa zhes bya'o/ /bdag gis drang bar bya'o/ /snyam du sems pa'i phyir snying rje zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di lta bu'i byams pa chen po dang
394a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa gang yin pa nges ni/ sems can rnams kyi mgon dang / skyabs dang / gnas dang / gling dang / mthar phyin pa'i gnas byed par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir byang chub
394a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas de lta bu'i byams pa chen po bsgom par bya'o/ /sems can rnams la rjes su chags pa yang med la khong khro ba yang mi skyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ byang
394a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i sems can stong pa'i byams pa zhe sdang med pa zhes bya'o/ /gang po/ byang chub sems dpa' gang byams pa'i rgyu dang bral ba'i rgyu dang / stong pa'i rgyus
394b1(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa chen po sgom pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'
394b2(dkon brtsegs): gang gis de ltar chos rnams rab tu rtogs par gyur pa de la bdud dang / bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos dang po 'di dang
394b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan par gyur pa de ni/ yon tan thams cad la sgrib pa'i 'ching ba rnams yongs su gcod par byed do/ /yon tan gyi 'ching ba yongs su gcod pa'i phyir mnyam pa nyid kyi pha
394b4(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang
394b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas phung po dang / /khams dang skye mched de dag la/ /bdag med par ni rtag shes pa/ /byams sgom stong par lta bar byed/ /bdag dang bdag gi chos gnyis dag/
394b6(dkon brtsegs): nges par yang dag dmigs su med/ /chos rnams dmigs su med pas na/ /byams pa'i sems ni sgom par byed/ /chos rnams la ni mi gnas te/ /mi gnas pa yang ma yin
394b7(dkon brtsegs): pa| 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi lam/ /chos rnams mi gnas pa zhes bya/ /bla med bzod pa gang thob pa/ /chos rnams yang dag mtshan nyid bzod/ /chos rnams skye 'gag
395a1(dkon brtsegs): med do zhes/ /don gyi tshul ni rab tu rtogs/ /blo gros chen po ldan pa dag /chos 'di la ni rten byed na/ /rtag tu gya nom gzungs thob cing / /spobs
395a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dag kyang thob par 'gyur/ /rtag par sangs rgyas phrad par 'gyur/ /chos rnams kun gyi don rig 'gyur/ /de phyir byang chub sems dpa' de/ /bla med byang chub thob par
395a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur| |gzhan yang gang po/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ nan tan brtson 'grus kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mchod rten dag la
395a4(dkon brtsegs): mchod par byed pas gus pa'i sems kyis me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / spos kyi phye ma dang / gdugs dang / ba dan dang / rol mo dang / sil
395a5(dkon brtsegs): snyan dang / mchod pa'i yo byad gya nom pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byed de/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gnyis pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pa
395a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub
395a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' me tog spos/ /ba dan dang ni gdugs mchog gis/ /blo mchog mchod rten rab mchod nas/ /shes rab mchog ni tshol bar byed/ /bsod nams 'di
395b1(dkon brtsegs): yi rkyen gyis ni/ /byad bzhin dag ni mdzes par 'gyur/ /nor phyugs rin chen rab tu mang / /'khor ni phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ /byang chub nyid du nges 'gyur zhing / /rtag
395b2(dkon brtsegs): tu chos la rab tu gnas/ /skye ba dag ni thams cad du/ /yon tan 'phel zhing mthon por 'gyur/ /rgyal po rnams ni bkur byed cing / /lha klu rtag tu dran par 'gyur/ /sems
395b3(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kun gyis kyang / /bkur sti dag ni byed par 'gyur/ /'das dang da ltar bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas dag la mchod byed na/ /skye ba kun tu mchod pa 'thob/ /
395b4(dkon brtsegs): rtag par mi khom med par skye/ /gzhan yang gang po/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ rtag par brtson pa'i sems kyis chos la mchod par byed do/ /
395b5(dkon brtsegs): chos zhes bya ba ni/ gang / ji ltar na/ chos la mchod par byed ce na/ de la chos zhes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul
395b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / zhi
395b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / zad pa'i ye shes dang / mi skye ba'i ye shes gang yin pa 'di ni/ chos
396a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o/ /ji ltar mchod par byed ce na/ chos de dag ji skad bstan pa bzhin du mngon par sgrub cing rjes su 'brang nas 'gal ba med par 'dun
396a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / brtson 'grus bskyed de phun sum tshogs par mngon par bsgrubs pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ chos la mchod pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang gang po/ chos la mchod pa
396a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba la/ chos ni/ mdo sde 'di lta bu dag yin la/ de la mngon par yid ches shing yid la sems pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / rjes su 'brang zhing sems
396a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'gal par mi byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ chos la mchod pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gsum pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ yon tan phun sum tshogs
396a5(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ rtag tu chos mchod brtson
396a6(dkon brtsegs): byed pas/ /ji skad bstan pa bzhin du gnas/ /zab mo stong pa'i chos thos nas/ /sems kyis 'gal bar yong mi byed/ /de phyir lus ni rtag mdzes shing / /spobs pa dag
396a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang thob par 'gyur/ /ngas ni ji skad bsngags pa'i chos/ /de yis rab tu 'phel bar byed/ /gzhan yang gang po/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
396b1(dkon brtsegs): ni/ rab tu brtson pa'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phags pa'i tshogs rnams la mchod par byed pas me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / spos kyi phye ma dang /
396b2(dkon brtsegs): byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad dag
396b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / gtsug lag khang dang / kun dga'i ra ba dang / 'chag sa dang / khrus kyi rdzing bu dang / khron pa dang / las byed pa'i mi dang / 'di lta bu la sogs pa gzhan yang mchod
396b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'di ltar 'phags pa'i tshogs rnams la mchod par byed de/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos bzhi pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ yon
396b5(dkon brtsegs): tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal
396b6(dkon brtsegs): pa| mchod pa'i yo byad mchog dam pas/ /'phags pa'i tshogs ni mchod byas pas/ /bsod nams 'di yi rkyen gyis ni/ /skye ba kun tu longs spyod ldan/ /lus kyi kha
396b7(dkon brtsegs): dog rab mdzes shing / /spobs pa dag kyang thob par 'gyur/ /yon tan rnams ni phun tshogs shing / /shes rab dag ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ /drang po'i sems kyis mchod
397a1(dkon brtsegs): byas shing / /bdag dang bdag gir med pas na/ /shes pa 'di yi rgyu rkyen gyis/ /skye ba kun du mchod pa thob/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis
397a2(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa yin/ /chos bzhi dag la rtag brten na/ /skye ba kun tu cho rigs btsun/ /yon tan dag ni mngon thob 'phags/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i le'u ste/ gsum
397a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'o|| / /bam po gsum pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa gang po la bka' stsal pa/ gang po/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
397a4(dkon brtsegs): d pa' chen po gang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pas rtag par chos bzhi po 'di dag la rten cing goms par byas na dge ba'i chos thams cad kyang phun sum
397a5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs par yongs su sdud par 'gyur la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang yang rab tu ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ gang po/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang
397a6(dkon brtsegs): dag theg pa chen por sems bskyed pas bzod pa sgrub pa'i chos la brten cing bsgom par bya'o/ /de ltar bzod pa'i chos sgom pa na gal te sems mnyam par
397a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ shin tu mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang thob par 'gyur la/ sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang thob par 'gyur te/
397b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ye shes mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par gyur pa na/ gal te 'gro'am/ 'greng ngam/
397b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dug gam/ nyal lam/ gnyid log gam/ sad pa'i tshe yang rung ste/ gcin gyi bum pa'am/ dug gi bum pa'am/ khu tshan gyi bum pa'am/ phyag dar ba rnams sam/
397b3(dkon brtsegs): me dang thal ba'am/ bshang gci 'am/ thal ba tsha ba thogs pa zhig 'ongs nas mgo'i steng du blugs sam/ lus kyi yan lag kun tu brdungs par gyur na/ byang chub
397b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de la zhe sdang dang / 'khon gyi bsam pa bskyed nas sems rnam par g.yeng zhing khong khro bskyed par yang mi bya'o/ /'di skad du bdag la nyes pa ci yod ces
397b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang smra bar mi bya'o/ /gzhan yang ngan sems kyis de la blta bar mi bya'o/ /sems rtse gcig tu rang gi chos don du gnyer zhing gang bsgrub par bya ba'i dngos po sems
397b6(dkon brtsegs): rtse gcig tu mi spong ba de ltar sems yongs su gdul bar bya'o/ /gang zag des rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyir gcin gyi bum pa dang / dug gi bum pa dang / thal ba dang me
397b7(dkon brtsegs): dag thogs te 'ongs nas bdag gi lus la gnod par byed pa ni/ bdag gi lus ni/ dngos po 'di dag gi rgyu rkyen gyis na ba dang gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes byang chub
398a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de'i tshe 'di ltar rgyu dang / rkyen mang po'i chos la so sor brtags nas su zhig ni/ dngos po 'di sbyin par byed/ dngos po 'di ni/
398a2(dkon brtsegs): su la sbyin par byed/ dngos po gang ni/ sbyin par byed ces nges de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yid la byed pa na/ sbyin par byed pa ni/ su yin/ len par
398a3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa ni/ su yin/ chos ni/ gang yin zhes chos 'ga' tsam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de ltar yang dag pa'i dran pas yid la byed cing so sor
398a4(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa'i tshe 'di dang de zhes bya ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad dmigs par mi 'gyur la/ mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' des chos thams
398a5(dkon brtsegs): cad mi dmigs shing mi mthong ba'i phyir zhe sdang dang 'khon du 'dzin pa yang skyed par mi byed do/ /gang po/ byang chub sems dpa' gal te de ltar bsam yang zhe
398a6(dkon brtsegs): sdang dang 'khon du 'dzin pa'i bsam pa bskyed par gyur na/ gzhan yang 'di ltar yang dag pa'i dran pas 'di snyam du reg bya gang gi rgyu dang / rkyen gyis bdag gi
398a7(dkon brtsegs): lus la na bar byed/ reg bya de dag gis gang du ni reg par 'gyur/ lus la gnod par gyur tam/ 'on te sems la gnod par gyur/ gal te lus la gnod par
398b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa yin na ni/ lus ni/ rtswa dang / shing dang / gyo mo dang / rdo dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu yin pas rtog pa med pa/ shes pa med pa yin te/ bdag kyang ma yin/ gzhan
398b2(dkon brtsegs): yang ma yin no/ /gal te sems la gnod par gyur pa yin na ni/ sems ni/ kha dog dang / gzugs med pa/ skad cig mar skye zhing 'gag pa/ thang gcig tsam yang mi
398b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pas bdag kyang ma yin/ gzhan yang ma yin na/ yang dag pa ma yin pas rnam par rtog pas rnam par brtags nas 'di ni/ sdug bsngal lo/ /'di ni/ bde ba'o//
398b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa'o/ /zhes zer bar zad pas/ deng bdag gis yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par brtags pa
398b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di bskyed par mi bya'o/ /deng bdag gis mnyam pa nyid kyi yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid du bltas nas 'phags pa'i bya ba rnams bsgrub par bya'i/ byis pa so so'i bya ba'i
398b6(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'brang bar mi bya'o/ /'phags pa'i bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos rnams las thag ring du gyur cing rnam par grol ba gang yin pa'o/ /bdag ni/ thag bsring
398b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir slob pa yin/ mi 'phrod par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'di dag ni/ thams cad kyang 'phrad par byed pa yin te/
399a1(dkon brtsegs): dang 'phrad par byed pa yin zhe na/ 'dod chags dang 'phrad par byed pa yin/ zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang 'phrad par byed pa yin no/ /ji ltar
399a2(dkon brtsegs): na| 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang 'phrod par byed pa yin zhe na/ lus la rmongs pa'i phyir dang / 'jig tshogs la lta ba la rmongs pa'i phyir dang / 'jig
399a3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs la lta ba la mngon par zhen pa'i phyir lus kyi sdug bsngal myong ba'i tshe gzhan dag la mnar sems skyed pa gang yin pa de ni/ zhe sdang dang 'phrad pa zhes
399a4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o| |'jig tshogs la lta ba la rmongs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dang / 'jig tshogs la lta ba la mngon par zhen pa'i phyir dang / yid dang mi mthun par gyur pa'i
399a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir gzhan dag la mnar sems skyed pa gang yin pa de ni/ gti mug dang 'phrad pa zhes bya'o/ /gang dag 'di lta bu'i dug gsum gyis bcings nas 'di lta bu'i
399a6(dkon brtsegs): kha na ma tho ba'i las kyi rgyu dang / rkyen slong bar byed na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang yongs su skyob par mi spyod na/ gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos
399a7(dkon brtsegs): te| deng bdag gis rgyu dang / rkyen gyis chos rnams shin tu legs par so sor brtags nas chos rnams stong pa nyid du blta bar bya'o/ /snyam du bsam par bya'o/ /
399b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de ltar rjes su mthun par yang dag par lta bas rgyu dang / rkyen gyis chos rnams so sor rtog par byed pa na/ chos 'ga' tsam yang sus byin pa'am/
399b2(dkon brtsegs): sus len pa'am/ dngos po gang yin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gzhan yang 'di snyam du chos thams cad ni/ rgyu dang / rkyen
399b3(dkon brtsegs): mang po las skyes pa yin pas rang bzhin gyis gzod ma nyid nas stong pa yin te/ nges par dmigs su med par stong pa yin na/ bdag ci'i phyir yang dag pa ma yin
399b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos dmigs su med pa dag la las mngon par 'dus byas nas zhe sdang bskyed de/ 'du byed kyi rgyu rkyen slong bar byed/ deng bdag gis zhe sdang dang 'khon du 'dzin
399b5(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i bsam pa bskyed nas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / skye ba med pa'i chos mngon par bsgrubs nas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid du
399b6(dkon brtsegs): blta bar bya'i/ bdag nyid kyi sems kyi rjes su 'brang bar mi bya'o/ /deng bdag gis mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / skye ba med pa'i chos la
399b7(dkon brtsegs): blta bar bya'i/ mngon par 'du bya ba dang 'byung ba'i chos la gnas par mi bya'o/ /bdag gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos rnams bsam par bya'i/ /deng bdag
400a1(dkon brtsegs): gis yang dag pa ma yin pa yod pa ma yin pa la 'di la nan gyis chos su 'du shes bskyed par mi bya ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pa la nan
400a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis mngon par 'du byed pa ni/ zhe sdang dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa dag yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi ngo bo la gnas pa la ni/ zhe sdang dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa
400a3(dkon brtsegs): yod kyi/ chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid mthar stong pa nyid la ni/ gnas par bya ba'i chos kyi ngo bo gzod ma nyid nas med pas so/ /snyam du bsam par
400a4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o| |byang chub sems dpas da ltar chos rnams yid la byas par gyur na/ de'i sems rab tu dben par gyur pas zhe sdang dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa skye bar mi
400a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang gang po/ byang chub sems dpa' de 'gro'am/ 'greng ngam/ 'dug gam/ nyal lam/ gnyid log gam/ sad pa'i tshe yang rung ste/ 'ga'
400a6(dkon brtsegs): zhig 'ongs nas spos dri zhim pa'am/ spos kyi phye ma'am/ byug spos sam/ me tog mchog dam pa dag lus la gtor ram/ yang na spos dang / me tog mchog dam
400a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / se mo do dang / me tog tsam pa ka'i phreng ba dang / me tog pa ri Sha ka'i phreng ba dang / me tog mang po'i phreng ba dag gis lus la g.yogs par gyur tam/
400b1(dkon brtsegs): yang na gos mchog dam pa shin tu phra zhing 'jam pa 'di lta ste/ ska shi ka'am/ ku sha ka'am/ ku she pa'am/ ku ma pa'am/ ku sha ya sha'am/ chu ma'am/ ka pa'am/ de
400b2(dkon brtsegs): dag la sogs pa gos phra zhing 'jam pa dag gis lus la g.yogs par gyur tam/ yang na dar gyi lda ldi mchog dam pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag
400b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid kyi steng du bres par gyur tam/ yang na lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / gos mchog dam pa dang / rin po che'i phreng ba dag gis lus la g.yogs par gyur tam/
400b4(dkon brtsegs): yang na lha'i kha zas mchog dam pa bdud rtsi'i re dang ldan pa dag khyer te 'ongs nas byin par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpas mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'di dag la
400b5(dkon brtsegs): sred pa'i sems bskyed nas mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /rkyen des gang zag de dag la brten nas yid dang mthun par byas te phan tshun 'drul zhing gtam smra bar yang
400b6(dkon brtsegs): mi bya'o| |phyogs gcig pa'i sems kyis rjes su chags par yang mi bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag la sems snyoms par bya zhing / chos thams cad kyi mnyam
400b7(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid rab tu rtogs par byas nas 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can rnams la khong khro bar yang mi bya/ /rjes su chags par yang mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams
401a1(dkon brtsegs): sdang gi dngos po gnyi ga yang nyon mongs pa yin pas so/ /deng bdag gis de dag la sred pa mi skyed par chos rnams kyi yang dag pa nyid
401a2(dkon brtsegs): legs par rtogs par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyi nang na sred pa'i rkyen gyis phrad par gyur pa 'di mchog tu lci pas so/ /'di ltar nyon mongs
401a3(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni| rus pa dang / rkang la yang thal te 'gro bas kun tu sbyor ba skyed pa'i chos kyi nang na sred pa'i sems kyis ni/ shin tu mngon par zhen par byed do/ /de ci'i
401a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ 'dod chags par bya ba'i dngos po gal te yid bzhin tu thob par ma gyur na zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur bas so/ /skye bo rnams ni/ rang gi lus la 'dod chags
401a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi srid pa skyed par byed pas de dag gal te 'ga' zhig gis gnod par byas par gyur na/ zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir zhe sdang ni/ sred pa'i 'bras bu rnam par
401a6(dkon brtsegs): smin pa yin la/ mngon par zhan pa ni/ gti mug gi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /deng bdag ni/ sred pas gos pa'i sems spangs nas
401a7(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la mngon par zhen pa med par bya'o/ /bdag ni/ 'dod chags kyi phyir slob pa ma yin/ zhe sdang gi phyir slob pa ma yin/ gti mug gi phyir slob pa ma
401b1(dkon brtsegs): yin gyi| bdag ni/ chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid la rgya cher slob pa yin pas/ chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bltas nas ji skad bstan pa bzhin du
401b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa nyid du spyad nas las rnam par smin pa'i rgyu rkyen la rten nas mchod pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi dngos po rnams kyang sngon gyi las kyi spyod pa'i rkyen las gyur pa yin
401b3(dkon brtsegs): par rig par byas nas de'i phyir rjes su mthun par gyur pa'i chos rnams la dga' zhing srid pa mi skyed/ dge ba'i chos dang 'gal ba la yang zhe sdang mi skyed par sems yongs
401b4(dkon brtsegs): su sbyangs te mnar sems med par byas nas 'dod chags kyi rjes su 'brang bar yang mi bya/ zhe sdang gi rjes su 'brang bar yang mi bya/ gti mug gi rjes su 'brang bar mi bya/
401b5(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar yang mi bya'o/ /snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/ /gang po/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos dang po 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ yon tan
401b6(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal
401b7(dkon brtsegs): pa| ngas ni rtag tu shes rab bsngags/ /tshul khrims srung ba'ang bsngags pa yin/ /bzod pa sgom la bsngags byed cing / /mang du thos pa'ang bsngags pa yin/ /ngas
402a1(dkon brtsegs): ni dge ba'i chos spyod dang / /byams sems tshig snyan smra la bsngags/ /sems can la ni phan gdags phyir/ /yon tan mang po ci rigs
402a2(dkon brtsegs): bsngags/ /nga ni rtag tu 'dod lnga dang / /khong khro 'khon 'dzin gti mug can/ /phrag dog nga rgyal g.yo sgyu dang / /'khrug long sems can gnod byed smod/ /le lo dang ni
402a3(dkon brtsegs): snyoms las dang / /bka' blo mi bde smra dga' dang / /byas pa mi gzo lam log can/ /nyes pa chung la cher khro dang / /rnyed pa la ni gdu ba dang / /bdag ni rnyed par
402a4(dkon brtsegs): rab dga' zhing / /gzhan gyi rnyed la mi dga' ba/ /'di dag la ni nga mi bsngags/ /blo chung rnyed pa dag 'dod che/ /gzhan gyi rnyed la phrag dog che/ /gzhan gyi khyim la
402a5(dkon brtsegs): ser sna byed/ /'di dag la ni nga mi bsngags/ /rnyed pa dag ni tshol ba'i phyir/ /spyod lam dag ni chos byed pa/ /'di ni 'tsho ba dag min pas/ /nga yi chos las shin tu
402a6(dkon brtsegs): ring / /lam mi sgom pa dag la ni/ /nyes pa 'di dag thams cad yod/ /'di ni ngan 'gro'i rkyen yin pas/ /dngos po 'ga' yang bsngags su med/ /sdig pa dag lta
402a7(dkon brtsegs): ma spangs na/ /'dod sred sems ni rab tu mang / /'dod sred sems ni mang ba'i phyir/ /rnyed pa dag la gdu bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du/ /bzod
402b1(dkon brtsegs): sgom sems can phan gdags shing / /khengs pa'i sems ni rab btul nas/ /myur du sangs rgyas bya bar gsungs/ /bdag gis byams sems rab bsgoms te/ /bzod
402b2(dkon brtsegs): pas sems can brtse bar bya/ /chos rnams stong zhing rkyen las byung / /'bral ba med par shes par bya/ /rkyen gang gis ni chos rnams yod/ /chos de sems las byung ba
402b3(dkon brtsegs): yin| |mi bden 'du shes khong khro bskyed/ /mkhas pa thams cad stong pa yin/ /mi bden 'du shes khams gsum bskyed/ /lus kyi rgyun ni 'chad mi 'gyur/ /mi bden
402b4(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes mi rtog na/ /nyes dmigs 'di dag yod mi 'gyur/ /rtag tu chos rnams sems pa na/ /rkyen las byung ba rab tu shes/ /rtag tu chos rnams stong lta bas/ /thams
402b5(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su bzlog par nus/ /khrims spangs sems can sdug bsngal ba/ /nga rgyal dag gis smras pa la/ /sdug bsngal nyer zhi'i chos ston pas/ /phan pa mang po rab
402b6(dkon brtsegs): tu byed| |gang zhig shar lho nub byang dang / /phyogs mtshams bzhi po dag nas ni/ /mi gtsang dug gi bum thogs nas/ /mgo yi steng du blugs gyur na/ /sus byin sus ni
402b7(dkon brtsegs): lan byed ces/ /bdag ni khong khro yong mi bskyed/ /chos gang zhig ni bdag yin zhes/ /brtags nas brtson 'grus brtson par byed/ /nyes pa ci yod gnod byas zhes/ /ngan
403a1(dkon brtsegs): sems gzhan la lta mi byed/ /shin tu brtan pa'i bzod bskyed nas/ /byams sems de la phan 'dogs byed/ /sngon gyi las las gyur shes pas/ /
403a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam smin 'di myong snyam du sems/ /dang du blangs te bzod byed pas/ /byang chub lam la gnas par byed/ /smod dang sdug bsngal dngos po 'di/ /gzhan gyis byas pa ma yin
403a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi| |'di ni nges par las kyi rkyen/ /yun ring lon kyang chud mi za/ /sems can 'jig rten gnas pa dag /rtag tu dge sdig las slong pas/ /deng bdag sdug bsngal 'di
403a4(dkon brtsegs): myong yang / /las rkyen yin par rab tu shes/ /gal te ngan pas las byas na/ /phyis kyang sdug bsngal myong 'gyur na/ /ci'i phyir dngos po ngan pa yis/ /de dag la ni gnod
403a5(dkon brtsegs): bya snyam| |bla na med pa'i chos gnyer nas/ /gzhan dag la ni ston byed pas/ /sems can sdug bsngal ji snyed pa/ /thams cad las ni thar par byed/ /gal te 'ga'
403a6(dkon brtsegs): zhig me tog spos/ /phreng ba dag gis bdag mchod kyang / /rjes su chags pa mi skyed par/ /mnyam par sgom pa bsgrub bya snyam/ /byams sdang dag ni lam min
403a7(dkon brtsegs): pas| |rtag tu btang snyoms spyod par byed/ /sus byin sus ni len byed ces/ /chos rnams yang dag rtog par byed/ /stong pas byin zhing stong len na/ /phyi nang gnyi
403b1(dkon brtsegs): ga stong pas na/ /stong la byin dang len med pas/ /thams cad kun la bdag med do/ /stong la 'dod chags bral ba med/ /stong la kun nas nyon mongs med/ /rnam par byang
403b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'ang med pas na/ /dri bral rnam dag stong pa yin/ /stong la rnam par rtog pa med/ /stong la ngo bo nyid rnams med/ /stong ni rtag stong mtshan ma med/ /de ni rnam dag lam
403b3(dkon brtsegs): yin no| |gal te 'ga' zhig 'ongs gyur nas/ /lus ni dum bur bcad gyur kyang / /las kyi rkyen las byung rig pas/ /de la zhe sdang yong mi bskyed/ /sems can dge
403b4(dkon brtsegs): sdig slong bas na/ /las bzhin rang nyid 'bras bu len/ /bdag kyang nges par snga ma'i sdig /sdug bsngal rnam smin 'di myong snyam/ /sdig pa'i rnam smin 'di myong yang / /lus
403b5(dkon brtsegs): btags gzugs brnyan chu bur dang / /sgyu ma sprul pa smig rgyu 'dra/ /stong zhing med pas mtha' yang stong / /kha cig lus kyi yan lag gcod/ /kha cig drin ni dran gyur nas/ /
403b6(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa dag ni byas gyur kyang / /dga' dang mi dga' yong mi byed/ /rnyed pa thob kyang dga' ba med/ /kha ngan byas kyang khong mi khro/ /'di gnyis sgrib pa yin pas na/ /sangs
403b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas yang dag lam min sems/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sems/ /de dag thams cad spong bar byed/ /rtag tu stong dben bsgoms pas na/ /sgrib pa rnams ni spong
404a1(dkon brtsegs): bar byed/ /bzod pa stobs bcu'i gzhi yin te/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gnas/ /thogs med ye shes snying rje yi/ /rtse ba dag ni
404a2(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa yi/ /bden bzhi dran dang yang dag spong / /dbang stobs byang chub lam yan lag /thams cad bzod pas gzhi byed pas/ /mkhas pa gang zhig bzod mi
404a3(dkon brtsegs): sgom| |ngas kyang wA ra NA sir ni/ /bla med 'khor lo bskor ba yang / /bzod pa dag gis gzhi byas pas/ /sangs rgyas rtag tu bzod pa bsngags/ /khyed kyang stong
404a4(dkon brtsegs): bzod bla med gzhi/ /yongs su sgom par byed na ni/ /chos kyi chos nyid de yin pas/ /sangs rgyas yon tan thob par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang gang po/ byang chub sems
404a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ 'dod pa lnga po dag spangs nas rtag par rab tu 'byung bar mos pas/ sems kyis rab tu byung ba'i rjes su 'brang bar byed/ rab
404a6(dkon brtsegs): tu 'byung ba la gzhol bar byed pas 'dod pa lnga po dag la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /rab tu byung nas kyang 'du 'dzin rnams spangs nas shin tu thag ring pa'i
404a7(dkon brtsegs): ri dang / nags tshal dben pa dag tu gnas shing dge ba'i chos chud mi za bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gnyis pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ yon

404b2(dkon brtsegs): pas| |rtag tu rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ri dang nags tshal gnas mos pas/ /yon tan 'byung gnas 'phel bar byed/ /dben par gnas la brten byed pas/ /

404b6(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa byas zhes mi brjod do/ /de 'dra'i nyes dmigs spong 'dod na/ /rnyed pa rnams ni spang bar bya/ /spangs nas gnas dben rab gnas nas/ /stong pa'i chos ni
404b7(dkon brtsegs): bsgom par bya/ /gzhan yang gang po/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ rtag par chos gnyer ba yongs su slob par byed pas/ yongs su gnyer nas kyang klog cig kha ton du
405a1(dkon brtsegs): bton nas 'di ltar tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan shin tu phra ba'i chos yongs su tshol bar byed kyi/ 'dod pa
405a2(dkon brtsegs): mang ba dang / chog mi shes pa'i chos yongs su tshol bar mi byed do/ /'dod chags nye bar zhi ba yongs su tshol bar byed kyi/ 'dod chags rgyas par mi byed do/ /zhe sdang
405a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhom pa yongs su tshol bar byed kyi/ zhe sdang 'phel bar mi byed do/ /gti mug gcod pa yongs su tshol bar byed kyi/ gti mug skye bar mi byed do/ /khengs pa
405a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yongs su tshol bar byed kyi/ khengs pa slong ba yongs su tshol bar mi byed do/ /nga rgyal gzhom pa yongs su tshol bar byed kyi/ nga rgyal 'phel ba yongs su
405a5(dkon brtsegs): tshol bar mi byed do/ /bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i chos spong ba yongs su tshol bar byed kyi/ bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i chos 'phel bar byed pa yongs
405a6(dkon brtsegs): su tshol bar mi byed do/ /bdag med pa'i chos yongs su tshol bar byed kyi/ bdag dang / gang zag dang / sems can dang / srog la gnas pa'i chos yongs su tshol
405a7(dkon brtsegs): bar mi byed do/ /rtag par shes rab chen po thob par 'gyur ba'i chos yongs su tshol bar byed kyi/ shes rab chen po nyams par 'gyur ba'i chos yongs su tshol bar mi
405b1(dkon brtsegs): byed do| |rtag par mtshungs pa med pa'i shes rab thob par 'gyur ba'i chos yongs su tshol bar byed kyi/ shes rab rgya chung ngu thob par 'gyur ba'i chos yongs su tshol bar
405b2(dkon brtsegs): mi byed do/ /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams yongs su tshol bar byed kyi/ yon tan rnams phun sum tshogs par mi 'gyur ba'i chos yongs
405b3(dkon brtsegs): su tshol bar mi byed do/ /de ltar mos yongs su btsal nas kyang klog par byed/ kha ton du 'don par byed/ /tshul bzhin du yang dag par yid la byed/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin
405b4(dkon brtsegs): du yang dag par yid la byed/ sgrub par byed/ gzhan dag la yang yang dag par rab tu ston par byed kyang 'jig rten pa'i khe dang grags pa yongs su tshol bar mi byed la/
405b5(dkon brtsegs): tha na legs so/ /zhes bya ba'i bsngags pa brjod pa tsam yang yongs su tshol bar mi byed pas sems can mang po chos de la dgod par byed de/ gang po/ byang chub sems dpa'
405b6(dkon brtsegs): gang chos gsum pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad
405b7(dkon brtsegs): de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rab byung ni/ /tshul khrims sbyangs pa dag la mos/ /des na shes rab yongs 'phel nas/ /ye shes char ni 'bebs par
406a1(dkon brtsegs): byed| |rnam dag chos zab de thos nas/ /yang dag dran pas don sems byed/ /ji skad bstan pa bzhin du ni/ /de bzhin yang dag sgrub
406a2(dkon brtsegs): par byed/ /rtag tu rnam dag sems kyis ni/ /gzhan la rgya cher rab bstan nas/ /sems can mang la phan 'dogs kyang / /sems la re ba cung zad med/ /yon tan
406a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi ro rnyed nas/ /bdag nyid chos de rab gnas shing / /gzhan yang de la 'god byed pas/ /de phyir sangs rgyas chos 'phel 'gyur/ /bskal pa tshad med rnams su ni/ /
406a4(dkon brtsegs): yon tan mang po ci bsags pa/ /thams cad mngon du gyur nas ni/ /byang chub lam du sdud 'jig 'gyur/ /de phyir sangs rgyas bsngags pa yi/ /chos zab dag ni
406a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs btsal nas/ /rtag par sems can brtan par bya/ /yon tan rnams ni de las skye/ /gang po/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims
406a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su srung zhing sbyangs pa'i chos la rab tu gnas par gyur na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gang
406a7(dkon brtsegs): p o| sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa tshad med cing mtha' yas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yang ches bsam gyis mi khyab pa byung ba de'i
406b1(dkon brtsegs): tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla
406b2(dkon brtsegs): na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das me ro gan+d+ha zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'i
406b3(dkon brtsegs): sku tshe'i tshad ni/ tshe lo drug cu thub par gyur to/ /'dus pa re re la chos bstan pa'i tshe nyan thos bye ba brgya phrag brgyad cu dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /gang
406b4(dkon brtsegs): po| de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan+d+ha yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dam pa'i chos ni/ lo lnga brgya'i bar du gnas par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
406b5(dkon brtsegs): d e yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu zhag bdun tshun chad nyan thos chen po ji snyed pa phal cher de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par
406b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur to| |gang po| de bzhin gshegs pa de yang nga ji lta ba bzhin du snyigs ma lnga'i dus kyi tshe 'jig rten du byung bar gyur te/ nyan thos chen po rnams yongs su mya ngan
406b7(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa'i 'og tu de'i tshe skye bo rnams phal cher 'di snyam du dge sbyong gi chos ni/ rab tu bde zhing skyid pa yin na/ bdag cag ci'i phyir so so nas rab tu mi 'byung
407a1(dkon brtsegs): snyam du bsam nas so so nas skra dang kha spu bregs te chos gos ngur smrig bgos nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / /rab tu
407a2(dkon brtsegs): byung nas kyang dngos po gsum po rtag par khyim pa'i khyim du 'gro zhing 'dul bar byed pa dang / rnyed pa la mngon par zhen nas bdag nyid tshol bar byed pa dang /
407a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid nyam 'tshag tsho ba 'ba' zhig tu sbyor zhing bsod nams dang ye shes dang mi ldan pa 'ba' zhig spyod par gyur pas dngos po gsum po 'di 'ba' zhig
407a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod par byed kyi/ las gzhan ni/ mngon par mi sgrub par gyur to/ /lo brgya 'das pa'i 'og tu nyan thos chen po thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das te ma
407a5(dkon brtsegs): lus par gyur pas/ dge slong mang po de dag khyim rnams dang mthun par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi mdo sde zab mo rnams dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang / sbyangs
407a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yon tan spyod lam zhib mo gya nom pa'i chos rnams ni/ phal cher spangs nas su yang klog cing 'don pa med par gyur to/ /gang po/ de'i tshe dge slong rnams
407a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa mang po dag la spyod par mos shing bza' ba dang / btung ba'i ro la chags par gyur pas/ de'i tshe rgyal po'i bu da ma shi ri zhes bya ba rgyal po shin tu byams
407b1(dkon brtsegs): shing gces par byed pa zhig yod de/ des gnas dben pa zhig tu gnas nas 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan+d+has chos ji lta bu zhig brnyes na/ deng de'i nyan
407b2(dkon brtsegs): thos rnams bag med par spyod cing khyim pa rnams dang bye brag med par gyur ces de snyam du sems shing the tshom du gyur pa dang / de'i tshe lha zhig de'i thad du 'ongs nas lus mi
407b3(dkon brtsegs): snang bar byas te 'di skad du kye rgyal bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan+d+has brnyes pa'i chos ni/ shin tu zab cing yongs su dag la rnam par nges pa yin no/ /zhes smras
407b4(dkon brtsegs): so| |de nas rgyal bu des lhas de skad smras pa thos pa dang / 'di skad du/ kye de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan+d+has brnyes pa'i chos shin tu zab cing yongs su dag la rnam par
407b5(dkon brtsegs): nges par gyur pa'i chos kyi dngos po de ji lta bu zhig yin/ lhas smras pa/ rgyal bu/ chos de ni/ gzugs kyang med/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam
407b6(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa yang med/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyang med/ 'dod pa lnga yang med/ 'dod pa'i sems kyang med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan+d+has de lta
407b7(dkon brtsegs): bu'i chos shin tu zab cing yongs su dag la rnam par nges pa brnyes pa sems can rnams la yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ /de nas rgyal bu des lha de la smras pa/ bdag
408a1(dkon brtsegs): gis de lta bu'i chos thos shing khong du chud par gyur nas ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub tu rung ngam/ lhas smras pa/ kye rgyal bu/ khyod sems
408a2(dkon brtsegs): rtse gcig tu nan tan brtson 'grus byos shig dang thob par dka' ba med do/ /gang po/ de'i tshe rgyal bu de 'di snyam du nges par lhas kyang bskul te/ bdag khong du chud
408a3(dkon brtsegs): par byas nas bdag rab tu byung nas chos zab mo de yongs su gnyer bar bya'o/ /snyam du bsam nas pha ma ga la ba der song ste ma gos gtugs te phyag byas nas 'di skad
408a4(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so/ /yab yum/ deng bdag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan+d+ha'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas lam yongs su gnyer bar 'tshal lo/ /pha mas smras pa/ khyod
408a5(dkon brtsegs): deng nged spangs nas rab tu byung ba de ci dgos/ da ltar sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba rnams ni/ khyim pa rnams dang bye brag tu gyur pa ci yang med do/ /de nas de'i
408a6(dkon brtsegs): tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ de ltar dge slong mang po rnams/ /bag med 'dod pa lnga yang spyod/ /zhing rmod nyo tshong byed pas na/ /khyim pa rnams dang bye brag med/ /
408a7(dkon brtsegs): dbul po sdug bsngal rab mang zhing / /bdag nyid gso bar mi nus pa/ /de 'dra'i skye bo mang po rnams/ /lus gso'i phyir ni rab tu byung / /khyod ni rgyal rigs khyim du
408b1(dkon brtsegs): skyes| |phyug cing 'dod lnga'i bde ba myong / /nor dang rin chen rab mang ni/ /rab tu byung bas ri zhig bya/ /de nas rgyal bu da ma shi ris pha ma la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag
408b2(dkon brtsegs): ni dbang phyug gi tshol te/ /gal te thob kyang spong bar bgyid/ /deng bdag sangs rgyas chos zab dang / /rnam dag tshul khrims 'ba' zhig tshol/ /lha zhig bdag ni go bgyis
408b3(dkon brtsegs): te| |rab tu 'byung bar bskul bas na/ /sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i zab mo chos/ /bdag ni rab tu rtogs par 'tshal/ /lhas smras bdag gis thos pas na/ /sems ni rab tu
408b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar gyur/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa nub tu nye/ /bdag ni grogs bgyis srung bar sems/ /de nas pha mas tshigs su bcad de da ma shi ri la smras pa/ mdo sde zab mo zad
408b5(dkon brtsegs): nub pas/ /kha ton 'don pa'ang yong med na/ /de ring khyod kyis su las ni/ /sangs rgyas chos zab thos par 'gyur/ /gal te 'khor ni bzhi po las/ /don zab 'don pa
408b6(dkon brtsegs): yod gyur na/ /de las khyod kyis sngar mnyan nas/ /de 'og rab tu 'byung ba'i rigs/ /da ma shi ris tshigs su bcad de pha ma la slar smras pa/ deng bdag nan tan brtson
408b7(dkon brtsegs): 'grus kyis/ /tshul khrims srung zhing sbyangs pa spyod/ /thag ring ri dang nags tshal nas/ /sangs rgyas chos zab rnam dag tshol/ /gang po/ da ma shi ris tshigs su bcad pa
409a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di smras nas mgo bos phyag 'tshal ba byas te rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba btab pa dang / pha ma gnyis kyang cang mi smra bar gnang ngo / /de
409a2(dkon brtsegs): nas dge slong rnams kyi thad du song nas skra dang kha spu bregs te chos gos ngur smig bgos nas rab tu byung ste/ bslab pa'i dngos po rnams yang dag par blangs nas
409a3(dkon brtsegs): gus pa'i sems kyis dge slong rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan+d+has rjes su bstan pa ji lta bu zhig gis slob ma rnams la rjes su bstan par mdzad/ bdag
409a4(dkon brtsegs): gis thos par gyur na ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub par 'tshal lo/ /zhes smras pa dang / gang po/ dge slong mang po rnams kyis dge slong da ma shi ri la 'di skad ces
409a5(dkon brtsegs): smras so| / bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa las chos thos pa ni/ med kyi/ mkhan po dang slob dpon rnams kyi rjes su spyod par zad pas/ deng khyod kyang 'di
409a6(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i chos la spyod cig / de nas dge slong da ma shi ris dge slong rnams la smras pa/ khyed ni/ gdon mi za bar dbul po dmangs rigs las rab tu byung ba yin
409a7(dkon brtsegs): pas| de'i phyir deng khyed gos zas 'ba' zhig lhur len pas spyod pa rnams khyim pa dag dang bye brag tu gyur pa ci yang med pas/ deng khyed bdag dang lhan cig tu
409b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo yongs su dag pa btsal bar bya'o/ /de nas de'i tshe dge slong mang po rnams kyis tshigs su bcad de dge slong da ma shi ri la smras pa/ bdag cag
409b2(dkon brtsegs): gis ni gang bsgrubs pa'i/ /dngos po de ni thob gyur pas/ /gos zas dag ni 'byor cing ldan/ /rgyal pos bkol pa las kyang thar/ /shin tu bde zhing rab tu skyid/ /brnyas
409b3(dkon brtsegs): shing nga rgyal byed pa med/ /khyim pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa/ /de dag da ltar gang yang med/ /'di nyid mya ngan 'das yin pas/ /mchog tu bde bar gyur pa yin/ /dngos
409b4(dkon brtsegs): po 'di las lhag par ni/ /bdag cag la ni dgos pa med/ /khyim pas rtag tu sbyor 'bul bas/ /bdag cag chos gos lhung bzed mang / /sman dang nor zas shin tu mang //
409b5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin bdag khyim yang rab tu mang / /gang po/ de'i tshe dge slong da ma shi ris dge slong mang po rnams kyis tshigs su bcad de de skad smras pa thos pa dang / sems la rab
409b6(dkon brtsegs): tu gdung ba skyes nas mchi ma blags te dus nas gtsug lag khang gzhan dag tu song ste/ yang dngos po des dge slong mang po rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan+d+has
409b7(dkon brtsegs): rjes su bstan pa ji lta bu zhig gis slob ma rnams la rjes su bstan par mdzad/ bdag gis thos par gyur na ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub par 'tshal lo/ /zhes smras
410a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dge slong mang po rnams kyis kyang snga ma bzhin du lan btab par gyur to/ /de nas dge slong da ma shi ris dge slong mang po de
410a2(dkon brtsegs): dag spangs nas gcig pu ri dang / nags tshal dben par song nas sems rtse gcig tu chos zab mo gnyer ba la 'dun par gyur pa dang / de'i tshe sngon de bzhin gshegs
410a3(dkon brtsegs): pa me ro gan+d+ha'i nyan thos rnams kyi nang na nyan thos chen po shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba rab tu dben pa'i spyod pa mngon par sgrub pa gcig pu ri phug dben par gnas pa/ 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes pa/
410a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spong ba la sems mngon par spro ba/ bya ba byas pa/ mngon par shes pa drug dang / rig pa gsum dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom
410a5(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po zhig byung bar gyur te/ ji ltar da ltar nga'i bstan pa las 'od srung chen po ji lta ba bzhin no/ /de'i tshe dge slong shin tu brtan pa des bdag nyid gnas pa'i ri
410a6(dkon brtsegs): phug gi brag ros la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag yi ger bris par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i ro ni myangs pa'i phyir/ /'khor ba dag ni rgyun mi gcod/ /dgra ni
410a7(dkon brtsegs): gsos nas dur khrod 'jug / don med sdug bsngal mang po myong / /lus ni mi gtsang ro dang 'dra/ /bu ga dgu nas mi gtsang 'dzag /srin bu mi gtsang mos pa bzhin/ /
410b1(dkon brtsegs): blun pos lus sred de dang 'dra/ /yang dag ma yin kun rtog pa/ /de ni 'dod lnga'i rtsa ba yin/ /mkhas pa dag ni mi rtog pas/ /'dod lnga dag ni 'gag par 'gyur/ /log
410b2(dkon brtsegs): rtog las ni 'dod chen skye/ /'dod chen las ni nyon mongs skye/ /yang dag dran la zhen med pas/ /nyon mongs lhag ma'ang zad par 'gyur/ /bam po bzhi pa/ gang po/ dge
410b3(dkon brtsegs): s long shin tu brtan pas ri phug gi brag ngos la tshigs su bcad pa bzhi po 'di dag yi ger bris pa dge slong da ma shi ri ri phug dben par song bas yun ring zhig lon nas ri
410b4(dkon brtsegs): phug gi brag ngos la tshigs su bcad pa bzhi po 'di dag yi ger bris pa mthong nas kha ton du bslab ste/ de'i don gang yin pa yid la byas pas ring po ma lon par shes
410b5(dkon brtsegs): pa lnga thob par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan+d+has sngon zhugs la bzhin pa'i gnas su phyin nas phyag byas te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas skyil mo klung
410b6(dkon brtsegs): bcas te 'dug nas 'di skad ces bdag gis gnas 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa yang ma mthong / chos gzhan yang ma thos kyi bar du 'di las mi ldang ngo / /zhes yid dam
410b7(dkon brtsegs): bcas so/ /gang po/ de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan+d+has gsungs pa'i mdo sde sgo stong phrag brgyad brgya pa zhes bya ba brgya byin lha'i dbang pos mdo sde de kha ton du shes
411a1(dkon brtsegs): p as| brgya byin lha'i dbang pos dge slong da ma shi ri'i lhag pa'i bsam pa sems kyis rtogs nas sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas nas babs
411a2(dkon brtsegs): te| de'i drung du phyin nas de la mdo sde sgo stong phrag brgyad brgya pa de yang dag par bshad do/ /gzhan yang mang du thos pa'i dngos gzhi'i tshig bzhi dang / rnam pa sna tshogs
411a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshig bdun dang / sgo'i tshig bcu bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang byin no/ /dge slong da ma shi ris thos nas kyang kha ton du bton te yongs su bzung bas chos rnams
411a4(dkon brtsegs): la shes rab kyi snang ba thob par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan+d+has gsungs pa'i mdo sde yongs su dag cing stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa/ bral ba'i rjes
411a5(dkon brtsegs): su mthun pa/ zab mo shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde rnams kyang rang gi ngang gis sems la snang bar gyur to/ /gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan+d+ha'i dge slong
411a6(dkon brtsegs): gi dge 'dun 'khor dang bcas pa dang / bzhugs pa'i gnas dri gtsang khang dang / gdan khri dang / 'khor bzhi po rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
411a7(dkon brtsegs): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'khor thams cad kyang mthong bar
411b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur to| |dge slong da ma shi ri yang chos rnams la shes rab kyi snang ba thob par gyur pas 'dug pa'i stan las langs nas mthar gyis rang gi yul du song ste/ pha ma'i drung du phyin
411b2(dkon brtsegs): nas pha ma la yongs su dag cing stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa/ bral ba'i rjes su mthun pa/ zab mo shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde rnams yang dag par bshad nas sangs rgyas dang /
411b3(dkon brtsegs): chos dang / dge 'dun gyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa rab tu brjod pas/ gang po/ de'i tshe dge slong da ma shi ri'i pha ma dang / nang gi btsun mo dang / blon po chen po dang / 'khor
411b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis chos de thos nas shin tu mngon par yid ches par gyur pas gus pa'i sems kyis dge slong da ma shi ri la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa/ bdag cag yongs su
411b5(dkon brtsegs): bskyab cing de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan+d+ha'i bstan pa la rab tu dbyung du gsol zhes gang po de'i tshe srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong rgyal po dang / btsun mo rab tu byung ba'i
411b6(dkon brtsegs): rjes su dus gcig tu rab tu byung bar gyur to/ /rab tu byung nas thams cad kyi ming da ma shi ri'i tshogs kyi dge slong gi dge 'dun zhes bya bar gyur to/ /gang po/ dge slong da
411b7(dkon brtsegs): ma shi ris de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan+d+ha'i bstan pa slar rgyas par byas nas sems can mang po de dag bde ba la yang dag par bkod do/ /sngon gyi tshe rabs kyi byams
412a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / snying rje chen po'i sems kyis dam pa'i chos srung bar smon lam btab pa'i phyir de'i tshe dge slong da ma shi ri ljongs gcig nas
412a2(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu/ grong khyer gcig nas gcig tu/ yul gcig nas gcig tu rgyu zhing song nas de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan+d+ha dang / de'i nyan thos kyi bsngags pa yang
412a3(dkon brtsegs): brjod| gzhan yang yongs su dag cing stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa/ bral ba'i rjes su mthun pa/ zab mo shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde rnams kyang sems can rnams
412a4(dkon brtsegs): la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pas/ de'i tshe dge slong da ma shi ri yang skye bo mang po kun gyis mchod cing rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bla mar byas shing
412a5(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa brjod pas snyan pa'i grags pa yang kun tu grags par gyur to/ /gang po/ dge slong da ma shi ris de ltar sems can mang po'i don rgya cher byas nas
412a6(dkon brtsegs): de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang / de'i slob ma dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams lhan cig tu 'dus te spos kyi shing
412a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad spungs nas mchod pa byas te bsregs nas ring bsrel gyi mchod rten chu zheng du rgyang grags gnyis yod pa brtsigs te/ me tog dang / spos dang / byug
412b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / spos kyi phye ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis gus par mchod cing rim gro dang / bla mar byas nas bsngags pa brjod par gyur to/ /
412b2(dkon brtsegs): gang po| dge slong da ma shi ri 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe slar 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid du skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab pas/ smon lam btab pa bzhin du rgyal rigs su
412b3(dkon brtsegs): skyes nas dran pa thob pa zhes bya bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan+d+ha yongs su mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og tu lo sum brgya lon pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ sngon gyi
412b4(dkon brtsegs): smon lam dang / tshe rabs dran pa'i shes pa'i dbang gis sgo rnams kyi tshig ces bya ba'i gzungs kyi tshig kyang rang gi ngang gis slar thob par gyur to/ /gzungs thob pa'i stobs
412b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbang gis sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde rnams la rgya cher yang dag par bstan gyi/ tshe rabs snga ma la sngar bshad par gyur pa dag ni/ ma bstan to/ /gang po/ de'i tshe da ma shi
412b6(dkon brtsegs): ri dge slong mang po rnams las gang shes rab zab cing gsal la rno ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba lhun stug pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ dran pa thob pas bstan pa'i mdo sde rnams thos
412b7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur nas sems kyi rjes su yi rang nas mngon par yid ches shing dang du len par byed/ gus pas mchod par byas nas dge slong dran pa thob pa la yang yongs su srung
413a1(dkon brtsegs): bar byed do/ /dge slong de dag las gang gzi byin dang yon tan med pa dang / dbang po rtul zhing mi gsal ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba
413a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni/ dge slong dran pa thob pas gsar du bshad pa'i chos thos par gyur nas mngon par yid ches pa yang med/ dang du len pa yang med la/ 'gal ba dag byas nas
413a3(dkon brtsegs): skyon 'byin cing 'di skad du 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'di dag ni/ bdag cag gis mkhan po dang / slob dpon las kyang ma thos/ sngon slob dpon chen po da ma shi ri las kyang
413a4(dkon brtsegs): ma thos so/ /zhes zer ro/ /gang po/ de dag las gang shes rab zab cing yang dag pa'i don la rton pa de dag ni/ tshig gi rjes su mi 'brang bar don la rton pa'i phyir sems
413a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis kyang 'gal bar mi byed do/ /'gal bar mi byed pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan+d+ha'i bstan pa yang yang dag par srung bar byed la/ gus pas dge slong
413a6(dkon brtsegs): dran pa thob pa la yang srung bar byed do/ /gang po/ de'i tshe dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu dge slong
413a7(dkon brtsegs): dran pa thob pas bstan pa'i mdo sde'i chos kyi rjes su zhugs par gyur to/ /gang po/ de'i tshe dge slong da ma shi ri'i slob ma 'khor rnams logs shig tu sde gnyis su
413b1(dkon brtsegs): gyes par gyur te/ gcig gi ming ni/ da ma shi ri'i dge slong gi dge 'dun zhes bya bar gyur to/ /gcig gi ming ni/ dran pa thob pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun zhes bya bar
413b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur kyang de'i tshe dge slong dran pa thob pas bdag ni/ da ma shi ri yin no/ /zhes ni/ ma smras so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i tshe dge slong da ma shi ri ni/ mang po kun gyis dgra
413b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ ma yin no/ /zhes zer bas gal te bdag nyid kyis smras par gyur na/ mang po kun the tshom za bar
413b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / dge slong dran pa thob pa ni/ de'i tshe mang po kun gyis 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' yin gyi/ dgra bcom pa ni/ ma yin no/ /zhes zer bas so/ /gang
413b5(dkon brtsegs): po| dge slong dran pa thob pas de ltar rgya cher sems can rnams la phan btags nas de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur pa dang / de'i slob ma mang po rnams
413b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis spos kyi shing thams cad spungs nas mchod pa byas te bsregs so/ /'khor bzhi po rnams 'dus te ston pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' de la mchod pa bya
413b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir ring bsrel gyi mchod rten chu zheng du rgyang grags gcig yod pa brtsigs nas spos dang / me tog dang / spos kyi phye ma dang / byug pa dang / phreng ba dang /
414a1(dkon brtsegs): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis mchod cing bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas shing bsngags pa brjod par gyur to/ /
414a2(dkon brtsegs): gang po| dge slong dran pa thob pa 'chi kha'i dus kyi tshe bdag slar 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid du skye bar gyur cig /ces smon lam btab pas smon lam btab pa bzhin
414a3(dkon brtsegs): du khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skyes par gyur te/ de'i ming ni/ ya sha zhes bya bar gyur to/ /sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis sngon gyi gnas rjes
414a4(dkon brtsegs): su dran pa thob par gyur pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan+d+ha yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu lo bzhi brgya pa'i bstan pa la lo bdun lon te rab tu byung
414a5(dkon brtsegs): nas gzungs rnams thob par gyur to/ /gzungs thob pa'i mthus skye bo mang po la sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde rnams yang dag par bstan to/ /de'i tshe dge slong dran pa
414a6(dkon brtsegs): thob pa'i dge slong rnams dang / da ma shi ri'i dge slong rnams las gang dge ba'i rtsa ba lhun stug pa de dag ni/ ya shas bstan pa'i chos rnams thos nas sems rab
414a7(dkon brtsegs): tu dga' zhing thams cad kyis chos kyi bde ba thob par gyur to/ /gang po/ dge slong mang po de dag yang dag pa'i don la rten cing tshig gi rjes su 'brang bar cang mi
414b1(dkon brtsegs): byed pas/ de'i phyir dge slong ya shas sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun zhing shin tu zab pa don dam pa'i rjes su mthun pa yang dag par bstan pa thos
414b2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur nas mngon par yid ches shing dang du len par byed/ 'gal ba med par yang dag par len cing kha ton du 'don par byed de/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du rjes su
414b3(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs par gyur to/ /gang po/ dge slong de dag las gang dbang po rtul zhing mi gsal ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba lhun mi stug pa de dag ni/ dge slong ya sha las sngon
414b4(dkon brtsegs): ma thos pa'i mdo sde stong pa nyid kyi don dam pa'i rjes su mthun pa/ stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun zhing shin tu zab pa dag thos par gyur nas mngon par yid ches shing
414b5(dkon brtsegs): dang du len par yang mi byed/ 'gal bar byas nas 'jig cing smod par byed de/ 'di skad du 'di lta bu'i chos 'di ni/ bdag cag gis mkhan po dang / slob dpon
414b6(dkon brtsegs): las kyang ma thos/ sngon ston pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' dran pa thob pa las kyang ma thos so/ /zhes zer ro/ /gang po/ /dge slong ya sha las chos thos nas rab
414b7(dkon brtsegs): tu dga' ba dang / sems kyis mngon par yid ches shing dang du blangs pa de dag thams cad ni/ da ma shi ri'i dge slong rnams dang / dran pa thob pa'i dge slong rnams kyis
415a1(dkon brtsegs): sdang zhing phrag dog gis smad nas lhan cig gnas su yang mi ster/ lhan cig klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang / chos bshad du

415a3(dkon brtsegs): d ge slong ya shas de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan+d+ha'i bstan pa rgya cher yang dag par spel nas grong khyer gcig nas grong khyer gcig tu rgyu zhing song nas sems can rnams

415a6(dkon brtsegs): slong ya sha'i phyir ring bsrel gyi mchod rten bdun khri brtsigs nas spos dang / me tog dang / spos kyi phye ma dang / byug pa dang / phreng ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
