449b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i chos bco brgyad dang / zag pa med pa'i dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan
449b7(dkon brtsegs): lag dang / lam dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid du bstan to/ /zhes zer na/ de
450a1(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad du smros shig / khyod kyis stobs bcu la sogs pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid yin no/ /zhes smras pas/ deng
450a2(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin pa shod cig / de gal te 'di skad du ci sangs rgyas dang / mtshan tha dad pa zhig yin nam zhes zer na/ de
450a3(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad du khyod nyid mtshan sangs rgyas yin no/ /zhes zer bar zad kyi/ mtshan ni/ sangs rgyas ma yin no/ /zhes smros shig /des gal te yang 'di skad du
450a4(dkon brtsegs): dbyibs med cing kha dog med pa'i chos gzhan zhig sangs rgyas kyi stobs bcu la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid byed par 'gyur ram zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du smros
450a5(dkon brtsegs): shig / dbyibs med cing kha dog med pa'i chos ji ltar dbyibs dang bcas shing kha dog dang bcas pa'i mtshan nyid byed par 'gyur/ gzhan yang khyod kyis
450a6(dkon brtsegs): gal te dbyibs med cing kha dog med pa'i chos la sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/ /zhes zer na/ 'o na ni/ gzhan dbyibs med cing kha dog med pa'i chos thams cad
450a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas yin par 'gyur ba'i rigs so/ /gal te chos de dag sangs rgyas yin par gyur na ni/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i
450b1(dkon brtsegs): chos bco brgyad dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar ba dang / ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa yang de'i mtshan
450b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid byed par 'gyur ba'i rigs so/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /glang po che'i lag /nga'i nyan thos rnams ni/ de ltar skyes bu blun po rnams rab tu 'dul bar byed do/ /gzhan yang
450b3(dkon brtsegs): glang po che'i lag / ngas sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can thams cad yongs su bzla bar bya'o/ /zhes
450b4(dkon brtsegs): smon lam btab mod kyi/ nga byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na sems can yang mi
450b5(dkon brtsegs): dmigs/ sems can gyi ming yang mi dmigs pas/ nga byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i tshe rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i chos dngos po yod
450b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir dngos po 'di yod/ dngos po med pa'i phyir dngos po 'di med par rtogs pa kho nar zad do/ /dngos po gang yod pa'i phyir dngos po gang yod/ dngos po gang
450b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i phyir dngos po gang med par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams yod par 'gyur/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par
451a1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug /skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen
451a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi/ rga shi'i
451a3(dkon brtsegs): rkyen gyis mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams yod par 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung
451a4(dkon brtsegs): po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ma rig pa 'gags pa'i phyir 'du byed rnams 'gag /'du byed rnams 'gags pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa
451a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gag / rnam par shes pa 'gags pa'i phyir ming dang gzugs 'gag /ming dang gzugs 'gags pa'i phyir skye mched drug 'gag /skye mched drug 'gags
451a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir reg pa 'gag / reg pa 'gags pa'i phyir tshor ba 'gag /tshor ba 'gags pa'i phyir sred pa 'gag /sred pa'i 'gags pa'i phyir len pa 'gag /len pa
451a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gags pa'i phyir srid pa 'gag / srid pa 'gags pa'i phyir skye ba 'gag /skye ba 'gags pa'i phyir rga shi 'gag /rga shi 'gags pa'i phyir mya ngan dang / smre sngags
451b1(dkon brtsegs): 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di dag 'gag par
451b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /nga de las mig dang / ye shes dang / rig pa dang / blo skyes pas 'di ltar dbus dang / mtha' med pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i rnam par grol ba rab tu
451b3(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par grol ba de rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir chos gzhan gang yang thob par gyur pa med kyi/ rgyu dang / rkyen las byung ba'i chos
451b4(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa kho nar zad do/ /glang po che'i lag /de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ ji ltar chos rnams rab tu rtogs pa de bzhin du sems can rnams la yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /
451b5(dkon brtsegs): glang po che'i lag /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid ni/ 'gyur ba med par rtag tu
451b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pas 'di lta ste/ ming dang gzugs kyang stong par mi 'gyur la/ phan tshun 'gal ba yang med/ skye ba yang med/ 'byung ba yang med do/ /glang po che'i lag /nga ni/
451b7(dkon brtsegs): rtag par de ltar chos ston pas khyod kyis kyang nga'i dgongs pa bzhin du rig par bya'o/ /ngas khyed la de lta bu'i chos bstan na/ khyed kyis kyang de bzhin du nan tan gyis bsgrub
452a1(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ /glang po che'i lag /ston pa chen pos slob pa rnams la gang bya ba'i rigs pa de dag ngas ma lus par byas zin pas/ khyed kyis
452a2(dkon brtsegs): ji skad bstan pa bzhin du mngon par bsgrubs nas chos rnams las ye shes kyi snang ba thob par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa glang po che'i lag gis
452a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te 'ga' zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i yang dag pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba zhig yin
452a4(dkon brtsegs): na| su zhig lam ston par 'gyur/ lam ston pa med pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos nub pa zhes bya'o/ /dam pa'i chos nub par gyur pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa yang
452a5(dkon brtsegs): nub pa zhes bya bas 'di yang sems can thams cad yongs su ma bzlas pa'o/ /zhes mchi na/ de la ji skad du lan gdab par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
452a6(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa| glang po che'i lag / gal te de skad du 'dri ba yod na/ de la 'di skad du lan gdab par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa yin par skye bo
452a7(dkon brtsegs): mang po kun gyis kyang shes shing mthong la/ rtag par sems can bzla ba'i dus la gzhes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang da dung phan pa mdzad pa yin no/ /
452b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas ma 'ongs pa'i dus su sangs rgyas rnams la byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar lung ston par mdzad pas de nyid
452b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi gdung bsab cing rgyun mi gcod par mdzad pa yin te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos ni/ sangs rgyas gcig gi chos yin pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
452b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /zhes bstan to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yin pas de lta bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ sngon byang
452b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe ji skad bstan pa bzhin du spyod cing ji ltar spyod pa bzhin du gsungs pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
452b5(dkon brtsegs): la tshe dang ldan pa glang po che'i lag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ chos thams cad yongs su tshol ba legs par thugs su
452b6(dkon brtsegs): chud pa lags te/ chos thams cad legs par thugs su chud pa'i slad du sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi 'phrin las mkhyen pa sngon du gtong zhing mkhyen pa'i rjes su
452b7(dkon brtsegs): 'brang bas na/ bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe ji skad bstan pa bzhin du mdzad cing / ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin du gsungs par gyur pa ni/
453a1(dkon brtsegs): shin tu ngo mtshar che lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ glang po che'i lag /de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ glang po che'i
453a2(dkon brtsegs): lag / khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin du nga ni/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe ji skad bstan pa bzhin du spyod cing ji ltar spyod pa bzhin du smras par gyur
453a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ /glang po che'i lag /yang dag par smra ba gang la la zhig 'di skad du su zhig nor ba med par 'jig rten du byung nas sems can la phan 'dogs pas lha dang /
453a4(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa'i 'jig rten bde ba la dgod pa dang / thams cad kun gyi ston pa chen por gyur nas yang dag pa'i lam ston pa dang / yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis rnam
453a5(dkon brtsegs): par grol bas spros pa mi mnga' bar pha rol tu byon nas da dung ma brgal ba dag yongs su zlos zhes zer ba la/ de ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nga yin no/ /zhes
453a6(dkon brtsegs): smra ba gang yin pa de ni/ yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin no/ /glang po che'i lag /yang dag par smra ba gang la la zhig 'di skad du su zhig slu ba med cing bya ba byas pa'i
453a7(dkon brtsegs): drin gzo ba yin zhes zer ba la de ni/ nga yin no/ /zhes smra ba gang yin pa de ni/ yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin te/ sems can gang la la zhig nga la bya ba
453b1(dkon brtsegs): cung zad cig byas pa'i dngos po de dag chud za bar mi 'gyur ro/ /glang po che'i lag /nga ni/ dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa tshun
453b2(dkon brtsegs): chad par der nam yang sems la ldog cing gyur pa yang med la/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mngon par zhen cing mos par gyur pa yang dag par
453b3(dkon brtsegs): rjes su mi dran yang ngas chos de bstan pas/ nga'i 'khor rnams las sems rtse gcig tu nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu yongs su gnyer ba dag gzud pa'i
453b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir 'dun par gyur pa kho nar zad do/ /glang po che'i lag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na nga mu stegs can gyi drang srong du gyur pa'i tshe shes rab gsal zhing rno la mang du thos
453b5(dkon brtsegs): shing spobs pa dang ldan par gyur pas chos zab mo'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de'i tshe bram ze gzhon nu lnga brgya zhig khyim na gnas pa dang / 'dod pa lnga'i nyes dmigs
453b6(dkon brtsegs): mthong zhing rab tu byung ba'i phan yon mthong nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste lam bsgoms par gyur to/ /de dag thams cad nga'i thad du 'ongs pa dang / ngas chos
453b7(dkon brtsegs): bstan pas rang sangs rgyas kyi lam thob par gyur nas mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan zhing sems la rang dbang thob pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan par gyur pas
454a1(dkon brtsegs): rtag par rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dag tu zhugs te/ bsod
454a2(dkon brtsegs): snyoms bslangs nas nga la rim gro byas so/ /nga de'i tshe 'di snyam du 'di ltar 'di dag ni/ yongs su dag pa'i ye shes chen po dang ldan pa yin pas/ bdag gis
454a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag gi mchod pa blang ba'i mi rigs so/ /snyam du sems par gyur to/ /drang srong de dag ngas rjes su bstan pa'i phyir de lta bu'i chos thob par gyur kyang ngas thob par
454a4(dkon brtsegs): ma gyur pas chos de thob par bya zhing / mngon sum du mi byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir nan tan brtson 'grus bskyed par gyur to/ /glang po che'i lag /ngas nan tan
454a5(dkon brtsegs): b rtson 'grus bskyed nas chos de mngon sum du byas pa'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha zhig 'ongs te mngon du lus bstan nas nga la 'di skad du kye ye shes 'di la
454a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par zhen par ma byed cig / khyod ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas nas sems can tshad med dpag tu med pa rnams
454a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bzla bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bsgo'o/ /glang po che'i lag /ngas de'i tshe de skad bsgo ba thos nas lam sgom pa btang bas/ sems mchog tu dga' ba thob par gyur
454b1(dkon brtsegs): nas zla ba phyed kyi bar du dben par 'dug pa'i tshe dga' bas lus kun tu khyab par gyur to/ /glang po che'i lag /byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan par gyur na/ lha
454b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis go bar byed cing rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyang thob par 'gyur la/ bdag nyid kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par rig par bya'o/ /

454b4(dkon brtsegs): chen por sems bskyed pa dag mthong na phrag dog kyang mi byed la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ bdag gcig pus thob par bya ba yin gyi /

454b6(dkon brtsegs): smras nas de dag gi dge ba yongs su srung bar byed pa yin/ bdag nyid rtag par rab tu brtson pa'i sems kyis chos rnams rgya cher gnyer zhing gzhan dag la bstan nas
454b7(dkon brtsegs): ser sna med par gyur pa yin te/ glang po che'i lag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan par gyur na/ lha rnams kyis kyang

455a5(dkon brtsegs): khong khro dag ni med pa yin/ /rtag par nan tan chos gnyer nas/ /sems can rnams la spel bar byed/ /ji ltar char ni rlan byed ltar/ /chos kyis thams cad tshim

455a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas de thos nas/ /nan tan brtson 'grus skyed par byed/ /dngos po 'di ni nges bden bas/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas nges grub sems/ /byang chub sems

455b6(dkon brtsegs): rang gi sems ni 'dul bar byed/ /sems can rab tu brtse ba'i phyir/ /'jig rten du ni skyes pas na/ /rgyal po blon po dmangs rnams kyang / /ngo mtshar che zhes bsngags par
455b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur| |lha rnams kun kyang smra bas na/ /de yi ya mtshan kun gyis rig /ci'i phyir de ltar rig ce na/ /bdag sems shes zhes sems phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' de

456a7(dkon brtsegs): na| |de phyir bzod pa bla med thob/ /yun ring byams dang snying rje yis/ /sems can kun la sems pas na/ /de phyir bsod nams de yi dbang / /sangs rgyas tshad med
456b1(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar 'gyur/ /de yi lus ni thams cad kun/ /sangs rgyas sku dang khyad par med/ /de 'dra'i bzod pa thob pas ni/ /chos kyis bdag nyid 'phel bar byed/ /byang chub

457a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lam ni spong bar byed/ /sangs rgyas chos la rtag brten pa/ /de ni lam la brten par 'gyur/ /des ni mi khom rnam spangs nas/ /khom ldan dag ni thob par 'gyur/ /
457a3(dkon brtsegs): khom ldan gnas ni thob gyur na/ /brtson 'grus brtsams pa chud mi za/ /gnas gnyis su ni mchog tu btsun/ /kha dog gzugs ni mchog tu 'gyur/ /g.yog

457a5(dkon brtsegs): phyogs la rab gnas shing / /bsam gtan shes rab 'phel bar byed/ /rtag tu sems can thams cad kyi/ /gtso mchog dag ni byed par 'gyur/ /yon tan kun
457a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi mchog gyur pas/ /don rig 'jigs pa ci yang med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gang bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di
457a7(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i chos gya nom pa dag la su zhig slob par mi bgyid de/ bdag cag ni/ sngon dang po nas le lo can du gyur pas sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa la re ba ma mchis
457b1(dkon brtsegs): shing / bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa 'di lta bu thob par 'gyur bar mngon par yid ches pa ma mchis pas na/ 'di ltar nyan thos kyi theg pas bdag nyid nges
457b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'byung bar 'gyur ba lags so/ /snyam du sems lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni/ deng slan chad byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gzengs bstod cing
457b3(dkon brtsegs): spro ba bskyed nas sangs rgyas kyi chos la dgod par bgyid lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ shin tu dka' ba mdzad pa
457b4(dkon brtsegs): lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe sems can gyi ched du rtag par de lta bu'i shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po sha stag mdzad
457b5(dkon brtsegs): de| de lta bu'i dngos po de ni/ dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la yang ma mchis na/ sems can gzhan la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bas so/ /bcom
457b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ de lta bu'i shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por gyur pa 'ba' zhig gis sems can thams cad la snying
457b7(dkon brtsegs): brtse ba'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po chen po de lta bu tshad ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa dag
458a1(dkon brtsegs): spyad pas/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag de lta bu'i shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po chen po spyod de bla na med pa yang
458a2(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor te/ sems can sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba rnams yongs
458a3(dkon brtsegs): su bzla bar bgyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byang chub
458a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas sems can thams cad kyi phan pa dang / bde
458a5(dkon brtsegs): ba yongs su gnyer ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin pas sems can thams cad kyi ched du byang chub sems
458a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe de lta bu'i smon lam chen po dang / dka' ba'i dngos po chen po shin tu zab pa/ shin tu dka' ba/ tshad med dpag tu med grangs
458a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang / 'khor bzhi po rnams dang / lha dang / mi dang / klu dang / gnod
458b1(dkon brtsegs): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yan du bcas pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rab tu dga' zhing yid ches pas mngon par bstod do/ /tshe dang ldan
458b2(dkon brtsegs): pa gang po'i le'u ste/ brgyad pa'o// //'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ gang pos
458b3(dkon brtsegs): zhus pa'i le'u ste/ bcu bdun pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ A R+Ya rASh+Ta pA la pa ri pr-i ts+tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yul
458b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis
458b5(dkon brtsegs): thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub
458b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' lnga stong thams cad kyang spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ bzod pa thob pa/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la shin tu nye
458b7(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pa/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ gzungs thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ spobs pa mtha' yas pa thob pa/ mi 'jigs pa thogs pa med pa thob pa/ rdzu
459a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul gyi stobs dang / dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa nas yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad zad mi shes pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang
459a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / kun tu mig dang / kun tu lta ba dang / kun tu 'od zer dang / kun tu 'od dang / blo gros mchog
459a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / blo gros 'phel dang / blo gros mtha' yas dang / blo gros rgya chen dang / blo gros mi zad pa dang / sa 'dzin dang / 'gro ba 'dzin dang / rgyal ba'i blo
459a4(dkon brtsegs): gros dang / khyad par blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa sems
459a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' dpe med drug cu dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 'jig
459a6(dkon brtsegs): rten skyong ba bzhi dang / lha'i bu mtshams bzang dang / lha'i bu blo gros legs gnas dang / lha'i dbang bo thams cad dang / klu'i dbang po dang / mi 'am ci'i
459a7(dkon brtsegs): dbang po dang / dri ze'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i 'khor brgya stong du ma yod pa
459b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang / 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'khod pa rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi snying po'i seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs te/ lhun
459b2(dkon brtsegs): po ltar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad las ni/ mngon par 'phags/ nyi ma ltar 'jig rten thams cad la ni/ snang / zla ba ltar 'gro ba thams cad la ni/ snang
459b3(dkon brtsegs): bar mdzad/ tshangs pa ltar rab tu zhi bar ni/ bzhugs/ brgya byin ltar sku ni/ bsnyen par dka'/ 'khor los bsgyur ba ltar byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po
459b4(dkon brtsegs): che bdun dang ni/ ldan/ seng+ge ltar chos thams cad bdag med pa dang stong par ni/ sgrog /me'i phung po chen po ltar 'gro ba thams cad la snang ba'i sku dang ni/ ldan/
459b5(dkon brtsegs): lha thams cad snang ba'i nor bu rin po che kun nas bsdus pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po ltar gzi brjid kyis shin tu 'bar zhing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
459b6(dkon brtsegs): g yi khams thams cad snang bas khyab par mdzad nas don shin tu rnam par nges pas chos thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu byon pa 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs shing
459b7(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa/ sems can thams cad kyi go bar byed pa dang ldan pa'i dbyangs kyis chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/
460a1(dkon brtsegs): bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ /tshig 'bru bzang po/ /ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs
460a2(dkon brtsegs): su byang ba yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par
460a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/ nyi ma stong las lhag pa'i 'od kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad zil du rlag par mdzad
460a4(dkon brtsegs): nas shin tu lhang nger bzhugs pa mthong ste/ dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / dad pas 'dun pa'i sems kyis stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te bcom
460a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /lha tshogs lha ma yin dang mi 'am ci/ /klu dang nyan thos dag dang
460a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas sras/ /'gro ba 'di dag rgyal bas gzi yangs kyis/ /zil mnan khyod ni gser gyi ri ltar gsal/ /rgya mtsho'i dbus na gnas kyang rnam mdzes
460a7(dkon brtsegs): pa| |lhun po lha yi tshogs kyi gnas lta bur/ /thugs rje'i rgya mtsho'i dbus su de bzhugs te/ /'od zer stong phrag brgya dag 'gyed par mdzad/ /tshangs pa'i gnas
460b1(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa'i tshangs pa de/ /tshangs pa'i mdun na gnas te mngon mdzes ltar/ /bsam gtan rnam thar ting nge 'dzin bzhugs pa/ /sems can dam pa 'gro ba kun la
460b2(dkon brtsegs): gsal| |brgya phyin sum cu rtsa gsum lha nang du/ /gnas nas gzi brjid yangs pas mdzes pa ltar/ /mtshan gyis spras pa ye shes yon tan phyug /thub pa'i rgyal po 'gro
460b3(dkon brtsegs): ba kun la gsal/ /gling bzhi mi yi bdag po snang ldan pa/ /'jig rten 'di la ston pa mdzes pa ltar/ /'phags pa'i lam du 'jug pa rab mdzad cing / /thugs rjes dgongs
460b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i thugs mnga' 'di yang mdzes/ /mkha' la nyi ma lham me thal le ba/ /nor bu me 'od mog mog byed 'di ltar/ /nyi ma stong bas khyad par 'phags pa'i 'od/ /sangs
460b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas nyi ma 'gro ba 'di na gsal/ /dri med zla ba nam gyi gung gsal ltar/ /shin tu rnam dag 'gro ba kun la gsal/ /rgyal ba'i zhal ras zla ba nya ba 'dra/ /kun 'od
460b6(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis mnan nas rnam par mdzes/ /ji ltar ri bo'i zom la me 'bar ba/ /mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na kun snang ltar/ /gti mug mun pa ma lus bcom nas ni/ /drang
460b7(dkon brtsegs): srong chen po'i ye shes 'od kyang gsal/ /seng+ge ri sul brten pa'i sgra sgrog cing / /sa la ri dwags tshogs rnams skrag bgyid ltar/ /mi dbang stong pa bdag med gsung
461a1(dkon brtsegs): sgrog cing / /pha rol mu stegs can rnams skrag par mdzad/ /nor bu'i rgyal po bzang ba gzi brjid 'bar/ /nor bu thams cad zil
461a2(dkon brtsegs): mnan lham me ltar/ /rgyal ba'i sku ni gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/ /'gro kun zil gyis mnan nas lham mer bzhugs/ /'jig rten gang na'ang khyod dang mtshungs
461a3(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis/ /lhag pa'i sems can mchis par ga la 'gyur/ /bsod nams ye shes brtson 'grus thabs rnams dang / /yon tan kun gyis khyod dang mtshungs
461a4(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis/ /mi yi dpa' bo 'gro la lham me ba/ /mgon po yon tan rgya mtsho bdag gis mthong / /gus pa skyes shing dga' ba rnam par 'phel/ /rgyal ba'i zhabs
461a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi mthil la bdag gis gtugs/ /yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas 'jig rten sgron/ /grags pa dam pa rgya chen thugs mnga' ba/ /bdag gis bstod de bsod
461a6(dkon brtsegs): nams 'dis thob des/ /'gro ba thams cad byang chub mchog reg shog /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos
461a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te mig gnyis mi 'dzum par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ni / blta| chos kyi dbyings nyid la ni/
461b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dpyod/ zab pa dang / gting dpag dka' ba dang / mthong bar dka' ba dang / khong du chud par dka' ba dang / brtag
461b2(dkon brtsegs): mi nus pa dang / rtog ge'i spyod pa ma yin pa dang / zhi ba dang phra ba la ni/ 'jug /sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ni/ rjes su rnam par dpyod/ de
461b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chos kyi dbyings thams cad du zhugs pa la ni/ rjes su rnam par sems/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa la ni/ yang
461b4(dkon brtsegs): dag par blta/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs kyi yul gyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ni/ 'jug /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings
461b5(dkon brtsegs): gcig gi tshul gyi ngo bo nyid la 'jug pa la ni/ rtog /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gnas med pa nam mkha' spyod yul du ni/ yang dag par blta/ chos
461b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha' mtha' ma yin pa'i rang bzhin la 'jug pa la ni/ mos/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa la ni/ mngon par 'dod/ sangs rgyas
461b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku rtag pa dang / zhi ba dang / ther zug pa la ni/ 'jug /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhing rab 'byams thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang /
462a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa la ni/ 'jug /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan gyi phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal
462a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mur yang thug pa med pa ni/ rjes su dran par byed/ chos kyi dbyings nyid la rnam pa dpyod cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga'
462a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rgyal po yang cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong mnyan yod du dbyar zla ba gsum gnas par dam bcas te/ de zla ba gsum
462a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das nas chos gos byas te chos gos zin nas de lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / gsar bu las dang po rab tu byung nas ring
462a5(dkon brtsegs): po ma lon pa dag dang lhan cig tu mthar gyis yul rgyu ba rgyu zhing / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang / bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba der song ngo / /
462a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das
462a7(dkon brtsegs): la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis thal mo sbyar te tshigs su
462b1(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ /mi mchog 'od mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
462b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba yid gnyis gcod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /srid gsum mthar byon thub la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhing rnams bye ba rab 'byams kun tu yang / /'dren pa dag ni khyod kyi
462b3(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa gsung / /rgyal ba'i sras kyis thos nas rab dga' zhing / /yon tan rgya mtsho thub pa mchod du mchi/ /bde gshegs tshul dang mthun pas mchod bgyis te/ /thub pa
462b4(dkon brtsegs): che las rdul bral chos thos nas/ /de dag khyod kyi yon tan phreng brjod cing / /yid rab dga' nas rang gi zhing du mchi/ /byang chub dam pa mchog ni tshol ba na/ /khyed kyi
462b5(dkon brtsegs): thugs ni skyo ba mi mnga' bar/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas su/ /sems can rnams kyi ched du spyod pa spyad/ /'dren pa khyod kyi sbyin dang tshul khrims spyad/ /bzod
462b6(dkon brtsegs): dang brtson 'grus dang ni bsam gtan bslab/ /shes rab thabs dang dbang gi pha rol gshegs/ /des na rnam 'dren che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang dag mngon
462b7(dkon brtsegs): shes mchog la mkhas/ /dbang po stobs dang rnam par thar pa bslab/ /sems can kun gyi spyod pa thugs chud rtogs/ /mnyam med ye shes gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro
463a1(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams kyi sems rgyud rab tu mkhyen/ /spyod pa gang dang ji ltar las 'byung dang / /tshul sgo gang gis rnam par grol 'gyur ba/ /de ni

463a7(dkon brtsegs): gsum rnams su rtag par stobs bcu yi/ /ye shes mkhyen pa sgrib pa mi mnga' 'jug /chos rnams kun la thugs ni chags mi mnga'/ /phyag 'tshal rgyal ba
463b1(dkon brtsegs): ye shes mtsho khyod la/ /khyod dang mtshungs mnyam ma mchis rab tu lhag /skar ma rnams kyis nam mkha' spras pa ltar/ /mtshan rnams kyis kyang sku ni rab spras pa/ /mi

463b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi mdzod spu mdzes/ /'gro la thugs rje dgongs pas gang gzigs pa/ /spyan ni ut+pal 'dra zhing yid du mchi/ /zla nyi dri med mkha' la ji lta bar/ /rnam 'dren khyod kyi
463b6(dkon brtsegs): zhal ni lham me ste/ /lha pa'i skye bo ngoms par mi 'gyur ba/ /zhal bzang mi yi mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ngan pa rma bya ri dwags rgyal gyi stabs/ /glang po dregs pa
463b7(dkon brtsegs): dal gyis mchi stabs kyis/ /sa rnams g.yo bar mdzad cing rab gshegs pa/ /stobs bcu brtul zhugs brtan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag gi sor mo ring zhing zlum
464a1(dkon brtsegs): la mdzes/ /sen mo zangs mdog dag cing dra bas spras/ /bzhengs kyang pus mo'i lha ngar reg cing sleb/ /sku mdog gser mdog 'dra
464a2(dkon brtsegs): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor lo dra bas khyab pa'i zhabs 'dor bar/ /sa steng ri mor mdzad cing rab tu gshegs/ /zhabs kyi 'od zer gyis ni yongs smin pa'i/ /mi
464a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams gum nas lha yi 'jig rten mchi/ /chos kyi rgyal po nor bdun sbyin pa po/ /chos kyi sbyin bdag dul ba'i thugs mnga' ba/ /chos kyi spyod pas 'gro ba
464a4(dkon brtsegs): rjes ston pa/ /'dren pa chos kyi rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byams pa'i go che dran pa'i ral gri mchog /tshul khrims gzhu dang shes rab thabs kyi mda'/ /de yis
464a5(dkon brtsegs): skye 'chi srid sred 'phel bgyid pa/ /nyon mongs dgra dag rnam par bcom par gyur/ /brgal nas sems can khrag khrig rnams kyang sgrol/ /grol nas 'ching
464a6(dkon brtsegs): pa las ni 'gro ba 'grel/ /bde gshegs gang gis zhi ba'i gnas mchi ba/ /bde ba rims nad ma mchis lam yang ston/ /gang na skye dang 'chi ba ma
464a7(dkon brtsegs): mchis shing / /'phral ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba/ /gnas mchog zhi ba 'dus ma bgyis pa de/ /thugs rjes brnyes nas khyed kyis bstan pa
464b1(dkon brtsegs): mdzad| |chos kun dbang gi pha rol gshegs pa'i rgyal/ /thub pa chen po 'jig rten mchog bstod pas/ /bdag gis 'dir ni bsod nams gang bsags des//
464b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya shog /de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par
464b3(dkon brtsegs): b stod nas thal mo sbyar te stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs
464b4(dkon brtsegs): su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skyabs phye
464b5(dkon brtsegs): na| bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so/ /de skad ces
464b6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /yul 'khor skyong / khyod ci dad ci 'dod pa dris shig
464b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / ngas dris pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis
465a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang
465a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan na/ chos thams cad kyi yon tan gyi khyad par thob par gyur/ /gzhan la rag ma las pa'i shes pa 'thob/ myur ba'i shes rab 'thob/ spobs
465a3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam par nges pa 'thob/ snang ba 'thob/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / yid gnyis
465a4(dkon brtsegs): spong ba dang / som nyi spong ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rnam par nges pa 'thob/ sems can 'dzud pa la mkhas pa dang / ji skad smras pa de
465a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du bgyid pa dang / ldem po dag yang dag pa dang / sems can gyi khams la mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'thob pa dang / zhu
465a6(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad zhu ba dang / chos thams cad 'dzin pa dang / myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor
465a7(dkon brtsegs): skyong gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab nges pa/ /yang dag nyid du ji ltar nges 'byung dang / /ye shes
465b1(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho'i bka' mchid rnam nges pa/ /mi mchog rgyal ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ /shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi gzugs lta bu/ /sems can dam pa
465b2(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams tshogs bsags pa/ /khyod ni skyabs dang gnas dang dpung gnyen lags/ /byang chub spyod mchog dri med deng bdag gsungs/ /gzungs
465b3(dkon brtsegs): dang bdud rtsi byang chub 'byung ba yi/ /ye shes mi zad ji ltar 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang gis skye bo'i dogs pa gcod 'gyur ba/ /shes rab rgya mtsho ji ltar
465b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag / 'khor bar bskal pa bye ba mang por ni/ /'jig rten sdug bsngal nyen pa blta bgyid kyang / /skyo ba'i blo ni nam yang mi bskyed cing / /de dag don
465b5(dkon brtsegs): dge bsten par 'gyur ba dang / /dag pa'i zhing dang phun sum tshogs 'khor dang / /tshe mchog dang ni phun sum tshogs zhing dang / /sems can ched kyi bka'
465b6(dkon brtsegs): mchid bla med dang / /byang chub spyod pa dri med bshad du gsol/ /bdud 'joms mdzad pa lta ngan sbyong ba po/ /sred pa skem pa rnam grol reg mdzad pas/ /chos
465b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshul yang bskyud par mi 'gyur ba/ /sems can rin chen spyod mchog bstan du gsol/ /gzugs dang longs spyod spobs pa phun sum tshogs/ /snum pa'i
466a1(dkon brtsegs): gsung gis 'khor rnams tshim par mdzad/ /bde gshegs sprin ltar 'gro ba tshim mdzad pa/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul legs par
466a2(dkon brtsegs): bstan du gsol/ /ka la ping+ka'i sgra snyan gsung 'byin pa/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis blo ngan rab 'jig pa/ /chos 'tshal gyur pa'i 'khor rnams lhags lags kyi/ /
466a3(dkon brtsegs): gtso bo bdud rtsi'i ro yis tshim par mdzod/ /byang chub dam pa'i mchog la 'dun pa mchis/ /chos dang 'dun pa bzlog pa mi rigs te/ /'dren pa bstan pa mdzad
466a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus 'di lags/ /rin chen dam pa bsgrag pa'i dus la bab/ /thub pa bdag ni byang chub re ba mchis/ /bdag gi bsam pa rgyal bas rab tu mkhyen/ /rgyal ba co
466a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dri ma lags don du gnyer/ /spyod pa dam pa legs par bshad du gsol/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor
466a6(dkon brtsegs): skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /yul 'khor skyong / khyod legs so/ /yul 'khor skyong / /khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang / yul 'khor
466a7(dkon brtsegs): skyong / khyod skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
466b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams yongs su gzung ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di dri bar sems pa ni/ legs so/ /yul 'khor skyong / khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon
466b2(dkon brtsegs): la yid la zungs shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ legs so/ /zhes gsol to/ /tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi
466b3(dkon brtsegs): ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /yul 'khor skyong / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi
466b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan na/ yongs su dag pa 'di dag 'thob bo/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pas nan tan byed pa dang / sems can thams
466b5(dkon brtsegs): cad la sems mnyam pa dang / stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
466b6(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ yongs su dag pa 'di dag 'thob bo/ /'di la 'di ni/ chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /bsam pa thag pas rtag tu
466b7(dkon brtsegs): mngon brtson pa/ /byang chub lam las mi ldog yid ldan pa/ /g.yo med tha ba med cing sgyu med pa/ /ye shes mtha' med ldan la de dag yod/ /skye dang nga dang rga dang
467a1(dkon brtsegs): 'chis gzir ba/ /sems can mgon med sdug bsngal mthong nas ni/ /srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba bsgral ba'i phyir/ /de dag chos kyi
467a2(dkon brtsegs): gru ni yang dag sbyor/ /nges pa sems can kun la sems mnyam pa/ /bu gcig pa bzhin 'gro ba rnams la blta/ /'di dag thams cad bdag gis dgrol
467a3(dkon brtsegs): lo zhes| |gang zag mchog gi bsam pa de 'dra'o/ /stong nyid rtag tu rtogs par khong du chud/ /bdag yod ma yin sems can yod ma yin/ /'dus byas
467a4(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma rmi lam 'dra ba la/ /byis pa mi mkhas 'di la rnam par rmongs/ /mkhas pa de dag ji skad tshig smras pa/ /de la nan tan byed cing kun tu gnas/ /dul zhing zhi
467a5(dkon brtsegs): la rtag tu skyon rnams spangs/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams byang chub lam la dga'/ /yul 'khor skyong / bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
467a6(dkon brtsegs): dbugs 'byin pa 'thob pa ste/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ gzungs 'thob pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed pa dang / chos zab mo la bzod pa thob pa dang / tshul khrims
467a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag par spyod pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong / bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs 'byin pa 'thob pa'o/ /'di la 'di ni/ chos nyid
467b1(dkon brtsegs): yin te| de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /gang gis sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa'i chos mchog 'dzin 'gyur pa/ /gzungs rnams grags pa chen po de dag gis ni rtag
467b2(dkon brtsegs): tu 'thob/ /nam yang chud zar mi 'gyur phyir zhing blo gros rab tu 'phel/ /de dag ye shes chags pa med cing chos kun pha rol phyin/ /byang chub yan lag 'phel bar
467b3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed/ /de dag 'dren pa rnams ni gang nas bzhud pa'i lam mchog ston/ /de dag sdig pa'i grogs po dag la brten pa ma yin te/ /
467b4(dkon brtsegs): tshig byed bdag nyid me ltar ring du rnam par spong / /dpa' bo stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i zab mo'i chos thos nas/ /de dag bdag dang sems can srog tu lta ba kun
467b5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'byung / /de dag tshul khrims skyon med dul zhing zhi ba'i yid dang ldan/ /sangs rgyas tshul khrims bla na med la sems can rnams kyang sbyor/ /yul 'khor skyong /
467b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong / sangs rgyas mthong
467b7(dkon brtsegs): bas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong / rjes su mthun pa'i chos thos pa byang chub sems dpa'
468a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba byang chub
468a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong / dmigs su med pa'i chos la bzod pa byang chub sems dpa'
468a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong / bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga'
468a4(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa'i chos so/ /'di la 'di ni/ chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /gzi brjid kyis ni 'jig rten thams cad kun nas snang mdzad pa'i/ /
468a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi mchog tshe rabs kun tu de dag mthong / /byang chub dam pa mchog tshol tshe na sems can dgrol ba'i phyir/ /dga' zhing gus par gnas
468a6(dkon brtsegs): na de ltar mi dbang rgyal po mchod/ /'dren pa rnams las zhi ba rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyang nyan/ /thos nas bsam pa thag pas brtan pa tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor/ /
468a7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs med chos thos chos 'di thams cad sems can med pa dang / /'di la bdag med par ni chos la som nyi de mi skye/ /de ni bdog pa thams cad yongs
468b1(dkon brtsegs): gtang rtag tu kun 'dzin med/ /slong ba nye bar 'ongs pa mthong na sems ni rab tu dga'/ /grong dang yul 'khor sa dang srog dang bu dang chung ma dang / /thams cad
468b2(dkon brtsegs): gtong zhing de yi sems ni gang du'ang g.yo ba med/ /yul 'khor skyong / byang chub sems dpas chos bzhi la blta bar mi bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor
468b3(dkon brtsegs): skyong / /byang chub sems dpas khyim gyi gnas la blta bar mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong / byang chub sems dpas rab tu byung nas rnyed pa dang bkur sti la
468b4(dkon brtsegs): blta bar mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong / byang chub sems dpas khyim la 'dris par bya ba la blta bar mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong / byang chub sems
468b5(dkon brtsegs): dpas lus dang / srog la blta bar mi bya ste/ yul 'khor skyong / byang chub sems dpas chos bzhi po de dag la blta bar mi bya'o/ /'di la 'di ni/ chos
468b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /skyon gyis gzings pa mtha' yas ldan pa'i khyim spangs rtag tu nor mi blta/ /yon tan ldan pa nges pa de dag dgon
468b7(dkon brtsegs): par dga' zhing dbang po dul/ /de dag gang du'ang bud med rnams dang skyes pa dag dang 'dris mi byed/ /bse ltar gcig pur gnas shing bsam pa dri med dag la
469a1(dkon brtsegs): dri ma bral/ /de dag rnyed pa rnams kyis dga' bar mi 'gyur mi thob yid zhum med/ /'dod pa chung ste ngan ngon tsam la dga' zhing
469a2(dkon brtsegs): sgyu dang tshul 'chos spangs/ /sems can don phyir brtson 'grus yid ldan sbyin dang dul la rab tu gnas/ /sangs rgyas ye shes don gnyer bsam gtan
469a3(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus yon tan pha rol phyin/ /lus dang de bzhin srog la mi lta sdug pa'i rtsa lag rnam spangs te/ /bsam pa rdo rje lta bur rab brtan rtag tu byang chub
469a4(dkon brtsegs): lam la sbyor/ /lus ni dum bu dum bur bcad kyang de dag sems la g.yo ba med/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid res phyir zhing brtson 'grus shin tu brtan
469a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dir rtsom/ /yul 'khor skyong / bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong /
469a6(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims skyon med pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong / dgon pa la gnas pa mi gtong ba byang chub
469a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong / 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi dang mthun par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams
469b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong / mang du thos pa thob par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos te/ yul
469b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor skyong / bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos so/ /'di la 'di ni/ chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /
469b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas tshul khrims dam pa 'di la 'dod byed cing / /tshul khrims dri med nor bu rin chen 'dra ba srung / /de dag nga ni khrims ldan legs sdom yin mi sems/ /
469b4(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims de nyid la ni rtag tu sems can sbyor/ /de dag stong pa dgon par rtag tu gnas par byed/ /de dag bdag gi 'du shes srog gi 'du shes med/ /gzugs
469b5(dkon brtsegs): kun rtswa dang shing dang rtsig pa 'dra bar mthong / /'di la skyes pa bud med bdag gi med par mthong / /'phags rigs bzhi la dga' zhing g.yo med tshul 'chos med/ /
469b6(dkon brtsegs): bag yod de dag bsam pa thag pas rab tu sbyor/ /thos dang yon tan rnams la rtag tu brtson par byed/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan mthu chen don du gnyer/ /
469b7(dkon brtsegs): skye rga 'chi bas bcom zhing nad kyis gzir gyur pa/ /'gro ba mgon med srid pa'i btson ra 'dir bltas nas/ /zhi ba dam pa mchog gi chos kyi gru sbyar te/ /srid pa'i rgya
470a1(dkon brtsegs): mtsho'i chu las skye bo sgrol bar byed/ /'dus byas gyur par 'jig rten 'khyams pas skyabs mgon dang / /dpung gnyer byed pa gzhan ni
470a2(dkon brtsegs): gang yang yod min gyi/ /bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad yongs dgrol zhes/ /de phyir byang chub mchog tu bdag gis smon lam gdab/ /yul
470a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor skyong / byang chub sems dpas bzhi po 'di dag ni/ cang shes kyi 'gros su shes par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bde 'gro thob ste/ de yang sangs rgyas
470a4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba dang phrad pa dang / bla ma la srid zhu byed de/ de yang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis bsten pa dang / bas mtha'i gnas mal la mngon par dga' ste/ de
470a5(dkon brtsegs): yang rnyed pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba dang / spobs pa thob ste/ de yang zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong / byang chub sems dpas chos bzhi
470a6(dkon brtsegs): po de dag ni/ cang shes kyi 'gros su shes par bya'o/ /'di la 'di ni/ chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /brten pa nags dang sul na rtag tu
470a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas par byed/ /de dag rtag tu khor mor rnyed pa don gnyer min/ /chags med blo can rtag tu spobs dang ldan pa yin/ /zab mo'i chos la mkhas shing spros pa rnams
470b1(dkon brtsegs): dang bral/ /rtag tu khor mor bla ma rnams la sri zhu byed/ /de dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin de dag sbyor/ /bde gshegs dpag tu med pa mang po mnyes par byed/ /rgyal ba'i ye
470b2(dkon brtsegs): shes ched du mchod pa rgya chen byed/ /grags pa chen po rnams kyi 'gro ba gtso bor 'gyur/ /lha mi rnams kyi nang na spyi bor phyin pa yin/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam la rtag tu
470b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'dzud/ /dge ba bcu po dag la'ang yang dag sbyor bar byed/ /sangs rgyas yon tan thos nas de dag dgar 'gyur te/ /de dag ring por mi thogs nga dang nye bar 'gyur/ /
470b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag byang chub rdul bral dam pa sangs rgyas nas/ /sems can khrag khrig sdug bsngal mtha' yas rnams las 'gro la/ /yul 'khor skyong / bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems
470b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su spyod pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ khong khro ba med pa'i sems byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / kha
470b6(dkon brtsegs): gsag dang / thob kyis 'jal ba yongs su spangs te dgon par gnas pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa dang / nyin mtshan du chos
470b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod cing chos smra ba rnams la 'khrul ba mi tshol ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong / bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su spyod pa'i chos
471a1(dkon brtsegs): so| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dod pa na/ tha ba dri ma med cing khro sems med/ /
471a2(dkon brtsegs): de ni su la'ang skyon tshol byed ma yin/ /g.yo med tshul 'chos med cing spros sems med/ /khyim gyi blo gros yang mya ngan rtsa/ /skye bo ngan 'grogs tshul bzhin ring 'gyur ba/ /spangs
471a3(dkon brtsegs): te de la mi lta rab byung nas/ /thar pa 'dod pa ri khrod gnas par byed/ /dgon pa bas mtha'i rnam par bsten pas na/ /shes khe thob pa kun la mi rton zhing / /lus dang srog la'ang lta
471a4(dkon brtsegs): bar mi byed la/ /seng+ge lta bur gnas shing dgra las rgyal/ /byang chub lam phyir ye shes tshol ba na/ /ngan ngom tsam gyis chog par 'dzin byed cing / /rtag tu bya ltar gsog pa spangs
471a5(dkon brtsegs): nas ni| |'jig rten kun la gnas pa ma yin no/ /dper na bse ltar gcig pur gnas byed cing / /seng+ge lta bur 'jigs pa yod ma yin/ /ri dwags lta bur gsar 'jigs yid mi
471a6(dkon brtsegs): rton/ /de ni mchod pas khengs par 'gyur ba med/ /g.yang sar lhung ba'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas/ /rab tu thar par bya phyir 'bad par byed/ /gal te bag yod dge ba'i chos spyod na/ /
471a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang 'gro ba 'di yi dpung gnyen 'gyur/ /mi mchog spyod pa 'di dag 'dod pa na/ /'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis rab snyan tshig smra zhing / /sdug dang mi sdug rtag tu rnyog sems med/ /
471b1(dkon brtsegs): rlung dang 'dra bar chags pa med par gnas/ /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med la mos/ /'dus byas kun la sgyu ma ltar bur rtog/ yangs pa'i blo can zhi dang dul la dga'/ /de ni rtag tu bdud rtsi'i ro
471b2(dkon brtsegs): yis mgu/ /ci nas byang chub lam ni grub byed cing / /de ni rtag tu bsam pa yongs su sbyong / /gzungs dang spobs pa tshol bar byed pa na/ /yon tan 'dod pa sdug bsngal brgya dag bzod/ /byang
471b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di bltas nas/ /gang zhig don du gnyer de dgar 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig byang chub 'di la ma mos pa/ /blo chung de ni nyes pa brgya yang bskyed/ /yul 'khor skyong / bzhi po 'di
471b4(dkon brtsegs): dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i g.yang sa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong / ma gus pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang / yul 'khor skyong / byas pa mi gzo zhing g.yo la brten pa byang
471b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang / yul 'khor skyong / rnyed pa dang bkur sti la chags pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang / yul 'khor skyong / /tshul 'chos pa dang kha gsag gis
471b6(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa dang bkur sti sgrub pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa ste/ yul 'khor skyong / /bzhi po dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa'o/ /de nas bcom
471b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /'phags pa bla ma rnams dang pha ma la/ /de dag rtag tu gus pa med pa yin/ /de dag byas pa mi
472a1(dkon brtsegs): gzo g.yon can te/ rtag tu kun tu ma bsdams spyod cing rmongs/ /rnyed la rtag tu chags shing zhen pa ste/ /de dag tshul 'chos pa dang g.yo sbyor
472a2(dkon brtsegs): dga'| |kha cig tshul khrims brtul zhugs ji ltas kyang / /'di na bdag dang mtshungs pa med ces smra/ /de dag phan tshun sdang bar sems pa ste/ /glags tshol ba la rtag
472a3(dkon brtsegs): tu brtson pa yin/ /de dag zhing gi las dang tshong la dga'/ /de dag dge sbyong yon tan shin tu ring / /phyi ma'i dus na 'di ltar ma bsdams pa'i/ /dge slong tshul khrims yon
472a4(dkon brtsegs): tan rab ring ba/ /de dag mtshang 'dru ba dang 'thab pa dang / /phrag dog dbang gis chos 'di nub par byed/ /byang chub lam las rtag par shin tu ring / /'phags pa'i nor las
472a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag shin tu ring / /'phags lam gya nom rnam par spangs nas ni/ /de dag 'gro pa lngar ni 'khyams par 'gyur/ /yul 'khor skyong / /bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems
472a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong / le lo byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos
472a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / yul 'khor skyong / ma dad pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong / nga rgyal byang chub sems dpa' rnams
472b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong / pha rol gyi mchod pa la phrag dog dang ser sna'i sems dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub
472b2(dkon brtsegs): la bgegs byed pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong / bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

472b4(dkon brtsegs): slong mthong nas ni/ /gtsug lag khang nas 'gro tshe dbyug pas brdeg /pha rol mchod phyir 'di ni phrag dog skye/ /de dag sems ni gnas pa yod ma yin/ /glags lta
472b5(dkon brtsegs): byed cing 'khrul pa tshol ba can/ /su la 'khrul yod gang la gleng bya snyam/ /de dag nga yi bstan pa 'di las ring / /de dag yon tan sdang zhing ngan song gzhol/ /de
472b6(dkon brtsegs): dag rgyal ba'i bstan pa bor nas ni/ /ngan song shin tu mi zad 'bar bar 'gro/ /de dag rnams kyi sdig pa'i spyod pa dang / /chos min ldan 'gro rab sdig 'dir thos nas/ /
472b7(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu 'khor mor byang chub lam la sbyor/ /ngan 'gror skyes shing gdung bar gyur ta re/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan pa drang srong che/ /bskal pa bye mang brgya lam 'byung bar

473a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin| |dmigs par lta la rtag tu zhen pa dang / /bdag dang srog dang gso bar zhen pa dang / /de dag dug phyis bzhin du rtag tu spang / /gang dag sangs rgyas ye shes don mi

473b3(dkon brtsegs): 'obs bzhin spang bar bya/ /gang zhig bdud ni gdul bar bya ba dang / /'khor lo dam pa bla med bskor ba dang / /de ltar sems can don yangs byed 'dod pa/ /des ni sdig pa'i

474a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba thams cad kyis kyang mchod 'gyur ba/ /de la mi shes pas ni brnyas byed na/ /des na de ni sdug bsngal mtha' yas rnyed/ /yang bas ni gang zhig longs spyod tshul/ /

478a1(dkon brtsegs): nas| |lus kyi dam pa ma bltas btang bar byas/ /de tshe nga yi sems ni g.yo ba med/ /spyad pa spyod tshe bya sreg gyur pa na/ /rgan la bsnyen bkur bya bar rtag dga' ste/ /nga

479a1(dkon brtsegs): btang / /sdong po me tog 'bras rgyas ne tso'i tshe/ /sdong po bskams kyang ngas ni de ma btang / /de tshe brgya byin byas gzos sang mthong nas/ /sdong po de
