479a4(dkon brtsegs): smin 'di ma rungs byar sems sam/ /ne tso des smras bzang po gsan du gsol/ /bdag ni rku bas khyod kyi 'bras mi len/ /pha ma rgan rgon gnyis ni gso ba'i phyir/ /de
479a5(dkon brtsegs): la snying rjes bdag gis sA lu blangs/ /gang tshe thog ma sa bon 'dabs pa'i tshe/ /'gro ba kun la cha shas sbyin no zhes/ /de skad tshig smras de ni bdag thos te/ /des na bdag
479a6(dkon brtsegs): ni rku ba gzhar mi 'gyur/ /ne tso legs so sA lu ci dgar khyer/ /sri zhu 'di ni mi yi nang na dkon/ /khyod ni mi yin nga 'dir dud 'gro yin/ /legs so khyod ni dul
479a7(dkon brtsegs): zhing yang dag bsdams/ /byang chub rdul bral dam pa tshol ba na/ /sngon chad spyod pa de la sogs pa rnams/ /spyad pa'i tshe na dka' ba brgya la yang / /nga yi yid ni
479b1(dkon brtsegs): skyo bar gyur pa med/ /nang gi dag gam 'on te phyir yang rung / /nga yis dngos po ma btang gang yang med/ /tshul khrims bzod dang de bzhin brtson 'grus dang / /bsam gtan thabs
479b2(dkon brtsegs): dang shes rab ngas spyad do/ /sha dang pags pa de bzhin rkang dang khrag /de dag rang gi lus las sbyin pa byas/ /bas mtha' dag dang phug na rgyu ba'i tshe/ /ngas ni de tshe lus ni bskams
479b3(dkon brtsegs): bar byas/ /gang la sbyar na rgyal bar 'gyur ba yi/ /sbyangs pa gang dag rgyal bas bstan mdzad pa/ /sbyangs pa de la rtag tu rab brtson te/ /sngon spyad tshe na nga ni rtag tu 'jug /spyod
479b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe na nga yis gang bsten pa/ /brtul zhugs rgya chen de 'dra de dag dang / /spyod pa 'di thos nas ni de dag rnams/ /tshig gcig la yang 'dun par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di thos
479b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas de yi tshe na ni/ /bstan pa 'di nyid la ni 'phya bar 'gyur/ /de dag zas dang 'khrig pa lhur len cing / /rtag tu gnyid non khab ltar g.yo ngan 'gyur/ /rtag tu 'phags
479b6(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin chos la sdang / /bstan pa sun 'byin byed cing yon tan nyams/ /zhi ba'i chos 'di thos par gyur pa na/ /'di ni rgyal bas gsungs pa min zhes 'dzer/ /nga yi slob
479b7(dkon brtsegs): dpon thos pa rgya mtshor gyur/ /mang du thos pa smra ba'i gtso bo yi/ /de yis 'di ni rnam pa ji ltar yang / /sangs rgyas bka' ma yin zhes dgag pa byas/ /pha rol las kyang rgan
480a1(dkon brtsegs): par gyur de yi/ /bla ma de ni dpag med yon tan chung / /des kyang 'di ni blang ba ma byas kyi/ /'di lam 'jug pa 'di ni nor ba yin/ /gang la
480a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag yod ma yin srog med dang / /rnam pa cis kyang gang zag med bstan pa/ /tshul khrims sbyor dang sdom pa'i bya ba la/ /gang 'bad de yi ngal ba don med 'gyur/ /
480a3(dkon brtsegs): gal te rdeg pa chen po yod na ni/ /'di la bdag dang sems can shed skyes med/ /gang la bdag dang sems can mi dmigs pa/ /de la bdag gis ngal byas don
480a4(dkon brtsegs): med 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i blo dang mu stegs ngan mtshungs pas/ /rang gi blo yis rang bzo byed pa ste/ /dge slong 'khor gyi nang du rgyal ba ni/ /tshig 'di gsung bar
480a5(dkon brtsegs): nam yang mi 'gyur ro/ /ngo tsha khrel dang 'dzem dang bral ba dang / /khwa ltar spyi rtol che la rgod gtum zhing / /phrag dog nga rgyal rgyags pas tshig pa yi/ /dge slong dag
480a6(dkon brtsegs): ni nga yi bstan la 'byung / /lag pa dang ni rkang pa rdob byed cing / /chos gos gra rnams kyang ni dkyog par byed/ /chos gos thogs shing chang dang rgyags myos nas/ /
480a7(dkon brtsegs): grong dang khyim dag tu ni rnam par rgyu/ /de dag sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan thogs nas ni/ /khyim na gnas pa'i skye bo sten par byed/ /bstan pa yon tan phung po 'di spangs
480b1(dkon brtsegs): nas| |de dag rtag tu 'phrin yig 'khyer bar byed/ /de dag ba lang rta dang bong bu dang / /de dag phyugs dang bran mo bran pho bsrel/ /zhing gi las dang tshong gi sbyor pa la/ /brtson
480b2(dkon brtsegs): yid ldan zhing rtag tu 'phags ma yin/ /de dag 'phags min tshigs kyang mi smra med/ /bya ba ma yin pa yang gang yang med/ /de dag rnams la mchod rten nor dang ni/ /dge
480b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dun gyi dang gang zag nor dang mtshungs/ /dge slong yon tan 'byor pa mthong nas ni/ /de dag la yang mi snyan rjod byed de/ /tshul khrims 'chal pa slu ba zhugs nas ni/ /bud
480b4(dkon brtsegs): med 'jigs byed mi bzad rab ces brjod/ /rab tu byung ba de dag brkam pa ltar/ /khyim pa 'dod pas brkam pa de lta min/ /khyim pa mtshungs pa de dag chung ma dang / /bu
480b5(dkon brtsegs): dang bu mo dag kyang yod par 'gyur/ /gang gi khyim du de dag chos gos dang / /lus dang longs spyod dag gis bsnyen bkur bya/ /de yi chung ma la ni yongs chags shing / /nyon
480b6(dkon brtsegs): mongs dbang 'gro rtag tu 'phags pa min/ /'dod pa 'di dag bsten bya ma yin te/ /dud 'gro yi dwags dmyal bar lhung byed ces/ /de dag khyim pa rnams la rtag smra zhing / /
480b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag bdag nyid ma dul nyer zhi min/ /ji ltar de dag bdag nyid ma dul ba/ /de dag slob ma tshogs kyang rab ma dul/ /kha zas dag kyang 'khrig pa'i gtam rnams la/ /de
481a1(dkon brtsegs): dag nyin dang mtshan du bgro bar byed/ /bstan pa'i phyir gyi yon tan phyir min te/ /de dag la ni de dag bsdu ba sbyin/ /'gro las rtag 'dir
481a2(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa thob snyam nas/ /rang gi slob ma'i tshogs kyis bdag kyang bskor/ /de dag skye bo rnams la smra ba ni/ /bdag gis snying rjes 'di dag sdud byed kyi/ /slob ma'i tshogs
481a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag las nam yang ni/ /rim gro don du gnyer ba med ces smra/ /de la nad kyis non dang mdze can mang / /lus la sha kra can dang gzugs mi sdug /rtag tu 'phags
481a4(dkon brtsegs): min mi dag kha cig kyang / /'ongs shing lhag pa rab tu 'byin par 'gyur/ /lung nod pa dang sdom pa rnam par nyams/ /de dag dge slong yon tan rtag mi brtson/ /de dag
481a5(dkon brtsegs): khyim pa ma yin dge slong min/ /de dag spangs pa dur khrod shing dang mtshungs/ /de dag so sor thar dang bslab pa dang / /'dul ba la yang gus par byed mi 'gyur/ /de dag
481a6(dkon brtsegs): rang nyams rang dbang 'gro ba ste/ /lcags kyo btang ba'i glang po'i dbang po 'dra/ /de dag nags su gnas par gyur kyang ni/ /sems ni grong du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ste/ /
481a7(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs me yis rtag tu rab gdungs la/ /de dag sems kyang gnas pa med par 'gyur/ /de dag sangs rgyas yon tan thams cad dang / /bslab dang sbyangs dang thabs
481b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang brjed nas ni/ /rgyags dang nga rgyal grags pa yongs rgyas te/ /de dag mi zad mnar med lhung bar 'gyur/ /de dag rgyal po'i gtam la rtag dga' zhing / /kun po'i gtam
481b2(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa la'ang rtag tu dga'/ /nye du bsten la'ang rab tu dga' ba ste/ /de dag nyin dang mtshan du sems par byed/ /bsam gtan dang ni kha ton btang nas su/ /rtag tu
481b3(dkon brtsegs): gtsug lag khang gi las la brtson/ /gnas la bkram zhing khro gnyer 'byin par byed/ /de dag slob ma 'khor kyang ma dul ba/ /nga ni gtsug lag khang gi lag gi bla/ /bdag
481b4(dkon brtsegs): gi ched du 'di ni ngas byas te/ /dge slong gang dag nga yi rjes mthun pa/ /gtsug lag khang 'dir de dag gnas yod do/ /gang dag tshul khrims ldan zhing yon tan ldan/ /
481b5(dkon brtsegs): chos 'dzin skye bo'i don la mngon brtson la/ /dul zhing yang dag sdom la rtag brtson pa/ /de dag rnams ni sdug par mi byed do/ /'di ni nga yi gnas su bskos pa ste/ /
481b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni nga yi lhan gcig gnas pa yin/ /'di ni nga yi dga' bar byed pa yin/ /khyod kyi gnas ni gang yang med kyi song / /'di ni dge slong dag kyang mang bkod de/ /mal
481b7(dkon brtsegs): cha rnams kyang ma lus bgos zin la/ /'di na rnyed pa 'byung ba yod ma yin/ /'dir ni ci zhig spyod kyi dge slong song / /de dag la ni mal stan bgo bya ba/ /nam du'ang srid
482a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'byung ba ma yin te/ /de dag khyim pa lta bur gsog 'gyur zhing / /'tshog chas rnams dang g.yog 'khor mang bar 'gyur/ /phyi ma'i dus
482a2(dkon brtsegs): na nga yi bu de dag / kun tu smad pa byas par gyur pa ni/ /de dag nga yi tshig ni dran 'gyur te/ /bas mtha' dag dang nags su de tshe gnas/ /kye hud rnyed pas zil non yon
482a3(dkon brtsegs): tan sdang / /dge slong mang po gang du byung gyur pa/ /rgyal ba dam pa yi ni bstan pa dag /ring por mi thogs par yang 'jig par 'gyur/ /phyi dus tshul khrims yon
482a4(dkon brtsegs): tan ldan pa dag / rtag par yongs su brnyas par 'gyur ba ste/ /de dag grong dang yul 'khor grong khyer rnams/ /spangs nas dgon pa nags su gnas par 'gyur/ /
482a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byed dang zur zer 'thab mo dga' ba dang / /yon tan nyams la rtag tu bsti stang byed/ /de dag skye ba'i ston par grags gyur te/ /de dag nga rgyal rgyags pas tshig
482a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /'dir ni nga yi bstan pa yon tan gter/ /yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog dga' ba/ /'di ni tshul khrims nyams dang phrag dog dang / /rgyags
482a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i skyon rnams kyis ni 'jig par 'gyur/ /ji ltar rin chen 'byung gnas bsubs pa dang / /pad+ma'i rdzing bu yongs su bskams pa dang / /rin chen mchod sdong chag par
482b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ltar/ /phyi ma'i dus na bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur/ /phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe na dam pa'i chos/ /rnam par 'jig 'gyur shin tu mi bzad tshe/ /dge slong dul pa ma yin de
482b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba| |de dag nga yi bstan 'di 'jig pa yin/ /spyod pa 'di la brten par dga' ba rnams/ /de dag bzang 'gro ga la yod de ring / /'di nas shi 'phos yi dwags 'gro ba dang /
482b3(dkon brtsegs): dud 'gro'i 'gro dang sems can dmyal bar gnas/ /lo brgya du mar sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa/ /mi bzad drag po nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ /ci ste de yis mi yi lus rnyed
482b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang | |rtag tu sdug bsngal mya ngan ldan par 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i spyod pa 'di dag rtag bsten pa/ /long ba'am 'on pa'am zhar bar skye bar 'gyur/ /lus la rtag tu sha bkra
482b5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs can mthong na 'jigs par 'gyur/ /gang zhig ya nga'i spyod pa bsten pa ni/ /de dag su yang yid rton mi 'gyur te/ /de yi tshig la
482b6(dkon brtsegs): yid ches mi 'gyur zhing / /de ni rtag tu sma 'bab par yang 'gyur/ /de dag nad dang sdug bsngal brgya yis gdungs| /mtshon dang shing dang bong ba rnams kyis bsnun/ /bkres dang
482b7(dkon brtsegs): skom pa'i 'jigs pas yongs su gdungs/ /yang na de ni rtag par rab tu brnyas/ /sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa dag thos nas ni/ /nges pa rnams kyi sdig pa'i spyod bor la/ /lag
483a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyod la rtag tu brten par gyis/ /'di nas phyin chad 'gyod par gyur te re/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas tshogs dang 'phags tshogs dang / /bslab dang
483a2(dkon brtsegs): sbyangs pa'i chos la dga' gyur pa/ /gnyen dang rnyed dang grags brjod spang byos la/ /de ltar rtag tu mngon par brtson par gyis/ /'dus byas 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu dang / /'jig par
483a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur dang rmi lam lta bu dang / /sdug pa kun dang mi ring 'bral 'gyur zhing / /'di la rtag pa gang yang med rtogs la/ /pha rol phyin dang sa dang stobs rnams la/ /rtag tu rab tu
483a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyor zhing 'bad par gyis/ /ji srid byang chub mchog sangs ma rgyas pa/ /de srid brtson 'grus nam yang nyams mi bya/ /gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ dang po'o// //
483a5(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong / /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag phal cher la skyon de dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ mi brtson pa dag ni mi brtson pa dag la mchod par 'gyur/
483a6(dkon brtsegs): g.yo dang ldan pa dag ni/ g.yo dang ldan pa dag la mchod par 'gyur/ mi shes pa dag ni/ mi shes pa dag la bsti stang byed par 'gyur/ zang zing la
483a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar 'gyur zhing / chags pa mang ba dang / khyim la ser sna byed pa dang / g.yo dang ldan pa dang / bya khwa ltar mu cor smra ba dang / tshul 'chos pa dang /
483b1(dkon brtsegs): nye du lhur len par 'gyur/ phan tshun bsngags pa smra bas rnyed pa sgrub par 'gyur/ rnyed pa yongs su btsal ba'i phyir de dag grong du 'jug gi /sems can yongs su smin par
483b2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir ma yin par 'gyur/ de dag mi shes bzhin du ji ltar na bdag la pha rol gyis mang du thos pa dang / dge ba'i chos dang
483b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan par shes par 'gyur snyam du bdag shes pa dang ldan par khas 'che bar 'gyur/ ji ltar 'dir mi brtson pa de bzhin du zhe sa med par 'gyur/ snod chag pa bzhin du
483b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ gcig la gcig 'khrul pa tshol ba dang / sbyor ba nyams pa dang / mi shes pa dang / le lo can dang / phan tshun mi mthun pa'i chos 'gro ba skyed pas ye shes la mi rtog pa mang
483b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang | rang dgar byed pa dang / shar gnyer ba dam pa dang / gnod sems kyis rgyas pa dang / rigs pa ma yin pa'i 'khor gyi skye bo dang 'gro ba byed pas bstan pa 'di la spyod par
483b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur| yongs su mi 'dri ba'i ngang tshul can dang / chos mnyan pa don du mi gnyer bar 'gyur/ mi rigs pa'i spyod pas dbul po'i khyim rnams su skye ba yongs su 'dzin par
483b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur| de dag dbul po'i khyim nas rab tu byung nas rnyed pa tsam gyis bstan pa 'di la dga' ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /de dag la nyes pa bshags pa yang med par 'gyur na/
484a1(dkon brtsegs): ye shes mngon par rtogs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams bor nas shes kyi khe dang rnyed pa tsam gyis bdag
484a2(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong ngo / /zhes bdag nyid khas 'che bar 'gyur te/ yul 'khor skyong / nga ni/ gang zag de lta bu de dag la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa yang mi smra na/ sangs rgyas kyi
484a3(dkon brtsegs): ye shes lta ga la zhig / de dag la ni bde 'gro yang ring na/ byang chub lta smos kyang ci dgos/ yul 'khor skyong / gang zag de lta bu de dag la byang chub kyi bar chad byed
484a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos brgyad yod par smra ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ ngan song gsum du skye ba dang / mtha' 'khob pa'i mi'i nang du skye ba dang / dbul po'i khyim du skye ba dang / rigs
484a5(dkon brtsegs): dma' bar skye ba dang / mdog ngan cing rtogs pa zhan pa dang / sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dang / nang mang ba dang / ya nga ba ma spangs pas 'chi ba'i dus byed
484a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong / chos brgyad po de dag ni/ byang chub kyi bar chad byed par brjod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong / tshig gis khas 'che
484a7(dkon brtsegs): ba la nga byang chub ces mi smra'o/ /tshul 'chos pa la spyod pa yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /g.yo byed pa la byang chub kyi spyod pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /zang zing lhur
484b1(dkon brtsegs): len pa la sangs rgyas la mchod pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /mngon pa'i nga rgyal can la shes rab yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /shes rab 'chal pa la the tshom gcod pa zhes
484b2(dkon brtsegs): nga mi smra'o/ /ser sna can la bsam pa yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /mi brtson pa mang ba la gzungs thob ces nga mi smra'o/ /yang dag pa'i yon tan ma yin pa yongs su tshol
484b3(dkon brtsegs): ba la bde 'gro thob ces nga mi smra'o/ /khyim la ser sna byed pa la lus yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /spyod lam bcos ma can la sangs rgyas dang phrad pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /
484b4(dkon brtsegs): khyim la chags pa la ngag yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /ma gus pa la sems yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /tshod mi shes pa la chos 'dod pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /lus
484b5(dkon brtsegs): dang srog la lta ba dang bcas pa la chos yongs su tshol ba zhes nga mi smra'o/ /yul 'khor skyong / ji ltar skyes bu blun po de dag la smad pa ltar ston pa drug la de ltar nga mi smod
484b6(dkon brtsegs): do| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni/ gzhan du smra la gzhan du byed pa'o/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la slu ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcas pa
484b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /yang dag ma bsdams rgod cing khengs pa can/ /ma gus nga rgyal ldan zhing chags shas che/ /nyon mongs zil non tha ba nyon mongs bcas/ /de 'dra
485a1(dkon brtsegs): dag la byang chub mchog rab ring / /chags bas zil gyis non na le lo 'phel/ /le los zil gyis non na dad pa nyams/ /dad pa nyams na
485a2(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims rab tu nyams/ /tshul khrims 'chal bar gyur na bzang 'gro nyams/ /dbul por gyur pas rab tu byung gyur te/ /mchod pa rnyed nas dbul las grol par
485a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur| |de dag gser gyi khur ni bor nas su/ /gso ma'i khur ni len par byed dang mtshungs/ /rnyed pa don du gnyer bas dgon par 'gro/ /der song nas kyang gos dang
485a4(dkon brtsegs): nye du tshol/ /mngon shes rig dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs/ /bor nas de ni phyir yang nye du 'dzin/ /rmongs nas nga rgyal dbang gis ngan song sa/ /mi khom 'gro ba rnams
485a5(dkon brtsegs): dang dbul po dang / /dma' ba'i rigs su skye dang long ba dang / /mdog ngan pa dang mthu chung de dag 'dzin/ /de dag tshul dang spyod pa yongs nyams dngos/ /bag med rnyed
485a6(dkon brtsegs): nas dran pa rab tu nyams/ /g.yang sa chen po mi bzad lhung bar 'gyur/ /de nas bskal pa bye bar thar pa med/ /gal te 'dir ni 'thob pas byang chub na/ /de phyir lhas
485a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin gyis kyang byang chub 'thob/ /rnam par 'thor rlung gis ni bya lhung ltar/ /chags pas kyang ni de ltar mi rigs so/ /bsod nams nyams shing gzhan gyi chung mar
485b1(dkon brtsegs): chags| |tshul khrims ma dag dge ba rnams las nyams/ /byang chub sems kyis ye shes gang ma thob/ /de dag bstan la mi dgos dur shing bzhin/ /byang chub don
485b2(dkon brtsegs): gnyer sangs rgyas chos tshol ba/ /dper na thar pa de bzhin mi gnas so/ /de ni rnyong gis spre'u la dam byas ltar/ /nga rgyal zil non byang chub de 'dra'o/ /byang chub don
485b3(dkon brtsegs): du gnyer bas chos tshig phyir/ /nga yi rang gi srog ni phangs pa'ang btang / /chos de btang nas brtson dang mi ldan pa/ /don med gyur nas bstan las lhung bar 'gyur/ /nga ni
485b4(dkon brtsegs): sngon chad legs par bshad don phyir/ /g.yang sa chen po me lce 'bar bar mchongs/ /de thos nas ni sdug dang mi sdug pa/ /thams cad rnam par spangs te nan tan gnas//
485b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa sna tshogs yon tan 'byor thos la/ /de dag nam yang 'dod pa mi skye na/ /chos min 'dod la byang chub ga la yod/ /dper na long ba lam sel med dang mtshungs//
485b6(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong / sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/ rgya che ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ dpag tu med
485b7(dkon brtsegs): pa| tshad med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs
486a1(dkon brtsegs): pa| 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
486a2(dkon brtsegs): don grub blo zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /yul 'khor skyong / de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo / /yul 'khor skyong / rgyal po 'od
486a3(dkon brtsegs): zer ldan ni/ 'dzam bu'i gling dpag tshad khri drug stong la rgyal srid byed do/ /yul 'khor skyong / de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling de na grong khyer nyi khri dang khyim
486a4(dkon brtsegs): bye ba phrag stong yod do/ /yul 'khor skyong / rgyal po 'od zer ldan de rgyal po pho brang gang na gnas pa rgyal po 'od zer ldan de'i grong khyer rin po che snang ba zhes bya
486a5(dkon brtsegs): pa shar nub tu chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ lho byang du rgyar dpag tshad bdun yod pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi phyir ra ba rim pa bdun dang / mig mang ris su bris
486a6(dkon brtsegs): pas mdzes par byas pa yod do/ /de'i tshe sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni/ lo bye ba phrag bcu thub par gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong / rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyi bu
486a7(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ de btsas ma thag tu rin
486b1(dkon brtsegs): po che sna bdun gyi gter stong byung bar gyur to/ /rgyal po'i khang bzang gi nang du yang rin po che sna bdun gter gyi mi bcu'i tshad tsam byung bar gyur te yul 'khor skyong / rgyal bu
486b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer de btsas ma thag tu 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad yid rangs par gyur to/ /sems can gang dag brtson ra na 'khod pa de dag kyang
486b3(dkon brtsegs): brtson ra nas thar par gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong / rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer des nyi ma bdun gyis 'jig rten pa'i sgyu rtsal ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rtogs
486b4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong / de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis nam gyi gung gi dus la bab pa dang / rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la gzhon nu/
486b5(dkon brtsegs): khyod bag yod par gyis shig /mi rtag par so sor brtag pa la mkhas par gyis shig /gzhon nu/ mi rnams kyi srog ni/ chen po med pa ste/ tshe 'pho bar 'gro ba yin gyi/ 'jig
486b6(dkon brtsegs): rten pha rol la 'jigs par blta bar bya zhing las dang bya ba dang mi 'gal bar gyis shig / ces bskul te/ de'i tshe lha'i bu de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras
486b7(dkon brtsegs): so| |gzhon nu bag med par ni gyur ta re/ /bag med dbang du song bar gyur ta re/ /bde bar gshegs pas bag yod rab bstod cing / /bde gshegs rnams kyis bag med rnams
487a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang smad/ /nges pa gang dag 'di na bag yod cing / /legs sdom dga' la ser sna byed pa dang / /sems can kun la snying rje byams yid ldan/ /de
487a2(dkon brtsegs): dag ring por mi thogs mi mchog 'gyur/ /bde bar gshegs pa gang dag 'das pa dang / /'di na da ltar dag dang gang ma byon/ /de dag thams cad dge ba rnams kyis 'phags
487a3(dkon brtsegs): bag yod lam nyid la yang shin tu gnas/ /bza' dang btung dang gos dang kha zas dang / /gser dang dngul dang nor bu mu tig dang / /bskal pa bye bar de dag rnams kyis
487a4(dkon brtsegs): btang | |byang chub dam pa 'di ni don du gnyer/ /rkang pa lag pa de bzhin rna ba sna/ /slong ba rnams la rab tu dgos byin na/ /byang chub yon tan kun gyis bsam rdzogs nas//
487a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag ring por mi thogs mi mchog 'gyur/ /rgyal srid bde dang sdug pa'i bud med dang / /nor rnams thams cad du yang rnam spangs te/ /'dus byas gang la blta dang sgyu ma
487a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dras| |'dod pa med par dgon par gnas par gyis/ /srog ni brtan pa med de rtag tu g.yo/ /'dzim pa'i bum pa lta bur 'jig pa can/ /brnyan ma 'dra zhing rtag tu
487a7(dkon brtsegs): ther zug min/ /gzhon nu 'di lta rtag med dge ma yin/ /ngan 'gror lhung ba'i tshe na 'di na ni/ /pha dang ma yang 'dzin par byed pa med/ /de yis dge dang mi dge gang byas
487b1(dkon brtsegs): ba| |de ni rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i rgyu yis bskal mang rgya mtshor ni/ /don med par yang gcig gis gcig bsad de/ /khyod kyis mi phan ma byas ci yang med/ /
487b2(dkon brtsegs): don med nyid du ngal ba bsten par gyur/ /da ltar khyod kyis 'gro phan byang chub zhi/ /mtshungs med go 'phang dam pa btsal ba'i phyir/ /rkang dang sha dang pags pa de bskams kyang / /da lta
487b3(dkon brtsegs): na yang khyod ni ngal ma sems/ /bde bar gshegs pa 'byung ba rnyed par dga'/ /zhi ba'i chos thos pa yang shin tu dka'/ /bsgrim pa byas te bdud kyi phyogs bsal na/ /sangs rgyas
487b4(dkon brtsegs): ye shes ring por mi thogs thob/ /bshes gnyen bzang la rtag tu yongs brten cing / /sdig pa'i bshes gnyen yongs su spang bar gyis/ /de dag rtag tu bzang lam khrid par byed//
487b5(dkon brtsegs): lam gol las kyang rtag tu zlog par byed/ /brtson 'grus shin tu brtan pa legs byos te/ /lus dang srog la 'dod pa rnams spangs nas/ /rdo rje lta bu snying gi bsam gtan
487b6(dkon brtsegs): par| |sangs rgyas lam 'di nyid la gnas par gyis/ /sngon gyi mi mchog dam pa 'od byed pa/ /kun kyang go 'phang dam pa bla med pa/ /tshol ba'i tshe na spyod yul dgon par
487b7(dkon brtsegs): dga'| |khyod kyang de dag spyod pa'i lam du phyogs/ /dgon par gnas la rtag tu dga' bar gyis/ /pha dang ma dang bu dang sdug pa'i gnyen/ /skye bo snying du sdug pa kun spongs
488a1(dkon brtsegs): la| |lus dang srog la sred par ma byed par/ /bde gshegs ye shes rgya chen btsal bar gyis/ /yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal bu
488a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis de nas bzung ste lo bcu'i bar du nam yang rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyis non par ma gyur/ nam yang rgod par ma gyur/ rtses par
488a3(dkon brtsegs): ma gyur| dga' ba byed par ma gyur/ yongs su spyad par ma gyur/ nam yang skyed mos tshal du ma song / nam yang grogs po mthong nas ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin/ nam
488a4(dkon brtsegs): yang glu la dga' bar ma gyur/ rgyal srid dang / nor dang / khyim dang / grong khyer rnams la 'dod pa bskyed par ma gyur te/ de ltar dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar
488a5(dkon brtsegs): gcig pur sems shing gnas par gyur to/ /nang du yang dag 'jog lhur len cing 'jig rten la snying po med pa dang / 'jig pa dang / dbugs 'byin pa med pa dang /
488a6(dkon brtsegs): mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang / sdug pa dang bral ba dang / byis pa 'drid pa dang / 'khor ba la dga' ba ro bro ba med pa dang / rgyal srid kyi bde ba slu ba'i chos can dang /
488a7(dkon brtsegs): srid pa la mngon par dga' bas chog mi shes pa dang / so so'i skye bo nyid rtag tu mi mthun par rnam par sems shing / bdag ni/ byis pa'i skye bo mi brtson pa'i nang
488b1(dkon brtsegs): na gnas kyi/ bdag gis cang mi smra bas 'da' bar bya'o/ /snyam nas de phyogs gcig tu cang mi smra bar gyur te/ bag yod pa la sems shing sdug pa dang bral bar gcig
488b2(dkon brtsegs): bu gnas par gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir sa phyogs shig tu grong khyer dga' mchog ces bya ba byas te/
488b3(dkon brtsegs): lho dang byang gi ngos su lam srang bdun brgya bdun brgya byas so/ /rin po che sna bdun gyi phyir dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas bres pa/ mu tig gi dra ba dang / rin po che'i srog
488b4(dkon brtsegs): shing bla re dang ldan pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor to/ /lam srang thams cad kyi sgor yang rin po che'i srog shing stong btsugs so/ /rin po che'i srog shing thams
488b5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang rin po che'i skud pa drug khris sbrel to/ /rin po che'i skud pa thams cad kyang phyogs bzhi nas shing ta la'i phreng ba bye bas sbrel to/ /de dag rlung gis bskyod de
488b6(dkon brtsegs): bskul na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rol mo'i sil snyan brgya stong gi sgra snyan pa lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo / /lam srang gi sgo thams cad na bu mo glu mkhas pa/ gar mkhas
488b7(dkon brtsegs): pa| dbang po dar la bab pa/ skye bo thams cad kyis spyad pa'i 'os su gyur pa lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do/ /de dag thams cad la rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis khyed nyin mtshan
489a1(dkon brtsegs): du glu dang / gar dang / rol mo'i sgras gang dag phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par dga' bar bya zhing / ci nas
489a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu dga' bar bya ba'i sems bskyed par bya ba ma gtogs par gtam gzhan ma byed cig / sems can gang la yang yid du mi 'ong ba ma smra zhig /ces
489a3(dkon brtsegs): bsgo'o| |lam srang de dag thams cad kyi sgor yang bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la ni/ bza' ba/ btung ba 'dod par nams la ni/ btung ba/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni/
489a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhon pa nas gos dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mal dang / rgyab rten dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams dang / gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang /
489a5(dkon brtsegs): bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul sil ma dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / ba lang dang / nor dang / rgyan thams cad
489a6(dkon brtsegs): byin zhing / skye bo thams cad kyi yongs su spyad pa'i phyir rin po che'i phung po yang bzhag par gyur to/ /de'i tshe grong khyer gyi dbus su gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir khyim khor
489a7(dkon brtsegs): yug tu dpag tshad tsam yod pa/ rin po che na bdun mig mang ris su bris pa/ rta babs brgyas rab tu brgyan pa byas so/ /de'i nang du khang bzang zhig byas te/ der gzhon
489b1(dkon brtsegs): nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir mal bye ba phrag bzhi bshams so/ /de'i dbus su skyed mos tshal byas te me tog gi shing ljon pa thams cad dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa thams cad
489b2(dkon brtsegs): dang | rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyis khyab par bkod do/ /yul 'khor skyong / skyed mos tshal de'i dbus su rin po che thams cad kyi rdzing rin po che sna bzhi'i them skas
489b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa byas pa 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel lo/ /gang nas spos chu 'bab pa'i seng+ge'i kha brgya rtsa brgyad btsugs so/ /rdzing de'i seng+ge'i kha brgya rtsa
489b4(dkon brtsegs): brgyad po de nas kyang chu 'bab bo/ /me tog ut+pal dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po rnams rtag par rgyun du rgyas so/ /khor yug tu rin po che'i shing ljon pas yongs su
489b5(dkon brtsegs): bskor to/ /dus thams cad pa'i me tog dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa rnams kyis kyang yongs su rgyas so/ /rdzing de'i 'gram du rin po che'i shing ljon pa brgyad brgyad bskyed de/
489b6(dkon brtsegs): rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyang rin po che'i skud pa rnams kyis sprel cing thams cad du yang shing ta la'i phreng ba bye bas sbrel to/ /de dag kyang rlung gis bskyod cing
489b7(dkon brtsegs): rlung gis bsgul na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rol mo'i sil snyan brgya stong blangs pa lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo / /gzhon nu'i lus la sa dang rdul gyis reg tu 'ong ngo / /zhes rdzing de'i
490a1(dkon brtsegs): steng rin po che'i dra bas bkab par gyur to/ /de'i tshe khang bzang der rin po che sna bdun gyi khri bye ba phrag bzhi bshams te/ khri thams cad kyi steng
490a2(dkon brtsegs): du yang ras bcos bu lnga brgya lnga brgya bting bar gyur to/ /gang du rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer 'dug par gyur pa'i khri rin po che sna bdun las byas pa 'phang du
490a3(dkon brtsegs): mi bdun tsam yod pa bshams pa dbus ma der ras bcos bu bye ba khrag brgyad cu rtsa bdun bting bar gyur to/ /khri thams cad kyi drung du yang pog por nas a ga rus
490a4(dkon brtsegs): bdugs shing / nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du me tog 'grem par byed do/ /gser gyi lda ldi bres so/ /gser gyi pad+ma rab tu dpyangs so/ /mu tig dang nor bu'i dra bas
490a5(dkon brtsegs): bres so| |nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyis snang bar byas so/ /rin po che'i dra ba brgyad khri rab tu dpyangs so/ /rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad la yang ba dan brgya brgya dpyangs so//
490a6(dkon brtsegs): skyed mos tshal kun tu yang nor bu rin po che'i 'od dpag tshad tsam yod pa 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu bzhag par gyur te/ de dag gi 'od kyis 'jig rten thams cad snang bar
490a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur to| |yul 'khor skyong / skyed mos tshal de na bya'i tshogs mi'i skad du smra ba ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khrung khrung dang / khu byug dang / rma bya dang / ngang pa dang / ngur pa dang /
490b1(dkon brtsegs): kun la dang / ka la ping+ka dang / shang shang te'u rnams 'khod do/ /de dag skad 'byin cing sgra sgrog pa na dga' tshal gyi lha rnams rgyags par 'gyur pa lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo / /gzhon
490b2(dkon brtsegs): nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir ro'i rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa ro rnam pa lnga brgya ba'i kha zas rnams rtag par rgyun du bshams par gyur to/ /de'i tshe gzhon nu lo bcu
490b3(dkon brtsegs): drug lon pa nyi shu lon pa'i shed dang ldan pa dag grong khyer thams cad nas bsdus nas grong khyer der btsud do/ /thams cad kyang bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas kyi
490b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba shes pa/ thams cad kyang 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba dang / 'tshog chas kyi bya ba shes pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu grong khyer der btsud par gyur to/ /pha ma gnyis kyis de
490b5(dkon brtsegs): la bu mo bye ba byin no/ /nye du'i tshogs kyis bye ba dang / grong rdal ba'i mis bye ba dang / rgyal po thams cad kyis bu mo bye ba byin par gyur te/ de dag thams cad gzugs
490b6(dkon brtsegs): bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa sha stag go /thams cad kyang na tshod lo bcu drug lon pa glu mkhas pa/ rol mo'i sgra mkhas pa/ gar mkhas pa/ rgod mkhas pa/
490b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu'i gan du 'gro mkhas pa/ drang ba/ gzhon pa/ mnyen pa/ yan lag 'jam pa/ gsong por smra ba/ bzhin 'dzum pa/ tshul mkhas pa/ sgyu rtsal thams cad kyi bya
491a1(dkon brtsegs): ba la mkhas pa/ ha cang yang mi ring ba/ ha cang yang mi thung ba/ ha cang yang mi skem pa/ ha cang yang mi sbom pa/ ha cang yang mi dkar ba/ ha cang
491a2(dkon brtsegs): yang mi sngo ba/ kha nas me tog ut+pa la'i bsung 'byung ba/ lus rnams las tsan+dan gyi dri 'byung ba/ lha'i bu mo ltar gsal ba/ shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i tshul dang ldan pa/
491a3(dkon brtsegs): glu dbyangs len pa de dag gi nang na rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gnas so/ /glu dbyangs dang rol mo'i sgra de la kye ma'o bdag dang mi mdza' ba'i tshogs chen po
491a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / bdag gi dge ba'i chos yongs su nyams par byed pa byung ste/ blta bar mi bya'o/ /snyam pa'i sems bskyed do/ /de de'i tshe 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gsad par bya ba'i mis
491a5(dkon brtsegs): gshed ma mthong na/ ngo mtshar gyi sems mi bskyed pa de bzhin du rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer yang bud med de dag mthong na/ ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin to/ /grong khyer
491a6(dkon brtsegs): de la yang grogs dang lhan gcig ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin to/ /lo bcu po de dag gi bar du bdag nam zhig na mi mdza' ba'i tshogs rnams pa 'di lta bu'i nang nas thar par 'gyur
491a7(dkon brtsegs): snyam pa dang / bdag nam zhig na bag yod pa'i spyad pa spyod cing des bdag thar par 'gyur zhig gu snyam pa de lta bu'i sems 'jug pa ma gtogs par nam yang gzugs
491b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi mtshan ma bzung bar ma gyur te/ de bzhin du sgra'i mtshan ma dang / dri'i mtshan ma dang / ro'i mtshan ma dang / reg gi mtshan ma bzung bar ma gyur to/ /de nas bu mo de dag gis
491b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po 'od zer ldan la lha/ gzhon nu ni/ mi rol to/ /dgyes par mi mdzad do/ /dgyes rgur mi spyod do/ /zhes smras so/ /bam po gsum pa ste/ tha ma/ yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal
491b3(dkon brtsegs): p o 'od zer ldan rgyal po brgyad khri dang lhan cig tu rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer ga la ba der song ste phyin nas gdong las mchi ma 'dzag cing lus 'dar te mya
491b4(dkon brtsegs): ngan gyis sa la 'gyel to/ /de sa las langs nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bu gcig rin chen dam pa nga la ltos shing smros//
491b5(dkon brtsegs): nga ni mya ngan gzir te khyim nang sa la 'gyel/ /su yis khyod mi dga' byas de myur nga la smros/ /de 'dir de'u re chad pa chen pos gcad par bya/ /khyed kyi ched du ngas 'dir
491b6(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis gang smras pa/ /lha yi khyim ltar nyams dga' grong khyer der ltos shig /'di la yan lag ma tshang ci yod de myur smros/ /brgya byin lta bu'i 'byor pa de ring khyod
491b7(dkon brtsegs): la bstan/ /pad+ma'i mig can mig mdzes mya ngan nyam thag pa/ /lha yi bu mo lta bu'i bud med tshogs smra ltos/ /mya ngan thul te de dag rnams dang de ring rtses/ /ci phyir zug
492a1(dkon brtsegs): rngus zug bzhin lus dman sems shing 'dug / de dag rab dga' tshul mkhas dbyangs kyi yan lag snyan/ /glu dbyangs pheg rdob dus kyi
492a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par nges pa shes/ /khyod dga' dus la deng bab mya ngan ma byed cig /pad+ma rnying pa lta bur ci phyir deng lus dman/ /me tog 'bras bu yal ga 'dab rgyas skyed
492a3(dkon brtsegs): mos tshal/ /sna tshogs stong bzhag lha yi sna tshogs shing rta 'dra/ /soms shig khyod kyi na tshod 'di ni thog ma yin/ /dga' ba'i dus la bab kyi deng 'dir bu dga'
492a4(dkon brtsegs): gyis| |khyod kyi khrus chen rdzing 'di lha rnams kyi yang 'dra/ /ut+pa la dang pad+ma dag gi tshal gyis gang / /pad+ma rnams kyang bung ba rgyags pa mchog gis brgyan/ /de la
492a5(dkon brtsegs): bu soms su zhig 'di la dga' mi byed/ /ngang pa rma bya ne tso khu byug ri skegs dang / /ka la ping+ka shang shang te'u dang kun la/ /yid 'ong sgra ldan gang nye spos ngad ldang
492a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba| |thos nas mi gang 'di la dga' ba thob mi 'gyur/ /gzhal med khang dag mu tig dra ra bcas nor bu btsugs/ /gser dang bai DUR+Ya spras rnam rgyal khang pa
492a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dra| |rin chen khri mchog dam pa rnams kyang rab bting ba/ /gser dril g.yer ka ta la'i phreng ba sgra snyan pa/ /zab cing brtan pa mchog gi sil snyan sgra bsgrags
492b1(dkon brtsegs): pa| |khyod kyi ched du srang rnams su yang sbyin rgya che/ /bu mo stong dag glu mchog snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa/ /dga' tshal lha yi bu mo rnams kyi 'dra ba sgrog /mtho ris 'dra ba'i
492b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas yid 'ong la ci yi phyir/ /rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems kyis 'di la dga' mi byed/ /gzhon nu khyod kyi rtsed grogs lta bu'i bu 'dra ba/ /bu mo de dag rnams dang lhan
492b3(dkon brtsegs): cig rtsed mo gyis/ /khyod kyi pha dang ma yang mchi mas brnangs shing 'dug /skye bo 'di la sdug bsngal snying rje med dam ci/ /'dus byas yid byung dor ba'i longs spyod don mi
492b4(dkon brtsegs): gnyer| |yon tan bsags pa srid pa'i skyon mthong des smras pa/ /'khor ba'i dra bar chud pa'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas/ /thar pa don gnyer pha la smras pa yab gson cig /
492b5(dkon brtsegs): lha cig sus kyang bdag la mi dga' bgyis ma mchis/ /bdag ni de ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan mos ma lags/ /nyon mongs gang dag ngan 'gro'i g.yang sar lhung byed pa//
492b6(dkon brtsegs): sdug pa thams cad dgra dang mtshungs te rjes mi srung / /mi mkhas bus pa skye bo bud med de dag dga'/ /bdud kyi zhags pa yon tan 'ching ba g.yang sa che/ /rtag tu 'phags
492b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i skye bos de dag de ltar smad/ /sems dmyal ngan 'gro mya ngan rtsa ba ci phyir bstan/ /bud med 'di dag pags pa'i gzugs kyis dga' ba tsam/ /bdag ni rus rgyus
493a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khrul 'khor mi gtsang don mi gnyer/ /khrag dang gcin dang mi gtsang ba dang dri ma 'dzag /gsal bar dur khrod 'dra la ji ltar dga' bar bgyi||
493a2(dkon brtsegs): glu dang gar dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra gzung mi bgyi/ /dga' ba rmi lam 'dra ba mi mkhas rmongs par bgyid/ /kun tu rtog pa sred gyur mi mkhas 'di brlag gi /ci phyir byis
493a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i skye bo lta bur nyon mongs khol/ /shing lcug 'di dag thams cad dgun gyi dus byung na/ /dgon dung shing ltar 'gyur te dga' bar 'gyur ma lags/ /mi rtag 'di yis
493a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams thams cad bshig gyur te/ /srog g.yor gyur kyang gti mug gis ni bag med gyur/ /sems kyi rgya mtsho lta bur tshim par byed mi nus/ /srid par rab tu 'phel
493a5(dkon brtsegs): la dga' bas phyir zhing 'dod/ /'dod rgyus phan tshun gsod pa'i 'gro ba bltas nas su/ /'dir ni ji ltar lhun po rlung gis mi bskyod bzhin/ /rgyal po khyod dang pha dang lhan
493a6(dkon brtsegs): cig skyes pa dang / /gnyen gyi skye bo chung ma ngan song bdag skyabs min/ /bdag cag thams cad rtswa rtse'i zil pa 'dra ba ste/ sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar ma gyur bag
493a7(dkon brtsegs): yod mdzod/ /mi dbang dar la bab pa mi rtag cir mi rung / /srog kyang ri yi chu ltar myur 'gro cir mi rung / /'dus byas 'di zad glog sprin 'dra ste cir mi rung / /rgyal po mkhas la
493b1(dkon brtsegs): srid gsum 'dod la chags pa ngan/ /lha rnams kyis ni bdag la bag yod 'gyur gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' yul la chags pa min zhes bskul/ /'jig rten phan pa'i snying
493b2(dkon brtsegs): brtse sangs rgyas 'dir 'gyur bgyi/ /rgyal po bag med spyod la byang chub yod ma lags/ /rgyal po gang zhig 'dod pas g.yen spyo sems 'khol ba/ /de ni bsod nams chud za
493b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' zhing mtho ris ldog / 'tshe ba shin tu rgyags pa nam yang spyad mi bgyi/ /skon par bcug pa'i bya ltar ji ltar dbugs phyin 'gyur/ /khams rnams sbrul dang 'dra zhing phung
493b4(dkon brtsegs): po gshed ma 'dra/ /zag dang bcas pa'i sems ni don med grong stong mtshungs/ /rgyal po 'di ni dug sdong me tog rgyas 'dra lus/ /chu bo rnams kyis bdas na bdag 'dir ji
493b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar dga'/ /rab tu gsal nas 'bar ba nam mkha' lta bu dang / 'gro ba ngan zhugs 'gro ba 'di la bdag bltas nas/ /rgyal po de ring 'dir ni de dag dgrol ba dang / /gnyid
493b6(dkon brtsegs): log sad par bgyi dang nad pa gso ba dang / /zug rngu rtsad nas gdon dang lam log bzlog pa'i phyir/ /bdag gis zhi ba'i chos kyi gru ni rab tu sbyar/ /stong chen du ni bcings pa
493b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam grol rab bsgrags nas/ /legs par bshad pas ring nas dbul ba tshim par bgyi/ /ngan 'gro'i lam du lhung ba dag kyang gdon par bgyi/ /long ba mig sbyin sred pa'i
494a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khri shing bskam par bgyi/ /rnam grol mchog phyir shes rab 'od zer mar me byas/ /de yis srid gsum gar la blta bar 'drar mthong 'gyur//
494a2(dkon brtsegs): byams dang snying brtses snying rje pha rol phyin pa'i sprin/ /sems can bde 'brug lha mthong glog gi phreng ba dang / /byang chub yan lag bde bsil char rgyun 'dra ba yis/ /'gro
494a3(dkon brtsegs): ba yun ring dus nas gdungs pa bsil bar bgyi/ /rgyal po bdag ni de dran gyur nas 'dir mchis te/ /bdag ni 'dus byas 'dod pa kun la smon ma mchis/ /byang chub don
494a4(dkon brtsegs): gnyer sems can ched du 'dir spyad bgyi/ gcig tu nges te bdag ni srid la dga' ma mchis/ /rgyal po 'di na shes bzhin su zhig dgra khrod gnas/ /blo dang ldan pa su
494a5(dkon brtsegs): zhig 'jigs bcas lam du 'gro/ /mi dang ldan pa su zhig 'di na g.yang sar ltung / /byang chub lam shes nas ni su zhig bag med 'gyur/ /'gro ba thams cad rgyun
494a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro dag ni rgyun zlog pa/ /rgyal po tshig tsam gyis ni byang chub thob mi nus/ /lhun po'i rtse nas rgya mtsho'i nang du mchong spro yi/ /bdag 'dir 'dod pa rnams kyis
494a7(dkon brtsegs): yid dga' de lta min/ /rgyal po dam pa rang gnyer thabs cig myur du bzhud/ /yul 'khor dga' ba thams cad 'jig rten kun la stsol/ /gang bdag bsam pa
494b1(dkon brtsegs): ji bzhin blangs nas mchi bar 'gyur/ /yab bdag bag med rgyal srid bye ba 'tshal ma lags/ /bud med tshogs kyi nang du gnas pas byang chub dang / /grub bde zhi ba bla med
494b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas ni thob mi nus/ /dgon par dgyes pas rgyal bas byang chub brnyes pas na/ /bdag ni ri dang nags khrod mchis te gnas par bgyi/ /yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal
494b3(dkon brtsegs): bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer khang bzang gi nang na 'dug bzhin du yid byung ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis bud med de dag dang lhan cig 'chag cing de spyod lam/ gsum gyis gnas so/
494b4(dkon brtsegs): /gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'greng ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa ste/ rmugs pa dang / gnyid yongs su spangs so/ /khang pa'i steng du song ste sa brgyad
494b5(dkon brtsegs): la gnas nas de nam gyi gung la bab pa'i dus kyi tshe gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod cing bar snang la 'gro ba dang / chos dang / dge
494b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dun gyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod cing 'gro ba thos so/ /thos nas kyang yul 'khor skyong / rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas mchi ma zag
494b7(dkon brtsegs): cing skyo ba skyes te thal mo sbyar nas lha rnams la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ lha rnams sdug bsngal bdag la thugs rje bskyed nas ni/ /gal te skyo mi mdzad na cung zhig zhu bar
495a1(dkon brtsegs): bgyi| |su yi yon tan brjod cing bar snang 'di las bzhud/ /tshig de thos nas bdag 'dir yid ni bde bar gyur/ /yul 'khor skyong / /de nas lha de
495a2(dkon brtsegs): dag gis rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod kyis sangs rgyas thos par ma gyur tam/ /don grub blo zhes bya ste skyabs
495a3(dkon brtsegs): med rnams kyi skyabs/ /de bzhin spyod mkhas bsod nams shes rab yon tan mchog /de yi dge 'dun khrag khrig stong bcu bsam gtan pa/ /bsod nams 'od zer gyis
495a4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ bdag ni rgyal ba lta 'tshal de yi gzugs ci 'dra/ /de yi kha dog ci 'dra thams cad bka' stsol cig /ji ltar spyad na sems can kun mgon gcig gyur pa/ /byang chub
495a5(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa ci 'dra bdag ni yongs su 'dri/ /de nas lha de dag gis rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/ de yi gtsug tor ri yi rtse la
495a6(dkon brtsegs): gser mdzes bzhin/ /dbu skra 'jam zhing mdzes la g.yas su 'khyil pa ste/ /de yi mdzod spu mkha' la nyi ltar lham me ba/ /nor bu shel ltar rnam par dag cing g.yas
495a7(dkon brtsegs): su 'khyil/ /spyan dag bung ba'i tshogs dang ut+pal sngon po 'dra/ /mi dbang seng+ge'i 'gram pa rang byung bim pa'i sgros/ /sems can lhan cig 'od zer bye ba mtha' yas 'gyed//
495b1(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum rgyas par 'gengs shing ngan 'gro rnams kyang skem/ /de yi tshems ni rab dkar kha ba dngul ltar dag /bzhi bcu mnyam zhing thags bzang rmad byung legs par grub//
495b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba dam pa mchog de'i tshems kyi mche ba bzhi/ /de yi ljags ni rab yangs rang gi zhal gdong khebs/ /rgyal ba de yi gsung ni ri mchog 'dra ba'i don/ /shin tu tshim
495b3(dkon brtsegs): byed 'brel cing gya gyu med pa ste/ /tshangs dbyangs shin tu snyan pa sil snyan stong 'dra ba/ /yid gnyis 'joms pa 'dod pa rnams ni tshim byed pa/ /rgyal ba'i gsung ni lha yi sgra
495b4(dkon brtsegs): skad tshim byed pa/ /yon tan sna tshogs tshang ba byang chub yan lag mthun/ /chos kyi phreng pa yid 'ong brgya stong rab brgyus pa/ /sil snyan dga' ba bsgrags pa lha klu nyams dga'
495b5(dkon brtsegs): ba| |mi ci ka la ping+ka khu byug ngur pa dang / /rma bya ngang pa sgra snyan ku na la yi sgra/ /tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs mi ci dbyangs kyi yan lag 'dra/ /ma 'khrul sdig med don rnams thams
495b6(dkon brtsegs): cad rtogs byed pa/ /rmad byung shel ltar 'jam zhing mkhas pa'i yid 'ong ba/ /skul ba 'dul bar 'gyur ba spyod pa dgar 'gyur ba/ /gzhan gyi spyod dang mthun pa zhus na
495b7(dkon brtsegs): tshim byed pa/ /chos kyi dbang phyug de yi gsung gi yon tan 'di/ /ston pa'i mgul mdzes dung dang 'dra zhing dpung mgo zlum/ /dbyug pa lta bur phyag ring de yi bdun
496a1(dkon brtsegs): yang mtho/ /phyag mdzes sna tshogs sor mo rnams ni ring zhing zlum/ /rgyal ba de yi sku ni btso ma gser gyi mdog /ba spu g.yas su 'khyil cing
496a2(dkon brtsegs): gyen du re re skyes/ /lte ba mtha' dag zab cing gsang sbubs rta yi 'dra/ /rang byung e na ya yi byin pa glang po'i sna 'dra'i brla/ /zhabs mthil mdzes par bris pa bkra shis
496a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lo'i mtshan/ /glang po'i dbang po'i 'gros thabs seng+ge'i rtsal gyi stobs/ /khyu mchog 'gying pa'i stabs can dbang po'i mchod stong rgyas/ /mkha' las me tog
496a4(dkon brtsegs): char 'bab me tog gdugs su gyur/ /gshegs pa'i rjes 'gro 'di dag de yi rmad byung chos/ /rgyal ba rnyed dang ma rnyed bde dang sdug bsngal dang / /grags dang ma grags
496a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin bstod dang smad pa yis/ /pad+ma chus ltar thams cad du yang gos pa med/ /mi yi seng+ge de 'dra mtshungs pa'i sems can med/ /yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal bu
496a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa thos shing / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs shing rab tu dga'
496a7(dkon brtsegs): ste| dga' ba dang / bde ba skyes par gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ci
496b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba dang / de'i dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / des mngon sum du byas pa'i chos ci 'dra ba dang / de'i slob ma phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / ji ltar 'khor ba
496b2(dkon brtsegs): ya nga ba dang phrad pa dang / byas pa mi gzo ba dang / ji ltar 'khor ba na byis pa so so'i skye bo dag byas pa mi gzo ba dang / ji ltar 'jig tshogs la lta ba ya nga ba dang / ji ltar khyim gyi
496b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa dag nyes pa mang ba dang / ji ltar mkhas pa rnams kyis bag med pa smod pa dang / ji ltar ma rig pa'i mun nag rmongs pa dang /
496b4(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar 'du byed rnams rtogs par dka' ba dang / ji ltar sems gdul bar dka' ba dang / ji ltar ming dang gzugs zab pa dang / ji ltar skye mched drug dbugs 'byin pa med
496b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ji ltar reg pa yongs su ma shes te sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa dang / ji ltar tshor ba nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar sred pa'i 'ching ba dam pa dang / ji ltar nye bar
496b6(dkon brtsegs): len pa las 'byung bar dka' ba dang / ji ltar srid pa'i sred pa 'phags pa ma yin pa dang / ji ltar srid pa yod na skye ba rgyun gcad dka' ba dang / ji ltar rga ba rnam par 'gyur
496b7(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa dang / ji ltar nad kyis rnam par 'jig par byed pa dang / ji ltar 'chi ba rjes su mi srung ba dang / ji ltar 'jug pa ro bro ba chung ba dang / ji ltar srid pa mngon par 'grub
497a1(dkon brtsegs): pa nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa nyams dga' ba ltar 'di mi nus te/ 'dod pa'i khol po nyon mongs pa'i
497a2(dkon brtsegs): rmongs pa/ sems tha ba can bag med pa la dga' ba/ byis pa'i nang na 'dug pa/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'khor ba la chags pa'i sems
497a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa/ skye bo ma rungs pa'i nang na 'dug pa ni/ bde 'gro'i lam yang rnam par spyad par mi nus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
497a4(dkon brtsegs): par sangs rgyas par lta ga la 'gyur snyam mo/ /de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag sgo nas byung na ni/ nye du'i tshogs kyi bar chad byas su 'ong gi /bdag khang steng 'di
497a5(dkon brtsegs): nas thur du mchong ngo / /snyam mo/ /yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de ga la ba de
497a6(dkon brtsegs): logs su phyogs te/ khang pa de nas mchongs nas tshig 'di skad du gal te de bzhin gshegs pa de thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs she na/ de bzhin gshegs
497a7(dkon brtsegs): pa de bdag la dgongs su gsol zhes kyang smras so/ /yul 'khor skyong / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub
497b1(dkon brtsegs): blos phyag g.yas pa brkyangs te/ 'od phyung nas 'od des rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la reg go /'od de las kyang pad+ma 'dab ma brgya stong yod pa shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam
497b2(dkon brtsegs): byung bar gyur to/ /pad+ma de las kyang 'od zer brgya stong byung ste snang ba chen por gyur nas snang ba des rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer khyab par gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong /
497b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer pad+ma de la 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
497b4(dkon brtsegs): don grub blo de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /yul 'khor skyong / de nas de
497b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo des 'od de brtul ba dang / gzhon nu de sdong bu bcad pa sgyel ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du babs te/ de bzhin gshegs
497b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de la lan brgya stong du phyag 'tshal lo/ /yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo
497b7(dkon brtsegs): la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ /bdag ni ring nas na ste ring nas ldongs/ /chegs chen sman pa'i rgyal po khyod rnyed do/ /ji ltar bde gshegs bstan la gnas nas ni/ /bdag
498a1(dkon brtsegs): gis thob 'gyur mgon po bstan du gsol/ /'dren pa bdag gis bag mchis thos pa ni/ /mtshan mo bar snang lha las thos lags te/ /thos
498a2(dkon brtsegs): nas skyo ste bdag ni 'dir mchis na/ /mi rnams bag mchis 'gyur ba ji lta bu/ /lam mnyam pa la de ring ston gyur cig /ldongs par gyur pa'i mig tu deng gyur cig /dad pa'i
498a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung gnas gso mdzad thugs rje ldan/ /g.yang sa chen po 'di las bdag phyung zhing / /dbul por gyur pa bdag ni bsdu bar mdzod/ /mgon po bcings pa bdag ni deng grol
498a4(dkon brtsegs): mdzod| |som nyi bcas pa'i yid gnyis gcad du gsol/ /byang chub lam la spyod pa bdag lung ston/ /chus khyer bdag la 'gram ni bstan du gsol/ /mun pa bdag la sgron
498a5(dkon brtsegs): ma mdzad du gsol/ /rmar gyur bdag la rma med mdzad du gsol/ /sman pa'i rgyal po bdag gi zug rngu phyung / /khyod kyis ngan 'gro dag las bdag thar mdzod/ /srid par dmigs pa 'dzin
498a6(dkon brtsegs): pa gcad du gsol/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i lam gyi lam chen gyis/ /mya ngan chu chen pha rol bsgral du gsol/ /srog ni zad pa'i chos can tshe yang thung / /dge ba bar chad mang po 'byung
498a7(dkon brtsegs): ba ste| |bsod nams rnam smin ring por mi thogs 'grub/ /bdag gis dal ba gdod rnyed gcig nges gsungs/ /byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bag mchis 'gyur/ /ji ltar byang chub
498b1(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa mchog spyad na/ /'gro ba srid pa'i 'ching las thar 'gyur ba/ /'jig rten mgon po de dag bdag lung ston/ yul 'khor skyong / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blos rgyal
498b2(dkon brtsegs): bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya cher yang dag par bstan no/ /rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis
498b3(dkon brtsegs): de thos nas rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob bo/ /mngon par shes pa lnga yang thob ste/ de nam mkha' la gnas nas me tog rnams mngon par sprul te/ de bzhin gshegs
498b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de la gtor/ mngon par gtor to/ /yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal po gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer bar snang de las babs te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
498b5(dkon brtsegs): pa don grub blo de la tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod pa/ mtshan mchog ldan pa dri med zla ba'i zhal/ /gser mdog 'dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdul bral khyod
498b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dra srid pa gsum ma mchis/ /mnyam med mkhyen chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba'i dbu skra 'jam mdzes snum zhing bzang / /khyod kyi gtsug tor 'di ni ri rgyal bzhin/ /
498b7(dkon brtsegs): gtsug tor mi mthong khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis/ /thub pa khyod ni smin mtshams mdzod spu mdzes/ /kun da zla ba kha ba dung ltar dkar/ /thugs rje gang gis 'gro ba 'di
499a1(dkon brtsegs): gzigs pa/ /spyan mchog bzang po ut+pal sngon po 'dra/ /rgyal ba dri med spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ljags yangs srab la zangs kyi
499a2(dkon brtsegs): mdog 'dra ba/ /de yis rang gi zhal gyi gdong yang khebs/ /chos gsung bas ni 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid/ /'jam snum gsung ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshems
499a3(dkon brtsegs): bzang shin tu brtan pa rdo rje dang / /bcu dang sum cu snyoms shing thags bzang ba/ /'dzum pa mdzad nas 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid/ /bden gtam snyan pa khyod la phyag 'tshal
499a4(dkon brtsegs): lo| |rgyal ba khyod kyi gzugs dang mtshungs ma mchis/ /'od kyis zhing brgya dag kyang snang bar bgyid/ /'jig rten na ni tshangs dbang skyong de dag /bcom ldan khyod kyi 'od kyis
499a5(dkon brtsegs): zil du rlag / e na'i byin pa mnyam med bcom ldan 'das/ /glang po'i rgyal po rma bya seng+ge'i stabs/ /bcom ldan gnya' shing gang du gzigs shing gshegs/ /sa dang
499a6(dkon brtsegs): ri dang dam pa g.yo bar mdzad/ /bcom ldan khyod sku mtshan gyis brgyan pa ste/ /khyod kyi pags pa 'jam zhing gser mdog 'dra/ /'gro ba gzugs 'di blta bas ngoms
499a7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur/ /khyod ni mtshungs pa ma mchis gzugs dang ldan/ /khyod sngon bskal pa brgyar ni dka' thub spyad/ /khyod gtong dul dang sbyin pa kun la dgyes/ /sems can
499b1(dkon brtsegs): kun la thugs rje byams thugs ldan/ /mchog tu thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod ni sbyin dang tshul khrims rtag tu dgyes/ /khyod ni bzod dang brtson 'grus dgyes rab brtan/ /
499b2(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni bsam gtan shes rab 'od gzi mnga'/ /mtshungs med ye shes mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod ni smra ba ngan pa'i tshogs can 'joms/ /khyod ni seng+ge lta bur 'khor du sgrog /khyod ni
499b3(dkon brtsegs): sman pa'i rgyal po dri gsum sel/ /mchog tu dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thub pa sku gsung thugs ni rnam par dag /pad+ma chu ltar srid pa gsum mi gos/ /khyod ni tshangs
499b4(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs ka la ping+ka'i skad/ /srid gsum pha rol gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyis 'gro 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang / /gar la lta dang rmi lam 'dra ba dang / /bdag med sems can med
499b5(dkon brtsegs): cing srog 'gro med/ /chos rnams smig rgyu chu zla 'dra bar mkhyen/ /stong pa zhi ba skye ba med pa'i tshul/ /mi shes pas ni 'gro ba 'khyams gyur to/ /thugs rje thabs tshul rigs pa
499b6(dkon brtsegs): brgya dag gis/ /de dag rnams ni 'dzud par mdzad pa lags/ /'dod chags la sogs nad mang brgya dag gis/ /skrag par gyur pa'i 'gro la rtag gzigs te/ /bder gshegs
499b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can brgya dag yongs 'grel cing / /bla med sman pa lta bur rnam par rgyu/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi dang mya ngan non/ /sdug dang bral dang smre sngags 'don pa brgyas/ /rtag tu na ba'i sdug
500a1(dkon brtsegs): bsngal gzigs pas ni/ /thub pa thugs rjes yongs su 'grel cing rgyu/ /dud 'gro yid dwags dmyal ba'i 'gro rnams su/ /'gro kun shing rta'i
500a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phang lo bzhin du 'khor/ /glen pa dmigs bu ma mchis mgon ma mchis/ /de la lam gyi dam pa ston par mdzad/ /gtso bo mtshungs pa med pas gang bstan pa/ /
500a3(dkon brtsegs): 'phags lam de nyid gang dag sngon chad kyi/ /chos kyi dbang phyug 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/ /rgyal ba de dag rnams kyis rab tu gsungs/ /'jam zhing mnyen la yid du 'ong
500a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mchog / tshangs las lhag par mchog tu dga' bgyid pa/ /dri za mi ci lha yi bu mo mchog /sgra de zil gyis mnan nas gsungs pa mdzad/ /bden dang drang ba mi zad thabs
500a5(dkon brtsegs): tshul gyis/ /yongs sbyangs yon tan mtha' yas ldan pa'i gsung / /de thos sems can khrag khrig phrag brgya dag /theg pa gsum gyis zhi bar mchi bar bgyid/ /khyod
500a6(dkon brtsegs): la mchod pas lha yi bde ba ni/ /rnam pa mang dang de bzhin mi yi thob/ /mi yi bdag po 'gro la phan bgyid pa/ /phyug cing nor che 'byor pa chen por 'gyur/ /mtshungs
500a7(dkon brtsegs): med khyod la dad pa bskyed pa ni/ /gling bzhi'i bdag po 'khor los bsgyur ba mchog /'gro la dge ba bcu po kun byed pa/ /rin chen rab bzang bdun ldan thob par 'gyur/ /rgyal
500b1(dkon brtsegs): ba khyod la mchod pa bgyis pas ni/ /tshangs pa brgya byin 'jig rten bdag po dang / /yongs su dga' ldan lha yi bdag po dang / /gzhan 'phrul ba dang 'thab bral rab dgar 'gyur//
500b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rnam mang sel mdzad pa/ /mnyam med khyod la mchod dang mthong ba dang / /thos pa'ang de ltar 'bras bu mchis lags te/ /gnas mchog rga shi med pa
500b3(dkon brtsegs): 'thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan lam la mkhas shing lam mkhyen pa/ /'jig rten 'di ni ngan pa'i lam las bzlog /bcom ldan 'gro ba dag ni 'phags pa'i lam/ /
500b4(dkon brtsegs): bde ba zhi ba rdul dang bral la 'god/ /bsod nams gter khyod bsod nams don gnyer ba'i/ /bsod nams bgyid pa rtag tu mi bas te/ /byang chub dam pa ma thob bar du
500b5(dkon brtsegs): ni| |bskal pa bye ba mang po bas mi 'gyur/ /gzhan 'phrul 'dra ba rtag tu dga' bgyid pa/ /yongs su dag cing mdzes pa thob par 'gyur/ /dam pa'i zhing du lus dang ngag yid
500b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis| |sems can dag ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba mchod pa'i mi yis 'di la sogs/ /yon tan rnam pa du ma thob par 'gyur/ /mtho ris thar pa mi yi bde ba
500b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / /'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gter thob 'gyur/ /khyod kyi brjod dang grags pa rgya chen po/ /phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing mang brgyar yang mchis/ /rgyal ba khyod kyi bsngags
501a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phreng ba ni/ /bde bar gshegs rnams 'khor du rtag par sgrog /rims nad bral zhing 'gro ba thar mdzad pa/ /mthong na dga' ba thugs rje
501a2(dkon brtsegs): mchog ldan pa/ /bcom ldan dbang po zhi ba zhi bgyid pa/ /mi mchog dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis rgyal ba khyod kyi gsung thos nas/ /mngon par
501a3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa lnga thob mkha' la gnas/ /dpa' bo bde gshegs mtshungs par bdag gyur te/ /dri med chos ni 'gro la rnam par 'byed/ /lha dang mi dang klus mchod bde
501a4(dkon brtsegs): bar gshegs/ /yon tan kun gyi mthar phyin deng bstod pas/ /bsod nams rgya chen gang bsgrubs gyur pa des/ /'gro ba sangs rgyas go 'phang thob par shog /yul 'khor
501a5(dkon brtsegs): skyong / de nas mtshan mo de'i nam nangs pa dang / rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis gzhon nu'i bud med kyi khor du ba'i sgra thos so/ /thos nas kyang myur ba myur bar rings pa'i
501a6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyis grong khyer dga' mchog ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod ci'i phyir ngu / de dag gis smras pa/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams
501a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'od zer mi gda' ba'i slad du'o/ /yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gzhon nu'i phyir shing bcad pa bsgyel ba ltar sa la 'gyel te langs nas ngu
501b1(dkon brtsegs): zhing grong khyer der lan stong du yongs su btsal lo/ /yul 'khor skyong / de nas grong khyer de na grong khyer gyi lha gang yin pa des rgyal po 'od zer ldan la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
501b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir shar phyogs logs su song ngo / /
501b3(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gzhon nu btsal ba'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig
501b4(dkon brtsegs): tu shar gyi phyogs cha ga la ba der song ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blo ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom
501b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs
501b6(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/ srid gsum khyod mtshungs ma mchis lhag pa ga la mchis/ /sems can dam pa lha dbang lha min rgyal pos bkur/ /skye bo khyod kyi
501b7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs la blta bas ngoms mi 'gyur/ /yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba khyod sku sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rab dag /lhun po rin chen mchog
502a1(dkon brtsegs): gis spras ltar yongs su dag / rgyal ba sdug cing 'jam pa gser gyi kha dog 'dra/ /blta sdug gzugs mnga' thub pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal
502a2(dkon brtsegs): lo| |bskal pa bye brgya bsam gyis mi khyab brtul zhugs spyad/ /bskal pa bye ba brgya mang sangs rgyas bsti stang mdzad/ /sngon chad mchod sbyin brgya phrag bsam gyis
502a3(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab mdzad/ /des na khyod sku bzang zhing shin tu mdzes pa lags/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang / /bzod dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan thabs
502a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis khyod gzugs sbyangs/ /khyod kyi spyan sngar brgya byin tshangs 'od gsal ma lags/ /chu shel nor bu glog gi 'od kyang mdzes ma lags/ /'gro ba'i don du yid du mchi
502a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gzugs kyang ston/ /chu zla 'dra zhing sgyu ma 'dra bar gda' ba lags/ /rang gi phyogs rnams kun tu rgyal ba'i sku yang gda'/ /bder gshegs rnams kyi sku yi tshad ni
502a6(dkon brtsegs): gda' ma lags/ /khyod ni dga' ldan 'ga' zhig na yang bzhugs par gda'/ /'chi 'pho mdzad cing rab dga' glang por gyur nas ni/ /dpa' bo yum gyi lhums su
502a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs par gda' bar mdzad/ /thub chen nam mkha' lta bur thams cad rjes su zhugs/ /bcom ldan phyogs 'gar bltams par ston pa'ang mdzad pa ste/ /sa
502b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' dag tu gom pa bdun por gda' ba mdzad/ /nga ni lha mir bcas 'gro nang gtso shin tu lta/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal mtsho las gdon zhes gsung yang phyung / /thub khyod chos
502b2(dkon brtsegs): gang la yang the tshom mi mnga' yang / /yi ge shes pa slob ltar 'jig rten dag na gda'/ /bsam gtan ting 'dzin spyod yul zhi ba brnyes gyur kyang / /kha cig tu ni bud med
502b3(dkon brtsegs): nang na zhugs par gda'/ /yab dang yum dang sras dang bud med rnams kyang btang / /gnyen rnams mya ngan non te rnam par brgyal zhing ngu / /sems can dam pa bye ba brgya
502b4(dkon brtsegs): yis yongs bskor nas/ /nags gnas gnas gcig pu nas 'byung bar gda' ba'ang mdzad/ /khyod ni bdud bzhi pham par mdzad nas yun ring yang / /zhing na bdud
502b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba yang gda' ba ston pa mdzad/ /sngon chad 'khor lo bsam gyis mi khyab bskor gyur kyang / /khyod ni thugs rjes 'khor lo bskor bar gda' ba mdzad/ /rtag tu rtag lta
502b6(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes ldan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas/ /mya ngan 'da' zhes 'khor gyi nang du tshig tu gsungs/ /rtag tu 'khor bar dga' ba'i 'gro ba gzigs nas ni/ /khyod ni zhi ba bsil
502b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur mya ngan 'das pa gsung / /khyod kyi bsod nams ye shes shes rab thabs mtshungs med/ /thub pa khyod sku 'od kyis zhing mang rgyas par 'gengs/ /phyogs rnams dag na 'dren pa
503a1(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi bsngags pa gsung / /kun tu spyod yul thub pa'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos nyid ma lus brnyes par gyur la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems
503a2(dkon brtsegs): can kun gyi bgyi ba sgyu ma ltar gda' yang / /thub pa khyod ni gang du bzhud pa'am byon ma lags/ /sgyu ma'i chos tshul gnas la mngon par phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba'i don du
503a3(dkon brtsegs): gang gis byang chub mchog thob pa/ /lam mchog mi yi dpa' bo khyod kyis legs gsungs pa/ /bdag gis chos nyid 'di ni myur du sangs rgyas nas/ /mi dpa' 'gro ba'i don
503a4(dkon brtsegs): du chos nyid bshad par bgyi/ /mi yi dpa' bo thub pa kun mkhyen rims bral ba/ /srid gsum mtshungs pa ma mchis lhag pa ga la zhig /bdag gis 'dir bstod
503a5(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams mtha' yas gang bsgrubs des/ /'jig rten byang chub bla med zhi mchog thob par shog /yul 'khor skyong / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub
503a6(dkon brtsegs): b lo des rgyal po 'od zer ldan de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas ci nas thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur
503a7(dkon brtsegs): ba de ltar chos bstan to/ /yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de la
503b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sang bdag gi grong khyer du gdugs tshod gsol bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu
503b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la thugs brtse bar dgongs te cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo / /yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer
503b3(dkon brtsegs): gyis pha ma de gnyis dang / grogs po de dag dang / bud med de dag la smras pa/ khyed cag thams cad rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig /ci nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan
503b4(dkon brtsegs): te ma chags par de bzhin gshegs pa la dbul du rung bar gyis shig / de dag gis sgra skad gcig tu rjes su yi rang ngo / /yul 'khor skyong / de nas rgyal po gzhon nu
503b5(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis ci nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan te ma chags par de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo/ /ro bro ba bkod pa lnga brgya pa'i zhal zas kyang de
503b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la gsol to/ /dge slong de dag thams cad kyi phyir rin po che sna bdun gyis g.yogs pa'i gtsug lag khang
503b7(dkon brtsegs): nor bu'i 'chags bshams pa/ steng du rin po che'i dra bas bla re bres pa/ g.yas g.yon du me tog gi shing ljon pa legs par yongs su grub par byas pa/ me tog
504a1(dkon brtsegs): pad+ma dkar po'i rdzing gis mdzes par byas pa/ ras bcos bu mu gnyis dri ma med pa brgya stong bting ba'i mal bshams pa/ dge slong re re la gos
504a2(dkon brtsegs): kha na ma tho ba med pa gang spyin pa de/ phyi de nyin mi sbyin gyi/ nyin gcig bzhin gos gzhan dang / gzhan sbyin par 'gyur bar byas so/ /de lo bye ba phrag gsum gyi bar
504a3(dkon brtsegs): du rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur/ bdag la dga' ba ma byas/ sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i phyir gzhan yid la ma byas so/ /bar skabs der 'dod pa
504a4(dkon brtsegs): la rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog par ma gyur/ rgyal srid la sred par ma gyur te/ lus
504a5(dkon brtsegs): dang srog la yang mi lta na/ dngos po gzhan la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bar skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gsungs pa de thams cad kun tu bzung ste/ de
504a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la lan gnyis su ma zhus so/ /bar skabs der khrus ma byas/ mar dang 'bru mar gyis lus la ma bskus/ rkang pa ma bkrus/ ngal ba'i 'du shes
504a7(dkon brtsegs): ma bskyed do/ /zan za ba dang / bshang gci byed pa ma gtogs par nam yang 'dug par ma gyur to/ /gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das
504b1(dkon brtsegs): pa de'i tshe tsan+dan dmar po'i zhugs la bzhen pa byas so/ /gang du de bzhin gshegs pa de zhugs la bzhen pa'i sa phyogs de nyid du 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad pa'i me tog thams
504b2(dkon brtsegs): cad dang / phreng ba thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / rol mo'i sgra thams cad kyis lo brgya stong du ring bsrel la mchod pa byas par gyur ba nas rgyu rkyen thams cad bsags
504b3(dkon brtsegs): te phyis mchod rten bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du byas so/ /mchod rten de dag la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi rin po che'i dra bas g.yogs so/ /mu tig gi dra ba'i bla re dag
504b4(dkon brtsegs): bres so| |mchod rten re re la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs lnga brgya lnga brgya phul lo/ /mchod rten de dag thams cad la yang sil snyan brgya stong phul lo/ /'dzam bu'i
504b5(dkon brtsegs): gling khor yug tu me tog gi shing ljon pa bskrun to/ /mchod rten re re la yang mar me'i rdza bo brgya stong las mar me bus so/ /mar me'i rdza bo re re nas kyang spos kyi 'bru mar
504b6(dkon brtsegs): drug cu rtsa bzhi pa stong gi mar me bus so/ /spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa thams cad kyis kyang mchod pa byas so/ /tshul de lta bus lo bye ba'i bar du mchod pa byas te/
504b7(dkon brtsegs): phyis rab tu byung ngo / /de rab tu byung nas kyang chos gos gsum par gyur cing rtag tu bsod snyoms sbyin pa dang / rtag tu tsog bu pa ste/ nam yang glos ma phab bo/ /nam yang
505a1(dkon brtsegs): rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to/ /de zang zing med pa'i sems kyis lo bye ba phrag bzhi'i bar du chos kyi sbyin pa byin te/ de gzhan la
505a2(dkon brtsegs): tha na legs so/ /zhes bya ba tsam la yang re bar ma gyur na/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de chos nyan pa'am chos bshad pas kyang ngal bar ma gyur to/ /
505a3(dkon brtsegs): de la lha rnams kyang bsnyen bkur byed do/ /yul 'khor gyi mi thams cad dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang / nang mi thams cad dang / grogs po thams cad kyang de'i rjes
505a4(dkon brtsegs): su bslab ste rab tu byung ngo / /yul 'khor skyong / de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyi rjes su slob pa'i
505a5(dkon brtsegs): yul gyi mi thams cad rab tu byung gi / bdag cag gis de la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byas na/ dkon mchog gsum la rim gro byas par 'gyur ro/ /snyam mo/ de
505a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos lo bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du gnas te/ dge slong bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis
505a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su bzung ngo / /tshul 'di lta bus sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi la rnam pa de lta bu'i mchod pa byas so/ /yul 'khor skyong /
505b1(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod de ltar dogs shing the tshom za'am yid gnyis su gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi
505b2(dkon brtsegs): blta'o| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya bar gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong / de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal
505b3(dkon brtsegs): bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod de ltar dogs shing the tshom za'am yid gnyis su gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o//
505b4(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya bar gyur to/ /grong khyer gyi lha gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs
505b5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong / de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
505b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas par 'dod pas lhag pa'i bsam pas bsgrubs pa dang / sdug pa dang mi sdug pa yongs su spangs pa dang / bag yod pa'i spyod pas rgyal bu bsod nams kyi 'od
505b7(dkon brtsegs): zer de'i rjes su bslab par bya'o/ /ngas bya dka' ba mngon par 'du bya ba de lta bus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /de lta bas na/ de dag mi
506a1(dkon brtsegs): brtson pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa lhur len pa dang / shes kyi khe la chags pa dang / nga rgyal gyis bcom pa dang /
506a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i rgyus nyon mongs shing sha thang pa dang / 'dod pa'i rgyus bstan pa las ring du gyur pa dang / rab tu byung ba don med pa dang / dge sbyong sun par byed pa dang / byang
506a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' dmu rgod dang / lus dang / ngag dang / sems mi drang ba dang / ltas lta ba dang / khas 'che ba nor ba dang / rang gi dam bcas pa las nyams pa dang /
506a4(dkon brtsegs): gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i ched kyi sman dang / yo byad kyi mtshan ma la chags pa dang / ngo tsha mi shes pa dang / khrel med pa dang / cho ga nyams pa dang /
506a5(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos ma yin pa la 'jug pa dang / spyod yul dang bral ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul las ring du gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang bral ba dang /
506a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang bral bar gyur to/ /yul 'khor skyong / de lta bas na/ rnam pa 'di lta bu'i chos 'di thos nas sdig pa'i bshes gnyen rigs pa med pa
506a7(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa don du gnyer ba dang mi bsten par shes par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba'i spyod
506b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dpag med na/ snying ni thob dang shes kyi khe la song / /byang chub yon tan brgyas khebs por nas ni/ /de dag thob phyir gzhan gyi khyim la dga'/ /khwa 'dra sdang ba khrel dang mos blo
506b2(dkon brtsegs): bral| |shes kyi khe phyir bdud kyi dbang du song / /nyon mongs rag lus srid pa'i 'gro bar gzhol/ /bdag 'dir yon tan ldan zhes de skad smra/ /lus ni dgon na dran pa grong
506b3(dkon brtsegs): khyer du| |thob phyir de dag rnam par rtog pas spyod/ /gnam dang sa ltar thar las ring ba ste/ /de 'dra de dag sprul ltar ring du spang / /de dag sangs rgyas chos dang ji bzhin
506b4(dkon brtsegs): du| |dge 'dun yon tan brgyas gang dga' ma yin/ /mtho ris bor nas ngan pa'i lam du song / /sdug pas phongs nas srid pa'i 'gro bar 'khyams/ /nga yi spyod pa nye
506b5(dkon brtsegs): bar bstan pa 'di thos nas/ /yang dag lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sgrub pas 'di la sbyor/ /bskal pa bye ba mang pos rnyed dka' dal rnyed kyi/ /de ltar ji skad bstan pa'i chos
506b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid ston pa 'dir brtson gyis/ /gang zhig theg mchog byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod/ /de yis rgyal po de yi yon tan dran par bya/ /bsam ste yang dag ji bzhin
506b7(dkon brtsegs): tshul bzhin gnas par bya/ /de ltas bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub chags med 'grub/ /yon tan 'di dag rtogs pas 'phags pa'i rigs la brten/ /rang gis
507a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dir ni kun tu shes pa bskyed par bya/ /bstan pa yon tan snying po 'di 'dra ma spangs shig /byis pa lta bur 'gro ba lngar ni 'khyams sa re/ /
507a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dir ni ri dang dgon pa phug tu gnas par bya/ /der gnas nas ni bdag mi snyems shing gzhan mi smad/ /sngon chad sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya mnyes ma byas/ /rjes su
507a3(dkon brtsegs): dran nas rtag par rgyun du bdag la spyos/ /lus dang srog la sred pa ma chags spang bar bya/ /gus pa drag po bskyed nas chos la brtson par bgyi/ /nga yis mdo 'dir
507a4(dkon brtsegs): sgrub pa bshad pa 'dir gnas na/ /de dag rnams kyis phyi nas byang chub rnyed mi dka'/ /gang dag rgyal ba'i theg pa 'di la dga' brtson pa/ /thos nas phyir zhing yid ni
507a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par bya ba'i rigs/ /de lta bas na bstan la mos pa bskyed par bya/ /rnam par rgyu ba'i tshe na phyis 'gyod gyur ta re/ /yul 'khor skyong / byang chub sems dpa'
507a6(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la spyod la/ yang gang zhig bdag 'di la bslab bo/ /bdag sdom pa 'di la gnas par bya'o/ /snyam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nan
507a7(dkon brtsegs): tan gyis bsgrubs na/ bsod nams kyi phung po de bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i gan na brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye
507b1(dkon brtsegs): ba brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sngon sems ma
507b2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa'i lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye rgu khrag khrig phrag sum cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas bla na med pa yang
507b3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /dge slong bdun stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /de nas bcom ldan
507b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ de
507b5(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /yul 'khor skyong / de lta bas na/ khyod kyis chos kyi
507b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di dam bcas pa don yod pa rnam par dag ba zhes bya bar zungs shig / skyes bu dam pa rnam par rol pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par nges pa zhes
507b7(dkon brtsegs): bya bar yang zungs shig / don yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong
508a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
508a2(dkon brtsegs): bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya
508a3(dkon brtsegs): ste| 'dus pa bco brgyad pa rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / mu ni warma dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes
508a4(dkon brtsegs): sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ //
